bousiritudaigakuno hougakubude syokuminseisakuno kougiwo tanninsiteru yasugiha aru tokisono gakkoude hakkousareteru daigakusinbunno zadankaini syussekisitaga zadankaimo owari sibaraku zatudanga tudukimou sankaitoiu magiwaninattemada katute uketakotononai situmonwo hitorino gakuseikara teisyutusareta 
syokumintini okeru gengotoiuyounakotoga wadaininatteta atodearuga gengokara bunsyouhetonde genzainipponno sinbunya zassini keisaisareteru ookuno bunsyounonakade kutoutensunawati maruya tengahidoku keisisareteruyouna kangaarugasoredeyoimonodearoukasoretomo kutoutenhasahodo zyuuyounamonodehanainodearoukatosouiu situmonnanodearu 
yasugihatossani meitoumonasikaneii kagenna henziwositeiruto aiteno gakuseiha sarani mondaiwo meiryounisitekita 
zibunha hantouumareno monodeatte nihongonihakanari syuuzyukusitatumorideori zyouzeturukotoniha zisinwo motteiruga bunsyouwo kakutonarutodousitemo kakutyouga dete konai 
sokode bunsyouno kakutyouwo kakutokusurunoha kutoutenwo ziyuuni kusisurukotoni aruto kangaetuiteikurakasono houmende zitokusurutokorogaatta 
sikaruni bungakusyano kaitamononadowo yondemo kutoutenno zyuudainakoto iwabasorezoreno kutoutenha hitotuno moziizyouno zyuuryouwo motterutoiukotoga hotondo darekaramo kangaerareteinaiyouna genzyoudearu 
korehadouiukotodearouka unnun
sounaruto yasugiha masumasusokutouga dekikanerunodeattagasono mondaiyorimo aitega hantouumareno gakuseidatoiukotono houni kokorowo hikaretesono huubouwo mimamotta 
yasugigakoremade sikitteru hantouumareno gakuseiniha honeno kakutattasosite donzyuuna kanzinosuru huubouno monoga ooku nakanigoku wazuka sirosekiakitosidatoiu kanzino huubouno monogaattaga imano aiteno gakuseihasono syousuuna kousyano hitoride sikamodokokatoboketayouna bisyousae ukabeteirunodeatta 
sono hohoeno kageni yasugihakotiramo bisyoude ouzite kutoutenno mondaiha zibunnimoyoku wakaranaikara bungakusyanidemo kiitagayokarouto sottyokuni kotaeta 
sorekara hanasiha seiyoubunniha kutoutennominarazu syusyuno imiwo motu kigouga ookuarunoni nihonbunya kotowazabunya kanbunnisorerano kigouga sukunainohadouiuwakedaroukatono gimonnitobi yasugino tizinde sousakumoyareba honyakumoyatteru yosimurananka mozino gosyokuyorimo kutoutenno gosyokuno hougayohodo kininaruto heisoitteirukotonadogamotidasareta 
sosite yosimurano ikendemo kiiteminaikatoiuyounakotokara yasugiha aiteno gakuseino namaeno sumomoeiyasusitoiunowo sirimata saranisono kaowo nagametanodatta 
sumomoeiyasusitoiu namaeha yasugino kiokuno nakaniatta 
suukagetumaesyokuminseisakunituiteno gakunenmatuno sikenno touanwo miteiruuti tyuuiwo hikareta itiyouga sumomoeiyasusinosoredattanodearu 
ittaigakuseino touannouti mizikakute kitanainoha seturetude nagakute kireinanoha yuuryoudeatte sikamo husigini mizikainoha oku nagainoha kireidearu 
sikaruni sumomoeiyasusinoha tinrasiku mizikakute kireideatta 
teatoga rippananoha hantousyussinsyatosite dakukeruga kutoutenwo seizentotuketa bunsyoude sikamo youtendakega kanmeini kakareteita 
sono bikotona teatoto meisekina buntaitoni sessite yasugihatyotto touansirabeno yuuutusakara sukuwareta kigasita 
sosite gakkouno kyoumukahe tensuuwo houkokusuru orikon'ina zimuinto kaowo awasitanode betuni nantoiukotonaku sumomoeiyasusino zenpanno seisekiwo kiitemita 
dono kamokumomina yuuryoudatta 
tada hitotu husiginanoha kakugakunenno syuuryoukamokugagoku syousuude osoraku sikenwo uketari ukenakattarisitanodearouka hutuunara sannenkande sotugyoudekiru hazunanonimou yonenkanmo zaigakusiteitemada sansino kamokuga nokotterukotodatta 
henna gakuseidato zimuinmo itteita 
souiu kiokuga yasugino atamani yomigattekita 
zadankaiha sankaitonari yasugiha zidousyawo tatte sukosi arukukototosi sumomoeiyasusito hanasino tudukimoaruyoude sizenni turedatte ikukotoninatta 
hokano gakuseitatito hutarino kyousitoha bunsyouno mondainadoniha kyoumiganainoka aruiha sumomoga sizyuutinmokuwo mamotteita matuni yasugito naganagahanasidasitanoni enryositeka aruiha mitisuziga kotonarunoka wakareteittesimatta 
yasugiha sumomoto hutaride ogawatyouno kaizyoukarao tyano mizuekihigasigutino houhe hiroi sizukana gairowo sukosi sakenihotetta mide yakiwo suinagarayukkuri asiwo hakonda 
wadaiha bunsyounokotokara hanarete yasugino koukisinno muku houhe ugoiteitta 
sosite kyuutino siteino mani okeruyouna kaiwaga tuduita 
kunhadono kamokumo seisekiga yuuryounanonidousite gonenkanmo gakkouniguzutuiterundai 
hayaku sotugyousita hougaiizyanaika 
sonnakotowo yasugiga sitterunowo sumomoha ibukarimosezu sunaoni kotaeta 
gakkouniiru maniiroironakoto benkyousitaindesu 
takusankougiwo kiiterunokai 
kougidehaarimasen 
syokuzitoka hensyuutoka kouseitoka kenkyuusitemimasita 
sosite kareha aru tiisana insatusyoni tetudaini ittakoto aru douzinzassino hensyuuwo tetudattakoto aru tizinno kouseiwosasetemorattakotonadowo hanasita

omosirokunaimonoha kouseimo iyakegasasi omosiroimononinaruto kouseihasezunitada yondesimaunodatta

to yasugiha itta 
yaremasukeredo gakkouwo sotugyousuruto gakuhiga moraemasen 
gakuhigasorezyaa darekaraka hozyodemo uketerunokai 
titigaimasenkara ozikara moratteimasu 
ozisannara sotugyousitekarademo seikatuhiwo tasuketemoraerudarou 
sorehaikemasen 
sotugyousureba hatarakanebanarimasen hatarakutonaruto benkyousuru zikanganakunarimasu 
suruto ozisanha gakubuga sannende sotugyoudekirukotowo siranainokai 
sitteimasu 
sosite hayaku sotugyousiroto iwanainokai 
kibousiteirudesyou 
sikasiiroiro benkyousita hougayoikotomoyoku sitteimasu 
kunno hanasihayoku wakaranyo 
ozisannisoredake rikaigaarunara hayaku sotugyousita houga zyugyouryoudakedemo nakute sumuzyanaika 
sikasi sotugyousureba hatarakanebanarimasen 
gakkouniirutumoride benkyoudakesurebaiizyanaika 
souikimasen doutokuno mondaidesu 
doutokusonna doutokugaarumonka 
sotugyoudekirunowoitumademoguzutuiterunoha ozisanni taisitenao hudoutokudarou 
watasizisinno doutokudesu 
sotugyousite hatarakanainoha hudoutokudesu 
gakkouniwazawazaguzutuiteirunoha kunno kotobade hudoutokuzyanainokai 
hudoutokutoha omoimasen 
benkyounotamedesu 
sono uegakkouniiru houga sinyousaremasu 
sinyounanno sinyoudai 
sekenno sinyoudesu 
senseidemo gakuseino watasinara sinyounasarudesyou 
gesyukuyatoka apaatotoka insatuyademo gakuseinara sinyousimasu 
sotugyousite hatarakanaitoikura benkyousiteruto ittemo sinyousimasen 
sikasi kunsinyoutoiumonoha mibunni taisurumonozyanakute ningenni taisurumonodarou 
sou omoimasu 
sonnara kunno hanasiha wakaranyo 
sekenga wakaranaindesyou 
soumo ieruga 
yasugiha kutiwo kinnda 
naniyara huniotiruyounaotinaiyounamonono nakakara sumomono itimennihakkiri hureta kigasitanodatta 
sumomono zaigakuriyuukoini hikinobasareta zaigakuno riyuuha yousuruni kareitionoreno doutokuto tuisekentekisakuryakutono hutatuni yorumonorasii 
zensyaniha issyuno zikonisemanno kimigaarugasono sokoni nanika hokanomonoga hisondeirurasii 
kousyaniha hantousyussinsyano kuzyuuga mieruga sikasi ippanni ittemo osoraku atarukotodearou 
sositekono ryousyawo awase kangaeru tokisumomono hitogaranoutini aru osorosiimonoga ukandekuruyoudeatta 
sikasi yasuginihasoregamadahakkiri tukamenakatta 
tada sumomonotekipakisita sottyokuna kotobanonakani kano sisouno tikaratoiuyounamonowo kanzita 
sosite kano kaokara mewo hazurasite tinsino kimotini sasowarerunodatta 
o tyano mizuekihigasigutini kuruto yasugiha densyani norutameni wakareyoutosita 
sono nisanaruatokara sumomoni yobitomerareta 
senseiyosimurasanhe gosyoukaisite kudasaimasenka 
sonokotowo yasugihamou wasureteita 
syoukaisurunara tegamidemo kaiteyaroukato omottagasorewo tomete hiziribasino rankanno uede meisini kantanna monkuwo kakitukete sumomoni watasita 
nisumomoeiyasusiha yasugino meisisyoukaide yosimurawo otozurete kita 
betuni bungakuya bunsyouni kansuru mondaiwo teisyutusurudemonakuarihureta zatudandakede sikamo ookuha yosimurakara kikarerumamani tyousenno hanasinadowosi itizikanbakaride kaetteitta 
tada bakuzentaru kyoumide yosimuratoiu sonzaiwo nagametadakenoyoudatta 
sorekara tokidokikareha yosimurawo otozurete kita 
sigototyuudato huhukurasii mesyokumosezunikonikosite kaetteitta 
gekina tokiniha itizikanbakari zatudansiteitta 
sosite ikanaru zatudanno orinimo karegahakkirisita danteino kotobawo torosurunowo yosimuraha miotosazu sidaini koukangamoteruyouninatta 
nikagetubakaritatta gorodeattarouka kareha suumaino genkouwo motte kita 
yosimurahasono mizikaimonowo kano maede yondemiyoutosita 
o azukesiteokimasu 
atode yondemite kudasai 
to sumomoha itta 
sono kotobaga heisono sumomoniha huzigounanode yosimuraha kaette koukisinwo okosita 
sumomono genkoutoiunoha syousetutomo syouhintomotukanaimonode hittinimo seisonomuragaari bunsyounimo tokorodokoroayasiitokorogaattaga daitaituginoyounamonodearu

daihaoyazitoiunodearu 
oyazitoha syuuino monotatigatuketa syakumeida 
sizyuutosiamarino otokode touhatuhamada irokokute kataiga iwaba zyoubuna kenamiwomurini mabikikaretayoude kazusukunaku wakai tokiha binandattarouto omowareru hosonagai kaorituniha seikatuno kondakuwo simesutarumiga hukaku araware medakegahenni seikiwo obiteiru

tyantositearuyo ieni 
saa tousan ikundayo

zyaa ikukana

syouzikina wakamonoda

korekarahamou kessitekonnatokoroni asibumihasasenai

osorosiinoha syuukantoiuyatudesu 
sounaruto itizaha damarikondesiintonatta 
soreganao kano zyouzetuwo aotta 
yotu haraino hayakutito hiyakutekina rensoutode sugurukowo datatakanbakarino seidatta 
sono notino gironwo zini youyakusureba 
yono nakano gaiakuhatada syuukandakeda 
syuukandakega ninwozuruzuru hikikuzusu 
syuukandenaimonoha bonte sinsende nanrakano igiwo motteiru 
syuukannoutidemo mottomo osorosiinoha insyuto kituenda 
soreha zyouzyuuhudanno syuukantyuudokunimade rituitaru syuukanninari erukarada 
syoyuuyokuya syokuyokusettouya houtoumo zyousyuuninatte hazimete gaiakude hossatekinanoha keppakuto ittemoii 
satuzinnadodesaemo hossatekinamonodearukarasore zitaitosite ookuha keppakunamonoda 
ren'aiga gaiakudenai yuenhasorega syuukanninari enaikarada 
ren'aito syuukantoha ryouritusinai 
dakara ren'aihaitumademo gaiakutonaranai 
sikasi houtouno kataha syuukanninari yasui 
dakara houtouha gaiakutonaru 
mottomo syuukanninari yasuimonoha insyuda 
dakara insyuha osorosii gaiakutonaru

arigataikotoda 
daga musukodakeniha onazi towo arukasetakunai

mattaku oyazidakeda 
sositeoyaziga atusureba atusuruhodo dokusinsyuginotoriutiha masumasuhiyakaninatteitta

kirakudesuze 
oyaziha nantomo kotaenaide mizuwo abitayouni kutiwo tugumi aiteno kaowo misueta 
sorekarahurahurato tatiatte domawo yuuzunda kisuguruno kanwonutte tyoubano houhe iki sorano biirukamewo ippontotte kita

watasiha tikaiwo mamoru 
oyazitositeno tikaiwo mamorunda

soreha kanoitumono kusedatta

itunokotoka kareha tyousenzinno kenkawo mitakotogaatta 
hutaride nanika ii arasotteruutini hitoriga tatiatte sugurukono ueno sorano biirukamewo toruga hayaika aiteno noutenmegaketesupa ^ritoitta 
dousita kokyuugaattanoka biirukameha kowaremosezu aiteha zugaikotuga sinzituninattebutu taoretatoiunoda

youoyazisan tanonmasuze

areha zissainiattakotodesu

wakarimasita 
sorekara sotoniha 
sotonihasoudaneanooyazisanno doutokutoiuka sisoutoiuka youyakusareterutokoronanka 
aaareha watasino sisouwotyottobokasitandesu 
kunno sisoudatte 
soudesu 
sosite sumomoga katarutokoroni yorebaano nomi yaha karegatyoityoi rituyoruoden yawo zyunsyokusitamonorasikuoyazitomo mensikigaari kotonisono musukotoha kon'inisiteiru 
oyakotomoni aru ookina insatugaisyano syokuzikoude ryousyano kankeimoano toorideatte sumomohasono husino tatibani tokusyuna kyoumiwo motianoyouna sisouwo motte musukowo hagemasiteiru 
nao sokowowatte ieba titioyaga musukowo sidousurunoha hutuunokotodearuga sakenomimide siyounonai titioyawo musukoga rouwari zibunno roukude titioyano nomi kawo hozyosiaaiu sisoude gyakuni titioyawo sidousurutoiukotoha yukaidehanaikato iunodatta 
douiukotogaattemo tatoeba daizisingaattemo musukoga sensouni deruyounakotogaattemoano sakenomimino titioyato kinbenna musukoto hutaritomoarede sukuwarerunodehanaidesyouka 
kotobaha sottyokude kaohanikonikositeru sumomono yousuwo yosimuraha tabakono kemurigosini nagamenagaraoyazi ippenni taisuru zibunno yomino sensani kyowo tukareta kokotigasita 
daga nanikamadasikkurisinaimonogaatta 
sou kunno sakuihayoku wakaru 
dagasorenisiteha zentaino nandaka hurumekasii kanzihadousitandaroune 
sorenandesu 
watasinimo wakaranainoha 
sosite kareha syokuzikouno titioyani meisenno kimonowokisetari dousyokuno musukowozutto nenwakakusite ritigina syouteninnisitarisitakotoga zibundemohidoku iyadattato kokuhakusita 
tumari syousetuwo kakoutositandane 
soukamo siremasen 
senseiga syousetukanamondesukara 
sosite kareha musinnatomo ieruyouna emiwo ukabeta 
sikaruni totuzenkarehabusitukeni iidasita 
ano genkouhamou huyoudakara senseini saageru 
kakinaosite tukatte kudasuttemoyoi 
sono kawari mattaku betunakotodaga sanzyuuenkasite kudasai 
sikyuunyuuyougaatte komatteirunode tasukete kudasai 
o temotoninakereba zassisyani tegamidemo kaite kudasai 
tukaha zibungasuru 
yosimurahatyotto akire kaetta 
sonnani kyuunakotowo ittatte bokuno binbounakotokurai watterudarouzyanaika 
watasiha isogundesukeredo 
maa nisannitimati tamae kangaeteokou 
sonnakotode sumomoha kaetteittaga mikkanotinimatayatte kite sanzyuuenno saisokuwosita 
yosimuraha sarani akiretemou nisannitimateto itte kaesita 
mikkanotini sumomohamatayatte kita 
yosimuramo akiramete saiwaisorekuraino ziawasehaattanode dasiteyatta 
sumomoha kodomonoyouna yorokobiwo kaoni ukabete kaetteitta 
sorekara hatukakanbakari sumomoha sugatawo misenakattaga aru yuugataiseiyokuyatte kite zehitomo issyoni syokuziwosini dekaketekureto tanomunodatta 
ano sanzyuuenhataihen yakuni tatimasita 
senseini kaesitattedouse tukattesimaundesyoukarao reinotumoride watasini syokuziwoogorasete kudasai

arukinagara sumomohakonnakotowo itta 
ano sanzyuuenha zituha reinooyazino musukogaoyazino sinkyuuno nomi daini komatterunode kasiteyatta 
sikasi kangaetemirutoaaiu sisouha kingakakatte binbouninniha komaru

kinnokakaranai zissenkanouna sisouga hituyounanodagasorega midasenainoga nayamida

gakkouniiru hougairoiro benridehaaru

karehanandakahidokusabisii kokoromotigasita 
zibunno syuuiniha zibunno siranu mani zibunno siranu atarasii sekaiga koudaini hattensiteitesousite zibunnimottomo sitasii nintatino tasuuhaminnasono atarasii sekaini ikiteiru

ookikunaranaide itininmaeni kowo motteiru

iwabasorezoreno kawano aziwomotteirunoda

ugokasarenaito iu kotowo imano watasiha aru imide hizyouninozonde iru kotodesu 
watasino semai satoruya aimada nenno guaide tokidokiha zibunno osorewo kanziruhodo monogotoni ugokasaremasu 
issatuhonwo yomeba taiteino tokiha nanikamousukkari kokorono sokomade kangekisite simau youna kotoga attesono dobini zibunwo zyounaku omottari motironzyounaku omoikiridehekotarehasimasenkere tomomaamaato omotte mitarisimasu 
yono nakano dekigotonosubeteni taisite sayoudesu

hontouni ugokasaretakunai

toiimasita 
suruto ieno nakakara koebakaridedaremo kaowo dasazuninanimoyaruyounamonohanai !tosikaruyouni kotaemasita 
sono nitihadouiumonoka kozikiha naniieheikimasitemo onaziyounakotowoitte kotowararemasita

to kozikihatukuduku omowazunihairaremasendesita 
sekinakaniobusatteiru akan bouga haraga hettanode naki dasimasita 
kozikihadousitaraiikahontouni komattesimaimasita 
taiyouhayagate nisini katamukikakatteimasu 
sono nitino hikariwonagametebonyarito siannihuketteimasuto taiyouhanikoyakana marui kaowositeitumademokonna ninzyounonai matiniitanodehasikataganai 
hayaku nitino kurenaiutinihokano matiheittahougaii 
to satositeiruyouni omowaremasita 
otokono kozikiha zibuntatini huninzyoudeatta matiwouramesisouni ikutabimo mikaerinagara tukareta asiwohikizuttetobotobotomata tooi mitiwo aruitehokano matiwosasiteittanodearimasu 
sorekara mikkabakaritatimasita 
aru matiwoarukimawatteimasutokini kozikiha mikkabakari maeni zibungatattekita matigasukkari umisyounotamenisarawaretesimattatoiuyounauwasawo kikimasita 
kozikiha yumenoyouna kigasimasita 
sositeano matihadounattaroutorippana kamaewositairoirona katatiwositeita ienadowo meni omoi ukabetanodearimasu 
ningentoiumonoha hukouniawanakereba ninzyoutoiumonowo satorumonodenai 
to karehaituka kiita kotobawo omoi dasimasita 
souda 
ano husinsetudeatta matino hitobitomokitto omoiatattarou

to omoimasita 
sosite karehaitumo zibunno muneni omottakotohahatasiteiikadoudearukatazunetemiruyouni taiyouwo gyouidanodearimasu

omaegasou omounaraittemirugaii 
toitteiruyoudearimasita 
kozikiha akan bouwoobutteitukatatta matihemodotteyukimasita

nitino hikariha kanoyuku mitiwo atatakani terasiteimasita

to kareha omoimasita 
kono yono nakaniomosiroi tanosii yumeganakunattesimatta zibunnihadokokaraka huneni noseteiroirona yumewomottekite minatoni tuitekara ninno siranu manimaki tirasunodatoitukakono matini ituttekita mikogaittatoiukotodesita

to sentyouhaiimasita

gatuhamata katattanodesu 
matiyorimo housekiyorimodonna tomiyorimo ningenno aitoiumonoha toutoimonoda 
watasihasorerano hukouna nintatiwo maiyonoyouni terasiteiru 
omaehaitumademo utukusii toutoi magokorowo sutetehanaranai 
wakamonono tabihasorekara yorutonaku hirutonakutudukimasita 
kekkonto rikonno mondaikara ieno ken'igatorinozokareruyouninatte kiteirutoiukotoha nipponno syakaino rekisinitotte zituni ookii imiwomotteiru 
ietoiumonowoyakamasikuiu tyuugokudemo huzinto ietonoikisatuha ooitanippontohatigatteitayouni omoeru 
tyuugokudemo mukasikara huzinha musumetumahahatosite ieni sitagaete kangaerareteirukeredomo ienitunagareru omomino sabetuha nipponhodo otokoto onnatono maniatte onnanibakari kakokudehanairasikumo omoeru 
ieno ken'iwo simesu seino mondaidemo nippondeha ryouninno seinisukkarikawattesimau 
sikasi tyuugokudeha soubireiwomitemowakaru 
sousino bireitosite syousihuzindeari eru 
tomoekintoiu sakkano kazokutoiu tyouhensyousetuwoyomuto tyuugokuno kohuuna zyouryuuno kateide daikazokuno seikatugadonoyouna muzyunwomotte soukokuwohukunde itonamareteirukatoiukotogamazamazatowakaru 
tyounantoiu tatibaga ienotamenidonna giseiwomotomerareteirukatoiukotomo tenitoruyouniwakarusi danzyono mesitukaitatino doreitositeno hisanna itimo egaki dasareteiru 
keredomokouiu omokurusii daikazokusyuginonakade tumadearu zyoseihayahari zikkano seiwo itadaiteirusi senrannadonotoki kodomowoturetesassato anzenna zikkahe hinansiteyuku ziyuumomotteiru 
tatoe tyoukeino tumaotoutono tumaga kodomotatitotomoni nigete ikuyouna zikkawomotanaitokidemo 
kouiukotoha nipponno ieno girinisibarareru onnanoyarikatadehanai 
sukunakutomo aniyomega ieninokotteirutoki tugiotoutono tumaga ziyuuni koudousurutoiuyounakotoha hutuunihaari enai 
kekkonga honnintatino syougainikakawaru mondaidenakute ieno mondaidearukotokara umareta higekiha tyuugokuto nipponno bungakunimitiahureteiru 
kakumatuzyakuno zidennisono setunai monogatarigaaru 
rozindesaemosono ningenrasii seizituna issyounoutinikono higekino hitosuziwohundeita 
natumesousekino gyouninha nipponno taisyounendaino tisikizinno iekara moutteiru kunoukoso teemadearu 
kenpouga kaiseisarete minsyutekiitoiu honsituniha tooikeredomo ningentosite danzyoga byoudounomonoto atukawareruyouninatta sekkyokutekina katihaakirakadearu 
kono syakainitomoni hatarakitomoni ikiru otokoto onnatogasono kihontekina ningentositeno kenrinioite goni hitosiimonodearutoiuwakarikittakotoga genseikino nakabaninattesikamokonnani sinkokuna hakyokuwotoositeyatto seibunnikakaretatoiukotohamusiroodorokubekikotodato omou 
kenpouga kaiseisaretakotoha minpouno kaiseiwohikiokosita 
minpouno uedekoremade huzinga mattaku katateotinisitagatte higenzituni atukawareteita zyoukouwo seikatuno zissaini tikaku danzyobyoudounomononi kaiseisiyoutosareteiru 
mazu kon'inno mondaiga ieno mondaidenakute touzisyadearu danzyono mondaitosite atukawareruyouninatta 
ieha kateiwo tan'itosite atukawarerukotoninarisokoniha ottoto tumato kodomotatitonohitokatamariga kihontosite kangaerareruyouninatta 
ieno yomehahakkirito ottono saisino hahatositeno tatibade mitomerarerukotoninatte kita 
rikonnioitekoremadeha tumano gawakarano rikonno youkyuuha hotondo dekinainoga hutuudeatta 
kyougirikontosite rikonsiyoutosuru tuiteno ottogasono sarusyutuwo syouninsi hutarino syouninmo syouninsi tumagawakakereba tumano seikano kosyuno syomeimadenakereba rikonha hukanoudeatta 
tumaga ottono rankouni taezumata reiguunitaegatakute rikonsitakutemo ottoga syoutisinakereba syougaitada meibakarino tumade hoboto kaseihuno hibiwo kurasanakerebanaranakatta 
ottodearu otokoto tumatonaru onnatoga gono aito syakaitekisekininnioite kateiwo itonandeyukunoga kekkonno gensokudearutosurebasono aiga usinaware sougono sekininga zikkousarenaitoki rikongaokorutoiukotohasake gatai 
rikonhaitudemo kekkonno zyunketuto gono sekininwo kanusurutameno bunritositesikaari enai 
iewo omonisite seikatuga untensareteita zidaiha tumaha yomedearisono tumaga hahatonattemoo kaasandearu yomedeatta 
rikonsitemo yomemataha kowomotta totugasono iewo sararetanodeattenokosareta kowo sodateruniha syuutomedano kozyuutodanogaatta 
tumawo saraseta otokono seikatuno kazitekina menhasorerano ieno onnatatiniyotte kekkoumakanawareta 
kateino tan'iwo ottoto tumatosono kodomotatitosuru atarasii minpoude kekkonga danzyohutarino iside okonawarerutoiu baaikoremadeyorimottomotto zyuudaina sekininwo kekkonsiyoutosuru tounintatiga goni zikakusinakerebanaranai 
o godousinohokani kuzyouno uttaedokoromonakereba sekininwo tenkasuru tuitemonainodakara 
douyouni rikonno ziyuugaarutoiukotoha zyuuraino iedeno rikonsatayoriharukani hukai ningentekibunriwo imisurukototowatasitatiha mazimeni rikaisinakerebanaranai 
kateikara tumaga sari ottoga tumakara sarutoiukotoha itizitekinimoseyo konteikara kateino houkaidearu 
kodomotatigairutoki kodomoha hahawo usinauka titiwo usinaukasinakerebanarazusono itadeha kodomonitotte zituni tuuretudearu 
kekkonno ziyuusosite rikonno ziyuugaarutokisubeteno ninha onnamo otokomo zibuntatino kokorononakani hitotuno koewokikuto omou

to 
daiitizisekaitaisennoatokara sekainosubeteno kunigunini rikongahueta 
kekkontoiumononi taisurusoremadeno kunigunideno kangaekatasikitariga sensouno hakairyokuniyotte daihendouwo ataeraretatameni 
kono gen'inha syutosite sensouniyotte zyosizinkouga zoukasitakototosoremade seikatuno anteiwomotteita nakasankaikyuuno keizaikisogakuzure kinrousuru danzyoga ookunattakotoniatta 
zieen oosuteinno syousetuya arasikeokade burontega kaitayouna igirisuno nakasankaikyuuno nintatinotyantosita kekkonno kannenmokawatta 
kondono dainizisekaitaisenha fasizumuni taisite syourisita kuniguninioitesaesono syakaiga moutta senkizuha sinkokude igirisudeha konnenno kurisumasuha kindaino rekisihazimatte iraihazimetenokiritumetamonodatta 
amerikademosamazamano keizaizyouno mondaigaattekono zizyouha kateiseikatuno anteiwoyurugasi rikonha hizyounihuete kita 
itikyuuitinananenno amerikadeha zinkousenninnituite iti nino rikondattanoga itikyuusanyonenkarahidoku zoudaisite itikyuusi(maru)nenniha ni (maru)tonari itikyuusigonenniha kekkonsanni taisite rikonitideatta 
zennenkaramiruto niwarigobusenzenni kurabereba baini tikai arisamatonatteiru 
kono gensyouha amerikade hitotuno syakaimondaitonatteori sintyouna kenkyuuno taisyoutositetoriagerareteirubakaridenaku ryousinno rikontosono maniokareru kodomono kurusimiwo teematosita gekiga zyouensare ookuno ninni kansinwo ataeta 
kyoubihondemo rikonha kyuugekini hueteiru 
sensouga kateino hakainotameni hatasita yakuwariha hyoumennimieruyorimoharukani hukakuhagesii 
sensoutyuunannenmo zensenniokareta ottoto kokokuninokosareta tumatono maniha ottoga kikansitehazimete mondaikasuruyouna tasyutayouna higekigakamosareteiru 
kouhoude sensisitamonotosareta ottoga kaettemireba tumaha otoutoto kekkonsiteitatoiuyouna zitureihamadamadahitonimo hanaseru higekino buruideatta 
sokaitennyuuseigenkoreramo oohabani nipponno kateiwo hakaisita 
keizaizizyouno kyokudono huantei
koremo kyouno rikonno doukiwonasu mottomo ookii riyuudearu 
korerano syoriyuuga rikonno doukininaruhodokoremadeno kekkontoiumonoga nippondehatuyoi aini tatteno ketugoudehanakute ienotameka setainotameka minohurikatano mondaideattawakedearu 
nipponnowatasitatiha kekkonto rikonno ziyuutoiukotonituite otituite tyuuibukaku genzitutekidenakerebanaranaito omou 
nazenara kenpouya minpouno uedeno danzyono byoudoukekkonno ziyuurikonno ziyuutoiukototokyouno genzituno huziyuudarakede hatansita syakaikeizaiseikatuno zissaitono manihaosorosiikuitigaigaarukara 
kekkonno ziyuutoikura minpoudekimeraretemokyouno wakai hitobitoni hatasitesonnaninobinobisita ziyuugaarudarouka 
mazu kekkonsite sumutokorogadokoniarudarou 
itigatuno mitugetunotameni den'enno ookii kanga youisaretanoha igirisudemo erizabesuouzyogurainomonodearou 
kekkonsimasyouyotoiuwakai hitobitono kessinhasugutuduitedemo ieha 
to mondainibutukaru 
sikataganaikara toubunoyatatito doukyotoiukotoninattatoki minpouga ottoto tumatowo tan'itosurukaratoitte wakai tumani yomeno kansyuugaoikabusatte konaitodousiteieyou 
huuhude hataraite seikatusiteyukanakerebanaranaimononiha tumano kazino hutanga ottonitottemo zyuudaina kadaidearu 
nipponnokyouno syakaideha yamino syanpanha metiiruwomazete kyabareeno tokoni nagaretemotutumasii tomokasegino wakai huuhuno zinseiwo seiketunitanosikusaseru kafeteriyamonakereba ootomattomonai 
kyouyakamasii sanziseigennokotomokousite sumu iewomotazu kazihutankara kaihousarenai wakahuuhuga uiuisii oyatonatteyuku yorokobisae setuyakusite taberarenai houkyuuni taeteyukutameno itizyoukennoyoudesaearu 
kyousanziseigenha yuuseigakuno tatibakaratoiuyorihamusiro minzokuno kutuzyokuno hitotutosite zisyuno sakuha nanihitotumotanai kyouno kenryokuni taisuru boseino ikidoorino hitotuno taisyoutositearawareteirutosaeieru 
rikonno ziyuuga huzinnimo mitomerare minpouhasoreto douzini rikonsita huzinno keizaitekienzyomo hukumeteiru 
konokotohasikasi hontouni huzinnitotte kozinno songenwo mamoreru syakaitekikeizaitekidodaigaarukotowo imisiteirudarouka 
huzinni rikonno ziyuuga mitomeraretatoiukotoha tokunikoremade inninwotuduketeiru nipponno zyoseinitotteha nanika hukusyuutekina kaikandearukamosirenai 
tumani mutte deteyuketoiu kotobahakoremadenoyouni deteyukeba asitakara rotouni mayowanakerebanaranaimononi mutte iwareruodokasino kotobadehanakunatta 
deteyuketoiu hitokotoniha deteyukaserumonono sekininga simesarete kitanodearu 
keredomosorekurainokotode hontouni nipponno syakaide huzinno kekkonto rikonno ziyuuha ningentositeno songenwo kankusuru tikaratonarunodarouka 
daitainipponno saikinno rikonno gen'inga kateikeizaino hatanniarunoga ooitoiukotoni watasitatiha tyuumokusinakerebanaranai 
sositekouiu rikonmonono nenreiga huzintosite angaihuketeirukotomo tyuumokusareru 
kono zizituha naniwo katatteirudarou 
rikonwonozomu kyouno nipponno huzintatigahitonimo kouzento kataru rikonno riyuutositemada gono seikakuwo mondainisitari ningentositeno seikatutaidowo doukitositari aino hatanwo gen'intosite zikakusi doudoutosorewo hyougensurutokoromade itteinaito kangaerukotomodekiru 
setainotame oyagayakamasikuiunode kekkonsita otokoto onnatono kande nakoudotoka syuuino zyousikitokawo nattokusaseru rikonriyuuha darenidemo tuuyousurusakino mikomiganaitoiukotodearunodarou 
aigauturoisono tumetasani taenaide ottotoiu kurusimino taisyoukara kaihousaretai onnano kokoromo nippondeha setaitokasakino mikominikaramete syutyousarerunodearou 
douiukikkakenimoseyo rikonha kateino bunrideari gendainisorega huetatoiukotoniha kanarazu hukai syakaitekikonkyogaaruhazudearu 
dainizitaisenno ookuno kunigunini rikongahuetakotoha kyoudaina sihonsyugino minsyukokuno syakaidemo katta kunidemosono syakainonakani hasseisiteiru samazamano bimyouna muzyunno eikyouwoukete keizaitekinimo sinritekinimo hitotu hitotu kirihanasarete itonamareteiru katatinomamadehakoremadeno kateino heianga tamotenakunatte kitakotowo monogatatteirunodato omowareru 
kekkonno ziyuuto minpougaittemo genzituni zyuukyononaikoto gekkyuuno sukunaikoto sensouniyotte ookuno kateiha atarasii huyoumonowomotazaruwo enakunatteirukotonadode ziyuuna kekkonhanakanaka dekinai 
zenteino zyuugyouinkumiaiha zyuusuumanno kekkontekireizyuugyouinnotameni kekkonsikinwo youkyuusita 
ikite hataraiteyuku kyuuryousae dasanai seihugadousite kekkonsikinmadewo dasudarou 
tomokasegide hatarakanakerebanaranai huzinmo syokubano hurukusaimonono kangaekataya boseihogosisetunonaikotokarayahari kekkontotomoni syokuwosirizoku rituga hizyouni ooi 
kousite hataraku isinoaru huzinmo kateino syuhutoiu itini oikomareru 
sono hitobitoha kumiawohanaretesimatte mottomo koritusita sosikiwo mattakuhanareta tumaninattesimau 
ottono kumiaiha kateiteato kazokuiankainonakade tumano sonzaini kankeisurubakaridearu 
somosomo kekkonnikouiu genzitunokuitigaigaaru 
konokotoha rikonga huzinnitotte kantanni ningenno songenwo mamorukotoninaranaikyouno genzituwo watasitatino maeni sekkaisite simesiteiru 
ningentekina songenni tatte ziyuuni rikonsitatositemosorekarasakino seikatuwotyanto ziyuuni kensetusiteyuku syakaizyoukenga huzinnihirakareteinai baaidouiukotoninarudarou 
kouzyouni hataraku huzinnitottemata gakkouno senseinisaemo teinentoiumonogaaru 
huzingasono sigotoni zyukutatusi onnatositeno keikenmoyutakaninari seizinsikakaru kodomotatino kyouikuhini ookuno hiyougairu zikituma syuhu hahatosite itibankeizaitekihutanno omoi sizyuutosiwo kosuto teinendearu 
insatukouzyounadodehasono sakisokonitutomeyoutosureba mizyukurenkounaminiotosareru 
onnakyouindesae sizyuuissaininatta onnakyousiha atarasiku honninyousinai toukyoutono naikigaaru 
rikonwo youkyuusuru zyoseino riyuunonakaniha ottono midareta seikatuha tumatositeno zibunni taegataito douzini kodomono kyouikunimowaruikaratoiukotomo mezurasikunai 
rikonsurunara kodomohasutete derotoiukotoha muzanna syuutomeya ottoga yomeni inninwo siirukarametekaranoodokasitosite ittakotodearu 
ziyuuninatta rikonhoude hukouna tumaha zibunkara rikonsiteyoikotoninarisono uehahato kurasitaito syutyousuru sanninno kowohikitotte issyoni kurasanakerebanaranaitoiutoki keizaizyouzirikideyatteyukeru zisinnoaru tumahaimano nipponni nanninarudarou 
ipusenno noraha noraga ningyoudenakunaroutosite ningyouno iewo detekara sakinikoso zyoseino syakaitekimondaigaatta 
konokotowokyouno wakai huzinde rikaisinai ninhanai 
utau unzyakukawaii ningyoukara kyuuni hitorino onnani tensyousiyoutosita norano zentonihuserareteitakono kadaihakyouno nipponno kinrouzyoseizenpanno maeni norano zidaiyori harukani gutaitekini muzyunno syosouwo teidasiteiru 
kekkonno mondainiatatte watasitatiwo sinkokuni kangaekomaseru takuzitokoroganaitoiukoto suizisentakuga syakaikasareta kazininatteinaikotoga rikonno baaimata setuzituna mondaitonari sikkokutonatte kuru 
sensouniyoru mibouzinno seikatuno doudoumegurinoitamasisaha zituni ookukouiu kyuusyoga mikaiketuna kyouno syakaizizyoukaramotarasareteiru 
naisyokudeha tabeteyukenai 
naisyokudeha kessite tabeteyukenainonisono naisyokuganakereba issoukyuuhakusuru teidono tinginsika siharawanainogaimano yatoumonoto yatowarerumonotono kankeidearu 
naisyokuha tinginno danpingudearunikakawarazu komotino hahaha seitouna hataraki basyowo mitukenikui 
gaikokuno syokokunimo baisyunhuhadossariiru 
sikasi watasitati nipponno onnaha ottono sensisaretaato mamatoiu tuusyouwomotta matino onnagaite sanninno kodomowodokokaninokositamamakubiri korosaretakotowo wasuretehanaranai 
kyouno nippondeha komotino matino onnamokanarino kouritudearunitigainai 
kekkontosono bunridearu rikonga ningenno songennotameni danzyono mani byoudouna zinkendearunaraba watasitatiha kenpouniiwareteirusubeteno zinminha hatarakukotoga dekirusubeteno zinminha kyouikuwoukerukotoga dekirutoiu zyoukouwo tetteitekini zitugensiteyukanakerebanaranai 
konokotokoso kenpouniiwareteirutoorisubeteno ninga ryousinni tatte koudousuru ziyuuwomotteirusono gutaitekina todearu 
kekkonno ziyuutoiukotowo kangaerutoki watasitatiha kyouno nipponno hataraku huzinno genzituno zyoukenkara mewosorasukotoga dekinai 
rikonno ziyuuwoiutokiwatasitatiha huzinga ippontatideyatteyukeru syakaizyoukenwo kensetusiteyuku doryokunukiniha kangaerarenai

ziyuutoiukotoha nandemositeiitoiukotowo imisinai 
kekkonno ziyuutoiukotoha ningentositenozondeiru kekkonwo honnintati igainomonono iside zyamasarenaideyoitoiukotodearuto douziniiyana kekkonwohatano zizyoudesaserarenaideyoitoiukotodearu

syukantekiniiyaninattakarawakareteyarutoiu taidoga rikonno ziyuuno tadasii ninsikidenaitotomoni kyakkantekiniha rikonsita hahato kotono seikatuhosyougasareru hourituzyouno zyoukenga hituyoudearuto tomoni syakaitekini hosyouga zitugensareru kanouganakereba rikonno ziyuutoiukotoha gimanninaru 
kenpouya minpoude huzinno tatibaga otokoto byoudouni sekkyokutekini kakareruyouninattatoiudakedeha hotondo kuubunnihitosii 
syakaino zissaino hibinisubeteno syokubani danzyono hataraite ikiru ninno hituyouwo syakaitekinimata houtekini hosyousuru houhouga gutaikasaretatokihazimete minsyutekiitoiuni ataisuru 
souiu syakaiwotukurutameni danzyoga tikarawo awasetearayuru doryokuwosiarayuru katatidetatakatteyukukotowo ryousinno kouitosite mitometatokihazimete minsyuga tetteisurunodearu

dekirudake kozinno keizaihutanno sukunai takuzitokoroyoutienkodomonotameno byouinryouyouzyo

yori ningenrasiku ikiru mititositehirakareta hitotuno monkarayori ookuno baisyunhuto hurouziwo umi dasukotowowatasitatino syakaitekiryousinha kouteisinai

[itikyuusihatinensigatu]itimukasi yono nakaniironna kamiga kazeno kamiya mizuno kamiya yamano kaminadoironna kamiga katagatanitakusan'ita goronokotoaru tokoroni hitorino tyouzyaga sundeimasita 
sono tyouzyagaaru nititakokukara kita tabibitokara tuginoyouna hanasiwo kikimasita

soreha yonimo husigina syude kaminarino kamino takaramononitigainai 
nazenara otita kaminarino kamiga kurokumoni tutumarete sorani nobotteyuku tokikurokumohasono syuwomo issyoni tutunde motteittesimau

sorehodo tinrasii husigina syuda 
tyouzyahasono hanasiwo kiite kangae komimasita 
sorekarasono husigina syuwodounikasite teni iretaito omoimasita 
iumademonaku tyouzyanotokoroniha kinya takaraga kuraippaiarimasitakeredo sekaizyuuni daremo mita monoganaitoiuhodo tinrasii syuha hitotumoarimasendesita 
sono husigina syuwo teniiretaimonodana 
sousureba watasiha sekaiitino tyouzyaninareruwakedasosite tyouzyahairoiro kuhuuwokorasimasitakeredodoumoumai kangaemo ukabimasendesita

tyouzyano niwanoman nakani ookina takai kiga ipponarimasita 
kaminarino kamiha nandemo takaimonono ueni otirunodesukarasono niwano kini otinaitoha kagirimasen 
sokodemosi kaminarino kamigasono kini otitesorekara zimenni korogari otitara kino nesitani ookina anagaaitesokoni husigina syuga otirudarou

soudasoudasokode tyouzyaha kaminarino kamito syutowo issyoni namatoru kuhuuwosimasita

hutatokoroga tyouzyagaikura mati uketeitemo kaminarino kamiha tyouzyano niwano kini otimasendesita 
toiuwakeha kaminarino kamiha sorawo narihatamekinagaradokoni otiteyaroukato mikudasiteiruutini tyouzyano niwano kini sikakegasitearunowo kiduitesimattanodesu

sono gorohodo tikai miyakoni nadakai monosiriga sundeimasita

soreha daihenda

sa awatasimo siranaikedo 
sou kotaeru watasiha genrokusodenodotera sugatazyuuotoutohasono henniatta hizakakewo youhukuno uekara haoritta kakkoudeo tyawo sosogi neyouyo neyouyoto iinagaratui hanasiga dannde meihoutikakuninattesimatta 
wakai sarariimandearu zyuuotoutono hanasino nakanikono gorono wakai onnanohitode kekkonhasitakunaiga kodomodakeha hosiitte iunoga zuibunarunetoiukotogaatta 
aru kisituno onnanohitoga otokonadoto hanasiteirutokino hitotuno sitaitositesouiu hyougendemonowo iuyounakotomo sukunakuhanaidearou 
onnanosouiu tokino hontouno kokoroziusono kokorozino nai kouru zyoutaiwo musiro omosiroku omottekiitanodeatta 
sonokotohasorekiri wasureteite sakibanaru kaide huzinno hyouronkaniatta 
tyuusinno wadaiha bungakunokotodeattaga guuzenmui awaseni mattasonohitohaneeanatahadou omoimasuto wakai onnanohitono nakani kekkonhaiyadaga kodomoha hosiito iu ningaarukotonituite hanasunodeatta 
sono sekidehamawaritono kankeidesonomama hattensarezuni ottaga watasino kokorono nakani kotobaha katutonokosareta 
nazenara watasiha maenimo zibunga onazikotowo zyuuotoutokarakiitakotowo senmeini omoi dasitakarasosite tankyuusinwo togegekisarerukotowo kanzita 
nipponno wakai onnanohitono maniarusono kokoromotoiunoha honkikasira 
honkinaraba nazekanozyotatino kanzyouhasouiu katatiwomotte onnano atarasii seikatuheno youkyuuwo hyougensurunodearouka 
sokoniha samazamanomonoga sakusousiteirusou kanzirarerunodeatta 
roman rooranha yuumeina zyan kurisutohuno nakade zituniyoku onnano tayouna taipuwo egaiteiru 
sorezoreni itta seikakuikikatawosurusorezoreno onnaga odorokubakarino zuisisade kiwamete kankakutekini nikutaito seisintode ikasareteiru 
miserareta tamasiitoiu tyouhenwo onazikono sakkaga kaita 
annettotoiu kyouyounoaru hukai kokoroziwomotta wakai onnaga tyuusinno zinbututonatte tenkaisurunodearuga annettoga zibunno zyoseikanseinotameni eranda mitiha dokutokunamonodeatta 
annettoha konyakuno seinenwomotteitanodearuga kanozyoha zyuuraino sikitaridoorino kekkonseikatuno nakade hutatuno ningentekina yousokoseitekina tokusyokuga goni gensaisiaukoto aizyouga misekakeno sigusaya kansyuuno hitotuni dasukotonadowo kiratte tuuzyouno kekkonseikatuni irukotowo kobamu 
keredomo annettoha zyoseitositeno kanseisonotappurisita seizyukuwonegau kokoroha setudearu 
iwabasonotameni kaette mukasikarano gizentekina huuhuseikatuno daryokuwo atteirunodearu 
annettoha kessinwosite konyakuno seinento aru kikanseikatuwo tomonisita 
hahaninaru kanouseiwo sinziruyouninattesono seinentoha keturetesimatta 
koreha sakuhinno daiikkanno bubunwonasiteiru 
umareta otokono koniyotte annettono hahatositeno seikatuga saranidonoyouni sintensuruka umareta musukozisinha zibunno syussyouni saisitetotta hahano taidowodou miruka 
soreranokotoha kanwo oute egakareteyukunodearuga watasino kokoronihonno itibubunsikamada yondeinai monogatarino boutouga omoi ukandanoniha riyuugaaru 
baruzakkuga kano hutoku kougitta pende kekkonno gisikinokagenikakusareteiru kinsentorihikino nikumubeki syakaiakuwo tekihatusitekara huransuno syakaiha ookuno suiiwo keikensita 
sorenimokakawarazu kekkonseikatutoiumonohasono keisikino honsituno nakani annettono youkyuuwo hituzennarasimeruyouna syakaitekikikizunawo onnano nikutaito seisintono ueninagekakerukotoni oiteha kyoumomada kawatteinai 
sono kutuuto kougitoniha kotobato miburiga tigatteitemoyahari nipponnosubeteno onnano kanzyouga tomoni natteiruto omowarerukaradearu 
andore ziidoha roman rooranto taihentigatta egakiburide onnawo byousyasuru sakkadearu 
roman rooranno egaku onnahamazamazato kankakuni semaru nikutaiwomotteiru 
midaretari totonoeraretarisuru kakukakuno ikidukaito kamitowomotteirunodearuga ziidono sakuhinno nakade onnaha amarihakkiri karadawo misezu ooku naitekikateiniyotte egakareteiru 
hutatuno sakkaha niyouno bito sugurubatuwo simesiteirunodearu 
ziidono egaita zyunevievutoiu zyuuhatitosino musumeha (mikanno kokuhaku)tairazokugizenna syousimintekititioyano ryouzokuni hankousi kougisezuniirarenai zyounetukara zibunno dokurituwo zibunno huhukuzyuuwo zyoseidakeganasi eru syussantoiu kouide akirakanisuru yokkyuukara kekkonmosezu ren'aikarademonaku kodomowo motoutosuru 
hahano sinyuudearu marusyarukunitewo zyunevievuha zibunwo hahanisitekureru nintosite erabunodearu 
marusyaruhasono sarusyutuwo kobamu 
nazenara marusyaruha tumawo itositeirukarato 
notini zyunevievuha hahanisonokotowo hanasihazimete hahaga marusyaruni aru kikankokorowohikareteitakotogaattato sitta 
marusyaruga kanozyowo kyonda kokorozino bimyouna nyuansuwo zyunevievuha rikaisurukotoga dekitanodearu 
annettoto zyunevievutono maniha kyoutuunamonoto mattaku betunomonotogaaru 
kyuuraino kekkonno keisikiga gizento kokoronaranu giseisinzituno aino kanzyousae korosuyouna omosiwo onnanikakerukotoni kougisuru kokorozino uedekono hutariha mattaku douharano simaidearu 
keredomo tosiuedeari seizyukusita zyoseidearu annettono nikutaito seisintono nakaniha sudeni kankakutosite zikakusareru yokuboutosite iseiwo itosi houyousiyoutosuru netuzyougaarunodearuga wakai zyunevievuhakono tendesukkari tigau 
watasino nikutaiha sukosimo watasino seisinno dassenwo dakuwanakattanodesusosite kanozyohasouiu zibunno nikutaino gyougiyosani rippukusitarisita 
genzituno kankakuwo siranu zyunevievuha hizyouni sottyokuni gutaitekina kotobade mondaiwo dasuga zyounetugasameteiru annettono katahasubetewomotto tyuusyoutekini hanasu 
koremo sakusyano dousatuno niyouno surudosadeatte hukai kyoumiwo yobiokosu tendearu 
tikagoronippondemo itibuno wakai onnanohitoga kekkonhasezu hahanihanaritaitoiusono kotobano nakanidoredakeno genzituseigaarunodarouka 
matadoredakeno bubunga bungakutekina hyougendeari sarani kudatteha seiinonai hitotuno kyoutainanodearouka 
onnagasono syougaino owarini zibunga onnadearukotono kankini tutumarete sineruyouni ikitaito mareu kokoroha hagesikutuyoinodearuga onnatositenoyorokobi kanasimino zikakunomukou gawanihaitumo buntansyatositeno otokoganakerebanarazu sarani ookii haikeitosite toudaino danzyowo ikasi korosu zidaitoiumonono rekisiseino tuyoi sayougaaru 
gendaiga onnatositenozomasii kekkonnomuzukasii zidaidearukotonozomasii ketugouni syougaito hakaitono kuwaerare yasui zidaidearukotoha akirakanakotodearu 
keredomo kodomohamotteyoitoiuhitogadousitesono maeno danzyono ketugouno keitaiwo syakaizyousikino uedemotto kouyakade sizenna ningentekina sougokouryuuno katatini takameyoutosuru zyounetuwo kanzinainodearou 
sono zyounetunukini kodomono gawakara mirebasorega ookuno baairekisitekina sikkokutonatteiru kyouno oyakokankeino kyuutouwosonomama kouteisiyoutosurunodearebasono maniha huni otikaneru hiyakugaaruto omou 
teisouno kannenni taisite onnaha hisasiku zyudoutekideari musatorudeattakotokara higekiwokurikaesiteirunodearuga boseino sinpikatyuusyoukanimoosorosiimonogakakusareteiru 
mikanno kokuhakuwo sakusyaha zyunevievuno ningenseinodonoyouna hattennioite ookii syakaitekiiginoaru kanozyono kougiwo kanketusaserunodearouka 
[itikyuusannananenitigatu]wasedani ituttanoha taisyourokunende gakkousoudoude nagaiyanagitarouooyamaikuosinadoga kyouzyuwoyamerareta nenno kugatudearuga wasedawo sibousitanoha wasedaha oosumisigenobukouga tokino kanryouno gunbatuni hankousite gakumonno dokuritukenkyuuno ziyuuwo mokuhyoutosite souritusita ziyuuno gakuendearutoiu tokoroni seinentekimiwakuwo kanzite akogarete nyuugakusitanodearu 
tyoudotouziha daiitizioususensouno eikyoude demokurasiino sisouga taitousite kita zidaidearu 
sokode gakuseino tatibakara minsyusyugisyakaisyugino kenkyuuwo hazimetanodearuga gaibuno syakaisyugiundouroudouundoukarano eikyoumoatte gakuseino nakani sisoutekini hiyakusiyoutosuru monoto zissaino menni sokusita monoto hutatuno nagarega detekita 
sisoutekini ikoutosurunoha takatuseidousinadogasono gawadeano hitotatihadandan hattensite nipponniokeru saisyono kyousantouzikenakatukitamikyousantouzikenni renmasita

touzino nakamaha wadagannakamurakouitiheiyatikarasanmiyakesyouitikawamataseionmiyaisin'itiyosidamitadokoroteruakiinamuraryuuitinadonadode gakuseiga wakaki zyounetuni moete syakaisyugisyakaiwo kensetusurutoiu risouno sitani minsyuuno nakahetoiu mottooga roudouundounouminundouto renrakusinagara nipponroudousoudoumeinipponnouminkumiaito kankeiwo motte zissaitekino undouwoyaruyouninatta 
watasiha roudouundouno houdemo kouottokumiaino undouni kyoumiwomotte touzisokubino kouzannihayoku ittamonodearu 
gakuseizidaideno itibanno omoi syutuha taisyouzyuuninengogatutoukadato omougasono gorowasedani gunzikenkyuudantoiumonogadekita 
wasedaha nantoittemo ziyuuno gakuende oosumisigenobukouga kanryougunbatuni hankousitetukutta gakkoudearukarakokowo gunkokusyugikasurukotogadekireba daigakuno iwayurugakuseiundouzentaini zindaina eikyouwo ataerukotogadekirutoiu tatibakaradato omouga gunbunoo koegakaride gakkoutoukyokunarabini gakuseino itibuga sankasite gunzikenkyuudannarumonowotukutte koudoude hakkaisikiwo ageta 
sonokoro soudainaibuno gakuseiundouha bunkadoumeitoiu katatide syuuketusareteottagasono rentyuugunzikenkyuudanno hakkaisikini boutyouni dekakete mouretunaru yatugitousouwo tenkaisita 
touzituha namaeha wasuretaga daiitisidantyou
ga bakuryouwo sitagaete oozeinori konde gekireino ziwoyattanodearuga nanzirano kunsyoukarawareware douhouno tigasitatarutoka itisyoukounatte manhonekarutoka wasedawo gunbatuni uruna gakuseihasikkarisirotokato yatutte kenkyuudanno hakkaisikimo omouyouni ikanakatta 
sono ueni bunkadoumeino rentyuuha yoseiwokatte rinzigakuseiyuusitaikaiwo hiraite sakanni kiseiwo ageta 
sono nitiwatasiha senzitunakunararete wasedadaigakuseizikeizaibusouninatta itimurakesakurasiga eikokude benkyousuru tameni youkousurunode yokohamani miokurini itteite hakkaisikino tokinokotowo siranakatta

amerikano sugatawatasiha amerikahehakono kanitte kitaga nikagatuyasokora amerikani itteitadakede amerikagadounokounoto iunohaokogamasikute iitakunainodagatadakouiukotoha ieruto omou

nipponniitemo amerikano kenpouno ari kataha wakarusi un'einituitemo itiouha syoukaisareteirugakorewo genzituni mitekono sisatuno kekkatositeno kaikakuikensyowo teisyutukorega kaikakuno hitotunokikkakeninareba saiwaidearu 
korega zitugenno tameooini doryokusitaito omou

nipponwo hizyouni rikaisite kureru youninatte iru 
senzituozakiyukiosiga amerikazyouinde kangeisareta kiziwo mitaga warewaregiindanmo minamikarorainasyuumasatyuusettusyuunyuuyookusyuuno syuugikaiwo kengakusitaga kakusyuugikaitomoyamazakidantyouto matumotodaigisiwo endanni annaisite gityouga kangeino ziwo nobe yamazakidantyouni syaziwo enzetusesime matumotodaigisini tuuyakusesimeruto itta tyouside tyottowaga kunideha souzoudekinai kangeisindeatta

koreha ireinokotodasoudearu

sikasi ippouniha sensouwo warikitteinai hitotatigairu 
bosutonzikenmosono itireidearu 
tadaano sinsouha nipponno sinbunga tutaeteirunotoha tyottotigatteiru 
bosutondehawarewarega iku issyuukanhodo maeni sityousenkyoga okonawarete sanzyuunitosino sino itisyokiga itiyakusityouni senkyosareta 
sorede ketugikikandearu sikaito sityougawatoumaku ikanai tenmoattato omou 
sityouhawarewareto atta tokimakkaasaagensuikarano denpoumo kiteiru zibunmo kokorokara kangeisuruto nobe syomeihaino enadowo kurete hizyouni kantaisitekureta 
tokoroga sikaideha boutyouwo kinsisurutoiu ketugiwositesimatta 
tumari sityouno seiziryokuno yowasa sikaino rizimonogawani taisuru engarasenotobattiriwo uketamonoto omou 
matahitotuhayahari sensouwo warikiranaide nipponno syouraini taisuru giwakuwomotteiru hitotatigaaru 
sorega bosutonsikaini arawaretato ittemo kagondemonai warewareha minsyukasareta nipponno sugatawo sirasimeteyukanakerebanaranaito omou 
sikasinagara nantoittemo amerikaha nipponno nizyuunanbaino hirosawomoti bussimokiwamete houhudearu

nipponno genzyouha igirisunosoreniyoku ruizisite irunodehaarumaika 
watasiha rokutatamiyozyouhansantatamisanmano hukagawano apaatonimou nizyuunenmo sundeiru 
semai ueni houkyakumo ooinode tukarega yasumaranai 
tokioribasyowo kaetehato omoukotomoaruga nagai kanhito tokoroniirutonakanakayosoni uturu kigaattemo ketudanga dekinai 
kinzyono hitotatimo ikunato iusi zibuntositemo sukosiyokunattakaratoittekono apaatowo dete iku kigasinainodearu 
sorebakaridenaku watasiha kokode kyoudoukumiaino kumiaityouwositeiru 
kyoudoukumiaide hurosakanayayaoyawo keieisite irukaraiwaba sakanayano oyazideari yaoyano oyazideari huroyano oyazidemoaru 
soredenaonokoto kinzyoatato sitasikusiteirunode ninzyouga ututtenakanaka ugokenaideiru 
toututomude yuuzeinadono tameryokousite iru kotoga ooiga zaitakutoiu kotoga wakarutoironna katagataga tazunete kuru 
ninni au kotohakutabireru sigotodaga aukotoha matayukaina kotodemoaru 
watasiha zyunsuisyakaitouindearitai syakaitouha seitoutosite kettousitanodearuga tokidokisayuuno tairitunadoto sinbunni kakarete hizyouni sokonawosite iruga hurui syakaitouinniha kosekimitainamonogaaru 
watasino kosekiha siite ieba nitiroutoudearu 
sikasi nitirouno maeha roudounoumintoudearisaranisono maeha nouminroudoutoudearu 
yousuruni touituseitouno nakakara umaretamonodearugasikasiyahari nipponno musanseitouno zin'eino kosekigaaru

nipponmusantoutoiuto suzukikatouto kuru 
syakaitouhakorerano kosekiwo zenbuyametesouiu hurui syakaisyugimononi atarasii bunsiwo kuwaetetukutta touituseitoudearugayahari nanika kotogaaruto hurui nakamaga tudottedoudadoudatoiukotoninaru 
souiukotoga tounaini habatugaarukanogotoku mirarerunodearu 
syakaitouha taisyuuseitoudearukara gironsuru baaitokiniha hidaritekigironari migitekigirongaaru kotoha touzendearu 
tada sayuuto koteikasite habatuninarukotoha keikaisinakerebanaranai 
sakunenitigatuno sousenkyoha kyousantouha simeikara itiyakusanzyuugomeininari ziyuutouha nihyakusitizyuumeiinnaizettaikahansuuwo kakuesita tokoroga nipponno roudoukaikyuuha katta kyousantouwo motomenaide yabureta syakaitouwo erande kokutetusinsanbetunikkyousozitikyousoudoumeisumirounadonadotairyounyuutouwo kaisisita 
matasigatutaikaideha rousokankeino rokuzyuugomeino daigiinwo mitomete saikenhousikiwo sadamete syakaitousaikentousouni nori dasitanodearugasono seizyukusinai nakani honnenitigatuno taikaide bunretuno hiunni souguusitanodearuga nipponkinroukaikyuuno syakaitoutouituno youkyuuha sigatutaikaini oitesono touituwo kanseisi konkaino sangiingiinno kaisenniha itidaisinsyutuwonasi tounainiokeru roudoukaikyuuno sidouseiha kakurituserarentosite iru 
itigatutaikaino bunretuha touinniyoriyoki kyoukunwo atae kono zikohihanno ueni syakaitouyakusinno oozeiha seibisaretutuaru 
watasiha watasinenraino syutyoutaru syakaitouipponno sugatano gugenno tameniarayuru doryokuwo sasagetaito omotte iru 
watasiha migino sinnenno sitani touno un'eino tametouhonseisousitutuarunodearugayoku ninha watasiwomaamaa kozidatoka yuuzyuuhudandatoka syousindatoka syoukyokutekidatokairoiro hihyousareteirugaoyoso taisyuudantaino nakaniatte koudousurunoniha hitotuno undouhousinwo kimeteyatte ikunodakara taikaide kimeta housinwo minaga zyunhousite ikebasokoniha tairitumonakereba bunretumonaiwakedearu 
taikaiha taisyuuno iside kimarunodakarasono tokinidou ketuttemokorehayamuwo enai 
tatoeba sakunenno taikaide suzukisigezourouga syokityouto ketuttatoki watasiha sosikikyokutyoutosite itinenkanyorokonde kyouryokusita 
imaha watasiga syokityoudearuga katoukunga sosikikyokutyoutosite kyouryokusitekureteiru 
katayamamaeiintyousuzukimaesyokityouwadamiyakehatanokunnisitemo mizutanikunnisitemo kondono senkyodehahontouni ipponninatte kyouryokusitekuremasita 
dakara taikainari iinkaide ketuttakotowo touinga sisinwo hasamanaide koudousite ikeba syakaitouniha tairitumo habatumo bunretumonainodearu 
tokorogayahari ningennokotodakara nandomo issyoni tudotte mesiwo kututtarisurutotuiyahari ninzyougauturutoiukotomoarouto omougasikasi taisyuudantaidehaakumademo zentaino ketteini sitagautoiukotodenakerebanaranaito omou

Qni(maru)sankyuuQni(maru)sankyuuieni iri kagiwokake gasituni iru 
gayousinisono bangouwo kakitukeru 
yatto ansinsite isuni asaku kosiwokakeru 
hiziwo hizano ueni tate hooduewotuku 
gohunkansono siseinomamazitto ugokanakatta

yagate sagasi ateta

hai 
tasikanisorehautino kurumadesusoudesuka

saigoni itutta

sono kuseyoku nemurenakatta

hanasiha toutyokukara kikimasita

kono doutinogataihen situreina taidowo torimasitasoude kareha hanasiwo kikinagara untensyuno kaowotiraritirarito miteita

kaerou atamakara tewo hanasi zyoumuha itutta

iya

untensyumosoreni tuduita 
kareha hutariwo otte genkanmade deta 
hutariha miwo kagamete kutuwo seniteiru 
haigokara miru untensyunosono kubisuziha senkuroku mitakotogaaruyounamatanaiyouna katatideatta

yahariano tokino untensyukana 
hihuni keananoyounamonogatakusan'aru gasituni modotte kite kareha kangaeta 
zyoumuhairoirosyabettaga untensyuha kutihitotukikanakattakotoni kareha imakiduiteita 
koesae kikebasono yokuyouya tyousinadode touninka kae tamaka wakaru hazudeatta 
demo kae tamadeattatositemosorega nandarou

muuga katteniyatte kitadakeno hanasidearu

subetegaaimainamama osamatteiru

kareha kutini dasite itutta 
konnamono darega kututteyarumonoka sinbunsiwo sigomaigusyagusyani marume kasioriwo motte niwani deta 
tiriakutabani nagekonde hiwotuketa

untensyuno kaonee 
dono untensyuno kaodattakasirasora 
sadokunno kaidesaissyoni takusiiwo hirottadarou itigatuhodo hette uenono kissatende kareha guuzenni yakini deatta

yakiha sisenwo tyuuni ukasetesibaraku kangaeteita

ano tokinone 
anataga siraganokotode sadosannikaranda yoruno siraga
ee

dakara sakuhinmo dameninattatte kareha kubiwokasigeta 
sadoha kareto dounende tikagoromyouni siragagahuetanomo zizitudearu

sosite kakuno kudamonoyani itutte itta kudamonoya
soudayo 
huzikudamonomiseto kanbanga deteita 
kunhamassugusokoni syaitutte itta 
bokuha zidousyano notimadokarasorewo miteitanda kondoha yakiga kimiwarusounisotto kappuwo suguruni oita 
hontodesuka 
sikasisonna hazuhanainaze 
nazette bokuhaano kudamonoyato hantosimaeguraidattakana banananokotode kenkawositandesuyo 
ookii bouno daikinwo harattanoniutideakete mitara tiisai bouga itutteita 
sokodeanooyazito oogenkawositesore iraiasokodeha kai monowosinaikotonisiteirundesudemo bokuha mitandayo 
kono mede hutarihasibaraku damari kondeita 
yagate yakiga atamawo ageta 
anatagasono mede mitatositesorekaraanatahadounattandesuutino tikakumade kite untensyuga bokuni oriroto iunda 
sokode bokuha orita 
sikasi ameha hutteinakattazesono keiiwo karehapoturipoturi kakumeruyouni setumeisita 
yakiha tekitouni aidutiwo utinagara kiiteita 
hanasi owaruto yakiha situmonsita 
de kekkyokusono kasiorini naniga ituttetandesuka 
wakaranai 
sinbunsiya sotobakodakega moe kotogotokiteatodorodoronanoga nokotta 
henni amattarui nioigasitene oukitakunaruyouna kimotigasitasi uziga wakisoudattakara sukoppude anawo hotte umetesimatta 
sikasisonnamonowo motte kurugurainaradousiteano tokimitini syaitutte kurenakattandarou 
zidousyagoutouto matigaetanzyanaidesuka goutou
konoorega 
masakasikasi untensyuniha kiwotuketa hougaiidesuyo 
noiroozedano tenkannadoga zikakusinaimama eigyousiterutoiu hanasidesukaranee yakiha magaoninatte hanasino houkouwo kaeta 
mottomo noru houdatte kiga tasikakadouka darenimo wakatteinaisoudayo sukosi hette karehaunazuita 
oretatidatte sukosizutukongurakatteruyo 
kunga oboeteirukototoorega oboeteirukotohadokoka kui tigatteiru 
soredeyoku ansinsite ikite ikerumondana bokugadesuka 
iya 
kundakezyanaku daremogada karehagomakasita 
mottomo utagai hazimerutokoreha kiriganaimondenee 
wasuretari kiokukarasime dasaretari omoi tigaetamama ansinsitarisono hougazutto ikiiindarou 
huruidowonozoitatte siyouganaiyane 
yakutaimonai kokega haeteirudakedesore hinikudesuka 
yakiha mewokirakirasasete hanmonsita 
natunoaru atui nitino gogokarehasono untensyuni saikaisita 
motiron karehasoreto siranakattasi muumokotirani kiduiteinakatta 
kareha mezirohukinde takusiiwo yobitomete nori konda 
zitakuno houni iku mitizyunwo setumeisinagara hankatide hitaiya udeno asewo nuguita 
kurumaha ugoki dasita 
ugoki dasitesugu untensyuga itutta 
danna
assiwo oboeterukane 
e 
asewo hukiyamete kareha untensyuno koutoubuwo mita 
kubisuzinimo asehahutuhututoahureteita 
oboeteirudaroune 
imano mitizyundeassiha omoi dasitanda 
areha gogatuno hazime gorodattakanaaaano tokino koutoubukara bakkumiraani sisenwo tenzita tokikareha sotuzentosite omoi okosita 
bokuwo totyuude hurosita untensyusandane hurositadakezyanaiyo untensyuno kutyouha kenwo obita 
orehaayamarini ikasaretandaze 
tuitatino kasegiwo bouni huttesasoudattane 
zyoumutokaiu kottaossantozitozitotosita senakawo zasekikara biki hanasinagara kareha kotaeta 
sikasi bokuhaayamarini koitoha iwanakatta hazudayo 
sotiraga katteni kitadakedaanna denwawokakete kuriya zyoumudatte hoututteha okenaisa zyoumuha genkikane 
are sindayo koutuuzikoka 
iya 
byoukidedatyottono kankaiwaga atotaeta 
kousatenno akasingoude kurumaha teitta 
taorude kubiwogosigosi nuguinagara untensyuga itutta 
ano temiyagemoassiga zibarawo kittandayo 
umakattadarousoukane kareha betunokotowo kangaeteita 
ano banbokutatiwo sinzyukude noseta bansaano sigurega huttetakane 
ame
naniwo ituttendesukai untensyuhasesera waratta 
amenokotonanka hanasitenaiyo 
kasiorinokotoda 
urusakatarasiikara itiban'uenadonowo kaette zyoumuga iumondehee 
sonna zyoutouno kasidattanoka 
nakamiha nandakke kasuteradayo 
tabetakusenimou wasuretanokai 
tabenakattayo kareha syouzikini itutta 
usowotukutomata konransuruosoregaatta 
tabenakatta 
ninniyattandesuka 
iya 
mositesimatta siroi honooto kantarui nioiga karenimazamazatoyomigaette kita 
naruhodone 
kasuterawo mosutoanna nioigasurunoka untensyuha henziwosinakatta 
senakagasukosihukure attayouni mieta 
madokara miru matiniha kazeganakatta 
gairozyumo densenmodonyorito ugokanakatta 
hayaku ieni modotte mizuwo abitai 
karehahebarituku sitagiwo hihukara hagasiteita 
osaetukeruyouna koede untensyuga itutta 
danna
mada kakegotohayatterunokane 
kakegototte nandai 
sora 
kurumano nakade tureno wakai otokotosikirini hanasi attetazyanaika 
keibaya hanahudanokotowosa singouga aoni kawatte kurumaha ugoki dasita 
tureno otokotte totyuude orita yatuka 
soudayomatasitemokongurakatte kitanato kareha kangaenagara madogawani karadawoutusita 
kazega kano kaowo kousikukosutta 
bokuha kakegotono hanasiwosinaiyo 
suru hazuganaiiya 
siteitayodemo bokuha keibamo hanahudamoyattakotohanaindaze 
yattakotoganainoni hanasiha dekinaidehaano banyakito nanno hanasiwositanokamou kareniha omoi dasenakatta 
hanasitatoiu kiokuhaarugasono naiyouha kie useteiru 
suruto syoubugotoha nanimoyaranaito iundanesouha iwanai 
syouginara sukosi sasumata kousatende teitta 
untensyuha taoruwo dasite tenohiradano handorunadowogosigosito nuguita 
taoruha yogoretekurozundeita 
atuine 
dannairairasita koede untensyuga itutta 
issyoni kourimizuwo nomanaika 
ikitukeno misegakono sakiniarundasoudanairairasita untensyuni kiwotukeroto darekaraka iwaretanowo kareha omoi dasita 
hayaku ieni kaeritaikeredokokoha gamansitetuki atta houga anzenkamo sirenai 
kareha kiyowaku dakyousita 
dehasousuruka kurumahasorekara gohyakumeetoruhodo hasiri hodouni taiyawosuri yosete teitta 
kareha kurumawo deta 
kourimizuyano akai hatahadararito tarenorenwo waketekuguru tokitubuno garasutamaga udeno kewo tikutikubiki nuite itakatta 
kooriwoatukau misenokuseni tennaiha matiyorimo atukatta 
kooriitigohutatusosite untensyuha miseno sumini iki huruboketa syougibanwo motte kite kareni mui atta 
komainemusouna mega kano masyoumenniatta 
danna
ittyousasouzyanaikanani 
syougiwokokodeka 
soudesuyo 
antaha sasuto ituttazyanaika sasutoha ituttayo 
sikasi kuntoha iikakete kareha kutiwotugunda 
noppikinaranaimonoga senakani sematteiruyouna kanzigasita 
nanika kakerunoka 
un komai megasukosi ookikunatta 
gankyuuni akai kekkanga tikutikuto hasitteirunoga mieru 
maketa houga aiteni saikeireiwosuru 
sorededoudane 
dannayosi 
sasou zyoumuno siroibuyobuyosita tenohiraga untensyuno koutoubuwogutto osu 
atamaha aturyokuniaragainagara kekkyokunomettesimau 
hun 
areka 
sou omottatotan kareha zensinno sikanno sokokara myouna tousiga waki atte kurunowo kanzite untensyuyorimo sakini komawopatipatito narabe hazimeteita 
sunayamawo komaku hiraita ryouhouno susoga muiatteatakamo nitouno osorosiki kemonono kyottayounamoutittode kouumihe deyoutosuru mitino bouni gakeni soute ikkenryousino syouiegaaru 
gakehasomosomo namitoiumonono yowo utihazimeta mukasikaraga tukito tetuno tatewo sasaite kioku|zintomo kagiri sirarenu siono zinwo husegi tomete kuzurekakaru yukinogotoku kouwo kezuru raikaasisa 
sunayamani hae kouru mebouhayagate tirihata nengotoni kare hatetemo tiyomandaino matukakete ganha matuno midorinisite simonimo syokuha kaenainodearu 
sarebakoso matugorou
waga isamisiki sendouha namiutigiwano gakewotayorinio namitoiusono utukusiki koinyoubouto airasiki nyuuziwo nokosite nitigotoni kenno monno maenaru saimitihe syoutosono usirosugatasoutaieru mouzyuuno mani totutatuyoto mireba tadatini unabarani moguruyou sunayamawo kudarite hamani detetatimati kouumiwo kogi wakete tobu kamomeyorinao takaku kenhatenu kumoni kakururunode 
rusuhatada isohuku kazeni mokuzuno nioino tasukikaketaru udeni somuga hamayurino kaoruyori sorakunyori nyoubouniha itikiwatokosiku syouniwo daitari hoosurisitari komoriutautoutarituduresasitariharimonositari matubade kanbutuwoaburimosite sabisiku kyouwo okuru narai 
namino otoniha nareta mimo niwatorino otoni odorokite zito soegano yumewo yaburi monbikiakete kumanaki gatuni musino otono syuukunituke ottokoisiki yahanno goronekoromoni tuyuwo oku kotoari 
momizinoyouna tewo muneni yayoino hanamo mizuni sugi wakabano kazenotayorinimo rono koeninomi mimiwo sumaseba ainikumatanu tokitori
kuzirano huyuno seizisaha sakamaki yosuru umino kibani namidani kooru makurawo kudaite naku ziwo yuruha bouhuuunarazuya 
hahaha udenonayuru tokititiha okinaru anyano huneni ameto namito kazeto roto kumoto sakanato uzumakiku katukei
sinsinuraitaru tokoroonazi ryousino yowatarisinagara minamiha danni kitaha samuku itizyoumitinimo inhyuugade bousyuumo nisikouno tateyamahouzyoutoha kotokawarisono uragawanaru maeharakamogawahurukawasirakokotukonado nakanzukuhuneyuureino tikuraga okikoukenwadanadono kaiganha kazeni muitaru sirohono sotoniha hitoeno saegirumonomonai taiheiyouno suitousi ninmo sittaru araisoumi
kono ikkenyahasono koumino hamano namiutigiwani sirono kabetomo isigakitomo kisiwo tanonda wakagino ietukuri kingoro betuiewositabakaride hukiita mesae senmidori sinwarakaketa simadaga niaou nyoubouha komotinagara tosinorihamada nizyuunisan
kyonentyoudo imadokihunakinohazimega uizandeo hamatoieba sunasae sikimyouno hitotubutane
nitiatarino nandoni sueta makurakayano aoki nakani hiruno hotaruno hikarinakusuyasuyato biitutteiruga kawairasisaha sihennikoboreta tatamo herimo teyuuganroumono
inuharikoga yokoni nete kinobori syouhousinokororito matta heridainiharimono itawo nanamenisite soetitino emonmo tukurowazu neesankaburiwo karukusite tasukigakeno nino udeatari hizasini sekikinakeredomo miyakosodatino siroyakani kurenaikinuno setuwopitapitato yubiwo sorasita teno sabaki namino otonosirabeni turete konno itowo tadoruyou setaisimitaganao yasasii 
akihiyorino sanzigoro ninno kageyori kibino kagehitotu akatonbono tobu muuno unewo iseino kai koe
gougaigougai
nisantyan nanno gougaidaneto nyoubouha mainitinoyouni kaowo miru onazi gyozyouno nazimino yatutyoumononiutumuitamama turedurerasii koewo kakeru 
katatewo kaityuuhe tukkondedousitekomasita baisyokuyara itibanhebiwo nonda hukurowo kaityuu
mizinbouwo tatenisite maebadehesi otte kazirinagara heridaino maehenyokkirito hukiyaga atte detayouna hukusukeatamani muu rokan
syoukotuno konno tutusodedokono masyuuni morattayara senkino kyuuobino saketanowo nawani netta hitoemawasi syouseiikini sirikudari 
korega oyahitosiha nenbutuziide amino yaburewo tukurouutimo zyuzuwo hanasazu tenikakenagara rituno nakano komadono anakara tonarino kakino kiurano yanekarasuwozirorito yokomeni nozokutoitumo maehadakeno kozano hizahe daisiriomoku hituke oku sandaisoudenno hinawazyuuno tusorito syuagete hututo hukutopa tuto tatu syouzinohokoriga meni itutte namidaha detemo soha tigaezu makkurona hanewobasarito otosite yatuosaeroto kenkoumosezumata namuamidade tenaisyoku
bannoo nani nitawa kuttawasono kazusanmansansensanbyakusaruhodoni ziino ingaga magoni mukutte konmeiwo syoukarasuno sanyukizyosuue nenzyuusanno oogarana warabedegozaru 
soutare mayuwo agato sitaookina kutide kanzisita 
neesamaonoreno gougaidayo 
kesagougaini haraga itandade inabamarusa gougaininamaketadaga tyokukimata gougaini naottadayo 
soreha komattaneesoredemosukkari naottano 
to kurenaikinusetuno komimiwo komakakutyoityoityoito nositeiu 
aa gougaida 
mou nantomoariyasineeya 
datteo maesansonnakotowosityamatao haraga warukunaruyo 
naniwoyosonna kototute 
naa neesamaamaimonowo tabetesagarigari goutte ranbouzyanaikanee 
umukorekai 
to mewo uezamani komausite sitakutibiruwoperorito nameta 
katamo sunemo hutokoromogasagasato hukurowo yuttekorya naniyo nandazeanou onorega yomesanni yarouto omotte ubaga misede katte kitande umasoudakarasyokonametai 
tatta ititudana 
minna yomesanni yarundaze 
tokururitohari itani narande kouwokae engawani tewo sasaite nandono houwo nozokinagarayaa neteyagara neesamaonorega yomesanha nenekana 
aa imasigata hirunewositano 
ninzyouganaizenaa onorega umaimonowo motte kurunoni 
eeoi okineekao hamatuzi
hetonomezuruyouni keiwo tasiname kosiwo hiite naninimoiwaneeya haebakaribunbun'ittemawattera 
hontoni hidoi haenee kaga inaku tutemo hirumadatteaasite kayahe irete okanaitone kawaisounayouni atumarundayo 
sorenikouyatte norigaarumondakaraneurusai tutyanaindamono 
mitiyan'o maesanno motonanzomoyapparikoukanee hamahehatittodemo houreteirukarasoredemo kikanka sukunakarounee 
yappari ira irudokorokamotto iradosikoto iruze 
hitotukami datoraete okadanezitoka nantokaitteo siruno zitunisitaiyouda 
tokeroritosite magaoniiu 
sankonna nensiteiukotono setaizimitamo kuremuki sioyakiku kemurimo itiretunionazi kasuno warayadousito nyoubouha dahohoemidoumo mitiyan kansinni syotaizimitakotowooiidanee 
yatuha kokoroduite warai dasihahaha syotaizimineedeyo neesan 
konnoo hamatukoga dekitekara onorenaritake syoutukahatukawanee 
kitiya sitito issenkowo tukattemona daizini kiwotuketera 
ganroumonodanona amedanonaironnamonowo katte kurunda 
nyoubouha nantonaku tesyokuno nakani hukumeninatte koeno tyousimo sizuminagara mitiyanhadousitesonnadarounee 
o maesanguraina tosinorikakkouzya syounino motteirumononanka hikiubattemo zibunga yokui tokidanonisouyattetittozutu minakara morauo syoukendeano zini nanika kattekuretesa 
neesansimizimi uresiikeredohontoni mitiyan'o maesan'o kurinara kai kino dokudenaranaimono 
yatuha uresisouni mewo sagetehehe nanineedayo kino dokuna kotohatittomoneedayo 
yomesanga taberu houga onorega zibunde taberuyori umaindakarana 
annakotowoiundayo 
to nyoubouha kaowo agete kanzito nante zyougaarundarou 
zyukuto mirarete dokude gankidatte otokoha daredemosoudaze 
anikadattesouiwaa 
hunede bouhuuuni nuretemona yanedaino iranee naide neesanyao hamatuziga ametuyuni nureneeto omoiya zibunga samui kihasineetoyo 
usoba tukari 
to tuitega syounidemo nyoubouha omowazuhatto ramu kao
usozyaneedayosono dainya neesanmosouyatte hataraiteruda 
naa neesan onorega yomesandatte nandaze onorega ryouni dekaketaatozyayappari tyoumonowositekunneezya onore|endaze 
aasimasyoutomosinakuttesaohoho mitiyan naniwo haruno 
esorya nandamatasono tokida imaha kita tukiride naninimonee 
to menkuratta minomawarihadakatta kaityuukarazuri otisouna kasihukurowosono tokiherihe saokuto teppoudamagakarakarakara 
gougaigougaituto kousiku syamide tuikakete hiratede yokozamani ponto hutukutokororitokaerunowokottikaramo itituharaitekururitomawasitetyoitosukuihatokake koede ponto kuti
oya gotisouyounee 
sanyukizyohagu tuto nondeaa gougaitokyotoritosuru 
nyoubouha nureta tewohuraritosasitesu tuto tatta 
mitiyan 
umuo maesansono sanzyakuha taisouirokegaarukeredo amariyoreyoreninattazyanaikatuidedakaratyoitokono hazihehatteoite agemasyou 
nanikonnamonowo 
toatohe tairiimani tokimasu syusuno obiyatuha kiki oboeno husininari nakaotodesosorinagarakururito muumukininattaga hayaika doutositatakana asibumisitewai !hyuugaheno tusorito kita tyano haninugabikurito sirizottepatto sunaiyasono tonge zyouno kousisa 
sizyouwo miro yowamusime daredato omoue syoukarasuno sanyukizyoda 
to kato waratte daitokui
kikkyousuruwane toutotuni donattesaaamada munegadokidokisuru 
ha tuto engawani kosiwokaketa nyoubouha zourino kakatowo kiyosikukoboreta tumanikake katatewo haigoniaranu sorawo simenagara humuki tousino tukaremoatta hinni munewo busuru 
neesanmo yowamusidanaa 
toukyoukara kite daizinnoo teini tumawo hikisuritteitandakara dameda ikuzihaneeya 
nyoubouha tesyokuwo kai tottaga mebutinoatarihonnorito gyakuzyouseta miminimoturekakaruokure kewo nadenagara enna zidayomata susowo susowo tuteo hikisurinoyoude ninkikiga waruiwane 
nisikieno neesamadaayo mineena minahikisurittera 
sorya mukasinoo himesamasa 
o teiha daizinno inabayouno naidatteo komadukainandamono hikisurittenanzoirumonokane 
imani tokimasu syusuno obitoketukaruda 
o himesamadatteo komasidattesonnakotoha kamawaneekeredo sendounookamisangasonna yowamusizya hukaneeyaaao hamatuzihakouha sodatetakunaimonda 
to kikaigaatte ningyouno harano nakade kieruyouna kaoniha zinai koumansa 
nyoubouha daemitutu kounaotutte kaowo mita 
hohohoiukotodake kiiteiruto mitiyanha taisoutuyosoudakeredosono miikuzinasi tutaranaindamono naniyoareha 
areha tute 
to mewoguruguru 
datte gentugisan senhutosan riuemonziisannankaga kurutoo maesankono gogatugorokara suina syoukarasutoiwarenaide besowo kaita sanyukizyoda besosanda besosanda 
tuideni borato kaimeisironante nanika koumanna kutiwokiku doni bangoto komerareteoidezyanaika 
nandemo kowaika turaikasitekitto okide naitandayo 
kono ninhatookasisouni seikouni mirarete yatuha kutiwomugumuguto rokanwohurarito sagetehehehe 
to humuite nigawarai 
mitaga kai besotyanya 
to omowazu karuku tewotataku 
dattedatte nandato yatuha kutiosisouna kaoirode onoreguraina tosinoride magurohuneno kogeru yatuha takusanneeze 
kokoirano hanasuisihayou isodatte oyogeyouka 
takadaka sekidemedakawo kiwameruka hurukawano asai tokorodebatyabatyato hunawo yaruda 
namidakiwatoittatte itiuneri notte mineenanotarito tenzyoumade takakunatte gakuno douha meno sitada 
oohurosikino yamazyaneega itinamikosuto tanizokoyo 
hamamo nipponmo mieyasineedeo hosisamaga uturisoudeo taiyousamaha makotoaoda 
neesan nagino kai nitidesounandaze 
tokorowo okihe dete hitotu bouhuuuto kurukagatyametyano makkurayamide namidaka takidaka wakaranee mamizuto siomizuwotyanponnigaburito tukattiyaamino siokarawoperoperotoo tyano kode hanautawo utaundai darega okihe dete besonanka 
to katawo ikarasite ootewo hutta yatuomawarino manesite rikimu 
zya nandatte nandatteo maebesosannano 
untatimati myouna kaokerokeroto giseino nuketa rokanwoizikurinagaraaryanearyanehehehe gougaida gougaida 
goaresatyoito yougaaruto nyoubouha koyameru 
yatuha tonge asiwo muunomeriniusirohe hikareta kosihudedatte gougaiga isogasiiya 
a gougaitutyoitoaresa nandayoo maeo taitutebanee 
syouto miwo okosite ooutosuruto yatuha kudasita goasibakariwo ititobini hane kaettehyoito kyomi tatta nyoubouno maesuinoatarihe marui isyutuhitaide gyouideoitoiu 
deasihe toutotuni totukagamarete nyoubouno miha maehesinaisouninatte souryoita 
nandaneemata kikkyousuruwane 
hehehe bangotodaze yowamusiyai 
aa kaiyo mitiyanha siugozaimasuyo tuyoikaraneo maeha tuyoikarasono besowo kaitawakewoo hanasiyo 
o maeha tuyoikara besowo kaitawaketo nennotameittemite syunsita mega sibusou 
hukaneeya tuyoikara besowonante darega tuyokutte besonanka kakumonda 
zyayappari yowamusizyanaika 
datte neesan besomo kakazarani 
yoruitiyabounenno higa hunenituite hanareneedamono 
riuemonnanza onorega besowonanteiu kutideaa mietesono tokihao nenbututonaetada 
to tuyogaritasani mewo (kigou)ru 
nyoubouhasorekaaranuka utiuti|abunda munehehisito syokukawarumade buntogameee bounenno higa tuitatteottotobakari sanyukizyoha kutiwoosae damarou damarouto bouwo muita henhooni warawo hukuminagara kikkyousitayouna syokudearu 
hisuhodonao kikitasani nyoubouhawazatosunete mise kaitomo takusansouyatteo hisina 
douse mitiyanha tanindakarao hamano mukosanzyanaindakarato katawo hiite miwo naname yoziri kirisouni sodewo awasete nyoubouha sekounina nnu 
yatuha deru kuiwo utu tetuki ponponto tenmadowotataitesimatta !neesan nanimo hisutoiuwakezyaneedayo 
konno anikamosouiusi zyoukunda riuemon|toemo neesanniha naisyounisiteoke hanasuto kyouhugaru tuteiukarayo 
dakara minade hisundakarasemete mitiyanga kikasetekuretatte kazyanaikane 
mumuzya hanasudaganeoraga zyouzetuttatte minaniittya hukaedaze 
daregasonnakotowoiumondesuka 
o hamatuzinimo naisyoudayo 
to mituto sinattemata engawakara nandono hahakoromokayawo sanozoku 
eiziga naniwo sittesa 
soredemo yumeni mite ensarera 
tyoitosonnani kyouhui kotonanokai 
to nyoubouha herino hasiranitukamatta 
e nanioraga besowo kaite riuemonga nenbutuwo tonaetakuraina kotodakendomo 
sora neesankono gogatumikkanagasino katuohunede hutabanokide tomattakkeyo 
nakano banno yonakano kotodane 
nodamo yamadamo hunnneebottosita umino nakade banmeni yuuhanwo kututtaatodeyo 
hirumatukarano kirisamegasitosito orininatte kitade minadouno kanhemoguttenason tokini sentadonga kogasikkee 
kyuunioo samuioo samui kazeagekuda busyousyou 
darezokawannaharaneekatte tomokara donto hikudaritada 
hunehaguraguratositadaganesorede tomaruyouna namizyaneeda 
donburiko tukosukko tuko rikuhe hyakuriyara gozyuusatoyara hougakumo nanimo wakaranee 
nyoubouha daunazuita erisamisiku titino haru munewoosaetanodearu 
rokubanmesino nani siokarasa name sugita 
dore nukaamedemo nomubeitottena riuemondonga irimaziriwatte kogasitukee 
yaozoina senhutowareetemonowo mite nigetana 
to tomode ziisamagaiwassyarutono bakaiwassyaihontouni samukegasuruda tute sentaha tenmadokara doteraoottekorogeta darumayo 
hoiahoito namino nakade yuuni yobaru koegasurudane 
dokokaradaka hunnnee tikaiyounimo kiereba tooiyounimo kieruda 
koyagatta koyagatta youkiga waruitoomottai !oramodoumo senkigakizasita 
saa darezo kiteyattekuretitto kyomaneezya suzihattesyo kotoganaito syouhantokidemata riuemon|ziisamaga senttadayo 
ware koge zutuuda nanzikoge kakkedato kaikui kaowosite syutuninganeedane 
tairakozadetyotto zisyakusa misasitukee koreieno anikaga yatunanzikogetoiwasittakara nanno kimotukaneede hunede tassyananohaorabakaridaottomakase 
to yatuha rokanno wawo ookiku udeippaini simeru manesiteikinari tomohe tonde deruto hunega namino uehe hasinikakatte amede suberutoiumonda 
do tukoinato kosiwo kiwametagazu tusirito tekotaesite tukino taibokunekosoginisitahodona ooi rono yatuno tusirito kaitadagane 
amegasyobosyoboto rokanni simirubakaride soradaka mizudaka wakaranee 
haa hirumamiru tooi tokorono yamano uewohuwahuwato hokoukuyoude sokoga todorokito hutuekuri kaeruda 
ahoihoiahoito henna koega makkurana uminimo sumigaattesono sumino houkara hibiite kitadayo 
nisisa mukeba nisino houminamisa mukeba minamino hounandemooragano muita houde kierudane 
namino uneruto douituni koega uitari sizundari tookunattarina tikakunattari 
sono naiboyaboyato higa moeta 
hunekara okihemonono zyuuyongomatito makkurona nakahebukubukuto ookina awaga tatuyounibo tuto hikaraa 
yaa higa tomoretai tuteoraa kikkyousite wamekutona neesan 
ooto nyoubouha kaetta kowane
damatte damatteto riuemonziisamaga douno kande tomano sitadeiwassyaru 
mata sentaganearemoyo rikuno nintamasiide zyuugono nenmade mineekerya issyou|awaneetoiundaga zyuusande dakkuwasita yatuha kouhukuyoto hakudaane 
oraasorewo kikuto rodukawo nigitta tekubikara samukunattaa 
maa enzyanaikanesorede besowo kaitandane murihanaiyo kyouhuiwanee 
tookure kewo kazeni hukasete nyouboumo syouzentosuru 
yatuno kaoiroakatonbokibino homo yuuduku niti
sosonnakureedeo hamatuzino mukosandasonnakureede besonanka kakubeika 
honootoiudaga henna higa moe moekottihe kisoudade kogi hanasubeito rowoositada 
neesansousurutosono higayo ookatanamino katatidanbeioraga tenmadoyori takakunattari hunazokohe gakega dekiruyouni sizundaribuyobuyoto korogeyaagatte hunaasihetuite umihebinonotakuruyounituite kuruda 
sosite naniyo ahoihoiahoito enna kenkoegayo hino uku tokiha sitahe sizunde hino sizumu tokiha uehe uite zyougeni sokosunde tooinoga miminituite kieruda 
sitinandemohaaorato onaziyouni darekasono honoosa koide kurudagane 
bouhe koraretehananneedato rodukawo kizande isoidesyakurutohaa hukae 
muumohuwahuwato tokunaruda 
koryananneesyokotoganaitomou utiyarakasiteosaete totutattebikubikusite miteitarana 
yapparisoredemo koyaagattehuwaritoyatte torinoyouni hesakino uehe mizugiwasa hanaretetakattagane 
itiatari kazewo kututte muuhebukubukutonobitakkeyo 
mataibitu katatini enkunatteboyarito kiiroi hakunigorino kagegasasita 
ookina huneha hesakikara douno kanhekakete hanbunbakari kiirokunatta 
huzingana susowo hirogete hizawo tatete hizyoutta katatidakke 
itipasi ookisamo ookiide roga atte muuhe omokunarisoudanihaya taaimonee karuinoyo 
oraawaitoiute rowo hanasita 
son tokidawareno kaoha makotoaodasouiu nanzino menha kiiroizeto tomano kandetendengaittaa 
ayakasi higa kayottayo 
yatudamatte koge nantomosurumonzyanee tute koreieno anikagaiwassyarudedousurumonka 
ora kutundena mitutosono hiwo miteyatta 
boyarito kiirona sokono houniuyouyoto nanika ugoiteketukara 
e tunanisa nanisa mitiyanto isogasiku kiite nyoubouha hisasino in
hyuugano yatumo kurekakaru akino nitino kibanda nakani hakukurokumonannuruyo 
nandakatittomo wakaraneega akameawabino tyousa hikizuri dasitetatakituketayounauyouyotositamonoyo 
dosu akaindanousu aoindanonitiniti hesakino itaniku tutuiteiruyoudakke 
suporito hanarete umihe otitaguruguruto mawattadagana dainosini sattonosite itiroude tookumade motte ittadokokade sakanano mega hikaruyouniyo 
oraga katamo karukunatte hunehasurasurato suberi dasita 
douno kanzya zyakurisite kasukani ibikimo kieruda 
yoruha osorosiku huketadaga namimo tairaninattadakaraoramo ikiwo haitagane 
etemonome naniga ikiwo hakasebei 
ahoiahoitooraga mimino boudemata yobaru 
damatte kogetoiwassyarudeoraha suutomo nakaneedaga harano nakade kenkoesasurukato omottadayo 
endakarana kikumaitosite atamaa toutte mimiwo magirakasiteitakkega tikusyouhuneni tuite hiwo yobudatoyo 
namiga tairadadenaoto hukae 
hino yatume kunasidehuwahuwatonosiottasono tokihaoraga koideiru rono houhesabukubukuto oyoide kitaga kyuuniboyatto hirogatta tanukino kouganhatitatamisikiyo 
sokora itimennamiga kiironi hikattadane 
sono nakanihaa hosonagainumeratosita kuroi simaga uitakke 
ayakasi hinituitesonna banha sameno yatuga bakerudatoatode ziisamagaiwasitta 
souiya medappei 
makkana higa hutatu sorawo muitesono senakano totusakini nirandeitagasibarakusurutona 
imano kasamemega mizinninattayouni ookii katatihasuporito kiete hyakutomo sentomo kazuwo sireneeironna sakanagasurasurasurasura kiirona namino uewo watariottaga kasamemenasamazamanisite miseru 
touno umidaka tenzikudaka orandadadaka hunnnee yonakadattakegaoraasonna kotode nakiyasinee 
to yatuha hitoikini isandeittaga iwo togirasi sihenwo simeta 
meno maenaru sunayamano nenosono muki aeru mouzyuuha hakuno hatotomoni kuroku umino soraha namino matuni kiwobokasitezo kurenainaru 
hatisousuru nainimatao saruwoyattekororito kutunda ningengureeni syukukamattesokora itimennisatto kurakunattato omoutoayasi hino yatumeburaburato susoni awawo tateteikiwotuite unette kite kondohaoraga asino kazini zyakundehirahirato moetadayo 
oraa mewo husaidaga hanano senda 
tomohe syanoborisouna katatiyosorede katappera moenobiteoraga motteiru rowotukamaesounisita tokioraga teha tumeno syokumade kiirokunatte meno tamamoyapparisono syokuni somarudagane
