yatuya 
hyaa 
sonoayasi hino nakawo nozoite miroiikaikoto mouzyaga iraa zigokuno zyouha ikkenedato sentadongaiudaane 
syounida bakawoiunaito koreieno anikagaiwasikke 
ora kannnakunatte besowo kaki kakioioi kyouhukutte naki dasitaadayo 
iwarehakakuto kietaga nyoubouha naninimoiwazu kutibiruno syokuga aseteita 
tomawo ageteboyarito hikattekonno anikano katatigana antyuuhe dasasitta 
oreni kase yatuneroi 
naruhodouttousiku tukiyaagaru tute hatuto tenohirahe kokyuuwo hukasittawa 
itisike kuruzo sawagunatoitte rodukasa totte makotosuguni sorawo misasittadeoramohitoridenisu tukomu tenmadowo agete simerutona itimennidosu akaku nigotte kitada 
namihasokorani makkurona oyamanoyouna umibouzugakasanari atte neteruyouda 
ora douno kanhe koroge kondayo 
kokonimogorogoroto hakkuninsa tiisakunattesukundeirudane 
dokodamo sinnee umino nakani hunesatada iti|soude meno maesa bakemononi syumakareteyoyagate bouhuuuga koyoutoiudani ikite hatarakunohakonno anikatada hitoridato omoiya kokorobosoikendomona anikaha sendoukonna tokinoo sendouda 
nyoubouha hikiireraretemaaneetobakari hukai iki
yatuha koumanni dakatamuki mimini tiisana tewo eisite todorokitotada narubakariyo tyouenterasamasa daiturikanewo hanniti|tenmadokara oottayoudane 
utoutotokou nemuttappe 
sumouwo tottekorori nage dasaretato omotte mesaakeruto huneno nakaha oomizudaa 
akawo kumi dase taihendato hunemo ninmokurukuru maudayo 
tomamo nanimo suitobasareta osorosii otobakaride amega hurutomo omowanee tenmadokara mizubitari makkurona umibouzume huneno maehemo notihemo migihemo hidarihemo gozyuusanzyuu
nukunukuto katasa nabete tewo kunde totutattawa tewo ageruto sodeno nakakara kutii hirakuto inkoukara waite massirona mizubasiragakara tounizaazaato hunesa megakete totusyuuru 
ahoihoitodokodayara yobaru koesaatiranimokotiranimo miminituite kierudane 
kyuusono tokisa huneha hattyouroninattaganaoraraga yobaru koezyaneeda 
yapparionazi tokoroni kazinituitaayasi hinoakaridena kagenoyouna huneno katatiga hakubonyari nezumiirosite kemuriga huite kieru guaiyosu tutonzyasurusuruto uite iku 
nanarie simaga mieru tukero tukeroto sentaga wameku 
yaadokonoka hunemo kogituketa simagasokonito riuemonziisama 
naosasokonisukusukuto yamano katatisaarawarete anno naka|tokkanite oohabana kino edaga (kigou)noaidani youburetena hobasirasa totutatte namino uewo oyoideruda

ansyouhe sasoi yoseru renwo yobu yuureisenda 
kiwo kakuni motassee yowai otowo dasiyaagaruna tute koreieno anikaga donarudakendo misu misu tenzikuhe huki nagasareruda zigokuno tutidemo kamawanee rikuhe atte kokyuuga hakitai tasuke hunenannotte yowai otosa dasunomoatte sititenbattousurudadena anika|makotosuguni totutatteburu tuto misinwosasikkeeyo totuzenmotohadakaninattadane

anikagayo 
oi 
ayakasi hisamada kazini tuite houreneeda tenmadokara kiironi hikatta kahukuhena maguronawasaguruguruto makituketesono katahasiwo douno mano yokogihe yuetukerutosaa nenbarasida syabaka zigokuka mitodokete kuru tutenakokosahaakonno anikaga konmeini yobareta umisuzumeyo 
torinoyounibirarito hunnetawa umino nakahe hikomudenee massirona naminokasanarikasanari kuzurete kuru ookina yamahe kunoboruda 
hyakuzinbakari tabane ageta maguronawano genyori takakattanogayo itisukuinizu tuto nosita !sono zyuutakezyuugotakeyuminarini uekara nozokunoyara sorikaette niramunoyara kutisaagete isunoyara heiwarikakatte tori kakonda kurobouzuno rituhadakatteiru nakahe namini momarete ikasikkee huneno nakadehasono tunawo tenteni totte riuemonziisamasono tokinio nenbutuda 
yatto tokiga tatte modottegozatta 
genhe tewokakete kamisamanoyouna kaowo dasite naninimonee happoukara namiwo utukeru ansyougaarubakarida mayouna tuteiwasitta 
o sendougokurouzya gokurouzyao sendouto minaakukobuside haindadagane 
bouzumo simamo huneno kagemosararito kieteyo 
sokora yamanoyouna namibakari 
kyuuniaredamatasokorazyuu soramo hunemo ninno kaomo namimo ookii ookii umino nobosa hanbunsikitte hakukiironinattadeneeka 
ee naniwosurudaayakasimemata hirogattana tute minakuso yakeni donattakkee 
souzyanee higasino munasao taiyousamaga noborassitagasokodemo neesan tento namito zyougehe houretada 
sakuyakasameno senakadasitayouni itimenno kiirona nakani hakubonyari kuroimonogakakattanoha gakuno douga meno kahe dete kitadayo 
nyoubouhahottositayouna kaoirodemaa bekattaneesorezya hamahemo tikakattandane 
omottayoriha nagasareteineedayosoredemo okihe sanzyuusatobakari deteitappei 
sanzyuusatotomata odoroita zyoudearu 
nandanaa neesan sanzyuusatoguree nandemoneeya 
soredehaa yoruga akeruto kiiroku kandotte tourukayottayouna mizuto tentono kansa usuakarino nakawoiroirona katatede henmino yatudano kubinoneenodano gamaga kokyuuhukuyounanodano inuno senakahe honoosa karamatteiruyounanodano usidano umadano igyounamonoga kagetouroumiruyounihuwahuwamayottesassato kake nuketedokokahe ikudane 
zyuuatodehai riuemonziisamamosouikkeekono nenninarumade sakuyaguree syuunenhukaeayakasino tuita kotohaneedatte 
neesan 
nandattearedayosonnani yorugaakete uminobakemonodomosasurusuru kake dasite userudani temotoga akunatte minano kaoga tutikisyokuninatte mieteyo roga sirounattanoni kazinikuituitaetemonomemada sirizokaneeda 
o taiyousamao hisasidane 
sono syokuga dandan|aokunattenatittozutu katamatte kaisukumattayoudakkeyabukubukuto susono houga mizugiwade hukuretaa hirumega sui kottayouninattehotorino namino uehe otitaganekarakarato akunatte aokuroi umisa nitino sitade totuhatte hunneteruda 
maamedeteeto minade kaowo mitakkeyamedeteehasorebakarizyaneeda neesanmo atarasii koromomonoga itimaidekitappeian tokino katuosa kotosityuudeno tairyouda 
hesakini tatte turasitta anikano minomawarihesa ginno katuoga huttakkeyaa neesan 
to kurekakaru kumono kakono enwo gyouida yatuno syutuhitaiha kurakatta 
nyouboumosorenarini inkouhono sirou gyoumuite mewo tozite miru muneno nakano oboe kaki
zya nandane samidarezibunyonakakaraareta tokidane 
maao maesanha naki dasusi ziisamamoo nenbutuwoo tonaedatte 
naino ninhasono osorosii namino nakade seimeigakede hikondesa 
watasihatada namino otoga osorosiinode syoukara monhe kusariwoorosite okudeo hamato netakkenee 
donna hagesii namiga kitemo urano gakeha kuzurenai tetuno kabeda ansinsiro tute naino ningaoiidakarasorebakariwotayorinisitesoredemo donto utukarugotoni gaketo namitode tatakawosuru imautta taihoude iwaga yabureyasimaikato bouyawosikkari dakubakari 
yonakani titinokarerunoto sabisiibakariwo yokunisite hiitomo samuitomo omowanaide neteitanonisoudattanokanee mitiyan 
sonna kounamidano osorosiiayakasi hitoyaradano kurobouzudano huneyuureidanono nakade naino ninha umikara miriya kino hanoyouna itaitimaini notteitesato nyoubouha kubitaretutu watasinya naninimoiwanaindamonoto omowazu erini itisizukuhororitosite sumanainee 
yatuha nanno sisaimo sirazu nagusame kaoni iseino kai koenanimo sumanee tute kotoaariyasineeda 
you neesano maeni samukattari tumetakattari turai omoisasarasemeeto omoudakara anikagasousite hatarakuda 
oramo nandazemousonna tokisaattatte besonanka kakiyasineeo hamatukono mukosanda issyoni umihe hikomuze 
sonokawari imamoikkeeyo 
anikanotameni neesangao zendatesitario sakekattariyo 
ora sakeha nomaneedao imode kaiya 
yo tusyoito katuosa tunde namini zyoukonde modotte kuruto hamani kemuriga nabikimasuareha nanizoto toutarebatoitaikeni tewotataki isiawasete sio|kunde ganrouno baketudeo imonitekazimewotyorotyoro takuwainoda 
you neesan yatuha kyuuninuito tatihadakatta munewo tede sikitteoragakokomade ookikunatteo hamatukoga hamahe detemama kotosuruhaitudarounaa 
nyoubouha yuutuyuno nureta memotono egaoyasasikuaasoryamou kyouasutoiu naini tyokukini musumeninarukeredoano mitiyanto tyousiwokaete kokoroarigeni yobikakeru 
zyuuitiaaanone watasiha nanimo atarasii koromomononanka yokuitoha omowanaisi bouyamoo kasimo youranaikarao maesandouzoo mukosanninattekureru kinara sendouhayosite nanizo hokano syoubainisiteokurena neesano negaidagadoudaroune 
to omoi ituttaka genmoaratame herini izumaimonaositanodearu 
yatuha asobi sugita tasogareno karasuno nakunowokyorokyoro kiite huasini memo agatuki neesan inabamaruha kyousa higaeridappeika 
aa naidemone 
konnitiha banhoumadeni kaerutte dekaketaganeo kikiyo mitiyantosowasowasurunowo osaeteittaga yatuhayokumo kikanaide neesankoso kikineenaarayo douno gakukara karasuga dete kita kaokaomoneemonda touzokuwosuru kusenisiyaagatte ryousae ataruto tabiwokakete yotte koyagara 
neesan hunega okihe kitaze tairyouda tairyoudato karasuno sitade tiisaku odoru 
zya naino ninmo kaette koyou mitiyan hamahe dete miyouka 
to ryouninno kaeru uresisani nanigotomo wasureta zyoude nyoubouha emonwo naosita 
mada mieruyouna tokoromade huneha iriyasineedayo 
misassee 
sokorano kakino kino edanankahorazawazawato karasumeienkowosite matteyagaru 
gorokusatono tokorokagitukete kurudakarane 
kokorani matteite hamahe sakanano noborunowo neraudayo hamahe detatte tookuno houde hunehayattokono karasugureenisika mieyasineeya 
yaa misasseemata zyuugorokuhane|tukatte kita okino huneha attaze 
neesanmata kirumonoga dekiraa tyotusitautino koumansaoramo notte ikiya syoukenga moraetani gougaiwo tukatte mouke sokonatta 
o hamatuzini naninimo ganroumonoga kaeneena 
to syutuhitaiwoga tukuri tumesenni kakikarawo totutukakete akatonbono tittaatohebotabotato ahurete uturu karasuno kagehe asireki
naniwomata kaokaodaoramo ganroumonowo kao kaoda 
damatte miteiru nyoubouha kyuunimatasimeyakanidakarasa mitiyan ganroumonomo kimonomo iranaikarao maesan ryousidenaku nanizo hokano syoubaiwosuruyouni kokorokaketeokunnasaiyo 
toiu koemourundeita 
yatuhahazimete kutiwo hirakekerorito magaode kounaotutte nandatte ryousiwo tomete nandatteyo 
dattemosonna yousuzya uminidonnamonoga kyoyoumo sirenaine kowaizyanaika 
naino ninya mitiyangasouyatte watasitatiwo rusunisite umihe ryouwosini itteru maniarasiga kitari namiga kitarisoryamadaiitositemosikaano umikara atte watasitatiwo ryousini kurumonogaattaradousiyou 
kaiga karahekakureruyouni iehe itutte kinndeitemo muuga tuyokereba tukamaerareruyo 
o hamaha eizidasi watasihakouyatte tikaraganaisisorewo omoutohontoni kokorobosokuttenaranaindayo 
tosimizimiiunowo akireta kaosite kiki sumasita yatuha uwakutibiruwo sitade name manaziriwo sagete koutohuki dasi 
bakaa bakaaiwaneemonda 
hehehe sakanaga sakanaga ningenwo turini kitedousuruda 
ode tattetyokotyoko hokouite hirede saowo motunokayoyou neesan 
sorya katuoya sabaga saowo seottesokokara hamawo hokouite kite kenhe kyomutohaiwanaikeredo sokono sirenai umidamonodonnamonoga sundeite youkino warui yorunanzo namini notte koyoumo sirenai 
hirumadattekokohe kitamonoha konnitiha mitiyanbakarizyanaika 
to nyoubouha souya usugurai nandono houwo kaerimiru 
zyuuniaa nandaka inkininatte anano nakawo miruyoudayo 
toura sabisigena yuukankurenamakanno kurenaikinumo kurozunde sihenhamonono isono kaze
yatuha kyuuraita kibigarano yaseta zizouno sugatasitezurarito ritunarabu keiwo mikaerimotto matino houhe hikkosite kenhe gasutoudemo tukerudayo anikamosoredakara kasegunda 
iie watasya nanimo imanokurasinidoukouto husokuwoiunzyanaindawa 
watasiha gamanwosurukeredoneo hamaga kawaisoudakara gougaiyademo nanindemoii hokano syoubainisiteokurette mitiyan'o maeni tanomundayo 
naino ninga sinpaiwosuruto waruikarao maekessite naninnimoiunzyanaiyo kaikai kaittano mitiyan 
to ingawo hukumeruyouniiwarete edano karasumo ganki kao
mumuzya nanda kosini suzuwotukete kakemawaruda kaettara itibanziisamato soudansubeikadatteo sennyanaraneetoyo 
to yatuha syoukogete yubiwo kamu 
iiesa imaga imatoiunzyanaindayo 
totuzensonna kotowoittya hukaiyomaa hanasidawane 
to karukuitte kiwokaete miwo okosita nyoubouha tyouitawosotto nade yokuhattakara kawaki kiranai 
nanineesanga nakukaradato toutotuniiwaretanode kyuuni munegasemattarasii 
aato katasodewo meniatetagaha tutosita kazedemata nandowo mita 
gasagasasurune karasuga iriyasimainee 
sanyukizyohamata warai umikara sakanaga turini kitadayo 
are enodorokasityao hamagamuzukatte kayaga ugoku 
sora goranna mewo samasitawane ninwo odorokasumondakarato henhooni kanzityoito nirandeaiyoaiyoyaa mewo obositara mituto kenbei 
oragairo tute nakasitya sigotono zyamasurudakara senkokukara sinbousitetada 
tokagotogamasiku miwo magaru 
o ainasaimasihohohoneeo hamato nyoubouha kurai nandode hahakoromokayano maede midougisita 
otto yatuha herini tobituitagaaa senasida neesan 
to sunewomozimozi 
kayoo noboriyo 
datte neesanha kireizukidakarana 
kamawanaiyoneetoitte daki ageta zini hoosurisitutu yokoni kenmuita kaoga siroi 
yaamou warattera imanaita karasugato herihazini enryosite tookude kaowohutteayasitagahontoni souzousii karasuda 
to kyuuni otonabite sorawo mita 
yuusoranimuramurato gakuno douwo nagarete deta itidanno kumono seityuuni satto yuretayouni donto ippatudodododonto namini hibiita 
mitiyanyamata ziisamaga karasuwoyatta 
asonderu tute sikararera hayakuitte osaebei 
maa asondeoideyo 
to nyoubouha muneno yukiwo zini atataku tokinagara nanameni daite nandokuti
zyuusannee imani naino ninga kaettara nanomonowo waketeo moraisousurya sikararehasinaikarane 
nandaka konnitiha sabisiku tute kokorobosoku tutenaranaikaramoutitto asonde itteokureneeo hamamouo tousangao kaeridane 
to kaoni kaoziniiinagara herihe dete kita

oyamouittesimattandayo 
nyoubouha kaowo agete syounidaneeto hitorideittaga enno sitanaru kogaiwo sukasuto hakukuroinoga tatteiru 
nandanee ninwodamasitesamadasokoni irunokai koreyatuto syounini utasetasounitukatukato yottagagyottosite sirizotta 
ensitano kuroimonoha mino takesanyukizyono yakusanbaimouroutosite atamano marui sodeno hiratai nyuudoudeatta 
nyoubouha miwosimete kito kutibiruwo musundanodearu 
tokini mizirogiwositato obosiku tekinda souno sugataha tyouitano yokohe yuretagatyoudo hamahe derusono nitouno mouzyuuni mamorareta sunayamano yokoananogotoki irigutiwo habaippaini husaide tatta

ryouninga zyoutta inabamaruhasono sitaatariwo yuuna yokokumo
soreni tourusuto senoatarihebonyaritodokokaraka kiriga sematte kite minomawariwo tutundanode sekisetaka koetaka siranukeredomo kubonda meno akaaziwo obitanoto sentte kuroi hanano takainoga mitomerareta

kokoroyowaki nyouboumo tadatinikorewo ayasiki umino kamino ninwo asarubeku umikara kenwaretatoha amari menoatariyue kangaezu 
nyoubouhatada souketatta 
keredomo enna kimino warui kozikibouzuga murahe nagare kondato omottanodesou omouto douzinibatabatato nandohe itutte tansuno bounaru kurai sumihe yokozamani henhizatukuto isogasikusikasi hotondo muisikini tyoumokuwo 
hayaku sattemoraitasano nyoubouha zibunmo isoide omoteno herihesurusuruto dete konokatani hikaenagarahaitoiusoredemo koeha yasasii onna
hakukuroi nyuudouha mewo tometesono kyodouwo mirutomonasini konokatano kikyowo sittarasiku imahousyawosiyouto eiziwo katateni tenohirawo sasidasitanowo mimo mukaenaide daigirasikuka tutarusouni atamawo sitani taretamama yuruku nitubakari atamawo touttagasamo ouheini mietanodearu 
mata naki dasitawo yurinagara nyoubouha temotibusatani kiyosisii mewo (kigou)ttaga nandesune naniga yokuindesune 
tonao monomoraitoiu nenha usenu 
yayaatte nezumino koromonodokoga sodetomonasini tekubiwo dasite souha omoimononoyouni yubiwo agetesono takai hanano sitawo sasita

mitiyan'o okiyo 
aa itekurereba bekattato yatuno meiwo kokoroyukasi nyoubouha kitenrasiku yobinagaramata nandohe

tokorogayorosiitoiuwakesa 
zibunmokorede iki sakiga ketutte uresiito gaizinhahontouni uresisouni akusyuwo motometasouda watasihasousita hanasiwo kiitesono gaizinno parini ikouto omoeba ninmade issyoni turetesugu ikerusono huyuuna mibunni senbouto sittoto hankanwo oboe (soreha watasinoutini kutuuwo yondeita 
)omosiroi hanasiniha tigainaigatyotto iyadaneto itutta 
maeno wakai danzyowo mite naitatoiu hanasiga watasini ataeta zyunsuina setutaru kanasisagasonotame usuraguyoudeatta 
daga hanasi tetositeha akikaze|rakubakutarutokorohe akarui hikariwosasaseru koukawo nerattesousita hanasiwo kuwaetayoudeatta 
kigatukuto heyanonakaha makkuradatta 
watasiha monokengeni tati atte heyano sotono tobirano yokoniaru suuittiwo hankaikinisita tobirakara tewonobasite patiritohinetta 
tukueno maeni modoroutositehuto watasiha heyano sumini akaku sabita gasukonrogaarunoni mewotometa 
heyade zisuigadekiruyouni gasuga hiitearunoda 
watasihasoudakoituha hibatino daiyouninaruzoto omotta 
imamadesoreni kigatukanakatta zibunnoukatusawo warainagara guaiwotamesubekusassoku hiwotuketa 
botuto keikinoii otowo tatete moe atta aoi honoono uenisimesimeto tewoyarutomotiron'ii kagenhanareta ueheyattanodaga atui 
sokode wakikara tewo eisuyounisitagasomosomo gasukonrohasouiu sikakeninatteirunodarou wakiheha usomitaini netuwo housyasinainodearu 
netuwo ukerunihayaharimassugu honoono ueni tewo okanakutehanaranai 
soregamata zuibunuedemo atuinodatta 
sosite tewo zyougesasetesirabete miruto atuitokorokara kyuuni atukunai tumetaitokoroheto kyuuhentekini uturisono manityoudoii guaidato omowareruyouna atatakaitoiu bubunwo mottenakatta 
watasihaamari tanomininaranai daiyouhindato rakutansinagarasoredemo tewomameni uragaesitehaabutteirutosonouti zibunno yase komatta honeto kawadakenoyouna teganandaka hini yakareteiru surumeno asikanankamitaini aware hukaku miete kiteiyana kimotininatta 
watasiha hibatino higa koisikunatta 
souda 
o konomi yakiyahe ikou honganzino urateno nokinamigeininno iedarakeno tazimamatino ikkuganonakani watasino ikitukenoo konomi yakiyagaaru 
rokukutoha hantaino houkoudearusokohe watasiha dekakete itta 
sokohao konomi yokotyouto iwareteita 
kakuni reviuyakusyano iegaarusono rozino irigutiha ninhitorigayatto toureru hososadesono rozinonakani hutuunosimotayagao konomi yakiyawoyatteirunoga sankenmui atteita 
sono ikkenno moriie|kotutaroutoiu manzaiyano saikungago teisyuga syusseisitaatode hiraitao konomi yakiyaga watasino ikitukeno iedeatta 
kotutaroutoiu geimeiwosonomama yagounisite huuryuuo konomi yakikotutarouto kaitearu genkanno garasukowo hirakuto semai tatakinisamazamanoamari zyoutoudenai getaga asino humi tate banonaikurainitumatteita 
korya taihenna kyakuzyawai hekiekisiteirutonakakaradouzoto saikunga iisono koeto issyoni hettono kusaito soosuno kogetuita kusaisouittao konomi yakiyatokuyuuno kusaiwoharanda atatakai kuukiga naniyara souzentosita kyakuno konzatutoiunotohatyotto tigatta kehaiwomo hakonde watasino hanasakini nagarete kita 
genkanwakino santatamimani mittuninaru saikunno kodomoga hirunenotudukika okunotoittemo hutamasikanaiga okuno rokutatamimano sawagini ikkouheikideito yasurakani nemutteita 
satekokode sibainitatoerunaraiwaba hazimete monogatarino makuha hirakarerunodearu 
deha imamadenoosyaberihanandeattaka 
watasitoiukono monogatarino katari teno kokorono gakuyawotyotto nozoite mitanodearuga omoebasonnakotoha huhituyoudeattakamosirenai 
dainikaihuuryuuo konomi yakitatoeba gakkouno syousiheyanadoniyokuaru ookina hibatitokuni syousiheyanadotoiunohaamari zyoutoudenai hibatiwo souzousite moraitaikaradearugasono ueni ookina makkurona tekatekahikatta teppanwo nosetamonono mawariwoizuremo itimokumitekoremoamari zyoutouno geinindenaito sireru danzyogamottomo onnahasono bani hitorisikainakattagagururito mesiroosini tori maitemeimei kattenio konomi yakiwo yaiteita 
daitaisono huuryuuo konomi yakikotutarouno ieni syutunyuusuru kyakuha kotutarouga kouenno yoseno geinindearu kankeikara geininga ookusositeitumo sadatta kaohurenosoremoamari tasuudehanai zyourenbakaridattakara watasiha hitomawari kaowo kentitteitagasono nitino kyakuha hazimete miru kaobakarideatta 
nanika mizimena seikatuno akatoittamonowosimi komasetayouna kunndasinabita seikinonai kaobakaridemarude hettosonomonowo kuumitaina butano aburade girogironoo konomi yakiwo kututteinagaratende aburakinonai kaoga sorotteita 
sositesono kaono sitanihennidogituiasamasii sikisainoikanimo tanasarasino yasumonorasii heraherano nekutaiya waisyatuwotuketeitesorerahasorerano motinusino ningenmadewo tanasarasino yasumononoyouni miserunonimigotoni yakudatunodeatta 
sayoukousita watasino kaki hurihasono hitobitowo mita tokino watasino meni sagesumito hankanga ukandeitakanoyouni dokusyani tutaerukamosirenaiga zizituhamasani hantainanodearu 
watasino menihasono hitobitowo mirutotatimati watasinoutini waki attekitanantomo ienai sin'aino zyounagoyakana kokorono kyuuisoreranomotarasita kandougaariarito hikatteitani tigainainodearu 
sono kandouni haigokara tukareruyounisite watasiha hibatino maenitotemo wari komenaitowakatteinagara heyani atte itta 
suruto hibatiwo gissiritori maitasono tasii itidanno hitorino onnamotimitaina zinkenno mahurawo kubini maita hiyowasouna sintaitukiwositatyotto nimaimeno kaowosita wakamonoga watasiwo uwamekosini mitesumimasento itutta 
sugu akimasukarasumimasen komai munewo tidimeteo zigiwosurusono kakkouha ninnoii kanzino inginsawo toori kositeikanimo hikutuna kanasiimonodattagasono koemo kanasiku hikutudatta 
douzogoyukkuri watasimokousureba nanikaitaitasii aiteno kokorowo kizutukenaidesumu makenai hikutusaninarudarouto tutometa koedesou iimatasonoyouni tutometa monogoside heyano sumini matta 
wakamonoha metyametyani soosuwobukkaketa usitenwookazunisite mesiwo kututteita 
timitaini namanamasiku akaisono usui kutibiruha watasino menisorega naniyara nenwakai karewo syokundeiru hakkouno anzinoyouni uturi muneni byouidemo himeteirunodehanaikatohutosonnakotowo watasini souzousaserunodattagasousita kutinonakahe wakamonoha yakeni siroi mesiwo osi kondeita 
gatugatuto kuu katatino kuseni huazisouna syokuyokuganainode muriyari kututteirutoitta kanziwo ippoude dasiteita 
tatimati tyawanwo soranisuruto miityan 
su nmasen daidokoronisou koewokakete tyawanwo zuzyouni kakageta 
miityanto yobareta ryokusyokuno youhukuwokita wakai onnaga yubinikaranda kiiroi sinasobawourusasouni torinagara daidokorokara sassokutonde kita 
watasihakono miityannaru zyoseitoha kaonazimideatta 
watasiwo mite pyokonto otokonoyouna ranbousadeo zigiwosuruto tentekomaidawato ikattamitaini itutta 
taihendaneto watasiga iunotosumanaina ato wakamonoga onnanoyounasinayakana komai tede tyawanwo watasinagarasou iunoto douzidatta 
suruto miityangasousumanaisumanai iunoyosinasaiyoto anenoyouna tyousidekimetuketa 
datte kiraidawa 
otokono kusenisumimasen kondohaodokete ituttagaodoketeitemosono koeha komai kinzokuno senwo omowaseru senzyakunakasukani huruewo obita kanzino koedatta 
zanonakakaratottemoikeneeyatoiu tonkyounayaya hiwaina tyousiwokometa koega atta 
miityantosono wakamonotono mani nanikaarunodaroukadouyarasono nanikawo yatutteirurasiikotoga zizyouwo siranai watasinimosono koekara saserareta 
daga miityanhatittomo douzinai keroritosita kaodekokono saikunga syousarawo tyaratyaraiwasete tyuumonnoo konomi yakino zairyouwo isogasisouni sakari waketeiru daidokorohe satte itta 
wakamonoha tere kakusinoyounimou yaketeruneto gawano zyoyuukazeno onnaga yaiteiru sinasobawo sasasita 
yakerudesuyotosukasazu darekaga itutta 
kokode miityannokotowotyotto 
watasiha hazimetekonoo konomi yakiyahe kite miityanni atta tokikanozyogao kyakunoyoudearinagarakono baainoyouni nanikuretonaku syoumameni tetudatteirunowo mitekono musumehanandarouto omotta 
kokohe watasiwo annaisitekureta reviusakusyanisokodesotto kiitemiruto kanozyoha minemisakotoitte izenTzano dansingu tiimuniitesono notiOkanni ututta odori kode imaha kouenno butaini deteinaitoiu 
sore izyounokotoha karemo siranakatta 
asakusano butaiha taihenna roudoudesono butaiwoyameruto odori koha kyuuni koeru 
sintaiwo simetuketeita kowo hazusita totannipuuto hukuretatoittayounasono kimyouna koeri houwo misakomo simesiteitemada wakainodarouni tosimano zeinikunoyounatyottoiyarasiinowo meni mierutokorodehatatoeba agonoatarini meni mienakutemohakkiriwakarutokorodeha kosinoatarinibuyobuyototuketeirunoni watasihanaruhodoneetoitta mewo sosoida 
hatinidemosasaretamitaina harebottai mehutade warauto meganakunari hanaha dangohanatoiunoni tikaku sitakutibirugamu tuto deteirusono kaoha genzainomukuminoyounamononi osowarenai izendemosou miryokutekina kaodattatoha omoenai 
tada koegasatenanto keiyousitaraiidarousayou wasabinokiitanowo kutinihukumuto hanano uragawawo kyututokusugurareruano issyuno kaisaarenityotto nita husigina soukaikanwo ataeru koede sukunakutomo watasiniha sukunakarazu miryokutekideatta 
sono notiwatasihasonoo konomi yakiyanokorematanantoiuka nanika rakuhakutekina hun'ikini hikarete asi|sigeku kayouyouninattaga ikutabini miityankoto misakoha taigaiita 
sositeitumoo kyakunoyoudearinagarao kyakunisiteha kinokikisugiru tetudaiwositeita 
kokono sanzyuuwotyotto deta nenkakkouno senosuraritosita syouikina saikunwo misakohao neesanto amaeruyouni itutteita 
(konoo neesantoiunohaneni tuyoi akusentowo okisanhasantosunno mano otode kotobadeha arawasi enai bimyouna amasadearu 
misakoha damatte hoututte okutoikanimo kino tuyosouna otokowo otokotoomowanu kazeno onnatosika mienaitatoeba bokuzyuuwotappurituketa ookina hudede isamasiku kaita nikutano onnatoiuyouna ziwo omowaseru appakutekina insyouwoyaya kyouretunimaiteirunodaga tokidokisousita amai kotobanoutinioya 
tobikkurisaseru yasasisawo housyasita 
)kokono saikunha misakowo miityanto imoutonoyouni (aruiha aisuru nekoni muttenoyouni )yondeita 
reviuno osanai odori kotatiha sitasii danseiwo yobu tokiikanimo ninnatukoi tyousideo niisanto iu 
watasiha misakogao neesanto iunowo kikutabini kokorowohuruwasusono amasawoso tuto toraeteo niisantoiu kotobawosoreni atehameta 
watasiha mewotubuttehisokanisono amai tyousininazoraeteo niisanto kutino nakadetubuyakukotomoatta 
kokorononakade watasiha akogareno odori kono utukusii amai kaoutukusii amai sitaiwo omoi egaiteita 
aa akogareno kanozyogaanoitosii oyanagimasakoga watasini mutteo niisanto ituttekurerunohaituno nitika 
watasihasono nitinokurunowodonnani mati nozondeitakotodarou 
daga douzinisousita nitinokurukotoga nanika kowai kanzidemoatta 
nazekasousita nitino konaikotowo negattemoita 
hanasiha misakoni modottehatesate koigokorozino hanasikara kuimonono hanasini totuzenuturunoha myouna guaidearuga bihutekio konomi yakino bihutekidearu 
sono bihutekitoiuyounatada aburawohiite yakudakedenaku yakinagarasono ueni zyunzimitusakekosyouazino motosoosuno taguiwo takumini sosogikakenebanaranutokoronotyotto hukuzatuna sousawo hituyoutosurumonoha watasiha misakoni tyouriwo tanonda 
hitotu negaimasyoukanatoiuyouna kotobade tanomunodagasoreha yaki houga muzukasiikara mizyukuna watasino teni zyakkanoenaiseimoarukedo misakoga gawade nanika tegusunewohiitemakasarerunowo neratteiru kazedattakaramoaru 
sousita akarasamani kanzerareru kiboutoiuyori yokubouwo musisite zibunde syakaerusyakaeruto yakutoiuyounakotohatyottodekigatai watasino syoubundearu 
daga siraruru toorio konomi yakino omosirosatoiunoha zibunno tede yakutokoroniatte kuudakedeha omosirosa tanosisanohotondo taihanga usinawareruto itutteii 
watasihasorewo sinonde misakonimakaseru 
soreha misakonimo tuuzirunitigainaikarasonokotoha naniyara misakono kankokorowo kaugotoki katatininarunodearu 
watasiha zibunnoutini misakono kankokorowo kawanebanaranu hituyouwodokonimo midasukotogadekinakattagasousitasoreha zenzyutunoyouna watasino syoubunkaramoaruga misakoga tyouriwo neratteirunohasousiteo konomi yakino taihanno tanosimiwo tanosimitaitokamataha tyourino myougiwo simesitaitokaitta uita kimotikaradakedehanaiyouni watasiniha ukagaetakaradearu 
otokonotamenioisii ryouriwo tukutte tabesaseteyaritai 
souitta kokorono okunihimerareta kateiseikatuheno akogare otokonitukusukotoheno onnarasii kawakisousita kanasisaga watasini ukagaetakaradeatta 
mosikasuruto watasino ukagattasousita kanasisawo misakozisinha kiduitenaikamo sirenakatta 
misakoha hyoumendeha muzukasiikara katte yaiteagemasyoutoitta kaowositeitaga katikina kanozyonokotodakara zibundemoaruihasonotumorideirunokamosirenakatta 
sonnayouna baainoarutoki watasihasarigenai tyousideantahadousite butaiwoyametanoto tazuneta 
hibatino maeniha misakoto watasidakesikainakatta 
mezurasiku kyakunonai sizukana bandatta 
itumonara hibatinomawarini urourositeite kyakuno darekarenikamawazu matoirituku tiisana kodomomo mezurasikuinakatta 
tumannaikarahu ^n yakunowo misakonimakasete temoti busatano watasiha sintyuunohagaside hibatino heriwo tataiteita 
tumannai tute iuto butainiakitanoka 
kanozyohasorewo syatte nyoubounoyouna tyousidetyotto mituwo tottetyoudai watasihahoikitatoawatetayouna koewo dasite tewonobasite mituno youkiwo totta 
mituwo kanozyoha yakeba yakuhodo tiritirini tidimiagaru nikuno ueni sosoginagaraii nenwosite zyuurokusitino musumeto issyoni odottemoiraremasenwasou iutomarude youkiniatarumitaini gatyarito ranbounisorewo oita 
zyuurokusititoiu kotobakara watasiha oyanagimasakowo omoi dasita 
itumohakkirito atamani kizamareteiru zyuusititosinosono karenna zeibina nikutaito ganzenno (yaya kotyoutekini ieba )aburagittabuyobuyono misakono sintaitowo hikakusita 
korehatasikani narande odottaraokasinamonoda 
iyaokasiitoitteha kino dokuda 
watasihasono koukeiwo souzousurumademonakusousita tiguhaguna odori kono odoriwo zissaimiteiru 
haturatutaru nikutaini matteno nennoitta sintaino kuzureta odori kononanto mizimena kakkouyo 
taihitekini kiwatatu syuukaimosarukotonagara haizantekinasono sugataha mewo heiitaikuraida 
ii nentte situreidagahontoni situreidawa meni kobiwo muisikitekina kobiwotataete niramuyounisita 
watasihanurukunatta tyawo nondesou ieba kouenno odori kosantatihaitumo kodomobakaridana 
ookikunaruto tugituginiyamete ittekawarinimata kodomoga detekuru watasihakono suunenkouenno butaini hananoyouni patuto saitehaizuremo hananoyouni tittedokokaheinakunattesimatta zitunitakusanno reviuno odori kotatinokotowo kangaesaserareta 
nanika sabisii omoiga muneni kuru 
dousiteyamerunokasiradatte odotteitattesyouganaindesumonosyouganaitoiebasyouganaiga yaketawa 
o sarahoikitato sarawo watasinagarayahari butainiakirunokane kanozyohasoreni kotaezu nareta tetukide yottuni kitta nikuhenwo subayaku syousarani toruto teppanni nokotta nikuzyuuga akakassyokuno awawo tatete zizizito yakitukunowo henpeinohagaside kiyounisukui agete sarani utusikonootuyugaoisiiwanesou ituttehaito sarawo watasinikureatasinankaakitawakezyanaindakedotubuyakuyouni itutta 
zyadousiteyametanoka 
kikoutositeanmari tati irisugiruto omotte hikae tyousini tewoyarutoo syakusimasyoukaiyadoumo tyousiwo tori agete watasini sasitekureta 
siroi kimenokomakai tede yubinotuke neniekuboga ukabu 
soryane epotunto itutte kutiwo tugumunonie 
to watasiga itutta 
ienesakkino hanasiaasoukatounazukutosoryaakiteyameru ninmoarukamosirenaikedodemo taigaino ninhaakiteyameruwakezyanaito omouwa watasiha damatte haiwo katamuketeita 
nanteiundesyou 
sizentoyamenakutyanaranaiyouninatterunone 
sou omouwa saigono kotobawo kyuuni tuyoku rikimuyouni itutte hitorideunazukutoatasimoo sakenomimoukasiraantaikeruno 
siranakattamonodakarato wabinagara (imamadekokode kanozyoga nondeirunowo mitakotoganakatta 
)isoide haiwo hosita 
sositesorewo kanozyoni mawasoutositehuto nanikanarenaresisugiruto hanseisare haiwo motterassyaiamari nomenaindakedo tyuutyoga kitanoka ugokoutosinainodeobasan 
haiwohitotu daidokoroni koewokaketa 
ieatasi tati atte saikunnio neesanatasio sakenomimuwa uttaeruyouna koeda 
oyaoya miityan 
daizyoubu
daizyoubuttena aninandaka siranaikedo daizyoubuyo haiwo motte modotte kiteo neesanmokottihe konai 
issyoni nomanai 
taihenne saikunha tori awanu koedeanmari arenaidetyoudai arerukamosirenai otokomitaini itutte kondohasinmiritodaga betuni kikaseru tyousidenakuatasinandaka kyuuni tazimani aitakunatta koibito
tokokode watasiha tawaketa tyouside kutiwo hasanda 
go teisyuhakkiri ituttenoketa 
dannasansou atterassyaimetoitta kaowosite tyousiwosasita 
kanozyohanantonaku hanawosusuttekottino tawakeni noranakatta 
mewo hosomesikasi kutimotoha kurusounisite haiwoguito katamuketanotitokoroganee kantanni aenainodousite toukyouniinaindamono kotobaga sitasimiwokomete zenziranbouninatteiku 
soryaturai 
dokoniiruno sizuokasizuokahu ^n wakareteiru riyuuwo tazunerunoha hikaeta

korehadokodedemo kikareru hutuuno kaiwada 
dagasorekarakimatte tuginoyouna kotobaga tuikasareru

watasihaukkari kiite kanozyono iidurai bekkyodattarisitarato omotte hikaetanodagakottiga damatteitatamekaette kanozyono houde itutta 
byoukide kyourihe kaettennohu ^n 
koitutumamanai nikuwosusumeruto koerukara kubiwo hutta

tinmokuga kita 
teppanno uede sakewo sasiteitanode tokidokisakega atusita tetuno uenikobore zizito syousoutekina otowo tateta 
omokurusii kuukidearu 
sorewo harainokeruyounisoukawakatta watasiha seiippaihyoukinna koenisiteantahasono dannasanto issyoninattanode butaiwoyametandane ituttekaraamari kinokiita serihudemonaito kiduita 
uunto kanozyoha kubiwo yokoni hutta 
kekkonto butaitoha tigauwa 
dottimo daizi
sorya kekkonsiteyameru ninmoarukedosou iuto kanozyoha kyuuni sakega mawattamitainitomini zyouzetuninatte kanozyoga butaiwoyameta riyuuwo hanasi dasita 
sono hanasi kataha hanasino notino houni mawasita hougaii hanasiwo maeni hanasitari maeni hanasita houga hanasigahakkirisuru bubunwo notinisitarisite metyametyadeattakara itioutituzyotatete noberuto kouenno reviugekizyouha taigaidasimonoga sibaito odorino hutatuni wakareteiru 
sosite kanbusantoiunoha syutosite sibaiwoyatte ii kaeruto sibaino houno yakusyaga kanbuno tiiwo dokusensiteite odorino kataha syutosite oobeyadearu 
dansingu tiimuno kanozyotatiha nannenkoyaniitemo butaide odotteirukagirihatumari sibaino houni tenkousinaide odori senmondearu izyouha syusseno mikominonai mannenoobeyade kanbuni ukabi noborenaitoiu 
konnawakenowakaranaisitowo bakanisita hanasitutearyasinaiwa 
itutta touzaha hayaku zenretuni detaito omotte zenretutoiunoha odorino zenretudansingu tiimunonakadenomaa kanbutoiutokoronesorewo saisyoha nozominisite odotteirukedosate nannenka hetteyattokosa zenretuninattatokorodenannokotohanai 
soredeosimai sibaino houni uturanaito kanbuni syussedekinai 
sosite uturitakutemomatasokoniha ningatumatteitenakanaka wari komenai 
odorihaumaiga sibaiha hetatoiuyounanoha nengaikuto tomoni kusatteyametesimau 
yamerusobakara wakai koga itutte kitesonnanoga kaoga kireidattarisurutotatimati ninkiwo yobisousita koga rokusuppo odorenainoni ninkinotameni tenguninatte hurui senpaiwo keibetusisikamo odoritonaruto butaide odorinagara ninisansisannisansinadoto kyakusekini kieruyouna koede keisansiteitarisurunono tonaride odotteirutonantomo baka|kusaku haradatasikuyametimaetoiukotoninaru 
tatoe syusseha damedemo sukina odoriha odotteitaito omottemosonnakotodedousitemoyametakunaru 
Tzano bungeibuno nindeatasitatinokotowo butaino syoumouhindato itutta ningaaruwa watasiha reviuwosyottyuu miteirusi reviukoyani yuuzinmoiroirotoaruga imamade reviuno odori koni taisiteha nanika amai musoutekina doukeitekina issyuekizotikkunamonowo miruyouna kimotide miteitekonoyouna kurai genzituwo sirasaretanoha hazimetedeatta 
watasiha mewosomukenagara itutta 
antahazya imademo kizana kotobadaga butaino zyounetuwonakusitawakezyanaindaneatasidekitara issyouodottetai hutatabi tinmokuga kita 
miityantara taikihonoodaneto itutte saikunga daidokorokara dete kita 
misakoha wadaiwo kaeteotakuha takaseisanhago syoubaiha 
kono kotobani watasiha hakaoissyouomoku osaetukeraretayouna kimotikaraho tuto sukuwareta 
kokode watasiha takaseitoiu meide tootteita 
sorehakokohe hazimete kitatokikokohe annaisita reviusakusyagahuzakete watasiwo takaseito yondanoni hazimaru 
kokohe kuru mitimitisono yuuzinha watasiga nanikano hyousini ookina mewo gyorogyorosaseruto kigekihaiyuuno takaseiboutosokkurininarutokarakatta 
sono entyoude yuuzingakokohe kite takaseikuntoyatta 
soregakokode watasino meitosite toottesimattanodearu 
saananikana atobokeruto tazimasanto onazi hounogo syoubaizyanaikasira saikunga aburabouzude teppanwo hukinagara misakoni itutta 
tazimasantoiu kataha watasiga touto honwo kaiteitandesuyoto saikunno kotae 
hontoha kyakuhonnokoto 
maa onaziyouna syoubaidesunesokohekokono teituranohitoridearu manzaiyasannopontanga konbanhato nigiyakani itutte kita 
(turuieanpontoiunogakono kameiepontanno aiboudeattagaanponhakokoheha sugatawo misetakotoganai 
)idayo 
dosakandaidokoroni nikaino nobori kutigaaru 
sono kaidanno uekara darekagadonatta 
nikaideha watasiga itutte kita tokikara nanika dotabatato otogasi suuninnomonoga bosobosotubuyaitarito omouto kyuuni kanitari warattari naitarisuru koegasiteita 
aiyo henziwositanoha reino wakamonodeatta 
dosakan
adanani tigainaiga myounaadanadato watasihaatahutato tati noboru wakamonono senisono imiwo saguroutodemosuruyouna mewoyatta 
gozituwatasiha dosatoha tabimawarikara kanha kin'iroyasyano kan'itikara tottamonodesono wakamononokotowo toukyoudeha nimaimetohaienaiga inakamawarino gekidandattaramaa kan'itiyakuno nimaimede tourudarouto darekagakarakattetuketanoga nakamanonakani patutonattaadanato sirasareta

anone 
(konoanoneha takaseibounoohakono kokkeinadaga watasino osorosiku kirainaanonenityotto niteita 
)atasi imamadeotakuga kurahasisantoha siranaidetukiatteitakedo zituhaatasito kurahasisantono manihatotemo myouna innengaanno misakono meniha watasiwo gyotutosaseta nanika zouoni nita hikariga moeteita 
innentoiuto watasiha kimiga warukatta 
izure hanasuwa aserasanaidekureyo semattaga kanozyoha kutibiruwo kituto musunda imamade watasinituizo misetakotononai katai kaowo sopponi mukete tori aoutosinai

ii

naze soretaka 
watasino kataha watasino oyanagimasakoha (ninyoii kinamonodato watasiwo waraunara warae !)Kgekizyouniirunodearu 
dakaradearu 
mosi watasigasono baaihitoridattara watasino asiha gekizyounonakani touzennoyouna kakkoude sui komareteitani tigainai 
itudattemo Kgekizyouno maemade kitaramouosimainanodearu 
soreha watasizisinno orokanaiya tanni orokanato ituttanodeha zyuubundenainantomo tenotukerarenainantomohaya iiyounonaihodo orokanasonna orokasano bozyounoseinanodaga nanika watasiniha gaibutekina teikoudekinai meni mienai bouryokuga watasino ueni osotte kiteguito watasiwo Kgekizyounonakani osi komu kanzidearu

de misakono kataha 
misakomohitosiku nogarerugotoki asidoridattanoha !ittaimisakoga watasini rokukuhe ikouto sasottanoha imaha hanareteiru rokukuheno kyousyuuhanaretakunakattanoni hanaresoreheno mirenga tati kirenai rokukuno butaihenoyarusenai omoisonoseito saserareta

watasitatiha hasino uehe kiteho tutosita 
sorega watasitatino asiwo omowazu hasino uenitodomesaseta 
watasihasousita hukainaiyouna zibunni tere ikeno kanatanibikkurizenzaito daizenno neonga kawanikakatta sikakehanabinoyouni ookiku utukusiku kagayaiteirunoni mewoyattehou kireidanato itutta 
sorega watasino asiwotodomesaseta teisainisita 
eigakanmatiwosonomama owarimadezutto ittetyotto migihezuretemassuguni sensokuhe tuuzuru toori komekyuugaarunode hutuukomekyuutoorito iwareteiruhisago toorisono irigutino katahouniarubikkurizenzaiha ookina nizyuumarunonakani nigyouni waketabikkuritoiu ziwo ireta akai neonwo kakage katahouno daizenhasono nizyuumaruno houhe oyoide iku kakkouno hireno yakeni ookii akai sengano magurono neonwo kakage ueni daizento aoi neonsitani meimetuno guaide namino ugokusamawoarawasita tenokonda aoi denkyuuitawotuketeiru 
sorega huzidanano sitani tatuto masyoumenni mie kuroi ikeno mennisono hadenaazayakana toukagega ututteiru

tazimasanganeto watasiha itutta 
(sono notisibasibasousita toutotusani atteiruutini watasiha narete toutotuwo kanzinakunattagasoreto tomoni misakonosousita toutotusaha kanozyono kokoronoutini nanikatoiuto tazimaga ituttekuru siranaiutini kanozyononakani tazimaga matteirusousitakotokara kiteirumonoto sirasareta 
)ee tazimahasouiu ninwototemo nikundeitawa misakoha kanozyomo tazimato onazi kimotirasiinowo gotyouni dasite zukezukeitutta 
tazimagamosi asakusaniiteotakuni atteotakuno ryoukisyumiwo sittarakitto kankanni ikattani tigainaisou iwarete watasihaawateta 
watasihaiwayuru ryoukitekina kimotide asakusahe kiteirunodehanaitosokode benkaisitagasikasi asakusano apaatoni heyawo karitanoha sigotowosurutametoiu riyuuwo tateteiruga asakusawo miru watasino meniha ikubunryoukitekinamonoganaito ienai 
soredakenisou iwareruto asakusahe raihazimetekarasudeni hantosihetta genzainanika hanbundake zibunga asakusano naibuno ningennoyouna kimotininatteiru watasitosite tazimaga asakusawo ryoukitekini miru gaibuno ningenni taisite hundoto zouowo motutoiusono kimotiha watasiniwakaranaidehanakatta 
daga watasihawakaranaiyouna kaowosite misakonidousite tazimasanha ikarunokato kiita 
tazimatoiu zinbutuni watasihatomini nanika kyoumiwo oboesaserareta 
kentounotuiteiru tazimano ikaruwakeyorimosousite misakokara tazimano hitogarawo kiki dasitai kimotidatta 
misakono henziha aimaide humanzokunamonodatta 
aimaisahaumaku ienaitokorokara kiteita 
umaku ienaide iradati iradatuto yokeiumaku ienakunarunodattaga imihawakatta 
imihawakattemo tazimano zinbutuwo siroutosita watasino omoiha manzokusaserarenakatta 
kottiga sinkenni ikiteirusono seikatuwohatakara nanika kyoumitekina mede nozokareteha toga tatunomo touzendehanaika 
tudumerebasouiu imidattagasorewoumaku ienaikotoga nanika hukigenna misakowoiyoiyo hukigennisita 
sousita misakoto watasigao konomi yakiyawo deyoutosuruto issyoni ikoukasira 
ii 
to ituttetuite kita misakotoha watasino kokorononakadedoumo issyoninaranai betubetunomonodatta 
dagasoreha misakoga itutta watasito kanozyono myouna innentoiunowo watasiga siranaikaradeatta

samuiwaneto misakoha ituttaga hantaihasinakatta 
hyoutanikeno simanihaomasanohokanisousita misega hidaritenimou ikkenattekoreha watasitatiga hasino uekara nagameteita neonno houhe muiteitekono miseha hantaigawano hunsuinoaru houni mukete heridaiwo nabeteita

misakomotokorotenwo tyuumonsita 
sate innenno hanasidaga kininarukara kikasete moraitaito watasitositeha mezurasiku tuyokini youkyuutekini ituttanodearu 
misakoga naniyara watasinihukumutokorogaaruyouna kanzide zukezukeituttakotoga hansyatekini watasino kiwomo tuyokusasetanodearu

syanhainiiru syanhaini 
kutiniha dasanaigananisini syanhaini ittaka kikitagena kaodearu 
watasihasikasi damatteita 
ikeno hunsuiga imaha natubatotigatte darenimo kaerimirarenainimokakawarazu nessinni tyuuzitunidaga tasigenisositeyaya hunzentaru omomukide samui mizuwo hukiageteirunoni mewoyatteita 
watasino izenno tumano ayukoha syanhaino baaniita 
moto kanozyogaita ginzano baaga syanhaini atarasiku baawo hiraita 
soreni yobarete ittanoda 
watasino yuuzinno hitoriha kanozyono syanhaiokonawo kiite watasinikou itutta 
sou ituttiyanandaga hokano onnano baaiha syanhaihe ikuto kikuto syanhaihenehu ^mutotyotto raserarerunodaga ayukokunno baaiha sizenna kanzidesu tuto uke torerune 
tuinitoitta kanzide ayukokunto syanhaitoha nanika pittarisiteirune watasiha kusyousite nanimo iwazuunazuiteita 
ayukono syanhaigyou ayukonaratoiunde kiitemobikkurisaserarenaitoiukotoniha watasimo doukandaga yuuzinno kotobanihasarani ayukomotoutou otirutokorohe otitatoiu imiga hukasareteiru 
soreniha watasiha doukandekinakatta 
ayukoheno douzyouairenkaradenaku ayukono syanhaigyou watasini otirutokorohe otitatoiu kanziwo sukosimo ataenaikaradearu 
ayukoga watasinotokorowo dete ittekaranokono suunenkanno seikatuhasonouwasawo ninkara kiitari watasizisinayukoni ginzanadode atte hanasiwo kikutabiniitumo maeto tigatta atarasii zyoutaiwo sirasareru zituni hententunenaki seikatudenaniganandakasappariwakegawakaranai 
souiu kotobaigainihasono seikatuno yousouwo iiarawasi enai kanzida 
sikasinaniganandakasappariwakegawakaranainagarasokonihasousita gensyouwoazayakani turanuite tootteiru 
soredakehahakkiriwakaru ipponno sennoyounamonogaaru 
seikaturyokuno ouseitoiukotoda 
ayukoha tuneni zituni takumasiku ikiteiru 
daitanni sassouto ikiteiru 
watasiha zibunno seikaturyokuno kihakuwo kanziteirudakeni (sono kihakusanotame ayukoha watasinomotokara sattanodaga )ayukono takumasii iki houga yokeiazayakani kanzirarerunodeatta 
syanhaiokonawo kiitemomazumotte kanzitanoha takumasii seikatuno syokusyuwo syanhainimadenobasitakatoiu kyoutandeatta 
suuzitumaewatasiha syanhaikarano ayukono tegamiwo uke totteita 
soreniha zyuugunsakkabutaini sankasite watarisisita watasito sitasikusiteiru sakkano Nkunnadoni ayukoga syanhaide atta moyounadoga kakaretearianatamozehi itidonantoka tugousitekottihe kuruyou setuniosusumesimasu

saa ayukoto ooyagorouno nakaha wakaretato kiitato omoutomata issyoninattatoiu hanasidattari issyodato omotteiruto wakaretato kikasaretarikorematananiganandakasappariwakegawakaranai

hutarino douseiwo kiitanoha ninenbakari maedatta 
kunha gorotyanwo sitteiruno 
watasiga iuto sitterumo nanimo misakohahunto hanawo narasuyouna reisyoutekina kutitukiwosite ooyagorouhaneto kondoha yobisutenisiteatasino imoutono teisyuto ioutositanoka koibitoto ioutositanoka iinikusouni kutibiruwo hizumesorewo nukasiteotakuno maeno okusanto dekiru maeno hanasidawahou hazimete kiku hanasidearu 
mattakumotte myouna innenda 
watasiha odoroita 
kono tokimisakoga nanika nakunowo osaeteirumitaina henni hizundatumarikono hanasigausodenaikotowo watasino meni akirakanisurutokorono sinkokuna hyouzyouwositenakattarausono tukuri hanasito omottakamosirenai 
sonna utagaiga ukandakamosirenai

)de imoutosanhayahari reviuno houdemoyattetano

watasiha ikeno muunibonyari mewoyatteita 
sokoniha eigakanmatikara iuto Okanno urateni atteimamadetittomo kigatukanakattakotodaga oyako|donburisusi tendonto kaita onaziyouna kanbanwo ikeni mukete dasita misega gokenkatamatte narandeita 
namaehanante iu nadattano misakoha kutiwotugundamamadatta 
dagayagate itikawa|reikohuruewo obita hikui koedatta 
misakoto watasitono myouna kankeino hanasihasorede uti kirareta 
dagasoredakedehahonno gaikakuwo simesaretanisuginainodearu 
soreyuesoredakedeha zensetuno owarini kaitayouna misakogadouiu kimotide watasinituitekitaka nadonadonokotoha watasini izentosite humeinawakedeatta 
notini hanasinosubetewo siruni oyonde hazimetesorewo saseraretanodattaga imahamadasorewo kataru tokidehanaiyouda 
satekokoha watasitatinoiru ikeazeha eigakanmatinosugu urade tewonobaseba toorino ninnitodokisouna tikasananodeattaga ikenohutinigissiri naranda yomisega heinoyouninatteiruseika toorino nigiyakana hagesiizawamekigakokoheha nanika sinzirarenaiyouna tooi monootono kanzi mimiwo utagaitakunaru tayorinasadesika hibiitekonainodeatta 
sorehakono samui misuteraretayouna basyowo issoutasikusaseta 
sorehamatasokoniiru watasino kimotiwomo tasikusase nanika kokorobosoimononisaseta 
daiyonkairakuhakusono yorunandaka myouni tukarete hunukemitaininatte watasiha oomorino iehe kaerunoga okkuuninari apaatoni tomarukotonisita 
mada zyuunizimaedattaga kamadanwo atamakara supporikabuttedaga atamaga saetenetukarenaideirutoyagate misirimisirito kaidanwo kisimasete sankaihe dareka attekuru otogasisono otoga watasino heyano maedetomarutoyaairuiru heyani denkiwotuketamamadattasi surippaga roukani deteirunodesoreraga watasino zaisituwo tugeruwakeda 
(denkiha kurakusurutodokokaratomonaku arawarete kite watasini kamituku muhouna musino syuugekiwo husegutamedattaga itidosoiturani haraippaiwatasino tiwo kuwaseteyattekarahasorenimou samukunattaseikasono gorohaamari detekonakunatteita 
)darekanato watasiga kamadankara kamenoyouni kubiwo dasuto heyano sotode kurahasikun
benkyoudesukahidoku karetasonotame murini hatuonsurumitaina hayakutini ikkuikkunagetukerusono koede asanomituotowakatta 
yaa asanokun
douzo asanoha tobirawo hiraketeoyamou neterundesuka 
kono goroha tomatteirundesukasosite watasino henziwo matazusenno goroha yorukitemoitumo rusudatta 
demoukono goroha kurunowo akirameteitandaga asanoha sakeno itutta hikatta kaowoatakamo ryousiga emonowotukamaeta tokinoyouna manzokuto yorokobide issouhikaraseteita 
hirumahaorarerundesyouga benkyouno zyamawositehato enryositemasitena watasiha asakusani sundeiru asanowo watasino houkaratuizo tazunetakotoganainonihuto zankino zyouwo oboesaserare ii wakemeitakotowo ioutosuruto asanoha watasini kutiwo hirakasemaitositeirugotokuni kurahasikunno asakusaseikatumoiyoiyokou tomari komide honkakutekininattekitadesunato itutta 
nanto aisatusiteiikaumai kotobaga mitukarazu watasiha aimaina bisyouwo ukabenagara nemakino ueni kita kimonono maewo awaseteita 
suruto asanogaamari kansinsimasennato itutta 
koreha issouaisatuni kyuusuru kotobadatta 
sigotono katahadoudesuka tatetudukeni iu 
kizyuuni tatatato uti komareru kanzide damedesuneto watasiha ituttehetabarumitaini kamadanno ueni suwari konda 
damedesuneto ituttakotode watasiha asanono syutugende tyuudansaretagasoremade nenagara atamanonakade doudoumeguriwosaseteita sounenwokokodemata yomigaerasita 
soreha hitokutide iuto nanika takumasii tuyoi syousetuwo kakitaitoiukotodeatta 
dagasono negainosuguatokarasorewo oikakete watasinihasou omottemosyosen kakenainodehanaikatoiu hanseiga kuru 
sorewo doudoumegurisaseteitanodearu 
watasino atamaniha huransuno sakkano monteruranno kotobaga kizamitukerarete hanarenai 
bungakuueno sigotoniha kanarazu retuhaisyanomittomonai naki gengatukimonodakara enninaru 
supootuniha naki genganai 
aiteyori gozyuusentisukunaku handa monomo kessiteatode monkunankatukeni konai monteruranhakou itutteiru 
watasihasorewo yonda tokiwatasino syousetutoittara tokuni retuhaisyanomittomonai naki gensonomonoga ooinodakarasoreni watasizisinmohayasonnanodenai syousetudokusyano seisinwo soukainisi kenkounisi koukinisi daitannisuruyouna syousetudekitara seikatuheno tuyoi iyokutakumasii seisinryokutoittamonowo waki tataseruyouna syousetutakumasii tuyoi syousetutoiunohasouiu imidagasousitamattouna syousetuwo kakitai kimotiniyouyakunatteitatokorodakara nanika hagesii mutiwo kanzita 
watasino syousetuno ookuha gozyuusentiooku handa mononiatokara uziuzito mesomesoto monkuwotukete ikuyouna syousetuda 
watasiha soukaini takumasiku gozyuumeetorumo tobuyouna syousetuwo kakitaito omotta 
kousita negaiha zihento tomoni watasinoutini okitamonodeatta 
sotokara youkyuusaretamonotoiuyori watasitositehautinionozuto okita issyuseiritekina yokkyuunoyounamonodeatta 
daga watasinihasousita syousetugadoumo kakenakatta 
itazurani yokkyuuga tuki agetekurudakedesorewo syousetuni gutaikasurukotogadekinai 
sokodesono yokkyuuha mitasarenaide watasinoutini ussekisi watasiha issyuno hisuteriimitaininatteita 
watasiha senzyouhe ittarasono hisuteriimitainanokara sukuwarerukamosirenaito omotta 
daga watasiniha douhouga seimeiwo kakesite tatakatteirutokorohe tatakaini kuwawarenai hinoetaneno watasiga ikukotohaikanimo kenbutuni ikumitaina kanzidedounimo kigahikeru omoidatta 
senzyouha watasiwosonoyouna mede minainisitemokottide mousi wakenai omoidatta 
kenbutunintoiukotowo zitatomoniakirakanisitutuiwaba seimeianzenno kenbutuninto kaita kamiwoodekoni hari dukete arukumitainakotoha seimeiwosasagete tatakatteiru heitaisanni sumanai kanzidatta 
aru tokiwatasihatutoni gentihe nidomo omomuita senpaino hyouronkanio maegentihe ikanainokato toware watasiha ikitaikotoha ikitainodagato ituttesousita kimotiwo hanasita 
suruto hyouronkaha kunhato watasiwonemetukeomeeha dameda 
dakaraomeeha damenandato suguruwo tataite itutta 
hyouronkaha damedatoiu riyuuwo setumeisitekurenakattaga watasiha watasinosousita kimotiha kudaranaitoiukotowo satori eta 
gentihe ikebasonna kozintekina kudaranai kimotiha hutu tobi hutu tobutotomoni ikanaito erarenai kityounamonowo erareruni tigainaito omotta 
senzyouhe ikutoiukotohasonna ketina kanzyounado mondaininaranaimotto ookii takai tatibani tatumonodato omotta 
dagasou omottemo watasinosousita kimotihayahari kokorokara harai sararenaide nokotta 
sositesonokuseni watasiha asakusawourotuite ikkensubeteno ninni taisite mousi wakenaiyounaguutarana seikatuwo okutteita 
watasiga asakusano apaatoni heyawo karita riyuuha maeni nobeta 
daga sakari bahairoirotoarunoninaze tokuni asakusawo erandakatoiukotonituiteha nobenakatta 
watasihasoremade sakari batositeha ginzawo itositeitagatomini ginzaya ginzatekinamono watasinoutiniokeru ginzatekinamononi ken'owo oboe douzini asakusaha minsyuuno sakari batoiubonyarisita (ii kagenna )gainenni hikarete watasiha asakusahe kitanoda 
watasihasokode minsyuuno gunnonakani zibunwo okitaito omotta 
(koremoii kagenna gainentekinamonodatta 
)minsyuuno motteiru sobokusa sottyokusa kyouzinsa nadonadode zibunno sinkeiwo zyuunde hisuteriiwo naositaito omotta 
daga 
iyakonna tyousidesyaberaseteoitarasorekoso hatesinonaiosyaberiwo watasihakono hende uti kiranebanaranu 
watasiha asanoni sigotogaumaku ikanaito itutta 
suruto asanohawaga iwo etaritoitta kaode asakusano kuukiha bokuranihaikandesu bokuratoiunoni tokuni tikarawo irete dankotosite nanika kami tukumitaini itutta 
asakusaha ningenwoguutaranisaseteikandesu 
asakusadehahuu tutositeitemo ikite ikaremasukarane 
koitugaikan watasino asakusaseikatuga honkakutekininarukotoha kansindekinaito asanoga itutta imigawakatta 
bokugaii reidesuyo 
mattakumotteii reida 
asakusani dokusareta asakusano kuukinisukkari dainasinisaretaii mihondesuwa asanoha tabakonoyanide kurokunatta kitanai hawomuki dasite waratta 
asanoha izenii syousetuwo kaiteitagakono suunennanimo happyousinakunatta 
(iyasono tudotigau henmeide zatubunwo kaitesorede seikatusiteita 
soremo saiteiseikatuhiwo kasegudakedesore izyounanimo kakoutosinakatta 
)sousitakotowo asanoha (watasiniha singinohodohawakaranaiga )asakusani uturi sunde asakusanonakani tinbotusitaseinisita 
sousite asanoha ningenwo mukiryokunisaseru asakusawo noroinagara asakusakara hanareyoutosinakatta 
bokuhakono kansaaninwo yondara yuuriitoiu hukusyuzinkougaimasune 
saaninto taisyoutekina yowai otokosono yuuriino kotobanikouiunogaatta 
bokuno yuuzinhato yuuriiga iundesuna 
bokuno seikatuha kyoukuntekidato iu 
tumari ningenhakonna kazeno iki houwositehanaranaitoiu imidetokou iundagakono bokumomasasiku kyoukuntekina sonzaidesuyo 
asakusagadonnani ningenwo kusarasukatoiu watasiha asanogamizukara haizanmonomitaini iunoga kikiduraku nanika wadaiwo kaeyoutoasetta 
(watasiga kanotokorowo tazunete iku kigasinainoha karewo otozurerukotohasousita haizantekina kotobawo kikutameni ikuyounamonodattakaradearu 
)sousouto watasiha hizawo tataita 
asanokunha tazimatoiuno siranaidesuka 
asakusade kyakuhonnanka kaiteitatoiu siruwakehaarumaito omoinagarasorede wadaiwo tenzuru bengitosite ituttanoda 
tokoroga tazimaga asakusani arawareottanodesuka 
attandesukato asanoga mewo hikaraseta 
iya attawakedehanaindesugasouda tazimaha yuuriidato asanogasaegitta 
sayoku|kuzuretoiunomosokkurida sayokukuzure 
sounandesuyo 
bokuha sayokuga kiraidakarasono hounokotowoyoku siranaindaga tazimaha sayokuno sibaino houwoyatteitarasii 
sono zibuntazimahamada gakuseide 
simaini tazimaha gakkouwoyamete sibaikara seiziundouno hounimoittarasiindesune 
soide sayokuga dameninaruto tazimaha asakusahe koroge konde kitandesuwa 
tazimatositeha atarasii seikatuwo midasoutoiutumoridattandesyouna asanoha battono kutiwo kande ittaisayokukuzuresoudakono gorohamoukonna kotobaha hayarandesuna 
sutattadesuna 
tenkoumonotoiundesukana 
sonna rentyuunihadouiumonoka myouni seikaturyokuno tuyoi yatuga ooidesuna 
bokuha sayokukiraidakarasouiu rentyuugadoumo musiga sukanaiga 
tokoroga tazimaha yatusan sayokukuzureno kusesitekoregatende damenanda 
marude seikaturyokuganai 
nainzyanakute nakusitandesune asakusade 
asakusahe kite atarasii seikaturyokuwo waki tataserutumoridattarasiigadokkoi gyakuni hunukenisaretimattetoutou sintaimade dainasinisitimatta 
tazimagakonoyappari asakusano kuukini dainasinisareta interino hitoridesuyo watasiha misakoniyotte uetukerareta tazimani taisuru kyoumiwoiyoiyo aorareta 
asanohahitoride kotobawotuduketa 
sono tenbokuha doubyousouawaremutoiu yatude tazimani sin'aino zyouwo kanziteirundagatadatyotto tazimaha myouna yatudeneto asanoha yamini hitokagewo saguru tokinoyouna metukiwosite tazimahatemee zisinhamarude damenakuseni zibunno syuuino asakusano rentyuuniha myounisono rentyuuno seikaturyokuwo waki tataseru tikaratoiuka sayoutoiuka eikyoutoiukasonna bimyouna kimyounamonwo motteyagatte 
(asanono koeniha zibunno kotobadedouiu kanzyoukawakaranaiga hagesii kanzyouwo namitataserareteirunoga kanzirareta 
)koituga zituni myounandesuwa 
yatuha isikisitesouyatteiruwakedehanairasii 
zibunha damedaga syuuino yatuhasikkarisaseyousonna todeyatterunzyanai 
tatoeba nekokoni akuziwo kindeiru yatugairutosimasa a
asakusano odori kode sigotoniaburete asondeiru yatunankawoumaku kutigurumani nosetedokoka tookuno tondemonaitokorohe uroutokanantokasonnakotowosiyoutokakatteiru otokogairutosuru 
soitugamaa hontouno akutouzyanakute mayotteirundesuna 
dousiyouya tutarokaiya matetoitta guaini 
sonna tokitazimani autosounanda tazimano kaodake mirebaii 
tazimaganannimo iwanakutemo tazimani autotatimatiya tutaretoitta kimotininaru 
tazimahasouiu yatunandesuyo 
koituha zissaino hanasidesuwa 
sono koakutoukarasono tokinokotowo bokuga kiitandakara 
tazimatoiunohasonnayouna myouna ningennandesuyo 
zisinha seigihanandesu 
toittemo kotobano uedakeno seigiha
dakarasonnakotoninarundarougatonikaku seigihano tazimagasono koakutouni onnawo utu tobaseto ituttarisuruwakehanai 
danoni tazimani auto utu tobaseto kimotigakimaru 
konna hanasiwo kikuto tazimaga isikisite syuuini hatarakikakeruwakedehanaikotogawakarundaga tazimanosousita myouna sayouhamotiron akuzino sendoudakezyanai 
sonnanohakesikaran seikaturyokuwo waki tataserukotodagaii imideno seikaturyokumo waki tataseru 
kusatteru yakusyanankawo hunkisasetarikono goroattarinourusa hougamatomona konzyouwo motteoden yawo hirakuyouninattari tazimatoiunohakorehamosikasuruto nanika iyounamonowo motta hutuuno ningentotigau sugoi yatukamosirenaidesuna ikkini ituttaga omoinasika saigono kotobawo itutta tokinosono kareta koeha kyouhuni nita ikeito zouoni nita hanpatutono kikaina kongouwo simesitutu hurueteita 
dagasugu asanoha akumudemo harauyouni kubiwo hutteiya tigauto ookina koede itutte zibunnagarasono oogoeni odoroita kaowosikametagatuduitesonokowabattasikame menwosousite naosoutodemosuruyouni kurahasikun
paiitiyarandesuka totuzensou iuto mayuwo hiraita 
yarimasukana kurahasikun
bokuha kinwo mottenaindagaarimasukaee sukosigurainara watasiha asanono kotobawomarude zibunno houde ituttamitaini hazukasii omoiwosita

sonkeisiteiru

tazimahaitumokou itutteirundesuyo 
takumasiku ikiyoutone 
korega yatuno ohakonandesuwa 
tyotto kizana serihudaga 
takumasiku ikiyou 
sou iu zibungakarakisi takumasikunankanaindakarakoituha mattaku kigekidaga (todosu kuroi kutibiruwo dokusiku hizume )maao daimokumitayounamondesuna

tazimano kaowo mitara takumasiku ikiyou 
korega pinto kita 
sorede tazimani attadakede tazimaganannimo iwanakutemoya tutareto kimotigakimatta 
souiunoni tigainai 
tazimano takumasiku ikiyoutoiuo daimokuhasonna akusinwo huruitataserukotozyanaindaroukedo koakutouha interino tazimaga iu takumasiku ikiyoutoiunogadouiukotokawakaranai 
nandemoiikaraya tutaredosidosiyaresouiu imito koakutoutekinitotteiru 
sorede tazimawo mite akusinwo hurui tataseta 
souiundesyouna 
sounanda 
taisitakotohanai 
tittomo odorokukotohanainda asanoha zibunkara tazimano iyouna kagezouwo watasino maeni egaki dasite misenagarasorewo zibunde uti kowasita 
uti kowasiteiru saityuuha asanono tokuino zibunde zibunwo bubetusurusono kankinoyounamonode mewo hikarase zensinni souretuna tikarawo minagiraseteiru kanzidattaga uti kowasitesimauto kyuuni gatatuto sintaiga tiisaku sinabitamitaide nanika tasisouna setunasouna omomotidearu 
sosite bosobosototubuyakuyounisitekoutuke tasita 
tyoudokowasita tyouzounokakerawo atumeruyouna tyouside 
sikasi tazimanihahenni ninwo hikitukerutokorogaarukotohaarudesuna 
minna imademosyottyuu tazimanouwasawosite tazimani aitagatteirudesuwa 
tazimaha imaha asakusaniinaigaminnano kokoroniha tazimaga izentosite sonzaisiteiru 
sonna kanzidesunasou itutte kutibiruga yakedosisounakurainimade sui tukusita tabakowosarani kubiwonobasite pappatuto kutibiruwo narasite suuto atusounisite haizarani sutesaa demasyoukasosite tati noborinagarahuto kiduita kazede kurahasikunha tazimawodousite sitteirundesuka (asanohaisasaka kikatatekina kanzigasurukurai asiga mizikatta 
osorosiku doutyoude kotyousite ieba tattemo matteta tokito takasagaamarikawarinaikuraidatta 
)sono ninno saikuntoiunoto tazimamatinoo konomi yakiyade siri aininatte kotutarouzyanaidesukato asanoga syatta 
kotutaroutoiuo konomi yakiyadesyou kotutaroude watasihamada asanoni attakotoganai 
asanokunhaasukohekono goroha ikandesuga watasitatiha heyawo deta 
kyuuna kaidanwo asanoha sakini orinagaraanoo konomi yakiyahakoregamata tazimano sakuhinto iimasukana 
arehago teisyuno kotutarouga syusseisitaatode saikunga hiraita iedeyari dasitandesugane 
tazimaga saikunni susumeteyarasitandesuyo watasitatiha kaidanwo orite usugurai tyairoppoi denkino hikarino tadayotta daidokoroni tatta 
apaatono nintatino kyoudousuizibadearu 
sono sumini daidokorokutinoyouna (zizitusoreni tigainaiga )apaatotoiumonono genkanrasikunai apaatono genkangaatta 
apaatono ikkaino omotedoorini mensitatokoroha tateguyakatuobusiyatoittaizuremo misede nikaisankaiga apaatoninatteite apaatono genkanha urano roziniatta 
sokode watasitatiha nikaikarinomonoga enryosinagara daidokorokara sotohe derumitaina kakkoude kitanai getano sanransita tatakini ori tatta 
genkanno wakini benzyogaari benzyoha nanika nitukawasikunai kanzide suisenbenzyodattaga orikara zyaatoiu suidouno mizuga honryuusuru otogasusamaziku kieta

gatuga rozino uenikakatteita 
sono yorunikagitte tookuhe tobi sattamitainihidoku hanarete tiisaku mieta 
awamoriikouzyanaidesuka kinha nisanmaruarimasuga 
souda 
o konomi yakiyahe ikimasyoukaiyaiyato asanoga kubiwo hutta 
hetana sakeyori awamorino hougaumai apaatono hukinni zyuunitokimadeni ituttesimaeba syousyouosokunarouto otu harawarenai awamoriyagaatta 
(koreha asanono kotobadearu 
)sokohe ikumade asanohadousitanoka apaatodeha hitoride netuniukasareta ninnoyounimakusi tateteita asanodanoniiyasonoseideka hukigenna kazeni damarikokutte watasino sakiwo tottoto itta 
sono atta katahasouiu katatukinanokasoretomowazato katawo ikarasiteirunoka nikugatende nakute honega gotugotunanowo syokugawarisita heraherano nizyuumawasino sotoniariarito dasiteita 
asanohasono rakuhakuno kanziwoitamasiku tadayowasita katawosayousono rakuhakukanwo daizini honeno ueni noseteite otositehanaranaitositedemoiruyouni bidoudanisasezumarude yuureinoyounisuu tuto sintaiwo maeni susumaseteitaga yuureito tigaunoha suri kirete zourinoyouna getakara hasserarerutokorono syassyatutoiu issyukaitekina rizumikaruna otodeatta 
sono otosositesono aruki houwo asanoha tanosindeitoosindeiruyouna kazedeatta 
awamoriyaha sutandono maeni gorokuninnarabutoippaininaru semai misede kotta baasangahitorideyatteita 
musumewo eigahaiyuuni totugaseteitekono mukoha imahamarude huguudagamotohatyotto uri dasikaketakotogaarisonna kankeikaraka takada|minorunadokara okuraretademo imahasukkari syokuno aseta norengakakatteita 
miseno kyakumo kouenno koyano kankeinomonoga ookatta 
sokoha kissuino ryuukyuuno awamoriwo utteite syukkouzeinouhusuminahazeimusyotoiu kaminotuita kamegaikutumo irigutini korogatteita

asanogasono hitorideatta 
asanoha baasanto kitazooya souzousiinoga kitatoitta kutiwokiki aunazimideatta 
baasanhasorega syoubaizyouzuno kutinanodarougamarude kyakuatukainadosinaizonzaina kutiwokiita 
awamoriga iruto asanono sitaga hutatabi ugoki dasita 
kotutarouno hanasiwo hazimeta 
kotutarounooyazi yatusanhaaredenakanaka taisita geininnandesuze imazyao konomi yakiyanooyazidekusubutteirudesugane sensouno kegade butaini derarenaitokaiyasoreganesoreganandesuwa

hoteideyararetandattene 
yatusan kouheide hanasiwo kiitadesyou 
kikanai 
kiitegorannasai 
sorya omosiroikara 
zituni yuukandattarasii 
ii hanasiwosorya hundanni kikasetekuremasuyo 
mottomo umaku motikakenaito yatusanno kigennoii tokiwoneratte hanasiwohiki dasuyounisinaito kaetta otokodakara zibundehanakanakasyaberoutosinaidesuna 
momontokoronandesune 
sorede kaesaretandaga byouinnizuttoite ittakara iehe kaettandarouga 
mitatokoronandemonaiyoudeyaharimada butaini tatutonagaku tatteiruto itandekurutoka sibiretekurutoka 
demada toubunderarenaito itutteiruga honninno kimotizyamou manzaino butaini detakunai butaihaiyadasonna kimotizyanainokasira 
toitteo konomi yakiyanooyazide manzokusiteiruwakezyanaisi asanoha buatui koppuwo kutini ateta 
geiningaiyaninattandesukane watasimo omotai koppuwo moti age koppuno heriga kutibiruwo aterutohenni namerakananoni kimino warui omoiwosinagara toumeina kyouretuna ekitaiwo hitokutihukumuto isoide mizuwo nonda 
souzyanaindesuyoto itutte asanoha nobita tumeni kuroimonowoippai tametasositekoremo akazimite kitanai teno kabutode beroberoto kutibiruwo nugutte (nanika awamoriyano yoidorerasiikitanarasii kanzidatta 
)yatusanha rippana geinindesukarane 
kudaranai siroutono geininga bakkositeiru genzaino butaigaiyanandesuyo 
siroutono manzaiga erasounisiteirunoni mukatuiteirundesuna 
iya yatusanno kimotihawakaru asanoha gyororito watasino kaowo nirande (kono siroutosakkame !tosoreha itutteiruyoudatta 
)ano ninha (to nanika gotyouwo aratame )manzainankayaru ninzyanaindeitukamo bokunikou itutteta 
kouzani hitoride dete oozeinoo kyakusanwo aitenisite makenainogakorega geininde hutarideteyaru manzaiyananka geininzyanai 
kou itutte manzaiyaninatta zibunhamou geinindenakunattato warattetagamotoha yoseni deteitandesune 
sorega reinomou zuibunmaeno hanasidaga yoseno boturakude sikatanaku manzaiyani tenkoutenrakutoiunokana 
moriie|kotudanosamunotokorohe itutte moriiekotutaroutoiukotoninattandagakono kotudanosamugayahari yoseno boturakude manzaiyani tenkousitandemotoha rakugokadesana 
kotutaroukunha (asanohairoiroto ii houwo kaeta 
)daitaiha kiyomotono nindeo kaasanha enhisasisannotokorono natoridattasoudesugane 
syamisenha kodomono tokikara narawasarete nenkiwo ireteirundesune 
o tousantoiunoha soutouni ookina ukeoisidattasoudedakaramotoha nanikakatagino syoubaidemoyatteitandesyougasoregadousite geininninattanoka 
soko ntokoroha siranaiga geiga miwo tasukeru husiaiwasetoittatokorodesyouna 
oiobasan sosoidekure asanoha koppuwotatimati soranisiteita 
baasanga sosogunowozi tuto minagarao konomi yakiyahehaironna geiningakurudesyou 
ironnatoittemoanna kitanaitokorodakara taisita yatuhakonai 
oyazino kiraina kudaranai siroutomanzainoyouna yatubakaridesonna siroutomanzaiyagaasukode togurowo maiteyare konbanha taisitao zasikideikura mouketanoyare sintaigaikutuattemo tarinainonadoto odawoagetarisurundeoyaziha issouomosirokunaindesunasorede saikungahitoride isogasigatteirunoni sotoni dete aruitebakariiruto asanoha itutta 
watasihakono monogataride huuryuuo konomi yakikotutarouha syoukaisinagarasono honninno kotutarouwokoremade ippenmo dasitenai 
dasite oita houga asanonokonoyouna hanasiwo syoukaisuru maeniyahari kotutarouwo syoukaisite oita houga koutugoudeattato omowareru 
dagasoreha watasino hutyuuide watasiga dasanakattanodehanaku kotutarouga detekonainoda 
watasiga kotutarouwo syoukaisuru bamenno tokihaitumo kotutarouha ieniinakattanodearu 
saikunni kikuto senyuunotokorohe asobini ikurasiinoda 
yoppodo natukasiimonoto miemasune 
senyuuno houmo ieheirassyarundesuyotokorode watasiha siroutomanzaiyaga kotutaroude odawoagerutoiu asanono kotobade kameiepontannokotowo atamani ukabeta 
pontanhatui sakigoromade dosamawarino yakusyadatta 
mada nizyuumaeno wakamonode zenzensitamawarino yakusyadattagasoregapontanno kotobade ieba anikino turuieanponto kunde manzaisininatta 
natta touzahaatikotide sikentekini dasarerunodesukoburu isogasikusonna zibunni watasiha kotutaroudeyoku issyoninattaga mattaku iki|kenkoutarumonodatta 
itigatunanbyakuentoiu syuunyuumade kikasare (ikubun|horamoarudarouga )watasiha dosamawarino yakusyano piipiizyoutaikara itiyakusonna kinga toreruyouninattanodakara odawoagetakunarunomo murikaranukototo omoimata manzaizenseino genzaitohaieikinari butaini tatebasorede tutomari kasegerutohaiyahaya osorubekikotozyato omotta 
mongaikanno watasidesae osorubekikotodato kanzitanodakara kotutarouhadonnani kusii omoidattarou 
daga watasihasono zibunkotutarouno kokoronoutiwo siranakatta 
sositekoreha yodanniwatarugayagate turuieanpon kameiepontanno konbiha kouenno manzaizyousetukanno Ekanni irukotogadekita 
siroutonagaraumakattanodarou 
aruiha siroutono sinsensaga kyakuni uketanokamosirenai 
kakute kareratositeha hareno butaino asakusano koyani derarerukotoninattanohaiiga kake dasitoiutokorode gekkyuuha rokuzyuuen
rokuzyuuentoiunoha hutarihitokumini taisitenomonodedakara hitoriha sanzyuuen
tokorode turuieanponhakorehapontannoyouna yakusyasyussindenaku zensinha mattaku butaini kankeinonai kyuusyuuno bouekino zyoyakudeatta 
sorega geisyani nettyuusiyagate kakuhoumenhugiridarakenisite rakusekisete issyoninaruto tomoni tutome sakiha kubitoiusousitakotono zyousekiwo hunde hutaride toukyouhe dete kitanodatta 
sousita mototetudoukanrigadouiu keirowo tadotte manzaiyaninattakasoreha imasyouryakusurutosite motogeisyanosono saikunmo douzini manzaiyaninatta 
sunawatimotoha huuhudeyatteitaga kameiepontanto kunde yakusinwo kisi rittaimanzaitoiunowo (toittemo betunisou sinkizikugaaruwakedehanai 
tadasouiu kanbandakede naiyouha hutuuno manzaitotigawanai 
)hazimeruto saikunha betuni hokanoto kunda 
sositesono saikunga betukutide kaseidekurukaraanponno kasegiga sanzyuuendemodounikayatte ikeruwakedaga hitori mononopontanno katahasouiu betukutinoganainodetatoe hitori monono kansyakuseikatudekakarigakakaranaitohaie sanzyuuendehayatte ikenainodeatta

to asanoga itutta

nanzyane 
sorehasosite azakeruyouna waraiwo ukabetezya asitaissyoni gakuyahe ikou 
kurahasikunwo oyanagimasakoni awaseyou 
sosite issyoni sotohe deteo tyademo nomouzyanaidesuka watasiha asakusano reviuno houni siri aiganaiwakedehanakattakara tanomebasouiu kikaiwo motetanodaga tanomi komutoiukotoga nanikadekinaidesitagattesousita kikaini imamade megumarenakatta

daga watasiniha nanikatamerawareta 
sikasi asanoha hitoridekimete asitaapaatoniimasuna

)asanoha pontohadaketa yaseta munewo tatakimizukarayoromeita

kozoukanankanandesyouna

de zitensyawoo tupori dasite nigetyau 
souiunorasii zitensyagasyottyuuarusoudesuna zenyato onaziyouni asanoha zyouzetudatta

kakitaitokorodearu 
watasinoyounaasahakana syoubunnomonoha watasigakanetemarude onnano himitudemonozokuyouna izyouna kyoumito koukisindezehitomonozokitaito munewo odoraseteita gakuyano huukeisoreni taisite syokunmomata watasito onaziyouna kyoumito koukisinwo motteiruto sounomi komisitesikamosokowonozoki etesono kyoumito koukisinwo manzokusurukotogadekitanoha watasidakedearuyouna issyuguretuna yuuetukanwomottesitagatte nanikahikerakasuyouna kimotidemotte heraherato kataritaitokorodearugakoremo habukou 
habukunohaanagati yakusokuno tenponotamedakedehanai 
naniwo kakusousonotoki hosonagai heyano ryougawani zurarito odori kotatiga inarandasono mannakani asanoni kyousei(
)sarete sueraretasonotokino watasihaiyamoumarude meno yowai sinkaigyoga nitino kankansyoutteiru hadenatokorohe hitu hariageraretamitainamonodesokononanihitotutosite seikakuni watasino meni ututtamonohanai simatunanodatta

)dearoutosoumo kangaete habukunodearu 
oyanagimasakoni syoukaisareta 
oyanagikun
kotiraha kurahasisenseito itutte syousetukano senseigakuyano mannakaniagurawokaita asanogahidoku gouzentositamottai hutta kutyoudesou itutta 
senseiha oyanagikunkunga dainohiikinandayorosikuo negaisiteokutoiize ookina koede iunode odori kotatihaminnakottiwo muita 
watasiha makkaninattekotirakosoyorosikusuruto asanoha senseitomoaroumonoga hyokohyokosita taidowotottya komarutoitta kaode watasinoo zigiwoyamesaseyoutosuruyouni senseiha issouikamesii koewosite iikakerunowo asanokunto watasiha syatta 
(senseisenseitte iuno kanbensitekure 
)karakawareteirumitaideturakattanodesou ioutositaga watasihaagatteite kutiga ugokanakatta

souda 
kinouzyanakutemou kyouno zikanda otokonoyouna kutyoude yosiharahe nomini ikundatteminna yotu harattetene issyoni ikoutoiuno 
iyadato ituttarazyao tyawonomaserotoiundeutiheagetarasonomama suwari konde hanasiwohazimetyatte asagatamade kaeranaino XXkunto dare
dareto dareto itutteatasihuntoni komattiyattawa hanano hikuisonokawarinoyouni kutibiruga tobi detasono odori koha buenryoni nage dasita hadakano asiwo boriborikakinagara asanotosonna hanasiwohazimeta

yagate asanoga saatyan syoukaisiyouto itutta

syounohazimaru maedeatta 
syouga sundara makuaiinikono saatyanya oyanagimasakoto issyonio tyawonomini deyoutoiukotoninatte watasitatiha syouno sumumade butaino sitano tikasitude matteita 
tikasituniha isyouheyanadogaattesono semai roukaniha sigekitekina sugatawosita odori kotatiga syutuwo matteurourositeiru 
watasiha kyakusekini mawatte syouwo mitakattanodaga asanoha syounado mitemosyouganaidesyouto syarewo ituttekokononamanamasisano houga konomasiitoitta medeatta 
asanotositeha mezurasii syarewo kutinisuruhodo karehasukkari ukiukisita kaodesousita tyouside kamekunto gitaawo daeta hitorino seno takai otokoni yobikaketa 
yaa asanosansoreha yukaina yonintoiu yoninkuno boodobirianno hitorino kamekutikurosubeedeatta 
asanoha kamekutito mudakutiwokawasitanoti syoukaisiyou 
kotira syousetukano kurahasikunsuruto kamekutigakorehakorehatosasugani butaino ningendakeni keiiwo kotyousita oogesana miburiwositeitumo osakuwo haikensiteorimasu watasiha tereteyadoumo sengetunoareha koudansekaidesitaka osakuwo hizyouni omosiroku haikensitanogaarimasitaga watasiha koudansekaitoiu taisyuuzassinimada itidomo kaitakotohanai 
watasihakotogotokumagotuiteyaadoumo tikatetuyokotyouni bon zyuurutoiu asakusaniha mezurasii ginzakazeno kanzino kissatengaaru 
ginzakazenosouieba ginzakazeno kissatenhaiwayuru asakusano naibuniha iri komenaidesono sotogawanoiwabasono hihunoyouna tikatetuyokotyoukokusaituuritoittatokoroniatakamo kawasennoyounihabikotteiru

omoi syutugaaru 
imakara nannenkurai maedarou

huyudeatta

na ani 
dousitano watasiha huri kaette itutta 
ienekono ninganeto ayukoga hanano tunto takaisonoseika torisumasita kanzinososite nanika toukinoyouna katai kanzino kaowositamou hitorino zyoyuuwo kaerimite itutta

sukoburu iyouna kanzideatta

okutte ikukana 
nanzi
sanzihazukasisounisite aikawarazu tiisana koeda 
minnade nanninikunotatetudukeno toini nanika tiisana toriga utimakurarete tizyouni oti kanasiku hanehakukisiteiruyounasonna kanzino mabatakiwosinagara sukuiwomotomeruyouna kaowo saatyanni muketa 
minnade goninyoto saatyanga katte kotaeta 
sorewo otte masakoga issyoukenmeitutometesiteiruyouna hohoeno kaowo nidosandounazukaseta 
masakoha kotobanokawarini bisyousiteiru kanzide toikakerarenakereba kutiwokikazu kutiwokiitemohonnowazukano kotobakazudatta 
sonna masakohasonomizumizusiitoiuyori nitini ataranutameno souhakui hihuno insyoukarakaitaikena hatiueno kusabanawoomowaseta 
hissoritohakanaku hanawo hiraiteiru tiisana syokubutuno karensisadatta 
aizyouyorimo airenwo otokono kokoronoutini kaki tataseruitaitasisadatta 
oyanagikunnoutihadoko asanono toini terasimane saatyanga katte itutta 
asanoderasima
saatyan hirokouzine asakeikono banha kaeruno tomaruno sagakuyatomaridawa 
atasi ntokonankaha itizinizininattemo aruite kaererukedo asaterasimazya arukenkana (sosite watasino houwo muite )sakki itta gakuyaheneminna tomatteirundesugane 
syonitito hutukamedake keikoganaidakede mikkamekarahamou tugino dasimonono keikogahazimarundeutino tooi rentyuuha gakuyani tomarundesugane 
dakara toukanouti keikononai hutukadakesika iehe kaerenaiwakede itigatunohotondo gakuyatomarinandesuna 
minnayokuyatteirudesuyo 
butaidakedemo taihennatokorohehanetekara keikosositeanna hokorippoi gakuyani iwasino kantumitainigissiri tumatte nete zissaiyoku sintaiwo warukusinaimondato omoudesuyo 
wakasadesuna 
wakaindeminnayatteirundesuna (watasiha minemisakoga asakusano odori koha butaino syoumouhindato Tzano bungeibuinni iwaretato watasini katatta kotobawo omoi dasita 
)saasanosantara iwasino kantumedanantehidoikotowo iuwane asadattesouzyanaika 
anna semai gakuyani nizyuunanninmo netanara saiwasisounesou iebaatasitati odori konante iwasimitayounamonne asasouhigaminasanna sahigamuwayo asasikasi iwasiha hetana tainankayoriumaikarane 
higesurukotohanaiyane (tabakonoyanide kurokunatta kitanai hawomuki dasite watasini niyarito kimino warui waraiwo nagete )tokuni tainankabakari kututteiruto iwasiga kuitakunaru 
kututtemiruto iwasino houga tainankayorizuttoumai sana anisore asanandemonai 
tonikaku iwasito iwarete ikarunato iukotosa 
tokinisonna hanasiwositaratomini kuuhukuwo oboetekitasoregakikkakede watasitatiha kamamesiwo tabeni itta 
basyogakawattanodakara kibunwo ippensase huruitatasete watasimo masakoto kotobawokawasouto omotte masakoga nanika zasikino suminikorogatteiru sihenwo hirotte hizano ueni nosetezi tuto mewootositeirunoninanisore misetetyoudaito itutta 
masakoha damatte bisyousite dasita 
betuni nantomo setumeisinai 
iwarerumamanisasi dasu nanika kanasiiotonasisadatta 
mirutonantokoreha bakabakasiimonodatta 
kesyouhinno kounoukakida 
kesyouhinwo kattekokode hakowoaketesoredake sutete ittanodarou 
aitegaotonasii masakodenakattarakarakawaretato harano tatutokoroda 
tonikakukoredeha masakoto hanasiwosuru zairyounihanaranai

iyaikenee 
puha hihuno huka masakohapou tuto zyoukisita hooni teno kabutowo osi atete waratteita 
momoirowosita tiisana koyubiga tabetesimaitaiyouna kawairasisadatta 
hadasou ieba oyanagikunhaii hadawositeirune asanoha mewo hosomete sakewo tyuuto nomimasani bihadadanesou itutte tenisita kounoukakiwo muzousani gusyagusyato marumetesimatta

iio niwa

doudesu 
kurahasikunhitotu oyanagikunto randevuuni ittehasou itutteawatetesono kotobawo momi kesoutosuruyouna ikioi konda koede edono hun'ikino tadayotteiru zituniii niwadaga

hanpenno suimonowo tyuumonsiteatta 
haitadaima misehagotta kaesino komiyoudearu 
watasitatiha nikaino sumini matteita 
zyotyuuga sarutoo suimonogaatoninaru nanteiyaninattyaunesou iinagarasudeni kamano hutawoakete yugeno tati noborunakani hasiwo irete sassokuhitokutiyattea tututu mewo sirokurosaseta 
marude ueta inuga katai honewo moteamasu tokinoyouna kokkeideasamasiisono kutino kakkounimaaokasii saatyanga masakono hizani tewoyattesono hizawoyusubutte geragerawaratta 
masakomokusuguraretamitaini sintaiwoyozirasete waratta 
reikoso wakakutemo odori kono kanozyotatihamou rippana itininmaeno seikatusyadearu 
dagasouyatte tewo tori atte waraikokeru hutariha muzyakina kodomonoyoudeatta 
seikatutoiukotonado siranai kodomonoyouna muzyakina waraideatta 
asanohasikasisono waraini kiwo warukusitarasiku sanmaimenisaretorudesuna bokuha 
kurahasikunhatyottosita nimaimedeto watasiniataru koedatta 
sonna watasitatino tonarini yamano tekara asakusani asobini kitarasiisou minarihayokunaigaottorisita kanzinoii rouzinhuuhuga hutaridehitotuno teeburunanodakara mui atte mattarayosasounamononi teeburuno kakunio tagaini sintaiwosuriyoseruyounisitetinto matteita 
ziisanya baasanyatoitawari atteiru huzeide kutiwo mogumogusasenagaramosono kutiwoo tagaino mimini tikaduketeha nanikato tanosisouni hanasi atteiru 
sosite hanasiwosinagara baasanha zibunno kamakara kakiwo totte ziisanno kamani utusitarisiteitesokodake syuuino kensouni midasarenainagoyakana sizukana kuukiga tadayotteiruyoudeatta 
watasihasono kuukiga sensikatta 
asanono kotobani masakoha waraiwohikkometaga saatyanha waraitudukenagara asanosanha sanmaimewoyarutokittoukeruwato itutta
