kitto ryuukousuruni tigainai 
motomoto yabaha asakusameibutude mukasino yabato imano kyuuzyoutohamotiron tigaukedomaasono hukkatutomo ierudesunanaruhodo masakoha kamanonakakara tiisana kaibasirawotumandehitotuhitotu kutini ireteita 
mousonnani atukuhanaidarougasoredemotyottosita atusademo hibukuregadekiyasinaikato omowareruyouna hihuno usuiyawarakai kutibiruwotittosorasete kaibasirawo hanihasamuyounisurunodagasono hahakasukanagara aoaziga kanzirareruhodono suki touruyouna sirosadesositesono kutibiruha sotogawanidakeussurato ruuzyuwo nutteitedakara kutibiruwosoraseruto ruuzyuno nuttenaidemo utukusii usubeniirowosita kutibiruno utigawaga nozokarete akai ruuzyuto siroi hano manosononamanamasii nureta syokuhanantomo iezu nayamasiku meni semarunodatta 
watasihaiwaba watasiga issyoukenmeikakusiteita kannouwo zituni kantanni saguri ateraremigotoni tikurito sasareta omoide hazukasiiyouna kanasiiyouna omoideatta 
souda 
masakono nayamasiku kutibiruwosorasetasonna poozuhamotoyori nayamasii insyouwo isikisitenomonodehanaidarouga (to watasiha omottaga )sorehamasani kyoutainiha tigainakatta 
sono kyoutaikara asanoha watasino mewo hanasoutosuruyouni mukasino bunsiha asakusano yabadenakanaka asondamonorasiidesunato kotobawotuduketa 
bimyousainadoha yabano onnato mondaiwookositarisono bimyousaini yabaasobino tehodokiwositanohanandemo koudatuyuhandatoiu hanasidaga tuyutomonatoiunoha touziyabano asobiyasonoatokaradekitaiwayuru meisyuyawohiyakasusonoumasanikaketeha bimyousainadototemoo tutukanai asobi nindattasoude imano tuyuhankaraha souzoumotukankotodesunanaruhododoudesu 
tyottosita zuihituno netaninaruzyanaidesuka 
ubattiyaiyadesuyo 
iya kaitattekamawandesu watasiha masakoto hanasigasitakatta !dagasonnayouna (watasinitotteha )rokudemonai hanasiwo asanogahitoridemakusi tateteiruutini zituniakkenaku zikanga sugita

zituniakkenai kanzidatta 
sonoakkenasanotamemoattarouka watasiha masakoto wakareruto nanika nanikawakaranaiga nanikawo uttayouna kanasiminihisihisito semarareta 
souda 
atteiru saityuudemowakuwakuto munewo odorasenagara douzini kanasikute sikatanonai watasidattaga imaya kanasimidakega watasino kokorowo ryousita 
watasihahidokuo hanasininaranuhodo tukareteita 
aa watasihadonnani neturetunasorekoso bakamitaina omoiwo oyanagimasakoni yoseteitakotoka 
sono oyanagimasakonitoutou aukotogadekitasono kekkagakonnatohakonna setunai kanasimikonna rakubakutosita tukaretohakorya ittaidouiunoda 
orikarano syutusakarino eigakanmatino hitonaminonakade watasiha hunukemitaina kaowokasigeteita 
konotokihodo watasihakanete watasinohisokani itositeita zattounonakano kodokugunsyuunonakanohitoripottitoiunowohakkiritosikamo omowazaru tuukuwomotteazayakani kanzitatokihanai 
watasino atamakaraha asanono sonzaisura kieteita 
asanomo nanika damarikokutteita 
daga totuzenasanoha watasini kututtekakaruyounanikunikusigena tyouside itutta 
oyanagimasakonanteannano kurahasikuntende kodomode tayorinakutetumaranzyanaidesuka 
soretomo kurahasikunha zyukusanai kazituwo kuunoga syumidesuka kuu 
sonna bokuha asanoha watasino kotobanikamawazu oyanagihaanna kodomoppoi kazewositeirukedo angaikamatotokamosirenga kamatoto
antamonakanaka kamatotono kanzidesuna kamatototutenandesuka asanoha usuwaraiwo ukabeta syokuno warui kaowo perorito nadeorosite taini kuiakiruto getemonono iwasiga kuitakunaru 
daga taninnihasonna honsinwo kakusitewasya kuitaiwakezyanai nanteiunowo kamatototoiudesunaisoisoto sinsetunisousite hokorasigeni masakowo watasinihikiawasetekureta asanodattanoni imahasorewo kuiteiru watasino dokugawo nikumi norotteirutoiunowohakkirisono kotobani dasiteita 
kanmonaku watasiha asanoto wakareta 
hitorininatte watasiha asanokara taini kuiakite iwasiwo kuoutositeiru otokotosareta zibunwo aratametemitumeta 
watasiha betuni taini kuiakita oboehanaiga oyanagimasakoni yoseru omoini hatasite issyuno yasingahukumaretenaikadouka genzyuunisiraberutonaito kippariha ienainodearu

matazoro asakusahe ikitakunatta 
soreha hazimehanantonaku asakusahe ikitaina atoitta bakuzentosita omoidattagasoregayagate asakusahe itteaamositaikoumositaitoitta gutaitekina yokubouheto susunde itta 
soreha ikyouni miwo oita ningatatoeba pariparito otonosuru kokoroyoi hakotaeno takuandeo tyadukewohitotusarasara tuto kuitainatoitta yokubounoutini nosutaruziano gutaitekinamonowo kanzurunoni niteitagasikasi watasinitotte asakusaha gyakuni gaikokunawakedearukara henna guaidearu

keredo kimotositeha doukeitoiuyori kyousyuutoiunonizutto nitamononanodeatta 
watasihatatoeba asakusano aguidouno mesiwo yamanoyounikonmorito sakariagetaano donburigamuyamito koisikunatta

issyuno dourakukokoroto iwarerukamosirenaiga 
souda watasino yuuzinde apaatonihitoride sundeite sando(aruiha tuitatinido)no syokuziwo sotono kan'isyokudoudesiteirunogaaru tokibokuha mattegohanga tabetaito ituttakotogaarugasono yuuzinnadoni iwasereba watasino omoinadohamakotonitondemonaimonotosarerudearou 
sono yuuzinha hanasiga tigauga watasitatinimatakonnakotomo itutta 
bokuha yasui ippinryourinoyouna onnatono ren'aihamoutakusanda 
tugitugini tigatta saraga detekuru goukana tabled'hotenoyounasonna houhuna kanzino itiryuuno onnato ren'aigasitemitaianmariumai hyougennanodesono umasani watasitatiha geragerawarattesimatta 
soreha watasitatiminnano kimotiwomo ii ateteita 
watasitatino sitteirutoiuyori watasitatino nitizyoutekini youinitukiaeru han'ino onnatatiha mattakumotte ippinryourinoyouni itimokudemottesono naiyougawakattesimauyounasonna kokorono mazusii asai yaseta sanryuuno onnatatideatta 
tukiaebatukiauhodo yutakanamonoga kanzirarerutoitta zyoseiwo watasitatiha siranakatta 
tokorodesono yuuzinga mattegohanga tabetaito itutta tokimo watasitatiha ookina kutiwoakete warattamonodeatta 
waraenai hanasinanodagasoreyuekaettesousitanodarou 
mazumotte itutta honninga itibansakini geragerawarai itibanhagesiku warattanodearu 
watasino donburimesiheno doukeimosikuha nosutaruziahasono yuuzinno kateitekina syokuzini yoserusimizimitosita omoito kuraberutokorekosohontounoo warainoo hazukasii guretunamononoyoudearu

soretomo 
*mezurasikusou samukunaiaru nitino gogodeatta 
watasiha nikaino syouziwo hirakisono sotono garasukomoakesottini muketa tukuede genkouwo kaiteita 
atamagamoromoronokotoni titte genkougahakadoranai 
watasiga matteiru meno maeni mitiwo hedatete nikaiiegaarisono ieno madoni madohasimeteattagabonyarito mewoyatteiru zikanno houga ookatta 
konnakotodehaikenaito kibunwo ittensaserutameni watasiha benzyoni tatta 
sou mizikakunai zikanwo benzyode tuiyasite nikaino tukueno maeni modoruto maeno ieno madogaitukaaketeattesono ieno zyuuyongoguraino musumesanga madonimotareteiru 
nanika monoomoini sizundeiruyouna an'utuna mewo sotoni muketeiru 
sisenga atta 
ryouhoutomo douzini mewosoraseta 
watasiha tukueni kaowo muketeitagayagateso tutoukagattemita 
muukaramokottikaramo sougoni marumiedeatte marumienotokoroni watasiga ganbatteirunode musumesanhakittoaraiyadawato madokara hanaretarousou omottaga musumesanha musumesanmo ganbatteiru 
kottino sisenwo isikisiteiru yokogaodearu 
sono musumesanno nengoroha daredemo itizikyuuniiwaba tubomikara hanaheto uturu tyuutono myouna syuusani gatatuto oti komu zikidagasono musumesanha tokuni aoi kaonibutubutumade dasitesousita syuusawo tenzentositesarake dasiteiruyouna yokogaodatta 
sono yokogaohasositeatasi monoomoinihuketteirunoto watasino meniwazawazasouiukotowo misebirakasiteiru kazenomonodatta 
hitoridehisokani monoomoinihuketteiru kanasii syouzyono sugatawohyoito kaimamitarisurutosoreha kanasiimonodaga aitekarasorewo misebirakasarerunohatatoesono aitega zyuuyongono musumenisiro nanika hankanwo sarareru 
otonagenaito warawarerudearougaiyarasii kanzidearu 
kaono syuusagasoreniha ikubunsayousiteirutokoromoarouga watasihairadatta 
genkounanka kakeyasinai 
hazimehatiratira tuto miteitanodagasonouti watasihanu tuto kaowoagete niranda 
niranda mewo musumesanno kaokara hanasanakatta 
musumesanhasorewo zyuubunisikisinagara heizento kanasii kibunwo tanosimisositesono kanasimino siseiwo watasini miserukotoniyotte issoutanosindeiru kaodearu 
watasiha makete syouziwo bisyarito simeta 
syunkanwatasiha watasino syousetuhamasanisono huyukaina musumesannisokkuridehanaikato kiduita 
watasiha kanasiitoiuyounakotowo dokusyani osi urisiteiruyouna syousetuwo watasiha tokuni kononde kaiteiru 
nantyuukottyasoregadouiu imidekikkakeninattanoka watasiha zibundewakaranaigasono nitisorewokikkakenisite watasiha asakusahe itta 
kokusaituurini rokukuno koyano rentyuuno kyuukeizyonoyouna kannoaru sakatatoiu miruku hoorugaaru 
(sokohasono nensunawati syouwazyuusannenno zyuunigatuni kireini kaitikusaretesoremadeha miruku hooruto kanbanni kaiteattaga miruku paaraato aratamerareta 
)sokohe watasiha miruku koohiiwo nomini itta 
watasiha darenimo aitakunakattanodagaiya aukotowo nanika osoreteitanodagasokode watasiha dosakanni atta 
dosakanto watasitoha kotutaroude attadakedaga misakokara dosakanga watasiwo sitteirutoiukotowo kiitaseika siri ainoyouna sakkakuwookositeyaato aisatusi dosakangabikkurisitayouni mewo patipatisasetanode sakkakuni kiduita 
sonotokihasudeni watasiha kano maeno isuni kosikaketeita 
nanika hanasikakenaitomazui kanzidekono kankotutarouno nikaide keikositeita atorakusyonno katahadounattadesukato watasiha itutta 
dosakanha ninnatukosounasositeikanimo kino yowasouna bisyouwo ukabete uri komigaumaku ikanaide keikositakirimada itidomoyattenaito kurai koedatta 
sorya komattadesunesorede hanasiha potunto kireta 
watasito dosakanha douzini kaowosomuketa 
tyottotyotto miruku koohiito watasiha youhukuni getabakinosokono onnakyuuzini itutta 
hosonagai teeburuno uenihayude tamagowo sakatta sarahukuroiririno bataa piinattuwo ireta kamesorekara doonatuwappurusyuukuriimuuzumakikasuterano taguiwo osameta garasuno kasihakoganarandeiru 
watasihasono kasihakoni mewoyatteitaganantonaku izikitanai kimotininatteoioikoitukureyo 
siberiyawotibita getawo zuuzuuhikizutteiru onnakyuuzini itutta 
onnakyuuzino hadakano asiha musinosasita atode dekobokositeiru 
watasito dosakanhao tagaini soppowo muiteita 
dagasorekaradonokurai hettekaraka kigatukuto watasitatiha izenkarano siri ainoyouna sitasii kutiwo maziwasiteiru zibuntatiwo midasiteita

kawaisouni sinzimatte

sonoseikatottemo kino yowai kitatenoii kode zissaikawaisounakotowosimasita

ano zibunnokotode ooyagorouhasono goroTzani deteitesono Tzano tonarino koyaga Seigano huukirikan
sokohe ayukosan maeno okusanha ayukosanto iimasitane 
ayukosangatyottosita zituenni detesokode ooyagorouto siri aininattandesune 
nimaimedesukarane 
ayukosanhasukkari gorotyanni horetimatte zituengasundekaramo mainitiasakusaheyattekiteha Tzano gakuyani iribitaridatta 
hitomenankakamawanaindesukarane 
touzitaihenna hyoubandesita 
ooyagorounihatyanto reityantoiunogaite onazi Tzani deteita 
sorewo ayukosanhasorya hazimeha siranakattakamosirenaiga gakuyahe deirisiteiruutini mimini iranaiwakehanainde 
sikasi ayukosanha syakaerusyakaeruto gakuyahe itte reityanno hougakaette tiisakunatteimasita tuke 
hungaisurunogaite damatte miteiru houhanaito reityanni ituttemo reityanhadattetotada namidagumubakaridesita 
sonouti ooyagorouga reityanni wakare hanasiwo moti dasitandesu 
kou ituttasoudesu 
ayukosannihatotemo kinzino ninnoii patorongatuiteitesono patoronha ayukosangatyantosite kekkonwosite miwo katameru tokihamatomatta kinwoyarutosou itutteiru 
sorede ayukosanha patoronto wakarete oreto kekkonsitai kekkonsitara patoronkara morattao kinde orewo benkyousaseruto itutteiru 
orewo itiryuuno kasyunisitaisosite zibunmo miwo katamete kouseisitaisou itutteiru 
orega asakusakara ukabi dete rippaninareru daizina tyansuda wakaretekurekou ituttasoudesu 
soide reityanhahontoni bokuha sinda reikotyantoiunoha kanasii asakusano kodato omoimasune 
gorotyanno syussenotamenaraatasituraikedo miwohikimasu tutekou ituttasoude 
reityanha kawaisounihontoni ooyagorouwo itositeitandesune 
kakketusite byouinni irutoatasihamou tasukaranai 
sinu maeni itimokugorotyanni awasetekureto naite miityanni tanomundasoudesu 
miityanha nindenasino ooyagoroumeto hungaisiteiteanna yatuni aitainante ituttiyaikenaito sikattemo reityanhakikanaindasoudesu 
simainihayahari kawaisouninatte ooyagorouni atteyattekuretokuyasiinagara iini ittasoudesu

(kigou)watasiha Kgekizyouno kyakusekino itibanusirono angarinonakani tatteita 
eigahamousugu owarunodearu 
Kgekizyouha eigato syouwo kaketeite rokukuno reviukankeino nintatiha eigawo soe monodato miteiruga eigakankeino nintatiha eigaga toride syouha eigakenbutuno kyakuheno saabisudato miteiru

)eigaha koutouno syougakkounotoaru zyoseitono tuduri houga myouna guaini zyaanarizumuni mote hayasaresono syouzyoha itiyakutensaitosae iware tuduri kataha kyakusyokusarete singekino butainikakeraretasono tuduri houwo eigakasitamonodesorewo watasihasudeni yuuzinni sasowarete maruno naino eigakande miteitagasorewo Kgekizyoude hutatabi mirunohaanagatisono eigagasorehodono miryokuwo motteirukaradehanaku watasiha watasinitottehaitumokokono eiganadohatatoesorega kessakueigademosyosen soe monono kanzide mitainoha syouseikakuni ieba oyanagimasakono deteiru syoudedemo syoudake mini irunohamohaya kaonazimino mogirino onnano koni taisitemo naniyara tere kusakusokodearakazime syouno maeni ituttekakute itidomita eigawo kokorotanosimanu kaode miteirunodearu

zyakoino aiteno teisyunisonna zyakohayokatta 
hiehhehhetuto matuhirosihasorega kano tinomonoka butaiyouno tukuri waraika watasiniha kentounotukanu kikaina warai koewo age waraudakedenanimo iwanakatta 
sono nitimisakoha mezurasiku sugatawo misenakattaga taigaiitudemo tetudainoyounisite kotutarouniirukotoha maeni kaita 
nanikakokoto tokubetuno kankeidemoarunokatosono nitiwatasiha matuhirosini tazuneta 
miityanto tazimasantogahazimete setaiwo motta tokikaritanogakokono nikainandesuyo 
miityanhakokonoobasanno zuibunsewaninattakara asondeiru tokihasoidemaa tetudaimitainisite kiteirundesuyosouiu matuhirosino kotaedatta

(korehaikan 
)sonoudon konaha usui sotogawakara zenziyakete itte syokuga kawatte iku

un masakosittenno bokuno koibitokoibito
iyouna koewo agerunoniiya zyoudandesugane

a tutiti atui misakoga watasino maenibetarito matta

bouyahato (santatamimawonozoite )neteiruna 
tyokkura hurohe itte atatamattekiyasyoukana daihatikaitabihenoizanai samui bandeiya samui kisetunanodakara samuinoha itiouatari maenanodaga hino kitoittara makuramotoniturusita dentouyorihokanainode sinritekinimo issousamusagakotaetekuru 
sonna apaatono heyade watasiha kamadannimogutte honwo yondeita 
teno katahouwo kamadankara dasitesorede honwo meno ueni sasaeteirutosono tegasugu tumetakunatte tumetasade itakunarunodesuruto katahouno kamadannonakade atatamerareteiru tewo dasite koutaiwosaserunodaga sizenno ritosite hieta tewo kamadannonakade atatameru hayasayorimosono atatameta tega sotode hiyasareru hayasano hougadousitemo hayainodemada zyuubunatatamerarenai tewo sikatanaku sotoni dasite koutaiwosasenebanaranuyouninarisono koutaiga zenzihayakunarisuruuti kamadannonakani ireta tegasukosimo kaihukusitenai maeni sotono tega kotaegataihodoni hietesimau sigitoainatteyagate ryouno tetomotittoyasottodeha kaihukusigatai teidoni hie attesimatta 
yamunaku watasiha honwosorewo yomunowokakaru gaitekina zizyoukara tyuudansurunohahanahada kutuunanowo murini gamansiteodekono ueninosetesoreha itamu atamano ueninoserareta koorinounoyouna katatidagatumari tyuudanno kutuudeitamu atamawo koorinounoyounisiteyawarageyoutodemositeiruyoudekakusite ryoutewo kamadannonakani ire hayaku atatameyoutameni tewo momonoatarini sasikomutomarude kooriwoottukeraretayouna tumetasani hietuto sakebinagaramoukou samukunatteha apaatoni tomarukotohadekinainatotubuyakunodattaga zituha samuinoni oomorimade watasino kanzideha mattakuharubaruto kaette ikunoga okkuunamamanitumarisono samusanotameni tomattawakedemoattanoda 
mou itiziwo sugiteiteiyasono apaatoha natugoronadoha yonakano zyuunizihankara itizihangoromadega apaatono tuitatide itiban|nigiyakana tokinanodagatatoebasono zikokuniatasya yottiyainaiyonadoto sitano mawaranuhitorigotowo iinagara abunakkasii asidoride kaidanwo dotandotanto nobottekuru onnakyuusantatimo natugorohahitoride heyani modottemo miseno kouhungasamenainodarouka nanikatohitoride sawaidarisi tokinihahitosiku meiteisita tomoyakarawo turetekite heyanonakade kyakkyatuto doubutunoyouna koewo tatesimainiha kenkawositari naki dasitarinakanaka taihennanodagasousita souzousii apaatono zyuukyomonotatimo tidoriasiha natubatokawarinaiga samuinode seisinga sosousiteirunokasudenihissorito nenituiteiru kehaidearu 
mattaku sizukadearu 
naimo sotomo 
souda 
natubaha sanzigoromadetyotto kotyousureba hitobanzyuuapaatono omotedooriha hitodooriga taenaide watasino makuramotonihibiitekurusono asiotononakade asanomituono getanoyounasuri kireta hawozuruzuru hikizutteiruyouna otohaiyadagaikanimonamamekasii asimotowo omowaseru hiyorigetano hakuhano kikkitutoikini natteirunonadohanakanakani kokoroyoimonodatta 
daga imaha toorimo sinkantositeite tookukara kokorohososouna inuno hoe koenadoga kietekuru 
kokorohososounatoiunoha watasino tasii kokorokarano kanzikamosirenaiga angaisorehaituka mita tiisana inuwoodokasiteita nikuttarasii ookina inuga nanikasokoniiwaregaattesukkari ikisyoutinsite kokorobosoi koewo ageteirunokamosirenaizoto watasiha omottarisitesou omouto tasii kokoromo nagusameraretarisita

(tabini detai

souda 
watasiga asakusani kitanoha issyuno tabidehanakattanoka 
watasihasorenisono tokihazimete kiduitanodeatta 
watasihasakini heyanonakano hino kitoittara dentouyori hokanihanakattato kaitaga watasino baaiha hino kihanakutemo itiouhuyuzitakuno kamadangaarunodagakoreha matuhirosiharukitikara kiita hanaside kano tomodatino situgyouyakusyagaarayurumonowo situni iretesimatte huyuno yoruni usupperana kamadanitimaisikanakuhontouni dentouno netuwo riyousite samusawo sinoidatoiu hanasiwo kiitakotogaaru 
kareha osiirenonakani itutte sime kittasono zyoudanni senbeikamadannikurumatte netesono gedanni dentouwo hippari komisorenidokokaraka mottekita tohoumonai ookina denkyuuwotuke koukouto hikarusono hikaride danwototteitatoiunodagahontounisorede danga torerumonokadouka watasiha zisinkokoromitakotoganainode hosyouno kagiridenaiga karehasousitetondemonai sikakewo sin'andenkisutoovuto yondeitato matuhirosiharukitiha iitoboketa yaroudesuwato waratta 
watasimo warai mattakuokasii hanasidaga kanasisagaokasisano urakara ziwaziwato nizimi detekuru hanasideatta 
sono kanasiiokasisaha hanasiwo byousyatekini kakanaitotyotto tutaegataikotowo watasiha sitteirunodearuga zituhasono hanasiwo tanpenni kaitakotogaarukara tyouhukusurunodeaetesinakattanodearu 
sositesono tokiha watasihamadasono hanasiwo tanpenni kaiteinai zibundekoreha kakerunatoiuyouna kimotiwo kokoroni himenagara watasihasono hanasiwobonyari omoi dasiteitanodearu 
satesonna hanasiwobonyari omoi dasiteitatoiunoha hokademonai teha ooitaatatamattekitanodagasakkiha tewo atatamerubeku honwo yomunowo tyuudansurunogaarehodo kutuudattanimokakawarazu imahamou honwo yomubeku tewo dasunoga okkuuninatteitakaranokotodearu 
odekoninoseta honmo kubiwo outyakuni ugokasite atamano muunizuriotositeita 
iikaeruto watasiha tega atatameraretakotoniyotte suikiwo sasowareteitanoda 
surutosono tokitotuzenkogainiawatadasii ninno asiotonanika sakebi auyouna koemo kietekiyagate apaatono sitamo souzentaru kehai
nanigotokato mimiwosumasuto kaidanno sitadedokodesuka kazihato iu koegasono watasino mimiwo utta

osoraku syouzikini ieba odorokiyorimo koukisinde 
madowoaketa 
kaminarimonno houni (oonanto batuatarino kankakudarou 
dagasonotokino zikkanwo syouzikini ieba )ikanimo atatakasouna higa kozotteiru 
huto kigatukuto nemakino ueni kimonowo omonetonbiwo kiteita 
toiu houga tekisetudearouto omowarerukurai zituni binsyouni migosiraiwosita 
sositesonnarahuto kigatukuto kaminarimonmekakete itisanni kaketeitatoiutokorodearubekidanoninazekawakaranuga watasiha tugini yuuzento tukueno ueno kuinokosinooinarisanni tewonobasiteita 
sono yuuzenwomanete iunarabasono inarizusiha apaatono roziwo kokusaituurini detatokoroniaru myoudaimukasidangoto kaitanorennokakatta momotaroutoiu miseno miseno sendenwosuruwakedehanaiga taisouoisiisositeoisiinode yuumeirasii inarizusinanodaga zenzyutunoyouni atatakai ketuekino tootteiru tewosae hie noboraserusono yoruno samusahamotomoto tumetaisono inarizusinomesiwo koorinoyouni tumetakusiteitesono tumetasaha watasino hani siinto simita 
watasihapururuto kutibiruwo narasinagara apaatono sotoni deta 
(watasiha toukyouno yamano tede sodattaga kodomono zibunyoruninarutooina arisa ^nto itutte inarizusiwo uri arukunogaite hiruha sugatawo misezu yoruhukeno hitodooriganakunaru gorotoiutodokokaratomonakusono kikaradana koega tikaduitekite koeno omono asiotoha kienainoni osanai watasiha ninsaraika nanikanoyouna kigasite obietamonoda 
genzaidehamou sitamatino katahayoku siranaiga yamano teno houdehasousitaoina arisa ^ntoka karinkarintokanabeya akiudontoka pyuuhyorohyorotoiu sinasobayano tyarumerano otosaehotondo kikarenakunattaga omoeba inarizusinihasonna natukasii omoi syutugaarisonna inarizusiwo kutinisuruto omoi syutuga yomigaerisoreni kodomorasii kazikenbutuno kibunkaraka watasihahidoku kodomoppoi kimotininatteita 
)kaziha kaminarimonno meiziseikano baitenno uradattaga watasihatinyano maemade ittesokode kaziwo miteita

toitta kimotideusirowo huri mukutotinyano yoroitobirawo hankaikinisitaikutukano madonimo hirumamirutoizuremoikinoii nikuyanoneesantatiga kesyouwosukkari otositekottiga hazukasikunaruyounausumittomonaihidokuikino warui kiiroi kaoninattanowo (kigou)to omonete tuki dasiteitesounaruto issyuno soukande naniyara seizetuna kanzideatta

sokomo onnabakarito ituttehausoninaruga zituni onnaga ooi 
akirerubakarinitakusan'iru onnano sugatani watasiha nanika asakusani kansuru zyuudaina hakkenwositayouna sukunakarazu gensyukuna kimotinisaserareta 
sono onnatatinohotondoha kuimono yanoneesantatito mirareta

(mateyo 
kono onnatatinonakaniha oyanagimasakogairukamosirenaizo 
)watasiha hatuto ikiwo nomu omoidatta 
gatuno taihanha gakuyatomariwositeirutoiu oyanagimasakogamosi kaziwo mini deteitara husizenna kanzidenaku kaowo awasukotogadekirunodatoomouto komiageruuresisamosarukotonagaranazemotto hayakusonokotoni kidukanakattakato kuyamarerunodatta 
sounaruto kazino kenbutunadomohaya bakabakasiku watasiha oyanagimasakono sugatawomotomete hino houni sewo mukete aruki dasita 
nanihodomo ikanaiutini watasiha kanzinna oyanagimasakonokawarini youmonai matuhirosiharukitiwo ninno gunnonakani midasikottiga midasitatokiha senpoudemo watasini kiduiteyaa kaerudesuka samuindeneusowotuite nogareyoutosuruto samuidesuna

to matuhirosiga itutta 
imanoo tutu anha tennakakentokotondesuyo

ikkasorottesounande

houeraimondesunato watasiha itutta 
tyottoeraimondesunato matuhirosiha oumukaesini ituttesou ieba syusseiheisiwo okurunonankamoo tutu anha taihenna nessinsadedemoanmari nessinsugitekaettehatade komattimautokoromoarunde 
douiu guaini komaruka matuhirosiharukitino katarutokoroniyoruto tyounaikara ousyoumonoga derutabini kareha rippana kansouhatawotukuriyagate yousumino hatagatamarutosoredemotte kimonowotukutta 
karehasorewo syukusyusseinaninani kuntoiu ziga senakanadoni ookiku deteirusono kimonowo doudouto tyakukonde kansouno gyouretuno sentouni tatunodagadandan kouhunsitekurutotintikurinno sintaide gyouretuno nanikanka sakihe tyokotyokoto kake dasite itte tatidomatte banzaibanzaito tewo agete gyouretuwo mukaeru 
gyouretuga tikadukutomata patuto sakini kake dasite itte banzaibanzai!kousita kano seiito netuzyouhawakarunodagasono hatadetukutta kimonoga nanpuntoppidetyotto tindonyamitaideokasiitokorohe tyokotyokoto kakedasu kakkouga tamanorinotame myouna kositukininattanoka henniokasiinodagaokasiitoitte hitobitoha waraukotomonarazusokonotokorogadoumo komarunodasoudearu 
honninha sinkennandakarasonna kettaina kimonowokite tyokomakatookasinamanewosurunato iuwakenimo ikanaindene 
zissaio tutu anha sinkende oretatigakousite yasurakani kurasite ikerunomominna oretatini katte sensouni ittekureteiru nintatinookagenandatoitumosou itutteitetatoeba densyanonakanankade akatasukiwo kaketa ninni autosurudesyou 
teetooyazisanha ninwo kaki waketesono ninno maeni tukatukato itte saikeireiwosite sinkenna koedesou iundesuyo 
anata hounookagedeatasidomohakousite buzini kurasasete morattorimasu 
kansyaitasimasuttene 
kimotihawakattemo nanpuntomo dasi nukedesono ueo tutu antokitaraitudatte kitanainariwositeirundesukarane 
nandaka kitigaizimita kanzide senpouno ninmotyotto aisatuni komarundesune 
sonna baaio tutu anto issyoniiruto hokano nintatini ziroziromiraretetotemokimariga waruitte kotutarounooyazinankamoituka ituttemasitakke 
kotutarounooyazi zisinmo ousyouno tokini tokotonnoo tutu anni kansyasimasutte iwareta kutinandesugane watasitatiha kototoitooriniaru mesiyade zidousyano untensyuaiteni syuuyaeigyouwositeiru miseni itutteita 
watasihasono tennakakentokotonno sinzyouni kandousiteii hanasiwo kikasetekuretato matuhirosiharukitini kansyasuru kimotideimaha oyanagimasakoni aenakattakuyasisamo kokorokara kie satteita 
yudouhuto tarakowo sakanani sakewo nondagasonoo tyousino atamanotokoroni aoi senga itutteiteo tyousiga hatimakiwositeiruyouna anbainanodesou iunoka misenoneesanha watasiganeesannio saketo iutoha ^i makio kawarito iunodatta

sonnakotomo itutteitakaranda 
nannokotodarou kutiatarikara sassuruto sakehadoumo kuromatuhyakutaka(sirotakani arazu )toka sumimatusirotaka(kuromatuni arazu )tokaitta taguino atapinto omoerunode watasihahikaenagara nondeita 
miityanno sinda imoutonokotodenankahahaaituka hyoutanikenoomasani itta tokinokotodanatowakatta 
kono miseno katasumini kobusitoitta huubounodagaurabureta minarino yaseta tyuunenno otokogaite kihatteirunoka kusenanoka sebonewosyantosorasete sakewo mizudemo nomuyouna muhyouzyouna kaode yuuzento nondeiru 
soreni mewoyarinagara watasiha kokorono katahoude nanika kininarusono otokogadonnayounakotowo atamanonakade kangaenagara sakewo nondeirunodaroukato kangaesorega zenzensouzougatukanainoni myounairadatasisani nitamonowo kanziteita 
sayou ninha taninno atamanonakaniaru kangaewosono ninno kaowo miruyouna guaini mirukotogadekinainoha atari maenokotodaga kangaetemirutosono atari maesahanakanaka hakukimiga waruimonoda 
sonnakotowo kokorono katahoudebonyari kangaenagara katahoude watasiha zibunde kidukanakattagaomasahe itta tokino misakoha watasinikarandeitanodeattakatosono tokino kiokuwotaguri yoseteita 
miityanha maeniotakunokotowo sukidato ituttetandakedodousita kagenkakono kanha kazamukiga kawatteeraku hungaisitemasitakke 
sinda imoutonokotonankamo moti dasite watasiha misakoga hyoutanikenotokorode watasini asakusahenanisini kitanokatoiu iminokotowo kitumontekini ituttakotowo omoi dasita 
sositesono tokimisakohasousita kitumontekina kotobanoatode watasitoha husigina innengaarunodato itutte misakono imoutono sinda itikawareikoto watasino izenno tumano ayukotono kimyouna kankeiwo katattesono tokimisakohasore izyouha iwanakattakeredosono kankeitoiunoha asakusahehyokkori arawareta ayukogaosorakuhatyottosita uwakigokorode itikawareikokara ooyagorouwo ubatte ikisonotame reikono seimeiwomo ubatte ittatoiuyouna taihenna kankeideattakotowo watasihaatode dosaturanukara sirasareta 
sousitakotowo misakoga zibunkara kataranakattanoha ayukoheno uramigaikani hukaikawo simesiteiruyouni watasiniha kanzirareru 
sosite ayukonoyouna asakusano gaibuno ningenga asakusaheyattekitetyoudo itazurasukina ningenga ikeni isiwo nagetesono ningenhasono kekkawo siranaidarougasono isini atta ikeno kaeruhasorede sinanebanaranusonnayouna itazurawosurukotoni misakoha reikono gawakara hukai ikidooriwo daiteite watasiwomosousita itazurawosuru ningennohitorito miteo maeha asakusahenanisini kitanokato kitumonsitanitigainaisou watasihasono tokino misakono kokorowo osi hakatta 
misakoga hungaisiteitatoiunohaosorakusousitakotodarouto watasiha kangaenagara bokunokotowo sukidato ituttetatte 
watasiha zibunwo kessite itazuranadohasinai ningentomizukara ii kirenainode misakono hungaitoiunoniurotaetakarasonourotaewo kakusuyounisouhuzaketa tyouside ituttamonoda 
(misakoha zituha watasino kangaetayouni bakuzento hungaisiteitanodehanakattanodeatta

sorehamada kataru zikidehanaiyouda 
)matuhirosimohuzaketa tyouside misakono koewomanete itutta 
kurahasisan tutenanka sabisisouna ninne 
atasiaasita sabisisouna ninga sukidawa 
miityanhaatasiniitukasou ituttamondesa yoiga mawattarasiku miburimo iretesoideatasihadouseatasiha nigiyakana ningendesuyoto itutteyattamondesugane 
soudaano zibunotakuha kurahasisanzyanakute takaseisantoiu meide toottemasitana 
aryadouiunde setumeisurunoga mendoukusaku watasihatada namaewo matigaeraretanodato itutte matuhirosino haini sakewo sosogi tokini dosakankuaa iinikui dosakankunhadousitadesu yatuha hakkirisineende komattadesuyo 
uiitutogeppuwositekonnako tutya nenga koseneeya reviuno hougaiinokana 
ano ninha Okanni deteitandesu tutenesoregane kawaisouni yatuno horeteta odori kowosokono zatyouni toraretimattene

imademomada kigaarunokamosirenai 
otakuno syousetunankayoku yondeimasuyo 
aramouo tyousiha aka makio kawarito watasihaneesanni itutta 
*sono nenno itino toriha zyuuitigatutuitatide watasiha betuni sinkousinmo kyoumimonainodeo torisamaheha ikanakatta 
zyuuitigatumikka
meizihusi
kono nitioyanagimasakoha imondanni kuwawatte toukyouekisanzihatude tyuukahe ikunodearu 
itigatubakariha kaettekonaidaroukara syuppatumaenizehitomo itidoatte syokuziwo issyonisitaito omotteitanodagatoutousono kikaiha erarenakatta 
kyakusekikarahisokani watasiha butaino kanozyoni genkide itterassyaito iukotoha itutteitaga 
mikkaha amehuride toukyouekihe okurini ikoukato omottaga miokurino ningatakusan'irunakano kakkounotukanai watasino kakkouwo souzousuruto touteiikerumonodenakusono zikokuni watasiha apaatono madokara sotowo nagameteita 
taharamatino zintanno koukokutomosibiga denkinotukanai hirumano koukokutomosibitoiunohasaradedanisyonboritositamonodaga tumetai amenizubu nureninatte tasiku nasakenasouni tatteirunoga watasino meni iri yanebakarisika mienai sougaino sakubakutosita kesikinonakade tokuni watasino mewohikumonotoittarasoredakenanodeatta 
watasihatumaranukotodemoiikara nanika kangaegotowosite oyanagimasakohenoitazurana omoiwosousite oi haraouto tutometatokorohontounitumaranukotowo omoituitanodearu 
soreha nanikatoiuto watasiha matuhirosiharukitikara geimeiwo kangaete oitekureto tanomareteita 
sono geimeinokotogahyoito atamani kitanode zintankarano rensoukanantoka ienoosinnantoka ieteerinnadotoiunohadoudearouassirano manzaiha noosinya teerinnoyounio kyakusanno zutuuwonaosimasutoitta anbaidesousita kusurino meiwo tukeruto kusurino seizouhoukara sendentoiu imide kinga moraerukamosirenai 
ikkyoryoudokuzya 
mateyonantoka ieadarinnantoka iekarumotinnanteiunomo omosiroina 
iyademosouiunoha matuhirosiharukitino manzaiwo kiiteiruto adarinya karumotinno koumenoyouni suikiwo moyoositekurutoiukotoninattemo komaruna 
dehanantoka ieasupirinninantoka ietokkapintoiunohadouzya 
sikasi matuhirosikunha zikyokukazena geimeiwoto itutteitana 
kusurino meiwo karitekitandehatyotto damekana 
sorekara nannitikasite watasiha asanomituoni attanodearuga asanoha watasino kaowo mirutoaa kurahasikun
kono mano itino torino banni oyanagimasakono kouenkaino rentyuuga oyanagimasakoga tyuukahe ikutoiundesono soubetukaiwo hiraitottadesugane 
zyurakuno nikaideyattottadesuyo 
antamo itteyaryayokattadesuna 
oyanagimasakoha yorokondadesyounina watasihasonna soubetukainoattakotowotende siranakatta 
asanohasonna kouenkainoarukotowo watasini ituttakotohanaisisonna soubetukainokotomo watasini sirasitehakurenakatta 
hou kouenkaigaarundesukato watasihaatoninattesonnakotowo iu asanoni humanwo kanzinagarasou ituttaga asanono houmo watasiga zannengarudaroutosorewoomosirogattesonnakotowo itutteiru kazedeatta 
doudoutaru kouenkaidesuwato asanoha kitanai hawo muki dasite niyaniyasinagara kaiintoiunoha kutuyano kozoutoka sakanayano suitoka tonkatuyanoantyantoka sobayano demaemotoka entakuno zyosyutoka mekkikouzyouno syokkoutokaaakutabireru

syousetuno netaninarudesuna 
osiikotowositana kurahasikunha derutoyokattanoni iziwarusouni warattesorehasoutokono kanhanasita asakusano kaidesuna Kgekizyouwo saisyonito omotte kametyannityotto ituttarazehiyattekureto yorokondetadesuwa 
sendenbuni hanasite kaino hiyouwo dasaseruyounisitemoiittene 
doudesu 
yarouzyanaidesuka watasihaaimainiunazuiteyarundattara kaihihakottimomeimeini harautoiu hougaiidesunedeha sendenbuga kinwo dasutoittarasorehao sakeno houhe mawasimasukana 
tonikakutyotto Kgekizyouno gakuyahe ittemindesuka 
oyanagimasakoga rusudakara kurahasikunha iku kyoumihanaidesukana watasihamusiro hantaide oyanagimasakoga rusunanodesono gakuyahe ikeru kanzideatta 
maeniha ikitaito omottemoizatonarutosono gakuyakutigakugurenakatta Kgekizyouno gakuyahe asanoto issyoni imahahirumukotonakusunaoni itutte ittanodatta 
daikukaikono aozamesi kesikihaikaniaa tabibitoyokono aozamesi kesikiha aozamesi nanzimizukarawoutusuran 
verureenumaenityotto kaitayouni gakuyaha butaiurano sankainiaru 
sono gakuyahe ikubeku kurai kyuuna kaidanwo nobotte nikaito sankaino mano semai odori bani ikituitatokityoudo watasino sakini itta asanohasudeni sankaini sugatawo kesiteitagatyoudosonotoki kurai kaidanno ueniatakamo patuto hikariga sasitamitainiarehanantoiu nunozinanoka siroi suki touruhuwahuwatositasoredakedemo naniyara syokuppoku nayamasii isyousono katano ueniha hananoyounisita siwagatuketeatte asino maegaaketearusono herinimo kireina hukuroga hanawanoyounituketearusousita isyouno susowokakageta odori kono itigunga totuzenzuzyouni arawareta 
syougahazimarutokoronanoda 
a tuto odoroite watasiga odori bano sumini miwo yoseruto douzini butaikutugaawatadasiku katakatato kaidanwo oritekitaga nanpunkyuuna kaidandeari semai odori bananode akai kutuga watasinosugu hanatusakini semattakatoomouto reinohuwahuwa tutosita isyouga watasino hoonisuresureni nanika watasinoaru taneno kokorowokusuguritutukarakauyounisite sugite iku 
watasiha ikubunkotyousite ieba mattaku mewo sirokurosasetanodeatta 
sousite mosusohatomokakutosite mosusono hukiokosutyotto keiyousigatai kazekorehatasikani watasino hoowo yousyanaku nadete ittanodaga watasihahuto sakenokotowo kitigai mizutoiukedokonna kazehatumari kitigai kazedanato omotta

sono hantainanodagaiwabaamari hantaisugitekaette kutuudeattanoda 
)satto kaidanwo kake attagasattoiu guaini kake noborutame nizyuumawasino susowo tedekakageteitesorehatemonaku mosusowokakageta odori koto onazi kakkounanoda 
keredo odori koto watasitohanantaru souidearouto watasihawarenagara kusyousita 
kaidanwo nobottasugu hidariga kutunugi badesono muuni dansingu tiimuno hosonagai gakuyaga mieru 
omottatoorisokokara odori kono nokorigawatto ahure detekite kouhunnotame megakurandayouna watasinihawattoiusugoi kanzi igaiha nanimowakarazumotoyori hitorihitorino kaonadoha meni iranaisonnanakakaraara kurahasisenseitoiu koegaatta 
koewotayorini mewo sueruto saatyandeatta

toboketato omottanodarou saatyanha imiarigena bisyouwo nokositamama kaidanwo orite itta 
sonoatode mano zitoha oyanagimasakonokototo kiduita 
gakuyaha odori koga debarattegaraakide gakuyakinadoga zatuzentonugisutetearunakani asanogahitori taizenzizyakutosite matteita 
maaagarandesuka zibunno heyadedemoarukanoyouna koedattaga zakkayano nikaino zibunno heyaheha kessite watasiwoagarasenai asanodakara yokeikimyouna kanzideatta 
sorehatomokakugaraakinanonituke konde watasiha nobori komisokode gakuyano naibuwohazimete tannousuruhodo meni osamerukotogadekita 
hosonagai heyano ryougawani kyoudaigazurarito nabeteatte ookuha tiisana tamagokatatino akai kyoudaidatta 
kitamukino katagawaha madoninatteitesokokara tobosiinagara akariga ituttehakurunodaga kyoudaino ueno hounikorematazurarito syoutengaino gaitounoyouni dentouga narandeiru 
dentoude danwo torutoiu hanasiwo zenkaini kaitagasono heyano hukuzatuna kusaiwo hukunda mututositaun kinihasousita dentouno netugasukunakaranu sayouwo motteiruyouni kanzirareta 
sousitesono dentouno uenihatasikani monohosiyouto mirareru himoga mawasiteatte sentakusita kutusitaookuha saikinryuukouno watasino kirainaano ninzinsyokunomonosoreni nezumiirosita sitagitoittamonoga kaketearuga denkino netudemotte kawakasunodearou 
sousita hosimono huukeiwo katattadakedesudenisono heyano hakukitanainamamekasisaha youini souzousarerudarougasate mewo kyoudaino sitani tenzurunarabaherinonai akatyaketa tataminiha akazimita nekanwo marumetanoya keikokini keikokutuwo issyonisitanoya kaohukino taorunadonadoga sisansiteitetatoeba busyouna onnano yogoremonodemonandemokamawazutume konda osiirerewonozoitamitaina kanzidenamamekasisayori hakukegasano houga tuyoku meni semarunodearu 
kou kakutoikanimo genmetutekina insyouwo tutaerunoni tutometeiruyoudearugasikasisokoha nenwakai odori kotatiga hirumahamotoyorizuttoirunodasi yorumo taigaiha tomarunodakarahotondo sirokuzityuuseikatusiteiru basyodearu 
sitagatte kitanaikotoha aikutemosono kegasanonakaniha yumemigatina nengorono onnatatigadekiurukagirisokowo tanosii seikatuno basyonisiyoutositeiru kanasikuhakanai doryokuga miraresoreha kitanai insyouwo zuibunto sousaisiteirunodearu 
tatoeba kabeniha botanhakenokawarinokorehamata mirukarani irokenonai daenkeino suponzigaturusitearu yokoni eigazassikara kiri nuitarasii binanno gaikokuhaiyuuno syasinga hari duketearitamanihakottimo zyoseinokuseni utukusii eigazyoyuuno kaomo hattearu 
sosite kyoudaino yokoniha kurenaihudeno tatetearu wakini tiisanao ningyoutoka fankara morattakaaruiha moratta kanzinonaninanisan kouto kaita kawaii kusudamatokasono hokasyouzyono konomisouna tiisana gangugaikanimo daizisouni oitearu 
sokodake mirebasorezoreno syouzyotatigasono semai basyode seiippaitanosii seikatuwo kidukoutositeirusono karenna utukusisaga mita mewo utazunihainainodearu

toittenamamekasisanihisokani niyatuitanodemonakatta

asanoga hanasikaketemo watasiha kappatuni henziwosinakatta

oyanagimasakogainainode yuuutunandesuka mizikai syoude odori kotatihayagate doyadoyato gakuyani modotte kita 
sosite watasino meno maede heikide reino hagoromonoyouna isyouwo nugutoiyatatoe heikidenakutemo heyaga marumienotokoroniatukamasiku suwari kondeiru watasino mekara kakurete nugukotohadekinaiwakedaga odori kotatiha huyudatoiunoni asewokaiteitehotondo hanhadakanihitosii kakkoude (sunawati odorihaikani hagesii nikutairoudoudearukawo nyozituni simesitutu )kyoudaino maeni mesiroosininarande kesyouwo otosihazimeta

sorerahatyotto genmetutekideatta

aa dareni kiita 
kamekutisankarasou iu saatyanto oyanagimasakotoha nitemo nitukanu kaodatinanoni watasiha saatyanno kaowo miteiruto husiginisokoni oyanagimasakono kaowomazamazato omoi ukaberunodatta

iyadawa 
sonna geisyanomanemitainakotowosurunosonnakotoore genyasinaiyosikasi asanoha akirakaniawateteita 
sono kamekutikurosubeetoatode gakuyano irigutinotokorode atta 
kamekutiharyuutosita youhukuwo kiteite pikapikahikatta kutuwohaiteitesono maeni tatutotominimisuborasiku miotorigasuru kitanai zouriwohaki kitanai nizyuumawasiwokita watasino katawo kamekutiha zyuunenno tikinoyouni sitasigeni tataitenee senseihasono sekaideha taigaino ninga senseito yobareru 
bungeibuinhuritukesinadoga senseito yobarerunohamadaiitosite tuyautasiagari kowairoyaagarino manzaigeininnadoga koyadeha kanbukyuutoiutokorokara senseito yobareteiru

awoyatte kudasarundesu tutene 
zehihitotuo negaisimasu 
syouzikini iimasugaassitati imaga itibandaizinatokorodekokode gunto nori dasitaitoomoundesorenihadousitemo senseigatano kouenganaitoiya asonnakoto iwanaidenee kawaigatte kudasai 
o negaidesukaraassitatiwohitotu uri dasasete kudasai watasimo syouzikini iugasouiu guaini kobirarete watasiha watasinodarasinai syoubuntositesou warui kimotidehanakatta 
iya inde naniwo iwareteirukawakaranaito omottemo hyoumensou iwarerutonakanakaii kimotideatta 
watasihakono kamekutitokatuteha onazi zaniitakotogaarutoiu matuhirosiharukitinokotowo omoi dasi matuhirosino nanika hetanamoso tutosita taidoto taihisinagarakono kamekutihatasikani syussesurunato omotta 
matuhirosino houga kozintekinihatumari rakuhakutekihun'ikino tadayottao konomi yakiyanadono sukina watasiniha sitasimiga moteru imide sukiha sukidaga ippouhenna kyoeisinwo kokoronoutinodokoka tenotodokanaiyounatokoronisotto hazukasii kawasenmitaini kakusiteiru watasihasorewo zyouzuni kaitekureru kamekutimo sukidatta 
sositekono kamekutiha nozomidoori syussesitara watasino sukidenai taipuninarudaroutosousita kentouhatuiteiruga syussemaenokou kioi tatteiru kamekutihaiwaba soudaina honoodemo miruyouna kaisade kessite kiraidehanakatta 
oyaoyahidoihukeda kamekutiha watasino nizyuumawasinousirowo harattekuremadesite oyanagimaatyanha zyuunigatunohazimeniha kaettekimasuga ahamaa oyanagimaatyanga kaettekaradesyoune huhuhuto waratte watasino katawo tataita 
saatyanno kotobatoiikono kamekutino kotobatoii watasiga oyanagimasakoni mutyuunakotohaitukamou koyanakani yuumeininatteirurasii 
kunga iihurasitanodarousonna mewo asanoni mukeruto asanohakururito watasini sewo mukete kamekunha zissaimattakuiyahontouni hari kitteruneesuruto kamekutiha kawatebukurowohameta tewo genkiyoku panpanto tataiteima hari kiranakya hari kirutokihanaindesuyo ninkiga detekitakarana akokodegu tutonositimawanai tutosoudayosoudayo genkina kotobadaga uturona koedatta 
sono asanohakatute watasini asakusaha ningenwoguutaranisiteikenaito ituttagasositetasikani asakusano kuukinihasousitatokorogaarukeredokousita kamekutinadowo mirutoguutarana kuukino uraniha hagesii seizonkyousouga uzumakiiteirukotowo sirasare watasihaguutarana seisinwo sigekisare kouhunsaserareta 
watasimo hari kirantoikan !reiniyotte watasito asanoha tikatetuyokotyouno bon zyuuruni ittanodagasono totyuuno sinnakamisetooride watasiha watasiga asakusahe kuru maeniurotuiteita ginzanosono urano houniarutoaru tokusyukissade kaonaziminosokonoiwayuru kissagaaruno hitorini guuzenatta 
mou zuibunsono misehe ikanaiga muudemo watasino kaowo oboeteitato mie zattounonakani watasino sugatawo hakkensurutomazuinoni attasonna kaowo yokonisomuketa 
sono onnano yokoniha otokogaitanodearuga onnanosono kaonosomuke houdesono otokogasono onnanitottedouiu iminomonodearukaga akirakanisareta 
souda 
watasiha imamade kakanakattagakouiu guaini ginzano onnatatiga randevuuni asakusawo riyousiteirunonihyokkoributukarunohakorega hazimetedehanakatta 
sosite onnamo watasimo souhoutomokono baainoyouni kimazui omoiwosurunohakoredemou nandomeguraika 
kakute watasiha ginzano onnatatiga asakusadattara miseno kyakuni awanaidarou misehe kiteurusai uwasawo tateruyounanoni au sinpaihanaidarousou omotte asakusawoaibikino basyoni erandeirukotowo sittanodaga watasino sonzaihasono ansinniiyana eiwo touzitanodearisositemata kaowosomukeraretakotoniyotte watasihakudaranu uwasawo tateruyounakudaranu kyakunohitorito miraretakotowomo siranebanaranakatta 
tokorode hanasiha kawarugaokasinakotoni ginzano onnaga asakusahekuruto ippouasakusano tikatetuyokotyouno kissatenno onnatatiha koukyuutoiuto ginzahe dekakete ikikoreha kanarazusimoaibikidehanaku eigakenbutuno tanosimiwo tanosimini ikunodaga eiganara tedikano rokukude mitarayosasounamonowowazawaza maruno naini omomukunodearu 
aru tokiwatasihaokasiitoiukotowosono onnatatino hitorini ituttaradatte ekanziga denaiwa sassoutokou kotaeta

sayou watasiha asakusade atta asakusano ningen'igaino ningennokotowo imamade itidomo kataranakattagakono kikaini hanasiwosoreni utusou 
*tazimamatino watasino apaatono maeno mitiwo rokukuno houdenakusono hantaino houhetumari kotutarounoaru houhe ittesonomama kikuyahasino densyatoorini derutosono densyatoorihatyotto husigina syoutengaiwonasiteiru 
sunawatisonoutinohitotuno miseno kanbanwo syoukaisureba kakuinsyokutendougutukemonosusitenyougukou niretuni kaitearu 
sono tonariniha tinretu|binmisetoiu kanbanga kakageteatte misewonozokutotatoeba syokungao maemotiyano misesakide mirarerudearouanoo senbeino itutteiru dentoukatano binmataha tabakoyano tabakono iretearu sikakui binhateha kissatennadodeutidehakouiu zyoutouno koohiiwo tukatteimasutoitta kazeni koohiino mamewo irete dasiteokunoni tukauyounadongurino mino katatiwosita tiisana binkousitaaritoarayuru syuruino tinretubingahokaniha nanimonaisousita bindakega miseniippai nabetearu 
sono tonariniha yousyokuno sarasinasobanodonburi susiyano ookina yunomisonnanobakari utteiru misegaarukatoomoutotamesini densyamitiwo yokogitte maehe ittemirutosokoniha aguidouno tyatina isukarahazimatte soutourippana kissatenyouno nagaisumadearusonna kateiyoudenaku syoubaiyouno isubakari utteiru misegaarutoitta guainisono henittaihamosimo syokunga asitakara kyuunitonkatu yawo hirakouto omottesokohe ikeba nikukiri houtyouaburanabenadono urano dougukara teeburuisunadono omoteno setubihinni itarumade issikigatatidokoroni soroerarerusonna benrikono zyounasino syoutengaidearu 
kuimonoyano dougudattaranandatte uttenaimonohanai 
waribasisenmonno misekakusyuyakumiyoukisenmonno misesorekaraaamouyameyou 
syousetuga kakenakunattarakokode andouguwo atumete yataidemoyarukana 
sonnaanmari tanosikunai kuusouwosinagaraarutoki watasihasokowo aruiteita

aanaruhodoto watasiha omotta 
souiumonobakariwomata senmonni utteiru misegasokoniarunoda 
watasihayaya okkuuna kimotidattaga aitenoitumademo kesanai husigisouna hyouzyougaurusainode watasigasonnatokorowo sanpositeiruwakewo temizikani katatta 
sosite baatenkunga rokukuno houhe mawatte kaerutokorodato iunode issyoni sibasakimatino houhe mattanodagasokoha asakusakouenno houkara iuto kokusaigekizyouno urani atarutokorodekokogamata husigina ikkakunanodearu 
sono tooriha tuusyouo kasiya|zindoutoiware nokinamimio kasiyadarakeo kasiwo seizousuru iebakarigasono ikkakunikatamatteiru 
konoo kasiyazindoutoiunowo watasihanagai kano kasiya|sindouwosounamatte itutteirunodarouto katteni omoi kondeitagazutto notininatteo kasiyanin(o kasiyasan )no mititoiunodato sirasareta

minna genki
to watasiha baatendaani itutta 
sukkarigobusatasiteiruga sakaetyannado aikawarazu genkikane sakaetyantoiunohasokono kissagaaruno hitorino meidearu 
to ituttemosokoniha onnano koha hutarisikainaiga 
sakaetyanhayamemasitayameta 
yuritupeni oi dasaretayounamonodehou misedeha eikono houga kosandesono yurikotoiunogamada misehe ituttabakarino goroeikoto yurikogakonna hanasiwositeirunowo watasiha gawade kiitakotogaaru 
sorewohuto omoi dasita 
huri kaettanogaikenakattanonekitto 
abunaito omotte nokisitano houheyoketandakedoyoketa houhe zitensyagawazatonoyouniyattekite dosin!maa bakanisiteiruwane yurikohakuyasisouni kutuno kakatode tokowo ketta 
donbeeyokotyoutoiu oomoriekitikakuno senrowakiniaru komai rozidenokotodatoiu 
itakattawa eikoha wahukudatta 
atasitatimoyokuaruzyanaino

sono zitensyamokittosoudato omouwa

eikoha kusukusuwarai dasita

hawo hakuzyousouni tuuto narasu 
wakaruneto watasiha kutiwohasamunodatta 
watasinadomotatoeba ninni asiwo humareta baaizyamanatokoroni asiwo dasiteitakottiga waruiyouna kigasite senpouga situreito iutoiyaiyato kyousyukusurunoga tunedearu

dousite 
to kikanakutemo yurikoni oi dasaretatoiunogaikanimoari ebeki kotogaranoyounisu tuto atamani irunodatta 
dokokaii misehe uturetanodearebaiigato inorunodattagasikasi eikonoyouna onnano ueniha taezu yono aranamigahitosio araku osoikakari yurikonoyouna onnahasorekoso aranamini kiwotukerotodonaritirasitewagamamani tuyoku siaiwaseni ikite ikukotodearoutomo omounodatta

gorotyanha kuikuito haiwo katamukerumanewosurutosoredetominisono yokubouni aoraretarasikusorewo sitanamezurini arawasite paiitidoudesuto ii watasiga sigotogaarukarato kotowarutoassarizyamata genkideto watasiga iwanebanaranuyounakotowo gyakuni itutte reino kokoromotonai asiwokaramaseruyounisitesoreha zenkarano aruki kusedehaarunodaga issouhidokusita souryotaru asidoride orikarano ginzano syutusakarinonakani magire kondesimatta

watasiha wakaretaatodemo seisinteki|gen'unkarasibarakuha tati naorukotogadekinakatta 
gorotyanhadoukasiteirusou iu watasimade atamaga okasikunattayouna kimotidatta 
tokorodesono konmeiwo hitosuziazayakani turanuiteirumonogaatta 
soreha gorotyankara kiita ayukono gyouzyouheno kantanni tikai odorokideatta 
syanhaide otokowotukuttatoiunohaikanimo ayukoga sinahe ittemo naitiniita tokito onazi zibunwo osi tousiteiru kanzide ayukono issyuno takumasisanihakanete watasimo sitawo maiteitagaimasaranagarasono zuhutosani odorokasaretanodatta 
daizyuuitikaihutatabi genzituno kougekinituite hanasiwomotoni modosite watasiha dosaturanukara ayukoga ooyagorouwo misakono imoutokarasaratte ittayounamanewosurunato iwaretagasoreha misakoni taisite zyakoiwosikakerunatoiu imini tigainainodaga watasinihatonto kaisenu kotobadeatta

gokai
dosakanga mikatasirono mewo watasini sosogunoniun watasiha ookiku kubiwo huttaga dosakanha nanimo iwazu kubiwo kokizaminiunazukaseta

sanno toriha zyuuitigatunizyuuitukadeatta 
(tuitatiga itino toride zyuusannitiga nino toride )nizyuusinitino banni watasiha kotutaroudeo zasikino sigotono kaeridatoiu misakoto atta 
yaninattyauwa

marude dansugeisyazyanaino misakoha menohutiwo akakusitedarusouni teppanno maeni matta 
miityanhasorede saabisusiteyattano kainomamano hamaguriwo teppanno maeninosetego mesi|musino arumino hutawosupporitokabusenagarasou iu kotutarouno saikunno koenihatasikani karui ikidoorigakomerareteita

nanno enkainano 
doko 
sonoo zasikihano souhagaside teppanwo karukudaga yakena kanzide misakoha tataitedokkano kouzyouno dannahourasikattawa

miityan 
syousaranomurasakini aonoriwohutte watasino maeni sasi dasuto saikunha hizano ueni ryoutewo omonete misakoni mewo sosogikorekarahasouiu tokimiityanhakkiri kotowaranakya dameyo 
iikoto 
antaha enkaino yokyouni yobarete odorini ittandesuyo 
sonna kyakuno syakuwosini ittanzyanaindakaraneeto daidokoroni kaowo huri muketa 
daidokorodeha kotutarouga sewo marumeruyounisite rensumino ueni tewokazasiteita 
nee eto saikunha kutizoewo unagasuyouni hutatabi ituttaga hoteide senkizuwo uketatoiu kikanheino kareha kizunotokoroto obosii momoniso tuto tewo ategatte usuwaraiwo ukabetakiri betuni nanigotomo ioutosinakatta

kaino siruga zizizito teppanni yakituita

geininha geiwo urebaiinoyo

kurusisoune miityan

sumimasenyosiitawaru koedatta

kousita bandeatta 
sono banno zyuunitokisugiruto nizyuuitukade sanno torigahazimaru 
zyuunizimaekara hitobitoha wasizinzyanitumekaketeiru 
dotiraga sasoutomonaku misakoto watasitohao torisamani dekaketa 
o torisamano banha kouenno kuimono yaha nizimade eigyouga yurusareru

e 
hitobankarirunoga zyuusennaruhodo torakkuninobotta otokoga taikamadanrasii usupperananowo musirodemo atukauyouni homitinizikani sutonsutonto otositeiru

sokode watasihasouda 
o yomeni iku musumesannadoha tokuni heritooi musumesannadoha dehunewo kautoiiwakedana 
o mukosanwo hayaku moraitai musumesanha irihuneto izenhao torisamano kumateha mizusyoubaikyakusyoubaino hitobitosika kawanaimonorasikattaga imadeha hutuuno nintatimo katteiru

kunha sitteyasinaikasirato watasiha dosakanni itutta 
kumateniha irihuneto dehunetoiunogaarundattene 
douiunoga irihunededouiunoga dehunekamou saimatunoawatadasisawo tadayowasiteiru sinnakamisetooriwo watasitatiha aruiteita 
watasitatino maniha kimazui tinmokugazutto tuduiteita 
sorewo yaburoutameno watasino kotobadeatta 
douiunoga irihunededouiunoga dehunekahao torisamano banmisakotomo hanasi attakotodeatta 
misakoha irihuneto dehunegaarutoiukotodakesika siranakatta 
kumateniha takarabunetekiyatamakukikinhakokomedawarao tahukumenzyuudaikokunadoga kazari duketearugakorega sensabanbetudedorega dehunededorega irihuneka mitatokorodehasappariwakaranai 
kumatewo katte kiitemirebaiiwakedaga kutiakeno misede tiisana kumatewo kaunomo kigahike takarabuneni nanika kubetugaarunokamosirenai 
hesakiga hidarininattetari migininattetarisurunde kubetusurunokamosirenainadoto itutte sudoorisitesimatta 
sikasi kumateniha tiisainoninaruto takarabunenotuitenainogaarituiteitemosonoyouna kubetuha mirarenakattakara kekkyokuwakarazuzimaideatta 
kumateno kawarini sasaedani imowo turanuitanoto setusansyouwo katte misakonoo miyagenisi kumateha wasizinzyadesorezorega katta 
atasi kyonenmokono kumate
hontouha bainowo kawanakyaikenaindakedo bokumosouda omoeba maeno nenha ayukoto ooyagoroutosorekara dareka hokanimoitagasousita kaohuredeo torisamani kita

nakamiseni kita

nioumonhe muke asakusano hanamitinoyouna nakamisewo doudouto (
)arukunoha mezurasiikotodeatta 
kunha nanika gokaisiteirurasiiga gokaiga harenaiyoudaga mizuhanawosusutte ikubundomorinagara watasiha itutta

soryahidoinomoiru

damenanosa

sonotame 
iya sokowo wareba bakabakasii hanasinanodakaramottaibutta kaki katahayameyou 
atode sittanodaga misakoga dosakanwokesikaketarasiinoda

to iutokoroda 
)kamekutitoiunohairoiroto onnagairukarahunhun (honrainarahoutodemo iutokoroda

sikaruni genzituha doudouto kaiteirunoda 
syousetukaga bakabakasikutesorazorasikuteasamasikute kakenaiyounakotowo heizento tenkaisitemiseru genzituno zuhutosasono nukenuketosita genzituno osorosisani watasino zeizyakuna syousetukatekina sinkeihamuzanni tatakinomesareta 
souda 
genzituno husigisaniiwaba utaretuduketeiru watasidehaattagakono husigisaha mizikatoiunomo orokana mizikasadakeni watasiwo utinomesu rikimo ookikatta 
watasihaosorakuha genzituni utaretuduketeiruseimoarouga watasino kokorogamaetositemo genzituni taisiteha kenkyonatumorideatta 
syousetude genzituwo saidansurutoiuyounaiwaba genzituwo ikaraseruyouna husonnamaneha tutometesinaiyounisitekiteiru 
danoni genzituha watasini taisitenanno uramigaattesonoyouna tehidoi utisue houwosurunodarou 
watasino uketa itamiha tanni oyanagimasakoga minemisakono imoutodatoiunoni taisuru odorokidakedehanakatta !hikaninarino maeni itta tokiha watasitatini kidukanu saatyanha asakusazinzyano houhe isogi aside satteite watasimo dosakanmoaete yobitomeyoutohasinakatta 
syamaeniha sinmontatugorouga houkensitatoiu hasirani sinmonto kizandearu isino hanaomotega tatteitesono utigawani kidetukutta tiisana kamitougaaru 
sono ikatano kousini musubitukeraretaomikuzigayouyaku sematta hakubononakaniazayakani siroku hikatteita 
daizyuunikaihuinaare (asakusano odori kotatiha finaarewohuinaareto iu 
)asakusawo aisuru atoittamonowoyaroutoiu hanasiga watasito asanomituono kande kawasaretanoha oyanagimasakoga Kgekizyouno imondanni kuwawatte sinahe ikumada maedattakara omoeba zyuugatunokotodearu

korya hutukayoida 
sakuya|awamoriwosouda asanokunni osietemoratta awamoriyade nomisugite higoroiki|sosousiteiru watasinisiteha mezurasiku yuuzinto gekironwosite nomisugita 
iya nomisugitatameni gekironwositanokamosirenaiga apaatoni tomattanoha nomisuginotamedearu

sorekarao tyousidaha ai 
sorekarao tyousiipponasanono kotobato zyotyuuno kotobatoha zyotyuugao tyousiwo ipponto genteisitasorega tigaudakedatta

dozyou sirukuzirasirusizimi siruaomi siru(yasainokoto )touhusirunegi siruizuremo gosendemesiga zyuusenzyuugosenyademesiga kueru 
zyuugosentoiu yasusani sukosimo higesezuni kueru tanosinde kututteirusono hun'ikikousita asakusano kuukiha watasino kokorowonagoyakanisaserunodearu

tousyabande sutta asakusano kaino annaizyoudearu 
daiikkaiwokanete hanasiteita toorini Kgekizyouno rentyuuwo yonde okonaukotoninatta 
asanogahitoride gekizyouno houtokake ai kaizyousono hokamo torikimetekureta 
zyakorewo dasimasukarane hasigakiha gekizyouno houdemottekure bungeibuno garihande suttekuretanodasoudaga inkiga kosugite okatta 
sonodogitusaha asakusano koyanodogitui geihuuwotyotto sinobaseru 
nannimosinaidedoumosumimasen watasiha kiga susumanakattanoda 
dosaturanukara igaina hanasiwo kikasarete iraiwatasiha Kgekizyoukarasositemata misakoto aukamo sirenai kotutaroukaramo toonoiteita 
tinmarito sumibiwo sakatta tiisana nabesaga sakini kita

tyuutosusutte kesaha huyukainakotogaatte hayaku okitimattadesuyo

mitatokoro kantennoyounamonowo sakatta kuziranabega hakobareta 
asabintokoroni tattara yuubinga kitete genkouga okuri kaesareteirundesuna

oi zuudousitahaitadaima yuumoasyousetunandesugane

zituwanandesuyo 
ikuto ainikusono kohamada kaettenakuteo baasangahitoride neteiru 
o tukaasankamo sirenaiga yousuruni tosiyoride genkankaramaru mieno senbeikamadankara oki dasitekitesugu kaerudaroukarasaadouzoo nobori kudasaimusakurusiitokorodesugadouzodouzotoiuwake

ima atuio tyawo dasimasukara 
tumari taihenna kangeihuri 
douzookamainakuto ituttaga baasanhakoreha senbeikamadannadoto tigattenakanaka zyoutouna tyakiwo soroetesate tati attanode daidokorohe itte yuwo wakasunokato omoutosaniarazu senbeikamadannonakani tewo osi komuzyanaidesuka

to mewo marumeta tokiha kyuusuno ueni yutanpono kutiwo ategatte odorokuzyanaidesuka imano imamade baasanga asiwo ateteita yutanpono yuwodokudoku tuto

daga baasanha keroritositamonde yutanpono yudeo tyawo dasutoheidouzo 
haatoha ituttaga kokorononakadeha getutoittadesuna

sou iuto heizentosite zibunno tyawanwo tori agete kokurito nondeaaoisii 
aaoisiiha bokuno sousakudesugane 
doudesukono hanasihahuumu zuunabega kita 
ikita namazuwo atamagoto saino meni buttakittasono tidarakeno nikuhenha nabenonakademada pikupikuto ugoiteiru

*asakusano hirokouziha yosiharato onaziyouni hiruto yorutodehamarude hyouzyouwo kotonisurunodearu 
yoruninaruto hirumanodokana youga sasiteitasono katagawani kuimonono yataiga zurarito tati narabi ookuha atatakai kuimonowo urusono norennonakanihadoremoippai ningatumari kaoha kakusareruga sitaha marumienosono asimotonihadokokara arawarerunoka mewo ranranto hikaraseta inugaurourositeitemakotoninantoiukasakanna koukeiwo teisurunodearu 
asanoto hiruno hirokouziwo aruitekara suuzitugoyoruno hirokouzide watasiha dosakanni atta 
masukuwokaketeite kaohahakkirisinakattagasikasi watasinihasugu dosakantowakatta 
watasiha usimesiwo kuini ikutokorodattanodedou issyoni kametyabowo kuwanaito dosakanwo sasottanodeatta 
koyano rentyuugahiikinisiteiru tanakayatoiu usimesi yano norenwokugutte dosakanga masukuwo tottanowo mite watasihakorehato odoroita 
kousenno kagenkatomo omottagasorenisitemohidoiyatureyoudemarude sininnoyouna kaodearu

iya kanwo oite maatyannio aidesukaiya yatainiha zyanpaayamoziri kyakugatumatteita 
sono isogasii saityuuni yatainooyaziha syousarani siruwo totte azimiwositeiru

nandemo asakusarakutentitoiu namaeninarutoka 
sokono syouni irukotoninattandesusorehayokattademone misemonokoyano odori kodehanedonnamondesukane 
bokumo miityankara sasowaretaga kotowarimasitaheio matidoosamato tamanegini nikuga tirahoramatteiru usimesiga maeni okareta 
dosakanha hasiwo warutosekkatini syakisyakito hasiwokosuri awasedouyarahidoku kuuhukudattarasii yousuwoarawanisitutu donburiwo kutino maeni motte ittaga isoidaseikamesino yugenimusete kurusisouniseki komunodatta

suruuti hasimo nage dasite taoreruyouni norenkara dete itta

*asakusano aha kokusaituurino sansyuuyaga kaizyoudeatta 
sono nitiha Kgekizyouno syonitini atteite syonitiha keikoganaikara syouno rentyuuha butaigasumuto hutuuno nitito tigatteatoha asoberu 
sorede kainimo derarerutoiunodesono nitiga tokuni erabaretanoda 
watasihasono nitino maezutto asakusani ikazusono nitimo teikokuni oomorino iekara dekakete ikuto asanoga sansyuuyano maeni tatteite watasiwo mikakeruto patuto kakete kite kurahasikuntaihenda imaya ososito watasiwo matteitarasikuikinari kamitukuyouni itutta 
metyakutyadayo kurahasikunooitasakega itutteirurasii yousuda 
dousitandesuka watasiga koutairisinagara iutodousitamokousitamo komaruna akouiu tokinihatyanto asakusaniitekurenakutyadoumosumimasen

dousitamonkane

sonnadokorozyanaitosakki sendenbuno yatuni turugitotuwo kuwasaretyatta 
Kgekizyouzya uehe sitaheno oosawagide tumetaku tutu hanasuyouni iu 
dousiyou hokkininha watasito asanosoreni watasino yuuzinno Tno meiwo karite sanninno namaeninatteita 
annaizyouwo okutta nintatigaminna atumattekitaradou ayamattamonoka namaewo karita Tnimosumanaisito watasiha zyumyouga tidimaru omoidatta 
kaidanno asiotowo miminisurutabinisaradedani yaseteiru sintaiga itisio yasete ikuyoudatta 
teikokuwosudeni itizikantikaku sugiteita 
daga raikaimonohamada suunindatta

hayaku sakewo nomitakatta 
sirahudehatamaranai 
mou konaidesuyo kitekurerunatoiu negaiwokomete itutta 
korezyasikasi komarunato asanoha honehatta katawosukumeta 
sansyuuyaniha sanzyuuninzengoto ituttearundaga 
mou konaidesukana 
kurahasikunha angaikaogakikannodesuna 
kurahasikunno kaodezokuzoku atumattekurukato omotteita asanomo watasidouyouraikaimonono sukunainonihottositeiruhazunanonikonnakotowo iu 
iyahottositanode nikumare kutiwo tataku genkimo detanodarou 
watasimo watasino ikisyoutinmo asanonokono itigekidetuini sokowotuita kanzide gyakuni husigina genkiga detekita 
sono bakagirino genkidehanai 
kono hantosibakarizutto watasiga oti kondeita teimeizyoutaikarayouyaku uki noborukotogadekisounasonnaarigatai tanomosiisinno kanzirareru genkideatta 
konnazamazya Kgekizyouno rentyuuga taikyosite kita baaisorehasoredemata haziwokakutokorodesitanakono asanono kotobahamottomodatta 
dehahazimemasukana asanoha zyotyuuni iutame tatikakete zituha kyoukappabasitooride tazimani attadesuyo

(doremo yukimo kanzennamonototenaiga 
)sononadono kairakuno nakade watasiha nettairinno seizyakuno nakade tadahitorionowo huruukono batubokusagyouwo takai itini okumonoda

mattaku kodomo|gisino torikku
tadasi yukiha faniigayattanode watasiha amari sinna kotowo konomanu 
mazu rafaerewo maeni suwarasekotiraha sukosi hanarete kano maeni tati ryouudewo nobasi ryouhouno hitosasiyubide rafaereno ryouganwo sasinagara zyozyoni tikaduite ikukotirano mottaibutta yousuni rafaereha sudeni kyouhuno syokuwo ukabe yubiga tikadukuto mewo tozite simau 
sono tokihidariteno hitosasiyubito oyayubitowo hirogete kano ryouganno mabutani hure migiteha rafaereno haigoni mawasite atamaya sewo karuku tataku 
rafaereha zibunno ryougannisawatteirunoha sayuuno hitosasiyubito sinziteirunoda 
faniiha migitewo hiite motono siseini hukuri rafaereni mewo hirakaseru 
rafaereha henna kaowosite senkokuatamano notinisawattanoha nandesuto kiku

hontoudayo 
totta otokoga konban|biruto mamonomo sokohe bini ikundayo 
zikini sono otokoha byoukininarudarouyo 
butawo totta syuusa 
yuureisinzyano kyokanha masumasuhuanno omomotininaru

kono kanmorino nakade omoi tuita reino monogataridouyara atamano nakade ooita|hakkousite kitayouda

utukusii samoagoda 
yukiwo sakuhintyuuno simano namaeni tukautumori 
imada kakanai sakuhintyuuno iroirona bamenga kamisibaino enoyouni tugikara tugiheto arawarete kite sikataganai

musumeha isoberuotokono ziha roidotoitta 
faniiha touzikosekino uedeha imada beikokuzinosuboonno tumadeattakeredo hisasiku ottokara torete ousuni watari zassikisyanadowosinagara hutarino kowokakaete zikatusiteitanodearu 
sorekara sannenno notisuteivunsunha sono tokikariforuniani kaetteita faniino notiwo oute taiseiyouwo watatta 
titioyakaraha kandoudouyoutonari yuuzintatino setunaru kankoku(kareraha minasuteivunsunno sintaiwo kidukatteita 
)womo sirizokete saiakuno kenkouzyoutaitosoreni otorazu saiakuno keizaizyoutaitowo motte kareha syuppatusita 
hatasite kasyuuni tuita tokiha hotondo hinsino arisamadatta 
sikasi usagini kakudounika ganbari tousite namanobita kareha yokunenfaniino maeottotono rikonseirituwo matte yauyaku kekkonsita 
tokini faniiha suteivunsunyori zyuuititositosiueno sizyuuni
zennenmusumeno isoberuga sutoronguhuzintonatte tyounanwo ageteitakara kanozyoha sudeni sobotonatteita wakedearu 
kausite yono sinsanwo nametukusita nakarouno amerikaonnato boutyan sodatide wagamamade tensaitekina wakai sukottorandonintono kekkonseikatuga hazimatta 
ottono byouzyakuto tumano nenreitohasikasi hutariwoyagate huuhutoiuyorimo musiro geizyutukato sono maneezyaano gotokimononi kaete simatta 
suteivunsunni kaketeiru zissaiietekisainouwo tabunni sonaeteita faniiha kano maneezyaatosite tasikani yuusyuudeatta 
ga tokini yuusyuusugiru kanganaidehanakatta 
kotoni kanozyoga maneezyaano hunwo koete hihyoukano ikini iroutosuru tokini 
zizitusuteivunsunno genkouha kanarazu itidoha faniino kouetuwo henakerebanaranainodearu 
miban|binaide kakiageta ziikiruto haidono syokouwo sutoovuno nakani tataki komasetanoha faniideatta 
kekkonizenno ren'aisiwo danzensasiosaeete syuppansasenakattanomo kanozyodeatta 
boonmasuniita goroottono sintaino tametohaie hurui tomodatino darekarewo gantosite issaibyousituni irenakattanomo kanozyodeatta 
yukiniha suteivunsunno yuuzintatimo ooitakiwo warukusita 
tyokuzyoukeiokono W E henrei(garubaruziisyougunwo sizinnisita youna otokoda )ga massakini hungaisita 
nanno tameniano syokuno asaguroi hayabusano youna mewosita amerikaonnagadesyabaranebanaranunoka 
ano onnanotameni suteivunsunhasukkari kawatte simattato 
kono goukaina akazensizinmo zikono sakuhinno nakani oitenara yuuzyouga kateiya tumanotameni koumuranebanaranu henkawo zyuubunreiseini kansatudekita hazudanoni imazissaimeno maede mottomo miryokuaru tomoga itihuzinnotameni ubai sararerunoniha gamanganaranakattanodearu

kono seinenmo hahaoyani nite zyaanarisutotekina sainouwo ooku atteiruyoudearu

to 
nyuukounakano gunkanno isyani kesakite morattaga paatarisewo mite izyounasitoiu 
syounenha konnitiha sigotowosurunodato itutte kikazu tyousyokuno tokiminano tokorohe kite sakuyano syazainotumoridarouka iezyuuno mononi seppunsita 
kono kyoutekiseppunniha itidousukunakarazu hekieki
sikasi dozintatiha minapaatariseno seniwo sinziteirunoda 
paatariseno ieno sinda itizokuga oozeimorino nakakara sinsituhe kite syounenwo yuumeikaihe yondanodato 
matasaikinsinda paatariseno aniga sono nitino gogo|sourinno nakade syounenni ai kano hitaiwo uttani tigainaito 
matawarewareha sisyano reito sakuyahitobantatakai tuduke kyouni siryoutomoha makete kurai yoru(sokoga karerano zyuukyodearu )heto nigete ikanebanaranakattanodato

fanii(kansyoutekina namidatoha bonso herino tooi )ga omowazu namidawokobosita 
yuuzin!nanto imano watasinisorega kaketeirukotoka !(iroirona imide )taitouni hanasukotono dekiru nakama
kyoutuuno kakowo atta nakama
kaiwano nakani atamatyuuya kyakutyuuno iranai nakama
zonzaina kotobaha tukainagaramo kokorono nakadeha sonkeisezuniirarenu nakama
kono kaitekina kikouto katudoutekina hibitono nakade tarinaimonohasoredakeda 
koruvinbakusutaaW E henreigosusukosi okurete henrii zieimuzuomoeba oreno seisyunha yutakana yuuzyouni megumareteita 
minna oreyori rippana yatubakarida 
henreitono nakatigaiga imamottomo tuusetuna kaikonwo motte omoidasareru 
dourikara itte konokataga matigatteirutohasarasara omowanai 
sikasi rikutunanka mondaizyanai 
kyodaina kenhigeno syara kaono henasino ano otokoto aozameta yaseppotino oretoga issyoni akino sukottorandowo tabisita tokinoano nizyuudaino sitatakana kanbiwo omottemo miro 
ano otokono warai koekaoto oukakumakutonomino waraidehanaku atamakara kakatoni oyobu zensinno waraiga imamo kieruyouda 
husigina otokodattaano otokoha 
ano otokoto hanasiteiruto yono nakani hukanounadotoiumonoha naiyouna kigasite kuru 
hanasiteiru nakani nanzika konokatamadega hugoude tensaide ouzyade ranpuwo teni ireta aradeindearuyouna kigasite kitamonoda 
mukasino |natukasii kaono hitotu hitotuga meno maeni ukande kite sikataganai 
muyouno kansyouwo sakerutame sigotono nakani nogareru 
senzitukara kakatteiru samoahunsousiaruiha samoani okeru hakuzinoubousida 
sikasi eikokuto sukottorandotowo hanaretekaramou tyoudoyonenninarunoda 
gosamoani oiteha koraitihouzitino seikiwamete kyoukonisite meimokuha oukokunaredomo ouha hotondo seizizyouno zikkenwo yuusezu 
zissaino seiziha kotogotoku kakutihouno fono(kaigi)niyotte ketteiseraretari 
ouha sesyuuni arazu 
matakanarazusimo zyoutino kurainimo arazu 
koraikono syotouniha sono hozisyani ouzyataruno sikakuwo ataubeki meiyono syougouitutuari 
kakutihouno daisyuutyounisite kono itutuno syougouno zenbumosikuha kahansuuwo (zinbouniyori aruiha kousekiniyori )etaru monoosarete ouini sokukunari 
sikousite tuuzyouitutuno syougouwo hitorinite kane yuusuru baaiha kiwamete marenisite ookuha ouno hokani hitotu aruiha hutatuno syougouwo hozisuru monoaruwo tunetosu 
sareba ouha taezu hokano ouiseikyuukenhozisyano sonzaini odosarezaruwo ezu 
kakaru zyoutaiha hituzentekini sono nakani nairanhunsouno inyuwo kurasurumonotoiubesi 
J B suteeasamoatisiitihatihatiitinenitutuno syougouno nakamarietoanatoaiteretamasoariino mittuwo atu daisyuutyouraupepaga osarete ouini sokuita 
tuiaanano syougouwo atu tamasesetomou hitotuno syougoutuiatouano motinusimataafatoha kawaru kawaru hukuouno kuraini sokukubeku sadamerare mazu hazimeni tamasesega hukuoutonatta 
sono gorokara tyoudohakuzinno naiseikansyouga hagesikunatte kita 
izenha kaigioyobi sono zikkenmonoturafare(oozinusi)tatiga ouwo ayatutteitanoni imaha apiano matini sumu kyokuku syousuuno hakuzinga yukini kattanodearu 
ganraiapianiha ei kome dokuno mikunigasorezore ryouziwo oiteiru 
sikasi mottomo kenryokunoarunoha ryouzitatidehanakute doituninno keieini kakaru nankaitakusyokusyoukaideatta 
simano hakuzinbouekisyounadono mani owatte kono syoukaiha tadasiku kodomokunino garivaadeatta 
katuteha kono syoukaino sihaininga doituryouziwo kanetakotomoari matasono notizikokuno ryouzi(kono otokoha wakai zindouiede syoukaino dozinroudousyagyakutaini hantaisitanode )to syoutotusite yukiwo yamesasetakotomoaru 
apiano nisikoumurinuumisakikara sono hukinittaino koudaina totiga doitusyoukaino nouzyoude sokode koohiikokoapainappurunadowo saibaisiteita 
senni tikai roudousyaha omoni samoayorimo sarani mikaino hokano simaya aruiha tooku ahurikakara doreidouyounisite turete koraretamonodearu 
kakokuna roudouga kyouseisare hakuzinkantokuni tiutareru kokusyokuninkassyokuninno himeiga higotoni kikareta 
dassoumonoga soutugisikamo karerano ookuha toraerare aruiha korosareta 
ippouharukani hisasii izenkara syokuninno syuukanwo wasureteiru kono simani kikaina uwasaga hirosimatta 
gairaino hihuno kuroi ningenga simatamino kodomowo totte kuuto 
samoaninno hihuha senkuronaisikassyokudakara ahurikano kokuzinga osorosiimononi mietanodearou 
simatamino syoukaini taisuru hankanga sidaini koumatta 
utukusiku seirisareta syoukaino nouzyouha dozinno meni kouenno gotoku uturi sokohe ziyuuni irukotoga yurusarenunoha asobi sukina kareranitotte hutouna buzyokuto omowareta 
sekkakukurousite takusanno painappuruwo tukurisorewo zibuntatide syokubemosezuni huneni nosete hokatokorohe hakonde simauni itatteha dozinno daibubunnitotte mattaku gunimotukanu nansensudearu 
yorunouzyouhe sinobi itutte hatakewo kousukoto yukiga ryuukouninatta 
yukiha robinhuddotekina gikyoukouito minasare simatamiippanno kassaiwo hakusita 
motironsyoukaigawamo damattehainai 
hanninwo toraeruto suguni syoukainaino sisetukangokunibuti kondabakaridenaku kono zikenwo gyakuyousi doituryouzito musunde raupepaouni semari baisyouwo torunoha motironsarani kyouhakuniyotte kattena zeihou(hakuzinkotoni dokuninni yuurina )ni syomeisaseruni itatta 
ouwo hazime simatamitatiha kono appakuni kotaerarenakunatta 
kareraha eikokuni sugaroutosita 
sosite mattaku bakabakasiikotoni ouhukuouikakakudaisyuutyouno ketugide samoasihaikenwo eikokuni yudanetai munewo sarudasoutositanoda 
torani kauruni ookamiwo mottesiyoutosuru kono soudanhasikasi sugu doitugawani moreta 
gekidosita doitusyoukaito doituryouzitoha tadatini raupepawo murinuuno oukyuukara tikui kawarini zyuuraino hukuoutamasesewo tateyoutosita 
issetuniha tamasesega doitugawato musunde ouwo uragittanodatomo iwareru 
usagini kakueibeinikuniha doituno housinni hantaisita 
hunsouga tuduki kekkyokudoituha (bisumarukuryuuno yari houda )gunkangosekiwo apiani nyuukousase sono ikakuno sitani kuu de tawo kankousita 
tamaseseha outonari raupepaha nanpouno santihukaku nogareta 
simatamiha sinouni huhukudattaga syotokorono boudoumo doitugunkanno houkano maeni tinmokusinakerebanaranakatta 
dokuheino tuisekiwo nogarete morikara moriheto miwo kakusiteita maeouraupepano motoni aruyorukano hukusinno itisyuutyoukara siga kita 
myoutyounakani kikaga doituno zin'eini syuttousinakereba sarani ookina saikaga kono simani okorudearou unnun
isino yowai otokodehaattaga takasikono simano kizokunihusawasii ippenno dougisinwo uttehainakatta raupepaha suguni zikogiseiwo kakugosita 
sono yoruno nakani kareha apiano matini dete hisokani maeno hukuoukouhosyadeatta mataafani kaikensi yukini notikotowo takusita 
mataafaha raupepani taisuru doituno youkyuuwo sitteita 
raupepahahonno sibarakuno kandokukanni notte dokokahe rensararenebanaranu 
tadasi kanzyouni oiteha maeoutosite dekiru kagiri kouguusuruto doitukantyouga hosyousiteirukotowo mataafaha hukaeta 
raupepaha sinzinakatta 
kareha kakugositeita zibunha nidoto samoano tiwo humemaito 
kareha zensamoaninheno ketubetuno ziwo mitomete mataafani watasita 
hutariha namidano nakani wakare raupepaha doituryouzikanni syuttousita 
sono gogokareha dokukanbisumarukugouni noserare dokohetomonaku ritusatta 
kano ketubetuno ziha kanasiimonodeatta 
waga simato waga zensamoaninheno aino tameni yoha doituseihuno maeni mizukarawo toudasu 
karerahasono hossurumamani yowo guusurudearou 
yoha takasiki samoano tiga wareyueni hutatabi nagasarerukotowo nozomanu

aanayo

syuubouha mataafani atumatteita 
ikkiga soutuide okori mataafaha zibunno siranu mani sizensuitaino katatide hangunno syuryouninatteita 
sinouwo youritusuru doituto yukini tairitusuru eibei(kareraha betuni mataafani kouiwo yoseteita wakedehanaiga doituni taisuru taikouzyoukotogotoni sinouni tatetuita )tono aturekimo sidaini gekikasite kita

doituno gunkanha enganwo kaikousite hangunno burakuni taihouwobuti konda

imamade|hankamino gotoku mieta hakuzinga karerano kassyokuno eiyuuniyotte husaretanodakara 
tamaseseouha kaizyouni toubousi doituno sizisuru seihuha kanzenni tuieta 
hungekisita doituryouziha gunkanwo motiite simazentaini sukoburu kagekina syudanwo kuwaeyoutosita 
hutatabi eibeikotoni beikokuga syoumenkara yukini hantaisi kakkokuhasorezore gunkanwo apiani kyuukousasete zitaiha sarani kinpakusita

kano rekisitekina daisankaitihatihakkunenno dai|guhuuga syuuraisitanodearu 
souzouwo zessita daibouhuuugamaru ittyuuyatuduita notizenzituno yuugatamade|ikarihakusiteita rokusekino gunkanno tyuudaihasonwo ukenagaramo usagini kakusuimenni ukandeitanoha wazuka issekini suginakatta 
mohayatekimo mikatamonakunari hakuzinmo dozinmo itidantonatte hukkyuusagyouni isogasiku hataraita 
sino haigono miturinni hisondeita hangunno rentyuumadega matiya kaiganni dete kite sitaino syuuyouya husyousyano kangoni atta 
imaha doituninmo karerawo toraeyoutohasinakatta 
kono sankaha tairitusita kanzyouno ueni igaina yuuwawo seisita 
kono nentooku berurinde samoani kansuru mikunino kyouteiga seiritusita 
sono kekkasamoaha izenmeimokuzyouno ouwo itadaki ei kome dokumikunininkara naru seimuiinkaiga yukiwo tasukerutoiu keisikininatta 
kono iinkaino ueni tatubeki seimutyoukanto zensamoano sihoukenwo nigirubeki tiihu zyasuteisu(saibansyotyou)tokono hutarino saikoukanriha ousukara hakensarerukototonari matazigoouno sensyutuniha seimuiinkaino sanseiga zettaihituyouto sadamerareta 
onazi nen(itihatihakkunen)no kureninenmaeni dokukanzyouni sugatawo kesite iraimarude syousokuno sirenakatta maemaeouraupepagahyokkori syousuisita sugatade modotte kita

sikasi kano kaette kitanoha kairaino outosite hutatabi taterareru tamedeatta 
mosi ouno sensyutuga hituyoutoareba zyunzyokara ittemo zinbutuya zinboukara ittemo touzenmataafaga erabarubekidatta 
ga kano turuginiha fangariino kyoukokuni okeru doitusuiheino tisioga kinrareteiru 
doituninha minamataafano sensyutuni zettaihantaideatta 
mataafazisinmo betuni siite isogoutosinakatta

motomotoisino yowai otokoga ninenni wataru rurouno mani taezaru huanto kyouhutonotamenisukkari hakiwo utte simattakaradearu

seimuiinkaino sasizude iyaounasini raupepaga sokuisaseraretekara itigatumo hetanai nakani (mada nakano yokatta hutariga taihenodoroitakotoni )outo mataafano mano huwano uwasaga tutaerare dasita

koreniha ei kome dokuno kubetuhanakatta

daisyousetuieno odorokubeki seizitekimutiunnun
dauningumatino zokubututomono keibetumonotaru suteivunsunnokototote (katute daisaisyouguraddosutoonga takarazimano syohanwo motomete huruhonyawo asatteiruto kiita tokimo kareha sinzitukyoeisinwokusugurareru tokorodenaku nanika bakabakasiiyouna huyukaisawo kanziteita )seizitekizissaini utoinoha zizitudattaga syokuminseisakumo dotyakuno ningenwo aisurukotokara hazimeyotoiu zibunno kouga matigatteirutohadousitemo omoenakatta

mattaku imano seihuhahidoi

itazurani simatamino kanzyouwo togegekisite hakuzinno seimeizaisanwo kikenni sarasukarada 
hakuzinha dozinyorimo zeiwo osamenai 
inhuruenzasyouketu
matino dansubamo tozita 
vairerenouzyoudeha sitizyuuninno ninpuga itizini taoretato 
zyuunigatuXXnitiissakuzituno gozenkokoano syusisengohyakutuduite gogoni sitihyakutodoku 
issakuzituno syougokara kinouno yuukokumadeuti nakasoudedekono syokutukinikakarikkiri 
minna nazumamireninari verandaha airurandotutideitannumano gotosi 
kokoaha hazime kokoakino hade anda kagoni maku 
zyuuninno dozinga urano morino syousyade kono kagowo amu 
yoninno syounenga tutiwo hotte hakoni ire verandahe hakobu 
roidoto beru(isoberu)to watasitoga isiya nendokaiwohurutte tutiwo kagoni ireru 
oosuteinsyounento sitahasitameno faaumatoga sono kagowo faniino tokorohe motte iku

itihakkuninenitigatuXnitiame

kono kankara kyuuyouwotoru imide sousohuno gorokarano suteivunsunieno rekisiwo kakihazimeta 
daihenrakusii 
sousohuto sohuto sono sanninno musuko(watasino titiwomo hukumete )toga aitugiide mokumokuto kirihukaki kitasukottorandono umini toudaiwo kiduki tuduketa sono toutoi sugatawo omou tokiimasaranagara watasiha koni mitasareru 
daiha nantosiyou 
suteivunsunieno hitobitosukottorandoninno ieenziniiano ikkahoppouno toudaikazokusitoudaigisino ie
sohuga bonso souzouni zessuru konnanto tatakatte beru rokkuansyoumisakino toudaiwo tateta tokino kuwasii kirokuga nokotteiru 
sorewo yondeiru nakani nandaka zibunga (aruiha hituziuno waga )hontounisonna keikenwositakanoyouna kigasite kuru 
zibunha zibunga omotteiru hodozibundehanaku imakara hatizyuugonenmaehokkaino huuhaya umikirini kurusiminagara kantyouno tokidake sugatawo miseru kono mano misakito zissaini tatakattakotogaarunodato tasikanisou omoete kuru

mizuno tumetasa 
hasikeno yure 
umitorino kyou

totuzenmunewo yakareruyouna kigasita
