mizuumi
asayuubunnareta edeinbarasirono rappa
pentorandobaraheddokaakuuoorurasumisakiaa!watasino imairu tokoroha nan'izyuusandoseikeihyakusitizyuuitido
sukottorandotoha tyoudotikyuuno hantaigawananoda 
sititoudaigisino ieno zairyouwoizitteiru nakani nanzika suteivunsunha itiman|mairukanatano edeinbarano utukusii matiwo oboi dasiteita 
asayuuno kirino nakakara ukabi noboru okayasono ueni kituzentosite sobieru kozyoukakukara haruka hizirizyairusukyoukaino kanerouhekaketeno sakikutaru siruuettogaariarito meno maeni ukande kita 
osanai gorokarahidoku kikanno yowakatta syounensuteivunsunha huyuno akatukigotoni nanzimo hagesii sekino hossani osowarete biteirarenakatta 
kinobori ubano kamiini tasukerare mouhunikurumatte madogiwano isuni kosikakeru 
kamiimo syounento narande kake sekino sizumaru madetagaini damattezitto sotowo miteiru 
garasutokosini miru heriotto|toorihamada yorunomamade tokorodokoroni gaitougaboutto sinnde mieru 
yagate kurumano kisiru otogasi madono maewosuresureni sizyouikino yasaikurumano umaga siroi ikiwo haki haki tootte iku 
yukiga suteivunsunno kiokuni nokoru saisyono kono miyakono insyoudatta 
edeinbarano suteivunsunieha daidaitoudaigisitosite kieteita 
syousetukano sousohuni ataru tomasu sumisu suteivunsunha kitaeitoudaikyokuno saisyono gisityoudearisono korobaatomo matasono syokuwo tuide yuumeina beru rokkuno toudaiwo kensetusita 
robaatono sanninno musukoarandeividdotomasumosorezore tugitugini kono syokuwo osotta 
syousetukano tititomasuha kaitentomosibisouhikarihansyakyouno kanseimonotosite touzitoudaikougakuno taitodeatta 
kareha sono kyoudaito kyouryokusite sukerivoatikkunsuwo hazime ikutukano toudaiwo kiduki ookuno kouwanwo syuurisita 
kareha yuunouna zissaitekikagakusyade tyuuzituna daieikokuno gizyutukande keikenna sukottorandokyoukaino sintodekano kirisutokyouno kikerotoiwareru rakutanteiusuno aidokusyade matakottouto himawaritono aikousyadatta 
kano musukono sirusu tokoroniyoreba tomasu suteivunsunha tuneni zikono katini tuite zindasiku hiteitekina kouwo daki kerutotekina yuuutuwo motte taezu siwo omoi muzyouwo kanziteitatoiu 
koukina kototo sokoni sumu syuukyoutekina hitobito(kano kazokuwomo hukumete )towo seinenkino robaato ruuisu suteivunsunha hagesiku ken'osita 
puresubiterianno tyuusintaru kono miyakoga kareniha kotogotoku gizenno huto mietanodearu 
zyuuhatiseikino kouhankono miyakoni deiikon burodeinaru otokogaita 
hirumaha sasimonosiwoyari sikaigiinwo tutometeitaga yoruninaruto ippensite tobakumonotonari kyouakuna goutoutonatte katuyakusita 
ooitahisasii notini yauyaku kenrete syokeisaretagakono otokokoso edeinbarazyouryuuninsamuraino syoutyoudato hatatino suteivunsunha kangaeta 
kareha kayoi nareta kyoukaino kawarini sitamatino sakabahe kayoi dasita 
musukono bungakusyasibousengen(titiha hazime musukowomo enziniiani sitateyouto kangaeteitanodaga )hadounika yukiwo mitome eta titioyamosono haikyoudakeha yurusenakatta 
titioyano zetubouto hahaoyano namidato musukono hungekino nakani oyakono syoutotuga sibasibakurikaesareta 
zibunga hametuno hutini otitteirukotowo satorenai hodoimada kodomodearisikamo titino kyuuno kotobawo uketukeyoutosinai hodoseizinninatteiru musukowo mite titioyaha zetubousita 
kono zetubouha amarini naiseitekina kano ueni kimyouna katatitonatte kenreta 
kikaikano souno notikareha mohayamusukowo semeyoutosezuhitasurani waga miwo semeta 
kareha hitori hizamaduki naite inori onoreno itarazaru yueni segarewo kamino zainintositakotowo mizukara hagesiku seme katu kamini wabita 
musukono houdeha kagakusyataru titiga nazekonna orokasii tokorookonawo enzurunokadousitemo rikaidekinakatta 
soreni kareha titito souronsitaatodeha nanzimodousite oyano maeni deruto sinna kodomoppoi gironsika dekinakunarunodaroukato zibundeiyaninatte simaunodearu 
yuuzinto hanasiaitteiru tokinaraba sassoutosita (sukunakutomo seizinno )gironno rippani dekiru zibunnanoni yukiha ittaidousita wakedarou 
mottomo gensitekina katekizumuyoutina kiseki|hanbakuronmottomo kodomo|gisino seturetuna reiwo motte syoumeisarenebanaranai musinron
zibunno sisouha sinna youtinamonodearu hazuhanainonito omounodaga titioyato mui auto nanzimo kekkyokuhakonna kotoninatte simau 
titioyano ronpouga masareteite konokataga makerutoiunodeha moutounai 
kyougini tuiteno saitina sisakunadowosita kotononai titioyawo ronpasurunoha kiwamete youidanonisono youina kotowoyatteiru nakani nanzino manika zibunno taidoga warenagara enninaru hodokodomoppoi hisuterikkuna sunetamonotonari gironno naiyousonomono madega kasinamononinatteirunoda 
titini taisuru amaega imada zibunni nokotteori (toiukotoha zibunga imada hontouni seizindenaku )sorega titiga zibunwomada kodomoto miteirukototo sousittekousita kekkawo seisunodarouka 
soretomo zibunno sisouga ganraikudaranai mizyukuna syakumonodeattesorega titino sobokuna sinkouto taitisarete sono massyoutekina sousyokububunwo hakusarareru tokisono hontouno sugatawo arawasunodarouka 
sono gorosuteivunsunha titito syoutotusitaatode nanzimo ketuttekono hukaina gimonwo atanebanaranakatta 
suteivunsunga faniito kekkonsuru isiwo akirakanisita tokihusino kanha hutatabi kensiimonotonatta 
tomasu suteivunsunsinitotteha faniiga beikokuzindeari komotideari tosiuedearukotoyorimo zissaihadouarouto usagini kakukanozyoga kosekino uede genzaiosuboonhuzindearukotoga daiitino nantendattanodearu 
wagamamana hitorimusukoha nenhasanzyuunisite hazimete zikatusoremo faniitosono kodomomadeyasinau kessinwosite eikokuwo hidasita 
husino kanha onsinhutuutonatta 
itinenno notinanzen|mairuhedateta umito rikuno kanatade musukoga gozyuu|senno tyuusyokunimo kotokakinagara byouto tatakatteirukotowo nindenni kiita tomasu suteivunsunsiha sasugani kotaerarenakunatte kyuuno tewo sasinobeta 
faniiha beikokukara mikenno syuutoni zibunno syasinwo okuri kakisoete itutta 
zitubutuyorimozutto yoku toreteorimasu yuekessite kono tooritoo omoi kudasaimasenuyou 
suteivunsunha tumato gikotowo turete eikokuni kaette kita 
igainakotoni tomasu suteivunsunsiha segareno tumani taihenmanzokusita

itidouha omoi omoino siseide nessinni kikitoreteiru 
dokuowarutotendeni iroirona tyuubunya hihyouwo zidasu 
hitobangotoni kyoumiwo masite kite titioyamadega birii boonzuno hakono nakano hinmokusakuseiwo zyumotouto gendasita 
gosuha gosude matabetuno kotowo kangaenagara anzentaru kimotide kono kouhukusouna danranwo nagameteita 
kono hanayakana syunsaino musibamareta nikutaiha hatasite nanzimademotudarouka

yakusokuyuemurinuunomisuborasiki oukyuuhe gotisouninarini iku

kyouno raupepano hanasiha omosirokatta

sobokuna hyougenga kokorowo utta

nagai koukaino notihitotuno minatoni tuita 
zyourikusuruto osorosiku atui totide asikubiwo hutarizutu tetuno kusaride tunagareta syuuzinnadoga hataraiteita 
sokoniha hamano masagonoyouni kazuookuno kokuzingaita 
sorekara mataooitahuneni nori doitumo tikaito iwareta gorohusigina kaiganwo mita 
miwatasu kagiri massirona gakega youni kagayaiteirunoda 
sanzikanmo hetutosorega tenni kiete simattanode sarani odoroita 
doituni zyourikusitekara nakani kisyatoiumonono takusanhaitteiru garasuyaneno kyokina tatemonono nakawo aruita 
sorekara iemitaini madoto dekkitonoaru basyani nori gohyakumo heyanoaru ieni tomatta 
doituwo hanarete ooitakoukaisitekara kawano youna semai umiwo hunegayukkuri susunda 
seisyono nakade kiiteita koukaidato osierare kinbasii koukisinde nagameta 
sorekara umino uewo yuuhino syokuga mabusiku akaakato nagareru zikokuni betuno gunkanni zyouuturaserareta 
hurui utukusii samoagono hatuondeyukkuriyukkuri katarareru kono hanasiha taihenomosirokatta 
ouha watasiga mataafano meiwo kutini dasukotowo kureteirurasii 
hanasisukina ninno yoi rouzinda 
tada genzaino zibunno itini tuiteno zikakuga nainodearu

siti|mairuno kanzutto dosyakou
deinei
umano keini tassuru zassou
butasyousyano sakumo hatitokorohodohikosu 
marieni tuita tokiha sudeni hakubo
marieno muraniha soutourippana minkagakanari aru 
takai doomukatano meyanewomoti tokoni koisiwo siita sihouno kabeno akeppanasino tatemonoda 
mataafano iemo sasugani rippada 
ieno nakaha sudeni kuraku yasikarano tomosibiga tyuuouni tomotteita 
yoninno mesitukaiga dete kite mataafaha imareihaidouniirutoiu 
sono hougakukara utagoega morete kita 
yagate syuzingahaitte raiwarewarega nureta kimonowo kaetekara seisikino aisatuari 
kavasakega deru 
retuzano syo|syuutyouni mutte mataafaga yowo syoukaisuru 
apiaseihuno hantaiwo okasite yo(mataafa)wo tasukenga tameni utyuuwo hase kurisi zinbutunareba kyounadoha igotusitarato sitasimi ikanaru baainimo yukini enzyowo osimubekarazu

deinaaseidankanwaraikavayahanmadetuduku

nitibotukara nitino demade kareraha mukoutaidearu

kokoroyoi neiroda 
nagoyakani amaku syouirisounaatode kikuto kono hueha maiasakimatte kono zikokuni hukarerukotoninatteirunodasouda 
ieno nakani nemureru mononi yoki yumewo okuranga tameni 
nantaru yuugana zeitaku!mataafano titiha kotorino outoiwareta kuraisyoukintomono koewo itositeitasoudaga sono tiga karenimo tutawatteirunoda

butano maruyakiwo zuzyouni sinmawasinagara takino youna asewo nagasite sakendeiru arisamaha soukandearu 
warewareno zisansita bisukettono kanto tomoni arii tusitara o re arii o maro tetere(monogatarisakusyasyuutyou taiseihuno syuutyou)to syoukaisareru koewo watasiha kiita

sukosi kurai kennoaru sono yokogaoha dantenisokkurida

kano bouniha musukoya douryoutatiga matteiru

suteivunsunnante kekkyokutuuzokusakkasa 
to ookuno ningasou iu 
sikasi suteivunsunno aidokusyaha kessitesoreni kotaeru kotobani kyuusihasinai 
kenmeina suteivunsunno syugotensi(sono mitibikiniyotte karega sakkataru kano unmeiwo tadottanodaga )ga kano zyumyouno mizikaidearoukotowo sitte (nanninnitottemo sizyuutosiizenni sono kessakuwo umukotoga osorakuha hukanoudearou tokorono )ningensei|tekiketuno kindaisyousetumitiwo sutesasesono kawarini kono zyounaku miryokuni tonda kaikina monogatarino kouseitosono takumina wahoutono syuurenni (yukinaraba karireisouseisitemo sukunakutomo ikutukano yoki utukusikimonoha nokoseyou )muwasetanodearuto

)sitagatte sono syuzinkoutaru zikono sumu hun'ikiha tuneni kano syousetuni okeru youkyuuto onaziku siwomottamono romansutekikoukani tondamonodenakerebanaranakatta 
hun'ikibyousyano ooyataru kareha zisseikatuni oite zibunno koudousuru bamenbamenga tuneni kano reimyouna byousyano hudeni ataisuru hodonomonodenakereba gamanganaranakattanodearu

nanno tameni suikyounimo robananka turete minami|huransuno yamano nakawourotukanebanaranuka

isyahatada itizitekino kutuuwo tutusimete kurerudakeda 
isyaha kanzyano nikutaino kosyou(ippanzinmano hutuuno seirizyoutaito hikakusiteno izyou)wo midasihasuruga sono nikutaino syougaitosono kanzyazisinno seisinseikatutono kanrentoka matasono nikutaino kosyouga sono kanzyano issyouno daikeisanno nakani oitedono teidono zyuuyousani mitumorarubekikanadoni tuiteha nanigotowomo siranunodearu 
isyano genninomi motoduite issyouno keikakuwo henkousitarisuru gotokiha nanto dakisubeki bussitusyugi nikutaibannousyugidearuka !nanihatomoare nanzino seisakuwo hazimeyo

)wo oboeteitanodearu

kodomono tokino mottomo sitasii yuudougudatta iti|hennara musaisyoku ni|hennara syokutukino kamisibai(sorewo ganguyakara katte kite iede kumitate aradeinya robin huddoya sanbonyubino zyakkuwo mizukara ensyutusite asobunodaga )no eikyoudearouka suteivunsunno sousakuha nanzidemo hitotu hitotuno zyoukeino soukikara hazimaru 
hazime hitotuno zyoukeiga ukabisono hun'ikinihusawasii zikenya seikakuga tugini ukabi atte kuru 
tugitugini nanzyuutoiu kamisibaino butaimenga sononadowo tunagu monogatariwo tomonatte atamano nakani araware mokuzenniariarito mieru sononadono hitotu hitotuwo zyunzyunni byousyasi tudukerukotoniyotte kano monogatariha makotoni tanosiku dekinoborunoda 
usupperade musyoukakuna R L S no tuuzokusyousetuto hihyoukanoiu tokoronomonoga 
hokano seisakuhouhoutatoeba hitotuno tetugakutekikannenwo reisyousentono mokutekino sitani zentaino kousouwo taterutoka hitotuno seikakuno setumeino tameni zikenwo sakuagerutokaha kareniha zenzenkangaerukotomo dekinakatta 
suteivunsunnitotte robouni miru hitotuno zyoukeiha imada nanninniyottemo kirokusarezaru hitotuno monogatariwo kataru gotokuni omowareta 
hitotuno kaohitotuno motosinmo douyouni sirarezaru monogatarino hottanto mieta 
manatuno yoruno yumeno monkudehanaiga sononadomeito tokorotowo atanumononi meikakuna hyougenwo ataerunoga sizinsakkadatosureba suteivunsunha tasikani umarenagarano monogatarisakkani tigainai 
hitotuno huukeiwo mitesorenihusawasii zikenwo atamano nakani kumitaterukotoha karenitotte kodomono tokikara syokuyokuto onazi kuraini tuyoi honnoudatta 
korintonno (hahakatano )sohuno tokorohe iku tokiha nanzimo sono henno moriya kawaya suisyani aisouna monogatariwo kosiraete ueivari novurusunakano syozinbutuwo tateyokoni katuyakusasetamonoda 
gai manaringuya robu roiya andoruu feasaavisunadowo 
souhakuihiyowana syounenno gorono sono kusega imadani nukekiranai 
toiuyorimo awarena daisyousetuieR L S siha kausita youtina kuusouigaini sousakusyoudouwo siranainodearu 
kumonoyouni yuuokoru kuusoutekizyoukei
mangekyouno gotoki kagezouno ranbu
sorewo mita mamani utusi dasu 
(dakaraatoha gikoudakeno mondaida 
sikamo sono gikouniha zyuubunzisingaatta 
)yukiga kano yuiitumunino kono zyounaku tanosii seisakuhouhoudeatta 
yukiniha yoimo waruimonai 
hokani houhouwo siranainodakara 
nanto iwareyoutomo oreha oreno iki houwo kositusite oreno monogatariwo kakudakenokotoda 
zinseiha mizikai 
ningenha syosenPulvisetUmbrazya 
naniwo kurusinde kakiya koumoritomono kini irutameni omosirokumonai sinkokuna syakumonono sakuhinwo kakukotogaarou 
oreha oreno tameni kaku 
tatoe hitorino dokusyaga nakunaroutomo oretoiu saidaino aidokusyagaaru kagiriha 
aisubeki R L S sino dokudanwo miyo !zizitusakuhinwo kakioeruya hiya kareha sakusyatarukotowo tomete sono sakuhinno aidokusyaninatta 
dareyorimo nessinna aidokusyani 
karehamarudesorega hokano dareka (mottomo sukina sakka)no sakuhindearukanoyounisosite sono sakuhinno purottomo kiketumo nanimo siranai hitorino dokusyatosite kokorokara tanosiku dokuhukerunodearu 
sorega kondono taisioni kagitte gamannimo yomitudukerarenakatta

nikutaino suizyakuniyoru zisinno gentaidarouka

nagai kankono simano seisintekina ouzyadatta mataafano boturakuni taisite iubeki kotobawo siranu

sagesumubeki kisyoukansokusya!tyuusyokugomatihe 
byouinhe itte mitara uru(haiwoyarareta syuutyouno mei)hamada husigini ikiteita 
harawoyarareta otokoha sudeni sindeita 
zantorareta zyuuitino kubiga murinuuni motikomareta 
dozinnadono ooini odoroki kuretakotoni sono kubino hitotuha syouzyonodeatta 
sikamo savaiino aru murano taupou(murawo daihyousuru utukusii musume)no kubidatta 
nankaino kisiwo motte ninzuru samoaninno mani owatte yukiha yurusubekarazaru boukoudearu 
kono kubidakeha saizyounadono kinuni tutumare teineina tinsyazyouto tomoni sassokumariehe okuri kaesaretasouda 
syouzyoha titino tedenni danyakudemo hakondeita tokorowo itaretamononi tigainai 
titioyano kabutono kazari kenisuru tameni zibunno kamiwo kattarasiku otokono youna kariagedattanode kubiwo toraretanodatomoiu 
sikasi nanto kanozyono binihusawasiki erabaretaru saigodearisiyo !mataafano oino reaupepedakeha kubito douto ryouhoutomo hakobareta 
murinuuno oodooride raupepagasorewo etumisi bukano kourouni syasuru enzetuwosita 
nidomeni byouinni yotta tokikangohuya kangosotuha hitorimoizu kanzyano kazokudakedatta

|kamimo kono utageni kuwawari tamawankotowo 
kono atumarino utukusisayo !tadasi warewareno okuttanoha supitto ava(kava)to iwareru katouhinnanodaga 
tikagoromesitukaitomoga syousyounamakerunode (toittemo ippanno samoaninto kurabereba kessite taidatoha iemai 
samoaninha ippanni hasiranai 
vairimano siyounindakeha betudaga 
to itutta itihakuzinno kotobani watasiha kowo kanzuru 
)tarorono tuuyakude karerani kogotowo itutta 
itibannamaketa otokono kyuuryouwo hangensuru munegenwatasita 
sono otokoha otonasiku unazuitetereta warai houwosita 
hazimete kokohe kita goromesitukaino kyuuryouwo roku|kokorozasigenzitara sono otokoha suguni sigotowo tometa 
sikasi imadeha kareraha watasiwo syuutyouto minasiteirurasii 
kyuukinwo herasaretanoha teiatoiu rouzinde samoaryouri(mesitukaitatino tameno )no kokkudaga zituni kanpekitoitteii kuraimigotona huubouno motinusida 
mukasinankaini takesimeiwo todorokasita samoasensino tenkeito omowareru taikuto youbouda 
sikamo yukiga hasinimo bounimokakaranai yamasidearoutoha !zyuunigatuXnitikaiseiosorosiku atui 
kangokuno syuutyoutatini manekare gogoyakeruyouna si|mairuhanwo kizyougokutyuuno utageni omomuku 
senzituno henreino imika 
kareraha zibuntatino ura(sinkuno syusiwo takusanoni tousita keisyoku)wo hazusite watasino keini kakete kure warerano yuiituno tomoto watasiwo yobu 
gokutyuunomonotositeha sukoburu ziyuuna sakanna utagedeatta 
hanamusirozyuusanmaiutiwasanzyuumaibutagotougyoruino yamataroimono sarani ookina yamawo miyagetosite morau 
totemo motikirenaikarato kotowaruto karerano iwakuiya zehiyukinadonomonowo tunde raupepaouno ieno maewo tootte kaette kudasai

to 
watasino keini kaketa uramo motomotoraupepano hosigatteitamonodasouda 
ouhenoatetukega syuuzinsyuutyounadono mokutekino hitotunanoda 
okurimonono yamawo kurumani tumi akai keikazariwo tuke umani matagatte saakasuno gyouretuyorosiku watasiha apiano matino gunsyuuno kyoutanno nakawo yuuto kaetta 
ouno ieno maewomo kayottaga hatasite karega sittowo oboetakadouka

tikagorohikituduite monteenyuno dainikanwo yondeiru

soreha zizituda 
sikasisoredemo takasiwatasiha syousetuga syomotuno nakade saizyou(aruiha saikyou)nomonodearukotowo utagawanai 
dokusyaninoriuturi sono tamasiiwo ubai sono titonari nikuto kasite kanzenni kyuusyuusare tukusunoha syousetuno hokaninai 
hokano syomotuniatteha nanikasira nensyousikirezuni nokorumonogaaru 
watasiga imasuranpuni zenideirunoha hitotuno kotowatasiga kono mitini gennai kowo kanzurunoha hokano kotodearu 
dozinhakuzinno ryouhouni okeru huzinbouto souzokuku hunsouni taisuru insekitode tuini seimutyoukanfon piruzahhaga zisyokusita 
saibansyonagamo tikaku yameru hazu
mesitano tokorokano houteiha sudeni tozirareteiruga kano pokettonomihamada houkyuuwo ukerubeku hirakareteiru 
kano kouninha iidasito naiteino yu
tonikaku sinseimutyoukanraininmadeha mukasinoyouni eibeidokuryouzino sanatamaseizida 
aanano houmenni boudouno okorisouna keiseigaaru 
zyuugomataafaga yaruutohe nagasareta notimo dominno ikkiha taenakatta 
itihakkusannenno kurekatuteno samoaoutamaseseno iziga toupuazokuwo hikiite heiwo ageta 
syoutamaseseha ouoyobi zenhakuzinno simasotohoutiku(aruiha senmetu)wo hyoubousite ottanodaga kekkyokuraupepaou|kikano savaiiseini zemerare aanade tuieta 
hangunni taisuru tokorobatutositeha zyuugozyuu|tenno bossyuuminouno zeikintyousyuunizyuu|mairuno dourokouzinadoga kaseraretani suginakatta 
maeno mataafano baaino genbatuto kurabete amarinimo hukouheidearu

suteivunsunha matamuekina kougiwo katagatani mutte kokoromita 
syoutamaseseni genbatuwo ataeyotoiunodeha motironnai 
mataafano genkeiwo motometanoda 
hitobitoha mohayasuteivunsunga mataahuano meiwo kutini dasuto waraidasuyouninatta 
soredemo karehamukininatte hongokuno sinbunya zassini samoano zizyouwo kurikaesi kurikaesi uttaeta 
kondono sawaginimo yatyoukubikariga sakanni okonawareta 
kubikarihantaironmonono suteivunsunha sassokukubiwo zantotta mononi taisuru tokorobatuwo youkyuusita 
kono ranno hazimaru tyokuzenni sinninno tiihu zyasuteisuno iidasiga gikaiwo tuuzite kubikarikinsireiwo dasiteirunodakara yukiha touzendearu 
sikasi kono tokorobatuha zissainiha okonawarenakatta 
suteivunsunha huntta 
simano syuukyoukatomoga angaikubikarini tuite mukansinnanonimo kareha harawo tateta 
mesitano tokorosavaiizokuha aku madekubikariwo kositusiteiruga tuamasangazokuha kubino kawarini mimiwo zantorudakede gamansiteirunoda 
katuteno mataafano gotokiha bukani hotondo zettaini kubiwo torasenakatta 
doryokuhitotude kanarazu kono akusyuuha konzetudekirunodato kareha kangaeteita 
tuedarukurantuno sisseinoatowo uke kondono tiihu zyasuteisuha sidaini hakuzinya dozinno mani okeru seihuno sinyouwo kaihukusitutuarukani mieta

utino morino nakani boutamitomoga ooku atumatteirurasiikara sikyuukite hosii munekakareteiru 
senaside pisutoruwo tazusae rafaereto tomoni kudarite iku 
totyuude faniino atte kurunoni au 
issyoni ieni iri kimino warui itiyawo akirakasu 
tanungamanonono houkara syuuyataikoto kanseitoga kieta 
haruka sitano matideha gekkou(gatuha osoku deta )no sitade kyouranwo enziteitayouda 
utino morinimo tasikani domintomoga hisondeirurasiiga husigini sawaganai 
hissorisiteiru houga kaette bukimida 
gatuno denai maeikarihakunakano dokukanno saatiraitoga souhakui habahirono koubouwo yamisorani senkaisasete utukusikatta 
tokoni tuitaga keibuno riumatisuga otte nakanakanemurenai 
kyuudomeni netukoutosita tokiayasii sinkoega genanheyano houkara kieta 
keiwo osae pisutoruwo motte genanheyahe iku 
minna imada okiteite suuipi(karutatobaku)woyatteiru 
bakamonono misiforoga makete oogesana sinkoewo hassitanoda

koueinari 
biityamuno syougaiha imanao nankaini okeru waga aidokusyono hitotuda 
mainitioosuteinsyounenno tameni rekisino kougiwositeiruhoka saikinnitiyougakkouno senseiwomositeiru

bakusutaato koruvintono rituande watasino zensyuuwo dasouto tyatoo ando uindasusyakara itutte kuru 
sukottono sizyuuyamakino ueivari novuruzuto onazi youna sekisyokuno souteide zennizyuukansenbugenteibantosi watasino kasiramoziwo sukasi irinisita tokubetuno yousiwo tukaunodasouda

watasino imano ninki(
)ga nanzimadetudukumonoka watasiha siranai

karerano hihanha kenmeinanoka orokasiinoka

sikamo genzituno kareraga girinimo kenmeitoierudarouka

yatyoukarerano tameni karerani yonde morau tameni kakunoda 
sono nakano masareta syousuusyano tameninadotoiunoha akirakani usoda

sikamohidoku kutioku

miyo 
korega oreno itida 
oreha morino nakani sumu ippeibonzindanoni nanto kareraga orehitoriwo meno tekiniyakkitonarukotoka !kareraga maisyuukurikaesite oreniha seiryokuga naito huityousenebanaranu hodooreha seiryokuwo atteiru wakeda 
kougekiha matikarabakaridehanai 
umiwo koete haruka kanatakaramoyatte kuru 
konna hanare simaniitemo takasihihyoukatomono koeha todokunoda 
nanto iroirona kotowo iu yatuga ooikotoda !omakeni homeru monomo kenasu monomo tomoni gokaino ueni tatteirunodakara yari kirenai 
houhenni kouwarazu usagini kakuwatasino sakuhinni kanzenna rikaiwo simesite kurerunoha henrii zieimuzukurainomonoda 
(sikamo kareha syousetukadeatte hihyoukadehanai 
)masareta kozinga aru hun'ikino nakani aruto kozintositeha souzoumo dekinuyouna syuudantekihenkenwo atuni itarumonodatoiu kotoga kausite kurueru gunyori tooku hanareta tiiniiruto zituni yoku wakaruyouna kigasuru

aru taneno bungakuni tuiteha yukiha hontoukamo sirenu

yorosii

to 
tokorode nittyuuno yukaini bikikaete yoruno hirouto nikutaitekikutuutoha mattakuhidokatta 
hisasiburini atukotonodekita tanosii tuitatino atodakeni kono handouhasukkari watasino kokorowo kurakusita 
mukasiwatasiha zibunnosita kotoni tuite koukaisitakotohanakatta 
sinakatta kotoni tuitenomi nanzimo koukaiwo kanziteita 
zibunno erabanakatta syokugyouzibunno aetesinakatta (sikasi tasikanisuru kikainoatta )bouken
zibunnobutukaranakatta syusyuno keikensononadowo kangaerukotoga yokuno ooi watasiwoirairasasetamonoda 
tokoroga tikagoroha mohayasousita kouiheno zyunsuina yokukyuuga sidaininakunatte kita 
kyouno hirumanoyouna kumorinonai kanbimomou nidoto otozurerukotoganainodehanaikato omou 
yorusinsituni sirizoitekara hirounotamenositukoi sekiga zensokuno hossanoyouni hagesiku okori matakansetuno itamigazukizukito osotte kurunituketemoiyademosou omowanai wakeni ikanai 
watasiha nagaku iki sugitanodehanaika 
izennimo itidosiwo omoutakotogaaru 
faniino notiwo oute kariforuniamadewatatte raikyokudono hinkonto kyokudono suizyakutono nakani yuuzinya nikusintono koutuumo issaitataretamama kuwakouno hinminkutuno gesyukuni singinsiteita tokinokotoda 
sono tokiwatasiha sibasibasiwo omouta 
sikasi watasiha sono tokimadenimada waga uno kinenhitomoiubeki sakuhinwo kaiteinakatta 
sorewo kakanai nakaha nantositemo sinarenai 
soreha zibunwo hagemasi zibunwo sasaete kite kureta toutoi yuuzintati(watasiha nikusinyorimo mazu yuuzintatinokotowo kangaeta 
)heno bouondemoaru 
sore yuewatasiha syokuzinimo kotokakuyouna hibino nakade hawo syokusibarinagara paviriyon on za rinkusuwo kaitanoda 
tokoroga imahadouda 
sudeni watasiha zibunni dekirudakeno sigotowo hatasite simattanodehanaika 
sorega kinenhitosite masaretamonokadoukaha wakatosite watasiha usagini kakukakerudakenomonowo kakitukusitanodehanaika 
murinikono situyouna sekito zennato kansetuno toutuuto kakketuto hiroutono nakade namawo hikinobasubeki riyuuga dokoniarunoda 
byoukiga kouiheno kikyuuwo zetutte iraizinseitoha watasinitotte bungakudesikanakunatta 
bungakuwo tukurukoto 
soreha kanbidemonaku kurusimidemonakusorehasoretoyori iiyounonaimonodearu 
sitagatte watasino seikatuha kouhukudemo hukoudemonakatta 
watasiha kaikodeatta 
kaikoga mizukarano satihukouni kouwarazu mayuwo musubazuniirarenaiyouni watasiha kotobano itowo motte monogatarino mayuwo musundadakenokotoda 
sate awarena yameru kaikoha yauyakusono mayuwo tukuri otta 
kano seizonniha mohayananno mokutekimo naidehanaika 
iyaaru 
to yuuzinno hitoriga itutta 
henkeisurunoda 
ganinatte mayuwo syokuyabutte hidasunoda 
koreha taihenkekkouna hiyuda 
sikasi mondaiha watasino seisinnimo nikutainimo mayuwo syokuyaburudakeno tikaraga nokotteirukadoukadearu 
zyuusitiitihakkuyonenkugatuXnitikinouryouribanno kuroroga gihuga hokano syuutyoutatito issyoni asitananika gosoudanni noborusoudesu 
to itutta 
kano gihuroupoeha mataafagawano seizihanwarewarewo gokutyuuno kavano utageni maneite kureta syuutyounadono hitorida 
kareraha sengetuno matuyauyaku syakuhousaretanodearu 
poeno nyuugokunakaha watasimo soutoumendouwo misaserareta 
isyawo gokutyuuni muketeyattari byoukinotametote karisyutugokuno tetudukiwositeyattari sainyuugokuno notiha matahosyakukinwo haratteyattarisitanodearu 
kesapoega hokano hatininno syuutyouto tomoniyatte kita 
kareraha kituensituni iri samoaryuuni kurumazaninatte sonnda 
karerano daihyousyaga hanasi hazimeta 
warewareno zaigokutyuutusitaraha ippounaranu douzyouwo warewareni yoserareta 
imaya zibuntatimoyatto muzyoukende syakuhousareta wakedaga nantokasite tusitarano kouzyouheno syaiwo arawasitaito syutugokunotisuguni minade soudansita 
tokorode warewareyori sakini syutugokusita hokano syuutyounadono nakanihasono syakuhousareru tokino zyoukentosite imatakasiseihuno dourokouzini tukawareteiru monoga zuibuniru 
sorewo mite warewaremo tusitarano ieno tameni dourowo tukutte yukiwo kokorokarano okurimonotosiyouto soudanga ikketusitanodaga zehitomo kono okurimonowo ukete morai doi 
to 
koudouto watasino ietowo tunagu dourowo tukuroutoiunodearu 
dozinwo yoku sitteiru mononara daresimo kakaru hanasiwo amariateni dekinaito omounodaga usagini kakuwatasiha kono sarudeni hizyouni kangekisita 
daga miwoiuto yukiha watasizisinga douguya syokuziya kyuukin(yukiha senpoudeha iranaitoiudarouga kekkyokurouzinya byouzyakumonoheno imonno katatideyaranebanarumai )notameni sukunakaranu kinwo tukawanebanaranukotoninarunoda 
sikasi karerahanao kono keikakuno setumeiwo susumeta 
karerasyuutyoutatihakorekara zibunno burakuni ritukaeri itizokuno nakakara hataraku monowo atumete kuru 
seinenno itibuha apiasini bootowo motte kite sumi kaigandooriwo tootte hataraku rentyuuni syokuryouwo kyoukyuusuru yakuwosuru 
dougudakeha vairimade tugousite morauga kessite okurimonowosite morawanaikoto nado
yukiha odorokubeki hisamoatekikinrouda 
mosi yukiga zissaini okonawarerutosureba osoraku kono simadeha zendaimimondearou 
watasiha karerani atuku syaziwo nobeta 
watasiha karerano daihyousya(kono otokowo watasiha kozintekini yoku siranai )to menwo awasete kosikaketeita 
kano kaoha hazimeno aisatuno tokiha kiwamete hokatokoroikideattaga susunde tusitaraga karerano gokutyuudeno yuiituno tomodeattakotowo kataru danninaruto kyuuni moeru youna zyunsuina kanzyouwo tuyusitakani omowareta 
zikotudehanaitumorida 
porinesianinno kamenmattaku yukiha hakuzinniha kyouni tokenai taiheiyouno nazodagaga kakumo kanzenni datusuteraretanowo watasiha mitakotoganai 
kugatuXnitikaisei
asahayaku kareraga kita 
takumasii kaoritumo zinzyouna seinenbakariga sorotteiru 
kareraha tadatini waga sindoumitino kouzini tyakusyusita 
roupoeha sukoburu zyoukigen
kono keikakude zyakukaettayouni mieru 
sikirini zyoudanwo ii vairimano kazokuno tomonarukotowo seinennadoni kozisurukano gotoku katagataaruki mawatteiru

yukidakede zyuubunda 
kokoromini omoe 
yukiha dourokouzisamoaninno mottomo imi kiraumono 
kono totideha zeino toritateni tuide hanranno gen'intonarumono 
kinsenwo mottesitemo keibatuwo mottesitemo youini karerawo sasoukotono dekinai dourokouzinanoda

watasiha uresii 
zissaikodomonoyouni uresiinoda

samoanintositeha odorokubeki kinbento sokudotodeatta 
kausita baainiarigatino burakumano arasoimo hotondo okoranakatta 
suteivunsunha kouzikanseikinenno utagewo hanayakani haritaito omotta 
kareha hakuzinto dozintowo towazu simano syudatta hitobitoniha nokorazu syoutaizyouwo okutta 
tokorode odoroitakotoni utageno nitiga tikadukuniture hakuzinoyobi hakuzinni sitasii dozintatino itibukara karega uketotta henziha kotogotoku kotowari zyoudatta 
kodomono gotoku muzyakina suteivunsunno yorokobino utagewo motte kareraha minaseizitekina kikaito minasitumari karega hantowo kyuuawasi seihuni taisuru atarasii tekiiwo sakuageyoutositeiruto kangaetanodearu 
kareto mottomo sitasii suuninkaramo riyuuha kakazuni syussekidekinai munewo itutte kita 
utageha hotondo dozinbakariga kurukotoninatta 
soredemo ressekisyaha obitadasii kazuni atta 
touzitusuteivunsunha samoagode kansyano enzetuwosita 
suuzitumaeeibunno genkouwo aru bokusino tokoroheyatte tutigoni honyakusite morattamonodearu 
kareha mazu hatininno syuutyoutatini atuku syaziwo nobe tuide kousyuuni kono utukusii sarudeno nasareta zizyouto keikatowo setumeisita 
zibunga hazime kono sarusyutuwo kotowaroukato omottakoto 
soreha kono kuniga mazusiku kigani odosareteori matagenzaikarerasyuutyoutatino ieya burakuga nagai mano syuzinno huzainotameni seiriwo hituyoutositeirukotowo zibunga yoku sitteirukaradatoiukoto 
sikasi kekkyokuyukiwo uketanoha kono kouzino ataeru kyoukunga issenhonno panno kiyorimo yuukoudato omottakarasorenikakaru utukusii kouiwo ukerukotoga nanimononimo masite tamaranaku uresikattakaradatoiukoto 
syuutyoutatiyo 
syokunga hataraite kudasarunowo miteite watasino kokoroha onkakunaru youna kigasimasita 
soreha kansyano nenkarabakaridenaku aru kiboukarademoarimasu 
watasiha sokoni samoano tameyokimonowo seisudearou yakusokuwo yondanodesu 
sunawati watasino saruagetainoha gaitekini taisuru yuukanna sensitositeno syokunno zidaiha sudeni ottatoiukotodesu 
imaya samoawo mamoru tohatada hitotu 
soreha dourowo tukuri kazyuenwo tukuri syokurinsi sononadono baihatiwo mizukarano tede umakuyarukoto 
hitokutiniieba zibunno kokudono tomigenwo zibunno tede kaihatusurukotodesu

savaiide 
uporude 
tutuirade 
syokunhasorewo butatomono zyuurinni makaseteirudehanaika 
butatomoha iewo yaki kazyuwo kiri kattehoudaiwositeirudehanaika 
kareraha makazaruni kari makazaruni syuukakureteorunoda 
sikasi kamiha kimitatino tameni samoano tinisorewo makaretanoda 
yutakana totito utukusiki taiyouto miti tarita ametowo kimitatini sazuke tamautanoda 
kurikaesite iukeredomo syokungasorewo tamotisorewo kaihatusinakerebayagate hokano mononi ubawarete simaunodesu 
syokunya syokunno sisonha minasotono kurayaminihouri dasare tadanakuyorihokahanakunarunodesu 
watasihaii kagenni itutteirunodehanai 
watasiha kono medesousita zitureiwo mite kitanodesu

sosite sononadono wadatiwohumanaitameni imakoso warewareha kinhundosiitibansubekidearuto

dakara watasino iukotowo kutisakidakeno keikaito omottehaikenainoda 
imaya syokunno ueni ookina kikiga sematte kiteiru 
imawatasino hanasita syominzokuno youna unmeiwo erabanebanaranuka aruiha yukiwo setunukete syokunno sisonga kono titisodenraino tide syokunno kiokuwo tataerukotoga dekiruyouninarukasono saigono kikiga sematteirunodesuzo 
zyouyakuniyoru totiiinkaito tiihu zyasuteisutoha kanmonaku ninkiwo kanryousurudesyou 
suruto totiha syokunni modosare syokunhasorewo ikani tukaouto ziyuuninarunodesu

ikanisite

)dareka zissaitekina tiiwo atu zinbutuga enkete kurenakereba dameda

watasiha narerukotoga dekinai

)keibetusi ken'osuru

kaidouno kamademiwatasitemo hitohitorimienakatta 
mitino migigawaha kansyohatakega midorino yuruyakana kihukuwo misetezutto kitamadetudukisono kaniha nennoboru nouaisyokuno taiheiyouga unmomatunoyouna syousiwawo tataminagara enku ookiku hukure atteita

ikiru tikaraga otoroeteiru hazuhanai 
tada saikintasyou|kouhunsi yasukunattakotoha zizitudesouiu zisuunenkanmarude boukyakusiteita sugatano aru zyoukeinadoga aburi dasino eno youni totuzenariarito sono syokuya nioya kagemade senyakani atamano nakani yomigatte kurukotogaaru

zyuuitigatuXnisseikamino izyouna kouyouto izyouna tinututoga kougoni otozureru 
soremohidoi tokiha tuitatini suukaikurikaesite 
kinouno gogosukooruga sugitaatono yuugataokano uewo kizyousiteita tokitotuzenaru koukotutarumonoga kokorowo kasumetayouni omotta

sikakubakaridehanai 
arayuru kankakukikanga itizini kintyousi aru tyouzetutekinamonoga seisinni yadottakotowo watasiha kanzita

watasiha hotondo kouhukudesaeatta 
sakuyawatasino uia ovu haamisutonha ooinihakadotta 
tokorode kesasono hidoi handouga kita 
inoatariga nibuku omokurusii kanzide kibunga saenakatta 
tukueni mutte sakuyano tudukiwo sigomaimo kaita gorowatasino hudeha tomatta 
gyounayande hooduewotuiteita tokihyoito hitorino mizimena otokono syougaino gen'eiga atamano nakawo toori sugita 
sono otokohahidoi haibyouyamide kibakari tuyoku hanazinaranai zikotuyade kizana mieboude sainoumonaikuseni itipasino geizyutukawo kidori yowai sintaiwo kokusisiteha sutairubakaride naiyouno nai dasakuwo kakimakuri zisseikatuni oiteha sono kodomoppoi kisyunotame kotogotoni hitobitono tyousyouwo kai kateino nakadeha tosiueno tumanotameni taezu appakuwo uke kekkyokuha nankaino kade naki doi hodohoppouno kokyouwo omoinagara mizimeni sinde iku 
tirarito issyunsenkounoyouni kausita otokono issyouno sugataga ukanda

gainende motte orewo keibetusuru yatumo zissaini oreno sakuhinwo yonde mireba monkunasini miserareruni ketutterunda

o maeno kakumononisonnani tumaranaimonoga dekiru hazuhanainoda

daiou|yasino kanni miwo sasae turauzite watasiha tatteita 
nanikasira aru huanto kitainoyounamonoga kokorono sumini waite kurunowo kanzinagara 
sakuyamo watasiha nagaikoto verandani dete arai kazetosoreni kouru amatubutoni miwosarasiteita 
kesamo kauyatte tuyoi kazeni sakaratte tatteiru 
nanika hagesiimono kyoubounamono arasinoyounamononiguttobuttukatte ikitainoda 
sousurukotoniyotte zibunwo hitotuno seigenno nakani heikometeiru karawo tatakitubusitainoda 
nantoiu kaisadarou !yondaino syunretuna isini sakaratte kumoto mizuto okatono mani kituzento hitori mezametearukotoha !watasiha sidaini hiroikkuna kimotininatte itta

nanika okoruni tigainai

nantoiu mazyutudarou !imamadeno haiirono sekaiha imaya nure hikaru sahuransyokuiousyokubarairotyoukosyokusyuirotorukotamasyokuorenzisyokugunzyousumiresyokubonte syusuno koutakuwo obita sononadono memo kuramu sikisaini someagerareta

issyunno kisekiwo gankani minagara watasiha imakoso watasino nakanaru yoruga tooku tonnogasi sarunowo kokoroyoku kanziteita 
kouzentosite watasiha ieni modotta 
nizyuuzyuunigatumikkano asasuteivunsunha nanzimono toori sanzikanbakari uia ovu haamisutonwo kouzyusite isoberuni hikkisaseta 
gogosyosinwo suutuusitatame yuugatatikaku daidokoroni dete kite bansanno sitakuwositeiru tumano boude zyoudankutiwokikinagara saradawo kakimazetarisita 
sorekara budousakewo toridasutote tikaihe kudarite itta

haizou|mahiwo tomonau nouikketuyukiga isino sindandeatta 
yokutyouvairimaha dozinno tyoumonkyakutatikara okurareta yaseino hana hana hanade umerareta 
roidoha zihatutekini kinrouwo sarudeta nihyakuninno dozinwo sikisite mimeikara vaeayamatenheno mitiwo syakuri takuiteita 
sono santyoukoso suteivunsunga seizenmaihoneno tito siteisite oita tokorodatta

tofa(nemure )!tusitara
arutokoroni seisituno itta simaigaarimasita 
onazi hahano harakara umaretatohadousitemo kangaerukotogadekinakattahododearimasu 
imoutohatuneni momoirono kimonowokiteimasita 
kiwamete kaikatuna seisitudearimasuga aneha haiirono kimonowokitekiwamete sizunda kutisuuno sukunai seisitudearimasita 
hutarihatomoni iewo demasukeredosugu monzenkara migito hidarini wakaretesimaimasu 
sositeitumoissyoniirukotohaarimasendesita 
imoutoha hirobirotosita nitinoyoku ataru noharaniikimasita 
sokonihamitubatiyatyouya kotorinadoga kanozyonokurunowo matteiruyouni tanosiku hanano uewo mattari sorawo kaketeii koedenaiteimasita 
iroirona syokuni saku hanamadega kanozyono sugatawo mirutoissou senyakani kagayaite mierunodearimasita 
imoutoha yawarakana kusano ueni kosiwo kudarosimasita 
sositesibarakuuttoritosite mino syuuini saiteiru hanayatyounizitto miitteimasitagasimainiha zibunmonanikano utawo kutizusamunodearimasita 
sono utahanannoutadearuka siranakattakeredokiiteiruto tanosikuukitatuutinimodokoka kanasiitokorogakomotteimasita 
imoutoha utanimoakitekuruto natukara akai itomakikiwo dasitesono itowo toite ginno boude amihazimeteimasita 
ginno bouha nitino hikarinikirakiratohiramekimasita 
akai itoha toketeha midorino kusano uenikakatteimasita 
aneha imoutoni wakarete hitori kitano houhe aruiteikimasita 
sokoha iti|danhikukugaketonatteimasu 
gakeno sitanihasabisii aki tigaattesokoniha nisan|honno yuuutuna zyoubankiga soranisobieteimasita 
sositesono kurozunda kodatino mani mazittenanno kika siranaikeredo makototu sirona hanaga saiteimasita 
sono siroi hanano syokuhahokano syokutotigatte tumetaku yukinoyouni mietanodearimasu 
anehagakewo oriteikimasita 
abunaugena mitigagakenihatuiteitanodearimasu 
sono aki tiniha huyuga nokotteimasita 
nitino hikarisurasasunowo saketeiruyouni samui kazega kurozunda zyoubankino edawoyusutteimasu 
aneha siroi hanano saita kino sitanitatazundeimasita 
sokonihanaku torino koemokikoenakerebamata tobimawatteirutyouno sugatamo miemasendesita 
atarihasintositeiru 
anehananiwo omoinaniwo kangaeteirunoka miugokisurasezuni damatte siroi hanano saku kino sitanitatazundeimasita 
anehazutto sekiga takakatta 
sosite kuroi kamiga nagaku kataatamakara tareteimasita 
kanozyoha yubisakidesono kamiwoizitteimasita 
sono kuroi kamihatuyatuyasinakattakeredonantonaku kuroihebinokarandayouni kimiwaruku miraretanodearimasu 
inkina aneha syoutokiha imoutonokotowo wasurerukotogadekinakatta 
tatoe kisituha itteitemosositekousiteirutokorosura betubetudeattemo imoutonokotowo wasurerukotogadekinakatta 
soreha kaikatuna imoutonitotteha meiwakunikoso omowarerugasukosimoarigatakunaibakaridenakudekirumononara eikyuuni anekara wakaretesimaitaito omottakotomoarimasu 
omaehamada nengaikanaiitukaha watasinoittakotogawakarutokigaaru 
to anehakatute imoutoni mukatteittakotogaarimasu 
neesandouka watasiwo ziyuunisasitekudasai 
watasiha neesannituiteirarerunoga kurusikutenarimasen 
to imoutogaiimasita 
suruto anehasabisisouna kaowosite sizundesukitooruyouna koedeitta 
itu watasihaomaewosonnani sokubakuwosimasitaka 
omaehadokohenaritokatteniikugaii 
keredoomaehasimainiha watasinotokorohe kaettekonakerebanaranai 
to anehaiimasita 
neesannaze watasihaanatanomotohe kaettekonakerebanaranainodesuka 
watasihasoregawakaranainodesu 
watasihakattenatokoroheikimasu 
sositemoukessiteanatanomotohe kaettehakimasen 
anataha watasitohamattaku seisituga awanaizyaarimasenka 
to imoutoha kotaeta 
iesorehanarimasen 
tatoeomaegadokoheittemo watasihaomaewo sagasi dasimasu 
kakuretemo nigetemosorehadamedesu 
watasihaomaegadokoniirukazikini sagasi dasukotogadekiru 
to anegaitta 
nantoiu syuunenhukai anedarouto imoutohasonotoki ritueagarazunihairaremasendesita 
umaretuki kaikatuna imoutomo anenoarukotowo omottatokiniha utaukotomoituka kumorazaruwo enakattanodearu 
aneha siroi hanano saku kino sitadenanika hukaku mimiwo sumasite kangaeteimasita 
sonotoki imoutohasonnakototoha sirazuni nessinni ginno bouwo ugokasiteita 
kouyawo koetekanataniha matigaarimasita 
sottikarahataezunigiyakana monootogakasukani sorawo nagaretekikoetekimasita 
imoutohasoreni mimiwo katamuketeitaga tati agarimasita 
sosite noharawo aruitesono otonokikoeru houhe aruiteimasita 
sonotokigakeno sitano siroi hanano saku kino sitanitatazundeita aneha sorawo gyouide imoutoha matiheitta 
toiimasita 
aneha siroi hanano saku kino sitakara hanarete zibunmo matino houhe aruiteikimasita 
imoutohadokoheittakasono sugataha miemasendesita 
kondobakariha anekara eikyuuni wakaretemou ienihakessite kaettekimaito omottanodesyou 
sorede aneni kidukarenaiyouni sugatawo kakusitesimattanodesu 
matihanigiyakadesita 
utukusiisosite kaikatuna imoutohadarekarademo yorokobaretanitigaiarimasen 
hitobitohaminna imoutowo kangeisitanitigaiarimasen 
koreni hansite inkinasabisii anehamatakessitedarekaramo aisarenakattanitigainai 
aneha hitori matino nakawosamayotte imoutonoiru basyowo sagasiteimasita 
hiroi ouraino yottu kakunotokoroni hanayagaarimasita 
onsituno nakaniha gaikokuno kusabanaga saki midareteimasita 
mata tentouno garasukono utigawaniha kurenai ao siro murasakinoiroirono hanagaii koukiwo hoututteimasita 
sono miseno maeniikuto aneha utigawawonozokimasita 
hanawo daisukina imoutohakokoni tati yottanitigaiganaito omottakaradearimasu 
keredosonotokiha naibuhasintosite hitokageganakatta 
tyoudosokohe goroku|ninno kodomoragayattekite garasukono utigawawonozoiteimasita 
mitino ueniha kiironatirihokorigakasukana kazenitatteimasita 
anehasono kodomorawonagameteimasita 
sono nakani hitorikawairasii otokono kogaarimasita 
damatte sinkuni saki hokottabotanno hanawo miteimasita 
anehananto omottaka asiotonosinaiyouni sizukanisono kodomonosobani tikadukimasita 
sosite koorinoyouni hiyakana kutibirude kodomonoringonoyounahooni seppunsimasita

kibunga warukunatta 
toitte kodomohaminnani wakarete ieni kaettesonomama taoretesimatta 
aneha hitori kokorono nakade hohoende matiwo sizukani aruite sarimasita 
sokoniha ookina gohukuyagaarimasita 
detari ituttarisuru hitobitodesokono monha kuroyamanoyounigiwatteimasita 
aneha ookuno hitobitono mani mazitte imoutohasono nakaniinaikato sagasitanodearimasu 
hadesukinasositekouiutokorowo konomu imoutohakittokokoni tati yottanitigainaito omottakaradearimasu 
imoutohamohayakokokarahokani satta atodeattakasono sugataha mienakattagatyoudo wakai utukusii onnaga tanmonowo kattesorewo daete yorokobinagara detekitatokorodesita 
anehananto omottakasono onnanosobani tikaduite hitomino nakawonozokimasita 
suruto nagai kurokamiga onnano katanikakarimasita 
imamadeikiikitositeuresisoudeatta onnaha kyuunisioretesimaimasita 
sosite kaokara tino kiga usete byoukinikakattayouni ninnitasukeraretekanatahe tureteikaremasita 
konotoki aneha zanninna waraiwo kaoniukabemasita 
sosite syourisyanogotokudokokahe sattesimaimasita 
sono nitino banhouaneha imoutowo sagasitearu kafeeno maenikikakarimasita 
sono nakadeha wakai onnaya otokogahasyaide yukaisouni utawoutai biiruya seiyouno sakewo nondeimasita 
anehakouiutokorowo sukina imoutohakittokono nakaniirudarouto omottanodesu 
aneha garasukonipittarito kaowotukete hikaru metukide nakawonozoiteimasita 
sonotoki ouraideoziisanga kyuubyounikakatte kurusindeita 
toorikakatta hitobitogasonomawarini atumattewaiwaitoitteimasita 
aneha kokorono nakademousukosi imoutowo ziyuunisasiteoiteyarou 
semete konyadakehakattenamanewosasiteoite asitahasonokawari miugokinonaranaiyouni sokubakuwositeyarouto omoinagara kafeeno maewo hanaretatokorodesu 
kottinikikakatta aneha kurusindeiruoziisanwo mimasita 
anehasassokusonooziisanni tikaduite siroi tede sekinakawonadeteyarimasita 
surutooziisanha sizukaninatte eikyuuni yasurakani nemuttesimattanodesu 
husigina aneha matino nakawo tootteitusika sabisii mitiwo kitano houni mukatte aruiteimasita 
yoruninatte soraniha hosiga syuniteimasu 
toorikakaru hitobitoha aneno meno syokuga hikarunowo mite omowazunanto kangaeteka tikayoruto kyuuni mizuwo abitayouni miburuiwosimasita 
aneno tourutokoroniha huyunoyouna kazega huitanodesu 
kuroi inkiwotokasitayounamakkuragarino utyuuwo imaobitadasii hungyouteino muragatondeiru 
hungyouteida !hungyouteitoittemonannokotokawakaranai ninmoarudearou 
hungyouteiha rokettotomo yobareteita zidaigaatta 
hikoukiha sorawotobukotogadekiruga kuukinonaitokorodehatobenai 
sikasi hungyouteiha kuukinonaitokorodemoyokutoberunoda 
teiohemuke hatihonno hunkankara aru gasuwohagesiku hukidasutosonoikioide teiha zenpounisusumunodearu 
teioniha kazigaattekorewougokasutotobiyuku houkouhadoudemokawarunodeatta 
daiutyuuwotobuniha hikoukidehatotemodamedearugakono hungyouteinara gasunotudukukagiri daiutyuuwotobukotogadekiru 
hikoukizidaikara tuginikono hungyouteizidainiututteitta 
soretotomoni ningenno meha tikyuukarahanaresarani tooi daiutyuuhemukeraretanodeatta 
imaobitadasii hungyouteino gunmo daiutyuuwotondeiku 
houdanwo ookikusite obuni hunkanwotukesosite ookina tubasawousirono houmadezuttonobasutosorehasokkuri hungyouteino katatininaru 
ginhakusyokunoutukusii sugatano hungyouteidatta 
sono dounitokidoki maeniiku ryouteino hunsyagasuga aosiroku hansyasuru 
matatokioriha sorawo ippaini daiyamondowohurimaitayouna musuunokagega teino dounouenikirarito hikariwootosukotomoatta 
gougoutaru bakuonwoagetetobiyuku hungyouteino gun!migimakino rasenkatatiwotukutte gyougiyokutondeiku hungyouteigundatta 
gunha zengoniikutukanokatamarininatte musuuno ganno muragatondeirunotodokoka nitatokorogaatta 
hungyouteino douni kiiroi byounoyounamonoga narandemieru 
sikasisoreha byoudehanai 
marumadonanodearu 
marumadono taguha hitotuno hungyouteinituiteoyoso hyakuni tikakatta 
sono kiiroi marumadokara ningenno kaoga hitotuzutunozoitatositemo hyakuninno ningenga teinainiiruwakeda 
nantoiu ookina hungyouteidearouka 
sikasi hungyouteiniha hyakuninyorimomottotakusanno ningenganorikondeita 
korekarawatakusigao hanasiyouto omou hungyouteiasibikigouniha nihyakusanzyuuninno nihonzinganotteiru 
minna nihonzinbakarideatta 
iya nihonzinganotteirunohakono asibikigoudakedehanai 
imakono daiutyuuwo ookina itikatamarininattetondeiru hungyouteinodono teinimo nihonzinganotteita 
iyamottohakkiriiuto zenbude hyakusitizyuuno hungyouteino norikumiinhakotogotoku nihonzindesimerareteitanodearu 
kono hungyouteigunha ittaidokohe muketetondeirunodearouka 
mata nanno mokutekidekonoyouna daiutyuuhetobidasitanodearouka 
souinsimanyomeimono nihonzinganaze itikatamarininattetondeirunodearouka 
dokusyasyokunhahusigini omowarerudearouga mattakunotokoro imakara gozyuunenmaeno ningenniha souzougatukanainomo muridehanai 
deha sakusyaha hungyouteiasibikigouno nakaninorikundeiru hitorino syounenkazamasaburouno minomawarikara byousyano hudewookosukotonisiyou 
zyuugonenno kouteioi saburou
itumadeneteirundai

oi saburou

sosite isogi aside syousyokudouno houhe kaidanwonobotteittanodatta

o maedokoheikundai siretakotoyo

husigina misosirudouda saburou

kattegatigaimasuyosoudarou 
einentaiyouno hikarino sitadekurasiteita mininarebamakkurana yorubakarino renzokudehakusakusasurunomomurizyanai taiyouno kousenha imatonattehatotemonatukasiimonodesune saburouhasimizimitoitta 
tizyouni teru taiyouno mabusii hikariwo omoi dasu 
tizyoukaramaiagattemo seisoukentikakunotokoromadehasoredemomadaussurato yuugatanoyouna taiyounokasukana hikarigaattaga seisoukenno nakawotukisusundeikuutiniitusikaatariha ankokuto kasitesimatta

taiyouha hikatteiruga sorahamakkuradeatta 
marude yonakani mangetuwo gyouideirunotoamari kanzigatigawanakatta

suruto toriharaha kyuukutimade hininatta tabakowo haizarano nakademomikesinagaraaa zyuuryokunokotoka 
zyuuryokuha ooini hettesimattasa 
sikasi zyuuryokuga herisugirutowarewareno sigotoya nanikanisukkari kattegatigattekurunode komarunosa

sagyoutyuuha migaruitokihadonnatokidemo kake asitokimatteita 
tyoudo teikokukaigunno suiheisanto onaziyoudeatta 
korehadekirudake binsyouni sintaiwougokasu kunrennotametomou hitotuha undoubusokuninaranaitamedeatta 
sukosigurai kimotinowarui nitidemo goureiwokakerarete teinaiwoattihekottihe nisandokakemawaruto myouni genkiwotorimodosu 
teityousituno maeniha hitorino syounenga tatte kazamano kurunowo matteita 
soreha kisokyuuman'ititoiumatano meikumatyandetootteiru sintaino ookina udepusinotuyoi syounendeatta 
kazamasaburoutokono kumatyankoto kisokyuuman'ititoha daino nakayosideatta

teityousituhuno teiottokoutaito kazamasaburouga hanpukusiteitta

atuii wasureta 
orugooruno kyokuha aibasingunutawoyattekurettesa kisono kumatyan ziganewo marudasinisiteawatete notinituketa 
wakarimasita 
koutaiteiottokyuusokunituiteyorosiieerasounakotowo !kisoha akai sitawoperonto dasite kazamawokarakatta 
sositeuyauyasiku kyosyuno reiwokaesite roukawo mukouheitta 
kousite kazamasaburouga honzituno daiitityokuwoukemotukototonatta 
tugino koutaizikanha zyuunitokideatta 
dakara imakara yozikanwo teityousituniite teityouno minomawarino motiwo tasunodeatta 
kazamaha teityousituno tobirano hasyuni tewokaketagadousitawakekasugu tewo hanasita 
sositesono tede yubiwo orikazoe dasita 
eeto hitotu koohiihutusihamousukosidebukubuku huki dasuzo 
sorekara hutatueeto gomuhuusenno tikyuugiha indohirosino hukinwo kaiteirarerutokorodato 
sorekara mittu orugooruha aibasingunutanari 
sorekaramou hitotu nanikaattayoudagamou hitotuno hikitugi zikouwo saburouha douwasuresitesimatta 
maaiiyade saburouha tobirawo osite nakani itutta 
nakaniha taiyoukousento onazi syokuno dentougatuiteiru 
sono denkyuuha tenzyouitimennosuri garasuno nakani itutteirunode sitakaraha mienai 
sono kawari tenzyouno ueni honmonono taiyouno hikarigasansanto terikagayaiteiruyouna kigasuru

nanikaii houhouhanaidearouka

o maehanakanaka kigakiku syounenda 
arigatou

teityou
honteino kosyouha naorisoudesukaun kyokuryokuyatteiruga tobinagara naosunohatito murirasii 
kono tyousideha honteiwo rikutinitukete naosukotoninarurasii honteiwo rikutihetukerutoiutomatamou itidotikyuuhe modorunodesukaiya tikyuumadeha toosugitetotemo hikikaesenai

gatutoiebaitumo tikyuunouedeutukusikunagameteitaano gatuda 
mikadukininattari mangetuninattarisuru gatu
kumomanikakureru gatuusagiga motiwotuiteiruyouna otennoaru gatuiyasoreyorimoituka gakkouno bouenkyoudenozoitemita gatuno hyoumennoanoosorosiihodoarehateta anadarakeno toti!sono gatuno ueni tyakurikusurutokiiteha saburousyounenno munehaayasikuodorunodatta 
teityou
gatuno uehe tyakurikudekirundesuka saburouha tuzityuusanitazunenaidehairarenakatta 
soreha dekiru 
nakanakamutukasiiga dekirukotoha dekiru 
wasiha itidodakedaga gatuno uehe oritakotogaarusasugani teityoudakeatte tuzityuusaha gatuno ueni oritakotogaarutoiu 
saburouhasorewokiitemazu ansinsitagasikasidousite gatuno ueni orirarerunokamatadousite gatuno uede ningengaikiwositeirarerunokahusigidenaranakatta 
teityou
gatuno ueniha kuukigaarimasenne 
suruto ningenha kokyuugadekinaidehaarimasenkasorehawakenonai hanasida 
sansokyuunyuuwoyarebayorosii 
warewaremo genni hungyouteino nakadekousite sansokyuunyuuwosinagara anzenni utyuuwotondeirudehanaika 
dakara gatuno ueni orireba hitorihitoriga sansokyuunyuuwoyarebaiinodayonaruhodosoudesuka 
ziyaa hitorihitoriga sansono tankuwo seounodesunemaasoudayo saburousyounenhayattowakattayouna kigasita 
gatuno uehe orite senakani sansono tankuwo seotteiru sugatawo kangaerutotyottookasii 
oi teiotto
mou sotoni sinpainakotohanaikanee teityouhakaraninatta koohiityawanwo saburounikaesinagaratazuneta 
ikiwosurukotogaumaku dekirunaramou sinpaihaarimasen saburouhasou omotteitanodesonotoori henziwosita 
suruto teityouhaniyaniya waraidasita 
teiottoo maeha gatuno sekaiheittekarazuibun igaina omoiwosurunitigainai 
imakaratanosiminisiteokinasainazedesuka teityou
igainakototoiutodonnakotodesukamaa imahaiwanaide okou 
tonikakuo maetatiga gatuno ueni anzenni orirareruyounitotyantorippana utyuuhukuga youisitearukara ansinwositeii 
sorewo kite gatuno uewo aruitemirunodanee 
kitto mewomarukusurunitigainai 
maa notinootanosimidasoudesuka 
hayakusono utyuuhukuwo kitemitaidesunesonoutini utyuuhukuno tyakuhouwodarekagaosietekurerudarou teityouto saburoutogasonna hanasiwositeiruutinimatamata teityounotokorohe houkokugadondon'atumattekita 
kikanbukaramo kitaibukaramo koukuubukaramodondon houkokugayattekite teityouhamata maenoyouna isogasisano nakani ituttesimatta 
humuhumu 
yappari murika 
yorosiideha honteiwo gatuni tyakurikusaserukotonisiyou kikanbuno houkokuniyorebakonomamadehadounimonaranutoiukotonanode teityouhatuini kessinwosita 
meirei
honteino sinrowo gatuni mukero koukuusamuraiha tadatini kaziwohiite hungyouteino sinrowokaeta 
teityouhamata sakenda 
meirei
gatuni tyakurikuno youiwoseyo 
sorekara hontaisireini taisi renrakuwoseyoiyoiyo teinaiha souinno katudoudeniwakanisawagasikunatta 
utyuuhukuo ^i 
saburoukun
hayakukottihe koi irigutikara saburouwo yobu monogaatta 
saburougasono houhehurikaeruto irigutini toriharaseinenno kaogaatta 
toriharasan 
nanno youde 
iyoiyo gatuno sekaihe orirukotoninattanode minamukoude utyuuhukuno tyakuhouwoosowatteirunoda 
kunmo hayaku koia utyuuhukudesukamou hazimattandesune 
ziya teityounityottoo yurusiwo eteikukotonisimasyou saburouha teityouni sarudete kyokawouke toriharaseinentotomoni teiottosituhe isoida 
teiottosituniha teiottotatiga oozeiatumatteita 
sugurukonoueniha koukyuuteiinga tatte minawo miorositeiru 
mou daitaiatumattayoudana 
deha utyuuhukuno tyakuhouwoosieru 
mazu zitubutuwo miserugakorega utyuuhukuda sitakara ookina sinkaisensuihukumitainamonogasasi agerareta 
setumeiyakuno koukyuuteiinhasorewo sugurukonoueni dae ageta 
utyuuhukuha kadainikakatteita 
zibunno yokonisono utyuuhukuwooite setumeigahazimatta 
korega utyuuhukuda 
tyotto miruto sensuihukunoyoudemoarugamata seiyouno yoroinoyounimo mieru 
koreha zenbukeigoukinde dekiteite aturyokuni zyuubuntaeruyouninatteiru 
teasino kansetunotokoroya kosinotokorogamarude hatino haranoyouninatteirugakoreha teasino kansetuya kosiwo magerunoni tugougaiiyouni tukuttearunoda ginbikarinosuru utyuuhukuha mireba miruhodomonosugoimonodatta 
anna ookinamonowo kite arukerukato sinpaiwosuruhododatta 
kono sitaniyahari keigoukinto tokusyugomutode dekita nagagutuwohaki utyuuhukunipissyari toritukeru 
koregasono kutuda kutuhamikan hakonoyouni sikakubattesosite ookii 
mata atamanihakono ookina kabutowokaburutyotto miruto sensuikabutoni niteiruga ookisahamotto ookikute zyougeni nagai entoukeida

otoha kuukino namidearu 
kuukiganakereba kuukino namimo okoranai 
dakara otoganainoda 
suruto gatuno sekaino uededonnaniwameitemo yondemo koehatutawaranai 
dakara hanasiwosurunoni otonikawaru nanimonokawo tukawanakerebanaranai 
sokodekono syokkakuga yakudatunodearimasunaruhodo gatuno sekainiha kuukiganaikarasitagatte otoga denaisimotiron otogatutawaruwakemonai 
koreha komarukotodearou 
saburounimosoreha watta 
dekono syokkakunohatarakidearugakoreha ningenno koeni ouzite kikaitekini sindousuruyouninatteiru 
tumari watasigakono kabutowokaburi kabutono nakademonowoiuto kabutono nakaniha kuukigaarukara koeha demasusurutosono koegakono syokkakuwo sindousaserunodearu 
tumari koeha kuukino sindoudearuga syokkakuni tutawatte kikaitekina sindoutonatteburuburupyunpyuntohurueru 
sokode watasino syokkakuto hanasiwosiyouto omou aiteno ninno syokkakutowo huresaseteokuto watasinoittakotobaha reino sindoutonari watasino syokkakukara aiteno syokkakuhe sindouga tutawaru 
sono kekkaaiteno miminotokoronituketearu sindouitatumari kouseiutuwanoyounamonosaga sindousite otowo hassurunoda 
sono ototoiunohatumari watasinokotobadearimasu 
doudesuwakarimasukasubarasii seinoutumaritumariwo renpatusite setumeimonoha asedakudakuno setumeiwokokoromita 
saburounihakuwasiikotoganomikomenakattagayoku aridousiga hanasiwosurutoki syokkakuwopikupikuugokasitetagaini syokkakuwohureawaseteirunowo mitakotowo omoi dasita 
ariha kutigakikenai kawarini syokkakuwohureawasetekotobawo aiteni tuuzirunodearouto omotteitagasoreni nitakotowoima ningendearuwarewaregayaroutoiunodearurasii 
syokkakuha nihonzututuiteimasu 
migino syokkakuhakottikaraiu houdesu 
hidarino syokkakuha aitenoitteirukotowo kikiwakeru houdesu 
tumari migiha sousinyouhidariha zyusinyoutoittamonodesu 
wakarimasitane saburouhaano setumeimonoga arito aritoga syokkakuwotukeatte hanasiwositeirunowo reinitotte setumeisurebaminnaha issouhakkiriwakarudarouto omotta 
sonohokakono utyuuhukunihairoirona sikakegatuiteimasugaizuremo zidoutekinihatarakuyouninatteirukaraminasanhabetuni tewotukenakuteyorosii 
tumarisono sikaketoiunoha hoonsoutiya sansosousyutuutuwaha zidoutekinihataraitekuremasu 
syoumeisoutiya kogatadenkinadomotuiteimasugakoremo zidoutekinihataraitekurerukara sinpaihairanai 
tumari kurakunareba kabutono ueya haranotokoroya kutuno sakikara tuyoi dentougatukuyouninatteiru 
akarukunareba sizenni suittiga kirete kieru 
mudenmoitudemohataraku 
goureihamina mudende ituttekuru 
zuibun benrini dekiatteiru 
kansinsitadesyouumaku dekiteirunaa teiottotatiha kutigutinikonosubarasii utyuuhukunokotowohometa 
tyottootazunesimasugatotuzen sakendanoha saburoudeatta

aa insyokusoutinokotodane 
soreha imasetumeisurunowo wasureteita 
sikkeisikkeito setumeimonohaniga waraiwosite insyokubutuha kabutono nakani itutteimasu 
sosite hidarino udeni mittuno botangatuiteirudesyou 
sono mittuno botanniha mizunikukusurito kaitearu 
mizuno botanwo osuto mizuga kabutono nakahe demasu 
tyoudo kutino maeni kanno degutigaattesokokara derunodesu 
dakara kutiwoaiteirebaumaku kutino nakahe iru 
doudesuumai sikakedesyouto setumeimonoha zibunga hatumeisyadearukanoyouni tokuininatteitta 
nikuto kaitearu botanwo osuto onazi kanno degutikara nikugatobi dasimasu 
korehakatai nikudehanaku nitamonowohiki nikunisiteatteomakeni azimotuketearimasu 
sorekara kusurito kaitearu botankarahaneri kusurigatobidasimasu 
koreha yasaiwo seiseisitamonodeyahari norinoyouninatteimasukaratabeyasui 
kono mizuto nikuto kusurino mittuwosukosizututabeteireba zyuubunkatudougadekirunodesu

dakaraobentouwo sageteittemomudadesu 
minasan botanni kiwotuketekudasaiyo tyakurikumeireisaburoutatihasono bade utyuuhukuwo haikyuusaresorewo kita

sikasi syokkakuwohureattegorannasai

koreha kimyouda

sikasigamanwositekudasai 
gatuno sekaiheno zyourikuga sippaisitarisorekaramata hungyouteino kosyougaumaku naoranakatta nitinihasorekosowareware itidouhasorotte sindesimauwakedakarasorekurainokotohagamanwositekudasaiwakarimasita 
tabakoguraigamanwosimasu iyouna sugatawosita teiottotatihazorozorotosorezoreno moti bahehikiageteitta 
saburoumo teityounotokorohemodotta 
sireitouni ituttemiruto teityouyasono hokano koukyuuteiintatimoituno mani kitanokasukkari utyuuhukuni miwokatamete moti banituiteita 
teityouno utyuuhukuniha teityouto kaita satuga muneto senakaniharituketeatta 
ituno manika teinagamo utyuuhukuwo kiraretanodesuneooo maeha teiottono kazamasaburoudana 
doudanakanaka tyakukokotigaiidarousoudesunee 
omoinohoka omokuhanaindakeredonandaka ugokunoga daigidesune 
doumohatarakinikuisorehasouda 
gatuno uehe orirebamottorakuninaruyo teityouha saburouno utyuuhukuwo nen'irinisirabetekureta 
sime kanaguno hitotugayurundeitanowo mitukete teityouhasikkarito simetekureta 
teityou
zyourikutitenno keisanga dekimasita koukuusamuraiga zuitawomotte teityounotokoroheyattekita 
sositeitumono tyouside kaowo teityounosobahe tikaduketamonodakara koukuusamuraino kabutoto teityouno kabutotogagotunto syoutotusita 
aadoumo situreiwo kiwotukenaitoikanneeto teityouhayasasikutasinamete koukuusamuraino tekara zuitawotoriageta 
naruhodo 
suruto waraino umihe tyakurikusurebaiindana 
kokohe tyakurikusuruto muikato zyuunizikanha hirugatudukundana teityouha myounakotowoitta 
muikahanmo hirugatudukunantesonnakotogaarudarouka 
sayoudesu 
kono keisannihamatigaiarimasenyorosii 
deha imakara waraino umiwo mokuhyouni tyakurikuno youiwosuruyounihaikasikomarimasita 
ato sanzikanguraide gatuno hyoumenni orirareru yoteidesuumu zyuubunkiwotuketekasikomarimasitaiyoiyo hungyouteiha tukisekaihe mukete tyakurikuno siseiwototonoetanodeatta 
tikaduku getumenteityoutuzityuusaha sireitouyori goureiwokakerunoniisogasii 
kazamasaburousyounenhasonosobanituiteitetadamou munegawakuwakusurubakaridatta 
aa gatu!gatuno ueni zyourikusurunante mattakuomoigakenaikotoda !zyuuryokusoutiwo zyozyoni modose teityouno goureigatobidasita 
zyuuryokusoutiwo zyozyoni modose singouinga denkoekanno nakahekoewohukikomu 
surutosonokoeha kikanbuhe tutawatte zyuuryokusoutiga motohe modosareteikunodeatta 
zyuuryokusoutiwo modosutodonnakotoninarudearouka 
oyanandaka sintaiga kyuuni karukunatta kazamasaburouhaodoroite kutini dasiteitta 
sintaigahuwarito uki noboruyouna kimotininatta 
soremosono hazudeatta 
imamadeha tikyuuno ueniirunoto onazikuraino zyuuryokuga norikumiintatino sintaini kuwaerareteitanoda 
tokoroga imasoregasizukani herasareteittanodearu 
zyuuryokuga herukara sintaiga karukunaru dourideatta 
oyaoyakorehahusigida 
omoi utyuuhukuwokiteirunonirakuni arukeruyouninattayo 
kinzokuseino utyuuhukuwokiteirutoha omowarenai 
marude huyuno gaitouwo itimaikiteirugurainokarusada saburouhahusigisouni sireitouno nakawokotukotutoaruitemita 
tokorogaodorokihasonokuraidehaowaranakatta 
kano sintaihamottokarukunatteittanodearu 
huyuno gaitouguraino omosani kanziteita utyuuhukugamottokarukunatteyagate yukatawokiteirukurainokarusaninattesimattakara saburouha mattakubikkurisitesimaimasita 
dousita kazamasaburouteityoutuzityuusagakoewokaketa 
saburougaanmarihenna kaowositeitakaradearou 
hadoumo kimotigahendesu kimotigahendatte 
munegamukamukasitekitanokaneiesoudehaarimasendesu 
kono utyuuhukuno omosaga kyuuninakunatte kimotigahennanodesu 
marude kamidekosiraeta yoroiwokiteiruyoude kituneni bakasaretayouna kanzidesu 
teityouhahenna kimotigasimasenkahahahaha 
sonnakotohabetunihusigidenaiyo

sumimasensumimasen saburouha sakenda 
oi teiottoo maeha nanikaitteirurasiiga syaberutokihao maeno kabutokara kudatteiru nihonno syokkakuwowasino syokkakunituketekara syaberanaitoo maega naniwoitteirunoyarawasiniha ikkouo maeno koegakikoenaiyo teityouga tyuuiwosita 
aasousou 
sorewosukkariwasureteita saburouhayatto kigatuita 
sosite kano syokkakuwo teityouno syokkakuno houhemotteikinagaraeetaihen situreidesuga teityouno syokkakunisawaraseteitadakimasu

kubino honegaitai

sokono madokara sitawonozoitemirugaii 
korekara tyakurikusiyoutosuru gatuno rikutiga mieteiruyo

atu !dagayappari saburouhaodorokinokoewoageta 
nantoiu kaikina tukisekaino huukeidearou 
tondeiku hungyouteino sitahamakkuradeattagasorekarazutto mukouno houwo mirutokorehamatamabusiimadeni hikaru gin'irono ookina rikutigaatta 
yoku mirutosono hikaru rikutihakewasii yamayamaga katawonarabetesobieteiru 
yamano haziga hikattesono notiha sumidenuritubusitayounimatu kurona sanmyakuga temaeno houniatta 
soreyori mukouno sanmyakuha zentaigamabusiku hikatteita 
sono mani akaruihirobirotosita haraga mieteita 
sanmyakuno ookuha kannoyounituranatteman nakaga hikukuotikondeita 
marude bakudanwootositaatonoyouni mieta 
hikaru rikutiha obinoyouni sayuuhe naganagatonobitetuduiteita 
tyotto miruto gatuno sekaiha hikarino obinoyouni mierunodeatta 
gatuha maruimonoto omotteitanonikorehahusigina mie houwosurumonodearu 
sikasiyoku kiwotuketemiruto hungyouteinoma sitaniaru kuroitokorohayahari gatuno rikutideatta 
soramo kuroikeredosokonihatakusanno hosigakirakiratoutukusikukagayaiteita 
sikaruni hungyouteinoma sitaha kuroidakede hosiha mienakatta 
hosiha mienai kuroi kaikoso gatuno rikutideatta 
mabusii hikarino obini mierutokoroniha taiyouno hikarigaatatteirunodeatta 
taiyounoataranaitokoroha sumidenuritubusitayouni makkurodeatta 
korega tikyuudearuto hiruto yorutono sakaino rikutihausubonyaritoakaruku mierunodearugasoreha kuukigaarutame taiyouno hikarigatirabatteusubonyariakaruku mierunodeatta 
sikasi gatuniha kuukiganai 
dakara taiyounoatarutokorohaakarukuataranutokorohamakkuradesono sakaimehataihenhakkirisiteiru 
hiruto yorutosikanainoga gatuno sekaideatta 
akatukidano yuuguredanobonyarito akaruitokihanai 
dakara gatuno sekaihaarehatetayouni mieru 
yawarakasaganai 
sino sekaidearu 
kemonomosundeinakereba musimotondeinai 
hanamonakereba kimo haeteinai 
aanantoiusabisii gatuno sekaidearou saburouha omowazutame ikiwotuita 
tada kokotiyoinohawaga hungyouteiga hikarino owohiiteisamasikutondeirukotodeatta 
hungyouteiha ikiteiru 
ma sitano gatuno sekaiha sindeirunoda !saburouhatoutou madokara sintaiwohiita 
amari arehateta gatuno sekaino koukeiwonagaku miteiruto kigahenninattekurunodatta 
saburouga myouna kaowositeirutosokohe teityougayattekite syokkakuwosasidasita

teityouga nanika hanasitekurerunodearou 
douda 
gatuno sekaigahakkiri mietarou 
susamaziitokoronanodebikkurisitarou saburouhaunazuita 
hikatteiru rikutiga mietarou 
waraino umihaano nakaniaru 
mousugu tyakurikudaaa teityou
waraino umitoiuto gatuno sekaini umigaarunodesukahontouno umidehanaiyo 
gatuniha mizuganai 
dakara umidokoroka ogawamo mizutamarimonaizyaaiyoiyohendesune waraino umidanantesorehakoudayo 
tikyuunouekara gatuwo miruto kurozundatokorogaaru 
sono kurozundatokorogatyoudo uminoyouni mierunodesorede umitoiunoda 
waraino umitoiunogatumariha iwadedekita heigennanda 
oritemirebayokuwakaruganehaasoudesuka 
waraino umino waraitoiunohadonnakotodesukasoreha timeidayo 
isewanno iseto onazikotodayo 
sikasi issetuni waraino umino kurozunda katatiganantonaku waratteiru ningenno yokogaomitaidakarasorede waraino umitoiunodato toku ninmoaruhee waratteiru ningenno yokogaodesutte saburouhamata madokara gatuno sekaiwonozoita 
horaasokoda 
itibantakai yamano hidariwogoran 
mada katatigahakkirisinaigaano kuroitokoroga waraino umida 
waratteiru ningenno hanadano kutidano hoodanoatariga mieteiruaa miemasuyoku miemasu saburouniha teityounoittatoorino gatuno mennihaitteiru waraino kaono itibuga mieta 
souiuutini hungyouteiha getumenni taisiteiyoiyo koudowo sagetekitamonoto mie hikarino obinoyouni mieteita taiyounoataru getumenhaitunomaniyara habaga kawanoyounihirokunarisoreganao tikaduitemasumasuhirokunatta 
yagatesoreha kouzuinoyounihirogari hungyouteinoma sitamade akarukunatta 
totanni gyorainoyouna katatiwosita hungyouteino kagegakukkirito getumennoueni otite sanmyakumo iwano heigenmo nagareruyounizunzunto notihe hasitteitta 
tyakurikuyoui!zyuuryokusoutiwo hantainisizukani mawase !teityouno goureiga mudenninotte deta 
denryokusoutiga hantaini mawaridasita 
suruto hungyouteino rakkasokudoga kuitomerareta 
teihadandan koudowo sageteikinagaramoriagattekuru getumenno uenihuwarito orita 
marude kamadannoueni otitakanoyounisizukani tyakurikusitanodeatta 
gotontotatta ikkaidake teihayuretadakedezituni migotona tyakurikuburideatta 
hungyouteiha waraino umini kyotaiwoyokotaetanodeatta 
zyourikudaiippowaraino umini tyakurikusuruto teiintatiha ganiisogasikunatta 
goureiha mudenwomotte yatugi sounitutaerareta 
omoi tobiraga utigawanimukatte hirakareta 
suruto nakakarahasigoga kudarosareta 
teityousitateino youigadekimasitayorosii 
wasiga gatuno sekaiheno daiippowohumidasuzosouitte teityouhayaora ookina utyuuhukunitutunda sintaiwookosi sireitoukara tati ideta 
sono notiniha koukyuuteiintatigatukisitagatta 
saburouhaawatete minano kanwokakenukeruto teityounosugu notini oituita 
semai tuurowonukeruto deirigutigahiraiteita 
teityouhayuuyuutohasigowo kudariteiku 
saburouhasorenituduita 
hasigowo kudarikitte saburouhakowagowa iwaharani asiwo kudarosita 
gotugotusita akakuroi iwaharadeattagasono uewo aruitemiruto omoino sotoasizawarihawarukunakatta 
tasikani iwano uedearunoni tatamino uewo aruiteiruyouna kanzideatta 
ookonohenni asibawotaterundana teityouhahaya syuurinokotonituite meireiwodasiteita 
saburouha gatuno daitini tatteharubarukokomade zibuntatiwohakondekureta hungyouteino kyotaiwo miageta 
teihautukusiku gin'ironikagayaiteitaga teityouno sasiteiru hukinno sotokakudakegasukosi yaketayouni syokugakawatteita 
teino senakakara utyuuhukuwo kita teiinga sigoninkaowo dasita 
senakakaramo detekitanodearu 
detekitanoha teiinbakaridehanakatta 
yagate ookina kizyuukino tetuketaganyuttoarawareta 
sonokoro hungyouteino yokobaranihaikutumono ookina deirigutigahirakisokokara asibayouno marutagatakusan'eisaeisato hippari dasareta 
teiintatihaodorokubeki hayasademottesono marutawo kumi tateteitta 
saburouha tetudautumorideattagamusirozyamaatukaisareta 
karehasorega huhukudeattagadoumo sikataganai 
hungyouteino kikainituiteno tisikiganaikarazyamaatukaisaretemo sikataganakatta 
saburounohokanimozyamaatukaisaretehukureteiru monogaatta 
soreha sotodemonai kareto onaziku kyuuziwositeiru kisokyuuman'itisyounendeatta 
kono kisosyounento saburoutoha iwaharanouewoburaburaaruiteiruutinituini ikiatta 
o tagaini myouna katatiwositeirunode iki attemosibarakuhao tagaini kabutono garasuno nakawonozokikondeitagayouyakusoretowakatte hutariha tewonigiriatta 
sorekarao tagaino syokkakuwohureawaserunoni temadotta 
narenaikototote kyuunihaumakuikanai 
kaza sanbuusitanadotokiregireni kisosyounennokoegakikoeru

yaa saburou
gatuno sekaitte sappuukeidane 
marude hakabamitaizyanaikasorehasousa

doumohendane 
tikyuuno ueno aruki kokotitozenzentigaunekorehaomosiroiya 
aruiteirutumoridakeredohuwarihuwaritotondeiruyouna kanzidane hutarihaomosirogatte aruiteitta 
sonoutinidousitawakeka kisosyounengapittarito asiwotodometa 
zenkagamininatte sitawomiteirunodeatta 
dousita kumatyan saburouha kisosyounennotokorohe bikikaesita 
suruto kisoha iwano uekarasokoni otiteita nanikawohiroiage mewo marukusiteiru 
korehanandarou 
nee saburoukisonosasidasitamonowo saburouga mirutosoreha kandumeno aki kannoyounamonodeatta 
sikasisoreha tikyuude miru kandumetohatigatte kanno yokoniha sankakudano hino tamadano myouna moyougakaitearumonodatta 
saburouhasorewo miteiruutininandaka sesuzigazo ^tto samukunattekurunodatta 
senzyuuseibutukahenna kanzyanaika kazamasaburouha zibunno syokkakuwo kisokyuuman'itino syokkakuniosituketesouitta 
ehhenna kandatte 
dokogahennano kisohadokogahennanokanomikomenaitoiu kaotukidatta 
kumatyanhorakonohennasirusiwogoranyoto saburouha kanno dounakanikaitearu sankakudano hino tamadanonosirusiwo sasinagarakonnahenna moyoumitainamonowo imamade mitakotoganaizyanaikanaruhodosouiebahenna moyoudane

sonnaraiugane 
nee kumatyan 
kono gatuno sekainiha seibutuhasundeinaihazudarousousatokorogakono kandumeno aki kannokorogatteirutokorowomiruto nanimonokagakono gatunisundeiruto kangaerarerunoda

kumatyan 
dakarawarewarehayudanhanaranaiyo 
kousiteirutokimoitudokokara huini gatunisundeiru senzyuuseibutuniosowarerukamosirenaihaaiyoiyo kimotigawarukunatta hayakuhikikaesiteminnanikono aki kanwomisete siraseteyarouzyanaikasoudanee

wakatteiruyo kisosyounenga kyuuni saburounokotobawoutagaidasita 
are kumatyan 
bokuha kunwoodokasuyounaiziwaruzyanaiyo 
nazesonnakotowoiundaidatte kandumetoiumonoha ningenga hatumeisitamonozyanaika 
gatuno senzyuuseibutuga ningento onaziyouni kandumewo hatumeisitatosurutoamarinihusigidayokonohennasirusihasonnamonoha hugoudakara kakouto omoeba ningennidattekakeruyo 
dakarakono kandumenokarahakoremadeni darekakono tukisekainitondekita tikyuuzinmano tankentaigakokonisuteteittamonozyanaikato omou 
kittosoudayo kisosyounenhakono aki kanhazutto maenikono tukisekaihe tankenni kita tikyuuzinkangasuteteittanonitigainaitoiu 
soukasira 
bokunihasonna kazeniha omoenaindaganeekokode saburouto kisotono kangaegahakkirikuitigattesimatta 
hutarihanandakatyottosabisiiyouna kimotininattedamattesimatta 
sosite hutarino asihaitusika okano hounimuiteita 
gansekinotogitatta hikarino okawonoborunoni angaihonega orenakatta 
gatuno uedehasubete hokougarakudeatta 
tyotto iwanoware mewopyontotobi koerunisitemo asini taisita tikarawo kuwaenakutemo sigomeetoruharakunitobikoerareru 
koreha gatuno zyuuryokuga tikyuunosoreni kurabetewazuka rokuhunno hitotoiutaihen tiisaimonodearukaradeatta 
saburouto kisotohaituno manika okano ueninoborituita 
atarinonagameha kyuunihirake gekaiha akaruku soraha kuroku hayasimo kawamonai kouryoutaru gatuno sekainosusamazisaga issouhutarino munenihisihisitosemarunodeatta

kono okano sitano taihoumitaini sakinotogatta iwano sitadayo

areha nanimonodarou 
ningenzyanaie ningenzyanaitte kisohaodoroitesakki saburouno sasita houwomita 
aareha kisohasono banihurueagatta 
kaibutugairunoda 
taihouiwano sitakara nitinataheyozinobottekita yottu itutubakarino kagesoreha notikara mirutogozawokabutta ningennoyouna katatini mietaga syoumenwo muitatokorowo miruto ningendehanakatta 
tyoudo koutyuuto pengintorino aino kowoo bakenisitayouna iyouna sugatano seibutudeatta 
areha nandarousugoi bake monoda 
tukisekaino seibutuda tukisekainiha seibutuhainaihazudagadatteano kaibutuhatyantobokutatino meni mieteirundaze 
yumewomiteiruwakezyanai 
areha torino bake monodaroukasoretomo koutyuuno bake monodaroukadottidakawakaranai 
oyaano kaibutuha teni kandumewomotteiruzyanaika saburougamata zyuudaihakkenwosita 
naruhodo bake torika bake koutyuukanosono kaibutuha gomudekosiraetamutinoyouna teni akai kanwo motteirunodatta 
miteiruutinisono kaibutuha nitinatani deruto narande iwano uenikosiwoorosita 
anakarahai dasite nitinatabokkowohazimetayounimiukerareta 
oyaoyaarewogoranyo saburougasakenda 
husiginakotowosono kaibutuhahazimeta 
tenimotteita kandumewo atamano ueninoserunodeatta 
sibarakusurutosono kandumewo atamakaraorosu 
sosite kaibutuha kandumeno nakawonozokikomunodeatta 
sonotokiha kandumehaituno manika anagaaite nakagakaraninatteita 
kaibutuhasono akikanwopoito suteta 
sositekondoha betuno kandumewohyoito atamano ueninoseta 
sosite onazi dousagakurikaesaretanodeatta 
husigihusigi sanbutyan'areha naniwoyatteirunodarouneareha kandumewotabeteirunosa kandumewotabeteirutte atamade kandumewotaberunokai 
okasiizyanaika 
naze kutidetabenaide atamadetabeteirunodaroukasaasonnakotobokunihawakaranaiyo atamade kandumewotaberu kaibutunantekiitakotoganai 
sonokusesono kaibutuhakutibasinoyouna katatiwosita nagai kouhunwomotteita

sonotokidatta 
totuzen hukounakotoga otta 
saburounosuguusironiita kisogadousitahazumikasurutto iwakadokara asiwohumihazusitanodeatta 
assimatta !tosakende kisoha zibunno sintaiwosasaeyoutosite maeniita naninimosiranai saburouno senakanisiteita tankunisigamituitanodeatta 
kuukigaarebaitihayakusonokehaiga saburouniwakatte karehausirowohurimuite oukyuusyotigadekitanodearugananisiro ototoiumonononai sekaidakeni saburouha kisonisigamitukarerumade naninimo siranakattanodearu 
sositeaabunaito kigatuitatokinihamouosokatta 
saburouno sintaihasukkari zyuusinwousinatteita 
sosite tugino syunkanniha hutariha utyuuhukuwo kitamama okanouekaragorongoron sitahekorogeotihazimeta 
sitaniha reino kaibutudanga nitinatabokkositeirunodatta 
hutarihasono maehe 
kaibutuno zinmonyuruyakanigorongoronto otiteittanode hutarihabetunikegawosuruyounakotomonakatta

oi kumatyan 
iwanisigamituketosakendagakono saburounokoehamotiron kisonitodokuhazuganakatta 
sosite kisohaaikawarazugorongorontokorogatte goteineinimo kaibutudanno asimotomadekorogeotiteyattosokohekaradaha tomatta 
ti etumazuikotowoyattanaa kaibutudanno houdeha kigatuitesawagihazimeta 
kisohatatimati kareranotamenitoriosaerarerusi saburoumo kisowotasukeyoukasoretomo houkokunotamenikonomama bikikaesoukato kangaeteiruutiniitunomanika kareranotametorikakomaretesimatta 
hutarihayagate kaibutudanno maeni bikisuerareta 
saatutuki korosareruka iki tiwosuwarerunoka 
saburouhamou siwo kannensitedoudemonareto ookina mewomuite aitewoniramituketeita 
kaibututatiha iwakadonikosiwoorosi hutariwo misuenagara atamawoyosete nanika hanasiwositeiru yousudeattagamotiron kaibututatinokoeha ikkounikikoenai 
saburouhakono mani kaibutunosugatawokuwasiku mirukotogadekita 
tookukara mirutokono kaibutuha koutyuuka pengintorinoyouni omowaretagasoba tikaku mirutokanarazusimosoudehanakatta 
koutyuuya pengintoriyorimozutto koutouna doubutunoyouni mieta 
toiunohamazu daiitini kareraha syokkakumitainamonowohurinagaraotagaini hanasiwositeiru yousudearu 
sikamo hanasiwosinagarairoirotokomakaku miburiwosurutokorowo mitemo sarunankayorimo koutouna tiewomotta doubutunoyouni mieta 
mattakuhusigina kimotinowarui seibutudearu 
sono kaibutuhakurukuruugoku ookina kaowomotteita 
kaonoman nakaniha tonbono metamanoyounitaihen ookina megaatta 
sositesono sitani kiiroi kutibasigatukideteita 
atamano ueha siroku hageteirutokorogaari atamano ueniharippana kakunoyouna syokkakuga nihonnyutto deteita 
atamanosono hokanotokoroha kabanoyouni myouniusu akai syokuwoobiteraterato hikatteita 
sorekara douha torinoyounihukureteita 
sikasi haranotokoroha yoroiwokitayouninatteite toritohatigau 
senakaniha koutyuuno sito onaziyouna siga tatamikomareteiruyoudeatta 
sono sinotuke neno yokoniha syokkakutohatigaimottogunyagunyasita gomuseino kannoyounamonogatuiteita 
sorehataihen nagakute tizyouni tassiteitagaugoiteiruutini kyuuni mizikakutidindesimaukotomoatta 
koreha teno daiyoumonodearou 
syokusyutoiumonokamosirenai 
tonikakuimadakiitakotomonaihusigina seibutudeatta 
mou hitotuhusiginanohasono kaibutuno asideatta 
asihasono kaibutuno kahukunotokorokara nihonnyutto deteita 
sono asihatyotto miruto turuno asini niteita 
sikasiyoku miruto kansetuga hutatumoari daitiwohumaerutokoroniha gohonno yubigaatte mizukakinoyounamonogatuiteita 
sikamokono kimyouna asihadokokara mitemo zyoubuni mieta 
nandaka kinzokuwo kumiawasete asino katatinisitamononoyounimo mieta 
(ittainanidarou 
kono koutoukaibutuha )saburouhasobahepittarisuriyottekuru kisokyuuman'itino sintaiwokakaenagara mewomihatta 
sono kaibutuno nakanidouyara taisyourasii kaibutugaatta 
sono kaibutuha hokano kaibututosikirini renrakuwositeitayoudeattagayagate renrakugasundanoka kaowo hutarino houni muketa 
oi kuntatiha nihonzindarousono kaibutugaikinari nihongode hanasikaketekita 
soreniha saburouhabikkuri gyoutensita
