husigida 
nazesono kaibutuha nihongowohanasunodearouka 
daiitikuukimonainoninazesono kaibutunohanasiga saburouno miminikikoerunodearouka 
saburouhawaga mimiwoutagatta 
korekorebetuni kuntatino seimeiwoobiyakasutumorihanaikara ansinsitewarewareno toinikotaenasai 
kuntatiha nihonzindaroune 
imakaoirowokaetazyanaika kaibutuno syuryouhanikuihodohakkirisita kutyoude saburoutatini hanasikaketekurunodeatta 
saburouhakotaetamonokadoukato kangaeteiruutini kisoga maeninoridasita 
sosite tewoagete nanikamonowoiuyouna kakkouwosita 
suruto kaibutuno syuryouha ookina atamawohutteunazukioosouka 
kunhanakanaka yuukigaatteeraizo 
souka kuntatihayappari nihonzindattaka kisoga nanikaittanoga kaibutuno syuryouni tuuzitamonoto mieru 
kuukimonainoninazekottinokotobaga mukouni tuuzitamonodearoukato saburouhahusigini omotta 
gasoreyorimo kisoni kattenaosyaberisasetehanaranaito omottanode kareha kisoni tyuuiwosurutumoride zibunno syokkakuwo kisono houniyoseta 
oi kuntati dousikatteni hanasiwositehaikenai syuryouha hayakumo saburouno kokorowominuitesikarituketa 
aa ittaikono tienosugureta kaibutuha ittainanimononanodearouka 
sireiteikuroganegouhanasihakokode kazamasyounentatiya tukisekaini huzityakusita hungyouteiasibikigoukarahanarete imanao doudoutaru hentaidemotte daiutyuuwotondeiruwaga hungyouteino hontainiuturu 
kono hontaidehahazime hyakusitizyuusekidattaga totyuuasibikigouwousinatte imahanokorino hyakurokuzyuukyuusekiga katamattetondeiru 
taino sentouniha kyoudouteiyokazegouga tadahitotu yuukannimogungunto utyuuno mitiwo sekkaiiteiku 
kono kyoudouteino teityouha matumiyaippeitoitte yobidehaaruga kaigunno hikouheisoutyoudeatta 
sono kyoudouteiyokazegoukara nikiromeetoruno kouhouni sireiteikuroganegouga irisono notini hungyouteino daihentaigatuduiteirunodeatta 
sireiteikuroganegou!kono sireiteiniha daiutyuuenseitaino sireiga bakuryouwohikituretenotteiru 
sireiha darearoukono maeno daisantugisekaitaisenno kuusenni sekitaru isaokouwotateta taiyuusyoutosite hitobitono kiokunimohakkirinokotteiruano sekiasisekiudeno ootaketyuuzyoudeatta 
kono hungyouteitaiha ittainaniwo mokutekitosite daiutyuuenseino tonituiteirunodearouka 
enseino mokutekihamada zinruiga kokoromitakotononaitaihenna sigotowosurutamedeatta 
taihenna sigototohanandearouka 
soreha muuasuiseiniaru tyouhousyagensode mubiumutoiu hizyouni kityouna bussituwo torukotodeatta 
mubiumutyouhousyagenso!kono kityouna gensonokotowo sitteiru monohaamari ookunai 
kono mubiumuhasubarasii housyanouwomotteirunoda 
housyanoubussitudemukasikarayoku sirareteirunoha raziumudearu 
tikyuunihakono sotourantoka toriumutoka akutiniumunadono housyanoubussitugaaru 
souiu bussitukarahaanohusigina arufabeetaganmano housyasenga detekuru 
kono housyasenga gantoiu byoukiwonaosukotoha daredemo sitteirugakonogorodeha zinruinotamemotto kityounahatarakiwositekurerukotogawakatta 
soreha imakuwasikuitteiruhimahanaiga ningenga kangaetakotomonakattahodonosubarasii ookina douryokuwohineridasu tanetositetaihen kityounamonodeatta 
tokorogasekkakunosono tanemo daidouryokuwohineri dasu taneno yakumewosaserunihayohodotakusan'atumenakerebanaranai 
sikamokono tikyuunihasouiu bussituhasukunaikara issyoukenmeini raziumusono hokawoatumetemitemoikuramoatumaranai 
tikyuuzentaino housyabussituwo ikkotokoroniatumetemitemo taisitakotohanai 
semetesono hyakubaiarebasono sindouryokuhasseihouha tiisainagaramo seikousurunodeatta 
sokode sekaizyuuno gakusyatatihakono sekkakuno sindouryokuhasseihoumo ningenno tikaradehadekinai soudandearutositeakirametesimattaga tadakokonihitori nipponno wakai gakusyade midorikawahakasetoiu nindakehaakiramenakatta 
hakaseha kangaeta 
tikyuuniaru housyabussitudakewoatumetanodeha sukunakutedamedearuga omoikitte tikyuuigaino hokano basyokara mottekuru kuhuuwosurebaiidehanaika 
kono kangaehasubarasii omoitukidatta 
kagakusyanosubarasii yumedatta 
naruhodosorehaomosiroi kangaedearu 
hakaseha suunenmaekara sirareteiru tyouhousyagensomubiumuni mewotuketa 
kono mubiumuha itimeikiwo hennisuru gensotomoiwareru 
soreha kakkokuno gakusyagakono mubiumuwo hakkensita hangariino tenmongakusyamuubiisinokotowo kiga hendatoiisonotamenisouiuhenna meigatuitanodatta 
muubiisino hakkenno hanasiwosurutoomosiroinodaga nagakunarukarakantanniiuga muubiisiha ganrai|siroutotenmongakusyadeariitumo hosino hikariwo kenkyuusiteitagatyoudo imakara rokunenmaetitamakara zyuumankounenno enpouniaru meimosirenai hosiwo hakkensita 
sonotokikono hosino hikariwo bunkousyasinnitottesirabetemirutokono tikyuunihanai gensogaarukotogawakatta 
sikamokono sinhakkenno gensoha keisanwositemiruto raziumuno itimanbaino housyanouwomotteirutoitte sekaizyuuwoodorokasita

"daiitisekkoutaihoukoku

saadousitawakedesyouka 
kottikaramosakkikaratabitabi daiyonsekkoutaiateni mudende singouyobidasiwoutteirunodesuga sarani outounasidesu mudenkigakowaretanokanasaasonnakotohamazunaihazudato omoimasu

iyoiyokoreha ookina sentouninarudearou 
sumukotonisae narenai tukisekaino uenioite tikyuuzinkanyorihazuttosugureta zunouno motinusidearutoiwareru kaseizinto tatakaunodearukarakoreha itidaikakugowo yousurukotodatta 
teiinno kaoha kumoru 
douhouga imakinanni kurusindeirunodato omouto munegasimetukerareruyoudeatta 
dounarudearoukakono sentouha 
tukisekaino ueno dairantouno matumosi asibikigouno norikumiinga hitorinokorazu kaseizinnotamenitaosaretesimaisono ueni hungyouteisae ubawaretesimauyounakotogaattarakoreha itidaizidearu

nazenaraba kaseizinha tikyuuzinruiwo mikubittesorekarasakidonnakotowomukoukarasikaketekurukawakattamonodehanai

ima tuzityuusano atamano nakanihatossaniareyakoreyato sakuryakuga uzumaiteiru

oi mudeninnanika genbayorino houkokuha konaikahai 
arekiridesu 
atarasii houkokuhamada hitotumo irimasensouka 
huumusouitteirutoki mudenhaidenbannipappatto kansitomosibigatuitari kietarisita 
oya daiyonsekkoutaigakottiwo yondeiruzo

aasorehamatigainaku daiyonsekkoutaikarano hazimeteno houkokudatta

"daiyonsekkoutaihoukoku
waga taihasukosi kangaerutokoroarite kaseizintaihakkenmade denpawo hassyasinaikotowo sadameokeri

houkokusyohanaosono sakigaatta 
"waga taiha ameyamayori mukaino hiiragiyamanokageni kaseizinno norimonogaarunowo hakkenseri 
kaseizintaino souzeiha yakuzyuumeikatoomowareru 
karerano norimonohasono katatiookii sarano gotokusono tyuuouno deirigutiyorizorozoroto arawarerunowo mitari 
waga taihasonoatonite ameyamawo kudaritehisokani kaseizinno norimononi tikadukeri 
saiwaini norimononiha kaseizinno iru wakenasi 
sikamo deirigutiha ake hanasininari iritaruyue naibuhe irite mitari 
sono kekkawareraha kazamakisono nisyounenwo hakkenseri "hou nisyounenga mitukattasouzya "sarinagara nisyounenha tomoni zinzihusyounoarisamanite hakkenseraretaruyuewarerahaodoroki teatewo kuwaetutuarumoimadanisonokikimenakihazannennari 
wareware nisyounenwokonomama ture modoroutosu 
iryouno youiwotanomu "hou nisyounentomo zinzihusyoudasouda 
sorewotasukete daiyonsekkoutaihakottihe modottekurutoiugaumakukaererukadoukawakaranai 
sugusama daiyonsekkoutaino houhemo kyuuentaiwo muketeyare tuzityuusaha sinpaino nakanimo daiyonsekkoutaino buzidattakotowo sittehotto hitoikituitanodeatta 
waretobitutuarisorenisitemo daigosekkoutaino katahadounattakana tuzityuusaha daiyonsekkoutaino houto renrakuga tore kazamakisono nisyounenga hakkensaretakotogawakaruto matakondoha kaseizinto dairantouwoyatteiruni tigainai daigosekkoutainokotoga sinpaininatte kita 
oi kyuuentaiha syuppatusitaka bakuryouwohurikaetta 
haisudeni daigosekkoutaihe kyuuentaiha nitaisyuppatusi kyuukounakadearimasu 
daiyonsekkoutaiheno kyuuentaiha tadaimakanmonaku syuppatuitasimasuhumusouka 
oi mudenindaiyonsekkoutaiwo yobidasite meireiwo tutaerunda 
iika daiyonsekkoutaihasono saranoyouna katatiwosita kaseizinno norimonowo kakuhositeiro tekini watasitehanaran 
sorekaratadatini kyuuentaiwo mukerutoiukotomo tutaeteyareha tumudeninhasugusama daiyonsekkoutaiwo yobidasite renrakuwotorihazimeta 
tokorogatokoroga daiyonsekkoutaikaraha zyusinno outougaattakato omoutosonomama matapattarito renrakuga kiretesimatta 
mouikura yondemountomosuntomoitte konainodearu 
mudeninha makototuakana kaowosite sousinkini torituiteitagayagate yowattayouna kaowosite bakuryouno houwohurikaetta 
doumo komarimasita 
daiyonsekkoutaitoha matarenrakuga kiretesimaimasitahumu nanika ottakana nanimata henziwosennokahu ^nsuruto kaseizinga zibuntatino norimononotokoroni kaettekitanokamo sirenna teityougaunazuita 
sosite mayuwosikameta 
sorehakouiukotowo kangaetakaradearu 
tumari kaseizintatiga daigosekkoutaiwo gekihasitesimatte yuuto zibuntatino norimononotokoroni kaette kite miruto sokonihamada daiyonsekkoutaiga ganbatteita 
sikamo daiyonsekkoutaihatatta imatuziteinagakarasono kaseizinno norimonowo watasitehaikantoiu meireiwo uketabakarinanodekokode matadairantougahazimattesimattanodehaarumaika 
sorede mudenrenrakuga kiretesimattanodehaarumaika 
u ^n bukaomoino tuziteityouha meno maenihirogerareta getumenzuno ueni udewo kumutosikiriniunatteita 
daigosekkoutaiha kyuuentaiga toutyakusuru maeni zenmetusitesimattanokamo sirenai 
sono uekazamakisono nisyounenwo hakkensita daiyonsekkoutaimotatta imaidehassita kyuuentaino toutyakusurumadeumaku aitewo huseideirukadouka gimondearu 
nanisiro aiteha etaino sirenai kaseizinnanoda 
komattakotoninattazo tuzityuusahakono narenai tukisekaino uede huntousiteiru bukanokotowosikirini sinpaisiteita 
gakono tokidaiyonsekkoutaino houniha tuziteityouga sinpaisiteita izyounokotoga okotteitanodatta 
soreha kanmonaku daiyonsekkoutaihoukokutositekono sireisituno mudenkini hikonde kita 
zyusinsiteiru mudeninga mazubikkuri gyoutensuruyouna houkokudatta 
"daiyonsekkoutaihoukoku
waga taiha mesitatukisekaiwo hanarete tobitutuari "e tumudenwo uketeiru mudeninga omowazue tutoittesimatta

"waga taiha mesitatukisekaiwo hanarete tobitutuari "kono husigina houkokunihamadaatoga tuduiteita 
sekkoutaino houkoku"waga taiha dainaru sarano gotoki karerano norimonowo kakuhosiaritaritokoro totuzenkaseizinno raisyuusentosuruwo hakkenseruwomottetadatinikono norimonono naibuni irisubeteno deirigutiwo genzyuuni tozasitari 
koreha sotoni dete kaseizinwo gekitaisentoseba kazamakisono nisyounenni mosimonokotoga okorazutoha hosyoudekizarutamenari 
saiwai ryousyounentomo ikiwohukikaesitarumo imadani ziyuuni katudoudekizaru zyoutainiari "u ^mu kazamamo kisomoii guaini ikiwohukikaesitarasiina teityouhanikkorisite bakuryouno houwo tyottomitagasugu matadenbunno houni mewo utusita 
nakanaka nagai houkokudatta 
"sikarunikono norimonono deirigutiwo zenbutozasuya hiya kotuzentosite kuutyuuni hudousuruwo hakkenseri 
sassokugarasuseito omowareru madoyori hanareyuku getumenzyouwo miruni honnorimonono hikouwo sitte kaseizinraha itaku kyougakuroubaino moyounari kangauruni honnorimonowo utteha kareraha sudeni kaseini kaerukotoga hukanoutonattatameto omowaru 
koreniyotte miruni honnorimonohawaga taiwo nosete itirokaseini hikousurumonono gotosi "sokodekono kikaina meniatteiru daiyonsekkoutaikarano houkokuga kireta 
surutosugu tuduite kondoha daigosekkoutaikarano mudengahaitte kita 
o daigosekkoutaikarano houkokudayoumuumu buzidattato mieruna teityouhahitoridetubuyaitehitoride unazuita 
sositesugu mataisogasiku enpituwohasiraseteiru mudeninno temotowo mitumeteita 
"daigosekkoutaihoukoku
waga taino keitaiyoumudenkimegakete kobusiwohuriagete kitta kaibutudanhasono koutyuuno gotoki ganzyounaru sintaitukinimo kouwarazu tikarahahanahada yowakikotowo hakkenseri 
karerahawarewareno kyouryokumusounaruni kyougakuserarumonono gotosi "hu ^mu tuzityuusahasono houkokuwo yondeniyaritosita 
kono daigosekkoutaiga zibunde zibuntatinokotowo kyouryokumusounadoto taihenna tikaramotinoyouniitteirunonihawakegaatta 
tumarikokoha tukisekainanodakara tikyuuni kurabete zyuuryokuha rokuhunno itisikanainodearu 
tikyuuzyoude zyuukironomonosika moti agerarenai monomokono tukisekaini koreba zituni rokuzyuukirono ooiwaisiwo yuuto moti agetesimaukotoninarunoda 
tikyuuzyouno rokubaino rikimotininattesimaunodearu 
dakara daigosekkoutaitonatteiru teiintatiha daremo karemo nihyakukiroguraino ooiwaisiwo heikide nage tobasuhodono tikaramotibakariga sorotteirukotoninaruwakedearu 
soredeha syuugekisite kita kaibutuno houdebikkurisurunomo muridehanai 
katihokotta daigosekkoutaikarano houkokuhamada tuduku 
"kakusite kaibutudanno kareramo heikousitakani omowaruru tokiharukani kyuuentaino nitaino tikadukitutuaruwo sittatame mohayasentounihakanawanuto mitaruka isseini taikyakuwo kaisiseri 
omouni kazamakisono niteiottono yukuehumeihakono kaibutudanno siwazakato utagawareruwomottewaga taiha toutyakuseru kyuuentaito tomoni tokiwo utusazu mesitakorewo tuisekinakanari "naaruhodo bakuryougaunazuite tuziteityouno houwo miruto kaseizinha tikarahaamari tuyokunaito miemasunahumu kaseiha tikyuuniyoku nitoruga zyuuryokuha tikyuuni kurabete sanpunno itihododakarana kaseizintatiga gatuni korebadaibu zyuuryokuga hettanode kyuuni tikaramotininattayouni omottottanzyarougasikasi tikyuuzinga gatuni kitakotowo omoeba mondaininaranyo tuzityuusagaitta

souitta tokimarudesorega aizudattayouni matamo daigosekkoutaikarano houkokugahaitte kita 
"daigosekkoutaihoukoku
waga taiha kaibutudanwo tuisekisite (kono kaibutudanga kaseizindearukotowo toutyakuseru kyuuentaiyori siraseraretari )ameyamawo koetesonomukaino hiiragiyamahukinmade sinsyutuseru tokitotuzyosono hiiragiyamanokageyori kyodaina sarano gotokimonoga kuutyuuni mainoboreruwo boumisitari "umusorega daiyonsekkoutaino zyoutta kaseizinno norimonodattanoda teityouha kutibiruwo kanda 
mou ikkokuhayakereba mani attakamo sirenainoni

"daiyonsekkoutaihoukoku
waga taihakono kikainaru hisorakini norite itirokaseini muitutuarumonono gotosi

itikono hisorakiha kaseito gatutono kanwosudeni suukaiouhukuserumononari 
nizanryuuseru kaseizinha kyuuzinite zannennagarakono hisorakiwo hutatabi tukisekaini kaesu houhouwo sirazarumonono gotosi (nao kityuuwo kuwasikusirabetarumo hikoukikanto omowarerumonoha issaimiatarazu souzousurunikono hisorakiha kaseito gatutono mano inryokuwo riyouserumonoto omowaru )
sansitagattewarewareha kaseini iku igaiikatomo houhounasi 
sikono kaseizinno hanasiniyoreba kaseizintatihaosoraku warewareni kigaiwo kuwaerukotohaarumaitonokotonari 
owari "maasorega hontounara kekkouzyaga 
sikasi kaseino hisorakiga gatukara kaette kitanoniiza tuite miruto nakakara kaseizinnaranu tikyuuzingazorozoro arawaretatoatteha kaseizin|tomogabikkuri gyoutensitedonnakotowosuruka sirankaranahai 
deha daiyonsekkoutaini renrakusite kaseini tuitanaraba mazusono kaseizinno kyuuzidakewo sotoni dasi itidouniyoku setumeisesimetekarasonoatode oriruyouni tutaemasyousoudasouitteyattekure teityouha bakuryouno setuniunazuita 
sousiteiruutinimo yobi modosareta sekkoutaiha zokuzokuto kaette kita 
kaette kuruto kondohasugukono hungyouteiasibikigouno kosyousyuurini zenryokuwotukusiteita 
to saigoni daigosekkoutaitosono kyuuenni mutta nitainomonoga kikaina koutyuunoyouna ningenkuraino ookisano kaseizinwo zyuuninturete kiteisite kita

mesitakaseihe mutte tondeoru bakuryougasouiutoha tu

dakara ubattanodehanainoda 
motomotoha kuntatiga waruiano nisyounenwoanna meni awasetanode tasukeni itta monoga hakkensiano norimonono deirigutiwo zenbusimetarahitorideni hidasitesimattanodaaasoredeha inryokusyadankiga hataraitesimattanoda 
nanimo watasitatihaano nisyounenwohidoi meniha awasemasenzotada kuwasiku tikyuunokotoga kikitakattadakedesusikasi kuntatiha hizyouni nihongogaumaizyanaikadousite nihongowo sitteirundanenandemoarimasenyo watasitatiha tikyuukara housousareteiru raziowo kiite benkyousitandesu mainititikyuuno razionyuusuwo kiiteimasukara tikyuuzyounokotonara daitei sitteimasuhu ^mu bakuryouhabikkurisitayouniunatta 
ano tengaino kaseide mainititikyuuno raziowo kiite kenkyuusiteiru monogaarutoha siranakatta 
hu ^mudesono inryokusyadankitoiunohadounatteirundanenandemoarimasenyosono meinoyouni inryokuwo dakesitesimau soutidesutumari gatuno ueni oite gatuno inryokuwo dakesiwarewareno kaseino inryokuwo ukeruyounisureba sizenni maiatte kaseini hikarete ittesimauwakedesu 
onaziyouni gatuni kuru tokimowarewareno kaseino inryokuwo dakesite gatuno inryokuni hikituhararete kuruwakedesuhu ^nnaruhodone 
sikasi kaseizintaru kuntatigakonna are hateta tukisekaini kitedousurundane onazi kurunarasugu tikakuno tikyuuniyattekurebaiinoninaruhodosoreha tyottookasiikamo siremasennasikasikouiuwakedesu 
warewareno kaseiha gatuya tikyuuni kuraberutomouzutto huruinodesu 
sorede tityuuniatta aru bussituwomousukkari toritukusitesimattandesu 
sikamosono bussituhawarewarenitotte zehitomo hituyounanode onazi taiyoukara wakare deta tikyuunosorekara matawakare deta gatuno sekainarabamadakittoarudaroutoiunodesorewo torutameniwazawazayatte kiteiruwakedesuyo 
tikyuuni ikanaide gatuni kitawakedesukasoreha kenkyuuno kekkatikyuuniha ningentoiu omoinohoka sinposita seibutugairusiiyakoreha situreihontouno hanasidakaraokoranaide kudasaiwarewarega ittemo hatasite damattesono bussituwo torasitekurerukadoukawakaranakattasi ippougatuno hounarabakoreha gorannoyouni seibutuhitotuinainodesukara zyamamohairanudarouto kangaetemaa gatuno houwoerandawakedesu 
sikamowarewareha kondogahazimetedehanakumou nandomosono bussituwo torini kiteirundesuhu ^nsoukasoredewakatta 
iya kuntatino kimotihayokuwakaruyotoiunoha waga asibikigoumo onaziyouna mokutekide tikyuuwo hidasitandakaranehohoosoudesukasounandasikamo kuntatiga kaseikara gatuhe kuruyorikamottomotto daiboukenno totyuunanda 
muuasuiseiniaru tyouhousyagensono mubiumutoiu kityoubussituwo torutamenandakaranekorega midorikawahakaseno sindouryokuhasseisoutini zehitomo hituyounanoda 
sonotameni warewareha ootaketyuuzyouno sikikani simanyomeino daienseitaiwo sosikisite muuasuiseimegakete hidasitandahe ^eano muuasuiseimade mubiumuwo torinisasugano kaseizinmokono daikeikakunihabikkurisitarasikatta 
sikasi zannennagara waga asibikigouha kosyounotame itigyouni okuretesimattanodasoudesukasorehao kino dokudesu 
saiwai watasitatino nakaniha kikaisyuurinikaketeha kaseidemo yuusuuno monowoturete kiteorimasukara sassokuo tetudaiwosasemasyousoukasousitekureruto arigataineumaku syuuriga dekitaratuideni kaseini yotte kuntatiwo okuritodoketeagerukotomo dekirusoudesukasousite itadakereba tasukarimasu kaseizinno syuryouha ooyorokobiwosurutosugu bukano kaseizinwo yonde nanika kaseigode meireiwo tutaeta 
kaseino tabe monosaadeha kunmotukaretarou 
imananikaumaimonodemo tukuraserukara tuzityuusagaiuto kaseizinhaiya damedesu dametohananda sekkakusinsetuniitte kudasarunoni bakuryouga mewomuita 
iyasouiuwakedehaarimasenwareware kaseizinha monowo taberutoiukotowo wasuretesimattanodesu naninandatte 
wareware kaseizinmo sosenno zidainihayahari monowo tabetanodesu 
sikasi monowo taberunoha kutide kandari iya tyouwo tukattarisite ziyouhunwo tino nakani kyuusyuusasesono tiga sintaityuuwo mawatte motteiru youbunwo sintaini hokyuusurukotodesyou 
warewarenihamou iya tyouga taikasite nakunattesimattatoittemoiinodesu 
warewarehamou zyuubunniyoku syoukasaretayouna tabemonowo kutikaradehanaku tyokusetukekkanno nakani sosogi konde ikiteirundesuhu ^musuruto byouninga budoutouno tyuusyawosuruyounamonodana tuziteityougaunazuita 
kono hanasiwo kazamaya kisoni kikasetara naruhodotoitteano myouna kandumetosorekarasorewo kareraga kutidehanaku atamanoatarininosete soranisiteitawakewo omoi dasitani tigainai 
daga kuntatiha koutouseibutuni niawanu kakkouwositeiruneiyakoreha yoroiwo kiteirundesu 
watasitatino sintaiha kaseino yowai inryokunotameni tikyuuno ninni kurabetara hizyouni yawarakaku dekiteirunodekouiu yoroiwo kiteiruwakedesu 
kono haneha hitorihitorino hikoukinoyouni tobutamenomonodesuyo kantannasikasi kyouryokuna douryokusoutigakono haneno sitanituiteirundesuhu ^musikasi warewaregakousiteirundakara kunmo yoroiwonuidaradoudane bakuryougaiuto damedesu damedesukono sireisituha tikyuuto onazi kiatuninatteimasukara watasigakono yoroiwonuidara itipende maittesimaimasuassoukadeha sikatanainasouitteiru tokoroni teiottotyouno matusitaumezougakake aside kaette kuruto patuto kyosyuno reiwosite kaseizinbutaino kyouryokuniyottetadaima honteino syuuriga kanryouitasimasitasoukago kuroudeha tadatini syuppatuzya kaseihe mutte syuppatu!sorekara sireiteikuroganegouhe renrakuwototte asibikigouha syuurikanryoutadatini hontaini tuigyousurukotowo houkokusiro hungyouteiasibikigouhasugu samamouzento syuppatuwosita 
hizyouni koutyoudatta 
ririkusitabakarino gatuha miru miruutini tiisakunatte toozakatte itta 
sokohe mudeninga zyusinkamiwo motte kita 
"daiyonsekkoutaihoukoku
waga taiha tadaimakaseino tyuubutihouni antyakuseri 
sikiwo matu "yosi !honteiha mesitakaseihe mutte kyuukounakadato tutaero hungyouteiasibikigouha mousinni mousinwotuduketeita 
kaseigizyutuinno kikaigizyutuha omottayori yuusyuudato mietenakanaka koutyoudatta 
nakanaka koutyounoyoudearimasu 
zituha kaseizinnadoni kikaiwoizirasetedoukato sinpaisiteorimasitaga bakuryouga tuziteityounisottoitta 
iya kareramokono hungyouteiwosikkari naosanakereba zibuntatimo kaseihe kaerenwakezyakarana 
sikkari naosu hazuzyayohahhahha tuzityuusahahazimete yukaisouni waratta 
oodan'ensate asibikigouha kanmonaku kaseini antyakusurutosokodeanohusigina saranoyouna kaseino norimononi turete korareteita daiyonsekkoutaino taityoutoriharahikokitiikazen'into kazamasaburoukisokyuuman'itino ryousyounenwo syuuyousi tukisekaini torinokosareta kaseizinwo kudasita 
kazamakisonisyounenno yorokobimo ookikattakeredo are hateta tukisekainimo sukoside torinokosarerutokorowo buzini kaereta kaseizintatino yorokobimo hizyounamonodatta 
zenkaseizinmokono asibikigouno kouiwo syasite taihenna kangeiwosuru yousudattakeredo sakiwoisoideiru asibikigouhaano tukisekaitankentaityouno kaseizinto saikaiwo tumasisugusama hontaiwo otte syuppatusurukotoninatta 
syuppatu!tuziteityouno meireiitisitahungyouteiasibikigouha yasumu himamonakatta kaseini wakarewotugeta 
sosite daiutyuuno nakawo sin'itimozini hontaiwo otte mousinmata mousinwo tuduketutuatta 
kakusite daiutyuuno nakawo tukisusumukoto zituni gonen!mokutekino muuasuiseini toutyakusuru magiwaninatte asibikigouha yauyaku hontaito gattaisurukotoga dekita 
kono gonentoiu nagai kantada ikkide daiutyuuwo toppasite hontaini oituitatoiukotoha sireiteikuroganegouniaru ootaketyuuzyouno sikito asibikigouno tuzityuusatono issimidarenupittarito kokyuuno atta tamamonodatta 
sorenisitemo imada zinruino souzoumo oyobanakatta daimuuasuiseiheha 
muuasuiseino syuuihamada kontonbakutaru noumituna taikini tozasareteita 
sudeni motironkokokara miru taiyouha yozoranikirameku ittenno hosinoyounamonodeattagasikasikono muuasuiseinosobaniha arotasudaiseiunga giragirato kagayaiteitanode muuasuiseino sekaiha tikyuuno nibaiguraino akarusadatta 
daiutyuuenseitaino taiinha zen'intomo kimitutoryouwo nutta utyuuhukuwotuketa 
sono utyuuhukuno menotokoronihaatarino akarusani mewoyararenuyouni koi syokunotuita syakougarasugatukerareteita 
gasoreyorimo naniyorimokono muuasuiseini orite daiippowo sirusita taiinga gakuroitanohakono daisuiseiga tikyuuno suuzyuubaimoaru kyodainamonodattasi situryoumo ookikattanode taihenna zyuuryokudearisonomamadehaamarini sintaiga omoku kanzi hotondo tatteha arukenutoiukotodatta 
daino otokotatiga akan bounoyouniyouyaku hatte arukuyouna simatudatta 
tukisekaideanotyotto hanerutohuwatto tondesimau migarusawo sitteiru kazamato kisohabikkurisitesimatta 
odoroitane sanbutyannandaka sintaityuuga namarininattamitaidaneukkarisiteiruto zimenni harituitesimauzeu ^nsouda kumatyan tuziteityouno tokubetusuittiwo irero !souda aturakuninattazokono tuziteityouno tokubetusuittitoiunoha tuzityuusagaano kaseizinno saranoyouna norimononituketearutoiu inryokusyadankikara omoituita inryokumetusatusoutidesorega utyuuhukunimotukeraretearunodatta 
konoo inde itidouha yoteidoorino sagyouwosurukotoga dekita 
kityoubussitumubiumu
kono inotigakeno daiboukenwosite kita mokutekino mubiumu
sono mubiumuha hatasite midorikawahakaseno yosoudoorikono daimuuasuiseiniha muzinzoutoittemoiihodoarunoda !*souinsimanmeini amaru mizouno daiutyuuenseitaino mokutekihakokoni nakabawo tassitanoda

kono hundeha saisyono yoteiyorikaharukani hayaku kaerukotoga dekisoudearu 
kono kuwasii mezurasii hanasihaizure kazamasyounentatiga kaette kitekarayukkuritositekurerukototo omotteiru 
tada saigoni aru nitino asano razionyuusunokotowo tutaete okou

oi kouzyouwoieto gangaitta 
nanno 
hebini geiwosaserundayosikitasomosomokoreha kanno haikouga hutatuni kitta sirohebino sisondegozai tyousiomosirokuhayasitatetanode hitobitoha sukosizutu atumarikaketa

tugiha 
moudaremoinakatta nageraretahebihagunnyarito yowatteita 
karehasorewo hirouto urano hayasino houhe isoida 
sokoniha ookuno seitoga mureteitakarerano daibubunha suidenni itowotaretekaeruwotutteita 
sono hokano monoha kokagekokageni kosiwoorosite zassiwo yondari syukudaiwo toitarisiteita 
ganhazuraritokarerawo mimawasitakoretoiuyatugaattara kenkawositeyarou 
dagaainiku yowasounayatubakaride aitetosurunitaranusokodekareha kino sitani tatte itidouwo miorositeitakareno munehaitumo genkigamitimititeirukareha maiasamegasamerutouresisawo kanzuru gakkouheitte ookuno gakuseiwonaguttariketobasitari ziyuuni siekisitarisurunogasaraniuresii

naniga kahiteru

to tibikougakiita 
naiyokimiha 
bokumonai oyaganainohao kinganaiyorimo kanasiikotodanesorenibokuha tikaraganaikimiha tikaragaarukaraiisa tikaragaattemodamedato yutakakouha kyuuni haradatasikuoreha maiasanamabanninagurarerundasositeimodano mamedanonasidanokakidanobundorarerundasoredemoorehadamattenakyanaranaibokumo maiasatouhuwo kuwareruyokiminazoha tikaragaarukaranagurikaesiteyarutoiindadamedayoto yutakakouhaayaukukoboreyoutosuru namidawokoraeteitta

syuhadaremurasakino hukumennizyuusankikutuwawonarabete tararararatatararararatapukapukapukararararararaumaizoumaizoto itidouga kassaisita

sorekarakareha haikaranahayariutawoutatta 
bokuranyawakaranaito tibikouhaitta zissaimirumono kikumonogotonikareha kyuuyuutatiyoriharukaniokuretakotoni kigatuita asaha gakkouheyuku hituyouna syosekiya zassihao kinwoosimazu kattemorau gakkoukara kaeruto katudousyasinwo miniitteiroironakotowooboetekurunodatenbin bouwokatuide iewoidetukarete iehe kaerisonomama netesimau zibunnadotohaamarini mibunno sagaaru 
o zenga hakobareta tibikouha tiisakunatte situno suminisuwattakareha kyoukono sekihekonakerebayokattato omotta 
iroirona kuusouha situbouya hungainitomonatte atamano nakani ouraisita 
hitobitohasakannio zenwoarasita tibikouhadamatteo zenwo mirutotaino yakizakananikintonkamabokomagurono sasimiha akaku kagayaki sui monoha atatakani yugewotateteiru 
kareha ozisanwo omoidasita ozisanhaitumo kutigusenikouitta 
magurono sasimide iti|haiyarakasitaimondanaakorewo ozisanhe motteittaradonnani yorokobudaroukarehakou omoikaesitasousitetaiha obasanto hahaga sukidakarakamabokodakeha iehekaettekarabokuga tabeyou

mitinokanatani mieru ookina tatemonoha itinenmaeni kayoinareta syougakkoudearu 
gekkano syougakkouhaima yasurakani nemutteiru 
hasigo katatino yanenomunekarananamenihirogarukawarano namiomoidasitayounigiragira hansyasuru madono garasukonmoritosigetta kouteino taizyusokode zibunha rokunennoaida heiwani sodattasokonihaarai kazemohukazu tumetai amemo hurazuyasasii senseino ziaino meni mimamorarete haruno kusani asobu syoubatonogotokuutaitu hasirituodorituwarattasokoniha kaikyuuno hensukoburumonaku hinpuno saimonaku benkyousurumonoha itibanninarinamakerumonoha rakudaisitadaga rokunennoowari !oosoreha yorokobubeki sotugyousikikahatamata kanasimubeki sotugyousikika kokubetuno utawoutautotomoni onazi sunohatoyasuzumeha nisito touzyouto sitahe kakuzentowakareta 
oyanoaru monokinnoaru monohanao gakuhuno kaidanwoyozi nobotte koutouhe susumi sihanhe susumi syougyougakkouhe susumusikarazarumonohakono nitiwokagirini gakumonto eikyuuniwakaretesimatta

yai tibitotuzenkoega kikoete rozino kakinekara namabangaarawareta 
oridumewoyokoseiyadayoto tibikouha ori hakowohutokoroni osikonda 
iyada 
kora yutakamatuhaotonasikuorenimitugiwosasagetanoniomaehaiyadatoiunokaiyadakoreha ozisanniagerundakarayaikora tukisamahaorenogenkotugakowakunaikayo namabanha yutakakoukara ryakudatusitataino owotukande dounotokorowomusyamusya tabenagaraitta 
sakaikunbokuha maiasakimini touhuwo kuwaretemonantomoiwanakattakoredakeha kanninsitekuretamaekimiha yutakakounowo tabetanarasoredeiizyanaikakisamaha yutakakouwogiseinisite zibunno gimuwonogareyoutoiunoka gimudatte 
bokuhananimokiminisakanawoyaru gimuhanaiyoyai kozoukora tusannenno raionwo taizisita namabanwo siranaikayosi tunamabanno tega hayakumo tibikounohutokoronihaitta 
iyadaiyadabokuha sindemoiyada tibikouha ryouudewo kundehutokorowo mamotta 
ei mendouda namabanhazuruzuruto ori hakowohikidasita tibikouha hissininatte arasouta 
itiha oziwo yorokobaseyoutoiu issinninobosetumeteiru itihawaga harawomitasoutoiu yokubouni kikuruwasikunatteiru 
daiheito tibikoumurontekisi ebekumonai namabanha tibikouno yokomenwopisyaritonaguttanagurarenagara tibikouhatenuguino haziwonigittehanasanai 
ei tukoetotomonikeageta asisaki!tibikouhabattaritaoreta 
hutatabi okiagattatokiharukani namabanno biwautaga kikoeta 
sore tatuzinha daimisu eikoha yumeka maborosika tibikouno mekara atui namidagatomedonaku nagareta kinnotamenisainamaretakareha wanryokunotamenisainamarerukono yonoaritoarayuru hakugaihatadawareninomi atumattekurunodato omotta 
hakamanodorowoharattetobotoboto arukidasitagairoirona hihunga muneni moetedokowodou aruitakawakaranakattakarehahyoro nagai popurano sitani tattatokihazimetewaga iehekitakotowo sitta ieno nakadeha kurai dentouno sitade oziga mamewohiiteiru otoga kikoeru 
giigiizarazarausuwomoruru mameno otogatyoudoararenoyouniikamesii nakaniusunosureru otohaikanimo kanzyakudearu miseno okuniha hahaga issyoukenmeini kimonowo nuuteiru 
yaseta kaoniokure kegatarete kire meno nagai mede hariwo oinagarahuto tewoyametanohawaga kono asiotowo kikituketatamedearou 
oridumeganaikou omottatoki tibikouhakoraerarenakunattenakidasita 
daredae hahano koegasita 
sensanka isiusuno otogayanda 
sousite kowoakerutotomoni ozino kubidakega sotohe deta 
naniwositerunda sensantibikouhadamatteiru 
oinaiterunoka oziha tewohiite ieheireta 
hahaha sinpaisounikonoarisamawo miteita obahasudeni netesimattarasii

maa kimonohayabuketehakamahadorodarakenito hahamo hihunno namidanikureteitta 
zyoyakuno kodane sakaino kodaneyosi tuozino kaohamakkaninattakato omoutosugumassaoninatta 
kareha suisouno herininosetatenuguiwohutokoroni osikonde iewo tobidasita 
ozisanwotometeto hahaga sakenda 
tibikouhasugu sotohe tobidasita 
daizyoubuda sinpaisunaminna netemoiiyo ozisanha hasirinagarakouitta

tibikouhaagarikamatini kosiwokakete ozito hahano kaeriwo matteita 
obasanha hiruno nakaha kutiyakamasiinikakawarazu yoruninarutomattaku ikuziganakunatte nemuttesimaunode okositatokorode okisounimonai 
touhuyaha mimeini okinebanaranu syoubaida tibikouha hiruno tukareniutoutoto nemukunatta 
nemuttiyaikeneetokareha zibunwosikarituketagaittan osoikitatta suimahanakanakasirizokanaigurarigurarito sayuuni kubiwo ugokasitakato omouto syouzini atamawokotunto uttahatto mewosamasite niwahe dete kaowo aratta gatuha popurano edawomorete aoziroi hikariwo toitaya isiusuyakomoya suisouni otosutosorerano kagegamazamazato ikitayouniuitekuru 
tibikouha kutibuewohuita 
tokeiha totokiwo utta 
ozisanga kenkawositerunzyanakaroukamosisoudatosuruto tibikouhakou kangaetatoki syounenno tisioga gotaininarihibiita 
sakaino ieheittanitigainaidaga sakaino oyaziha zyoyakuda kobunga oozeida ozisanhitoridehatotemokanawanaidarousousurutokarehamoudamatteirukotogadekinakunatta sintaiha tiisaigaoreno houga tadasiinda ozisanwo tasuketeagenakyanaranai 
kareha amadonosinbari bouwohazusite tenisagetasorekarazyoubusounazourinihakikaete sotohedetamezasutokoroha sakaino iedearukareha imanimo oziga rantouransenni hibanawotirasiteirukanoyouni omotta munega takanarisite sintaigahurueta 
matini matudukiroutoiu ryouriyagaarusono maenisasikakattatokikarehatadanaranu monootowo kiita

suruto hokano otokogamata onazikotowoitte hasitta

ozisan !to tibikouha monnainikakekondeitta 
oo sensankaomaenokatakiha utteyattazoiika asitakara syoubaini derutokinihana teppoutonaginatatowakizasitomasakarito nanatu douguwosyottederoiika zyoyakunosegarega goutounidetemo keisatudeha touhuyawo hogositekurenaindakaranakouitta ozisanno ikiha sakekusakatta 
aruketo zyunsagaitta 
mattekudasaiomawarisanto tibikouha zyunsano maenisuwatta 
ozisanha yotterundesu ozisanwoyurusitekudasai asitano asaninatte sakegasametara ozisanto issyoni keisatuheayamarinimairimasu ozisangainakereba watasihitorideha touhuwo tukurukotogadekimasen tibikouno koeha namidanihurueteita 
naniwonukasukabakato ozisangadonatta 
syoubaigadekinakattarayametesimae syoubaiwositakaratte zyoyakuno musukoni kuwaretesimaubakarida ozisanhanosonosoto arukidasitakareha monno sotoninakunaku tatteiru imouto(tibikouno haha)wo miyatte sukosi tyuutyositagaatohatanomuzeoreha goutouno oyadamawo taizitandakarakorekara keisatuhegohoubiwomorainiyukunda hahagananikaioutositaga ozihazunzun'ittesimattahitorino zyunsatohutarino matino ningatukisouteitta

komattaneeto hahagaitta 
sakainikegawosasitandesyoukasourasiiyotaisitakotomonaiyoudagasoredemo aitega zyoyakusandakarane konbankaettekurudesyou 
saahutariha omoi omoino yuuutuwoidaite iehe kaetta hahaha togutini tatidomatte hukai tame ikiwotuitakano onnaha obanoo senwoosoreteirunodearu oziha sinsetudaga obahananikanitukete zyakendearutayorubeki sinruimonai bosiha mainitiobano kaoirowoukagawanebanaranunodeatta

hento obaha hiyayakaniwaratta 
nanteebakana nindaroukono kogakawaiikaratte zyoyakusanwonagurunante asitakara syoubaiwodousurutumoridaroudousitego mesiwo tabeteyukutumorinano 
o senha nemui memosukkarisamete kutigitanaku ryouninwononositta

sasiire monottenaani

tibikouha touwakusita 
mamewohikunisitemo nirunisitemoomaeno udedehatotemodekinaisi watasino kangaedeha toubunyasumuyorihokanisikataganaigasousurutoo miyohasimizimitoitta 
yasumimasen ozisannodekirukotonarabokugayattemisemasubokunotameni zyoyakuwonagutta ozisanni taisitemobokuharusu atarippaniyattemisemasudemosasiire monohaneo kaasanbokuno kangaedehaneo kaasanmobokuto issyoni touhuwo tukuttesorekara ozisanno mawari basyowo urinidetekudasai hutarideyarebadaizyoubudesusoudatoo miyohauresisouniitta 
soudayo sensanwatasiha onnadakarananimodekinaito omotteitaga konyakara otokoninarebaiinoda ozisanto onazi ninninarebaiinodasousiyouneo kaasanni kawokatugasete touhuwo urasetakuhanaindakeredomoo kaasanbokuhamada tiisaikarasikatagaarimasen ookikunattarakittokonoumeawasewosimasu tibikouno kouhunsita meharurinogotokusumiwatatte hitomiha kantameno yuukini moeta

obasanhananimosinakutemoiikaratada sasizudakesitekudasaito tibikouhaitta

saaikouzetoo miyohaiseiyokuitta

rappahahukenaikara suzunisuruyotoo miyohawaratteitta 
zyao sakini tibikouha kawokatuide iewodetanantonaku senzyouhedemoderuyouna kintyousita kimotiga gotainiahuretakareha umaretehazimete sekininwo kanzitaimamadeha samuinituke atuinituke syoubaiwo yasumitaito omottakotomoattamata ozisannisikararerukarasikatanasinideteittakotomoattasikasikono nitiha zenzensoreto kotonatta itidaikakumeiga seisinno ueni inadumanogotoku okotta 
oregasikkarisinakerebaminnaga komarukareha keisatuniaru ozisanmo obamo hahamoyase udeipponde yasinawanebanaranu daisekininwo kanzurutotomoni hontannogotoki yuukigaikanaru konnanwomoutikudaiteyarouto kessinsaseta 
rappano otohahogarakanihibiitakareha reinotanbo mitikara matihehairoutositatoki kyoumo namabanga matteirudarouto omotta

naniwo 
namabanhabikkurisite sakendagatugino kugatugenakattakarehaitumo namidagundepekopeko atamawo sageru tibizyogasikamo sakuyakareno ozigaoreno titiwonaguttakotowo sitteru tibizyoga hukusyuunoosoremo kanzezuniitumoyori yuukannanowo miruto zissaikorehodohusigina gensyouhanainodeatta 
mate tumatteirarenaiyo asitano asamataaoune tibikouhazunzun saroutosita

sakaiyoseyosoreha yanagikouitideatta 
nandeekimiha waruiyoto kouitiha ayumiyotta 
nandeeto namabangahoeta 
kimihabokuto sinyuuninarutoittakotowowasuretakawasurehasineezya issyoni gakkouheikousikasimouiiyo kouitiha namabannohiziwotottasousite tibikouninikkorisitehurikaetta 
tibikouha toridabouwonuide itireisita 
kono nitihodo touhuno ureta nitihanakatta matideha kakutairaga zyoyakuwonagutte kouryuusaretatoiu uwasaga itienni hirogattasikamosoreha mazusiki touhuyano koganinattekuru touhuwo goudatusitauramidatowakattanode tyounaino douzyouha nagareno hikukinitukugagotoku tibikouni atumatta 
katteyare katteyarekawaisouni touhunokiraina iemadega arasoute touhuwo katta tibikounohukurappaha gaikanogotoku narihibiita 
nizikannisite uritukusitanode tibikouha keisatuheitta 
ozisanwoyurusitekudasai ozisanga waruindenainodesu sakega waruindesukarakareha keibunikou aigansita 
keisatudehayurusiteyaritaindato keibuha douzyouno mewomatataiteitta 
daga sakaino houde zidannisinaito keisatudeha komarunda kangokuheikundesyoukasounarukamosirenaikimino houde sakainikakeattenantokasitemoraundane tibikouhagakkarisite keisatuwodetasorekarasono asidesasiire yaheyuki uridamekara sitizyuugosenwodasiteitta 
doukayorosikuo negaisimasu kakutairasandattanetosasiire yano teisyugaitta 
haa kakutairasannosasiirehasunderuyo sandohunno bentoudesuyoaasunderudaregasitekuretanodesudaredakawakaranaigasunderu gozyuusenno bentouga sanbonheesorezyatiri kamiwo hitotutiri kamitotenuguito mouhunimaitomakuratosoremosunderusoremo 
to tibikouhaakiretedonatagayattekudasuttanodesukasoremoienaiiwazuniitekuretoiundakarazyasasiiresurumonohahokaninandesyousono ningaminnayattekurerukaraiidarou tibikouhaakkenitorarete kotobagadenakatta sinruitotehokanihanasi tomodatihaarudarougasikasi tokumeinisitesasiiresurunodehahudannisahodo kon'inisiteiru nindenaikamosirenu zibundeha souzoumodekinuga hahanikiitara omoiatarukotomoarudaroukou omottekarehasokowodeta iehe kaeruto hahamosudeni kaetteita 
umaretehazimetetenbin bouwokatuidanode hahahagakkaritukarete katawo hiyamizude hiyasiteita 
doudesitao kaasanto tibikougaitta 
taihenniyoku uretayoto hahahawaratteita 
bokuno houmo hizyouniyokattadesu nizikannoutinikarehakaranookewo misesorekara uridamewo obaniwatasitesasiiremonono ikkenwo katatta 
daredarounesaadaredarou obato hahahasikirini siri ninno meiwo kazoeagetagasorehaminna tokumeino hituyounonai nindeari mouhunimaiwo kau siryokunonai ninbakarideatta 
sono nitino yuuhanhasabisikatta sakewo nonde kenkawosurunoha komarugasatesono ninga rougokuniaruto omoebasabisisaga issousimizimito mini semaru 
sakainikakeatte zidannisitemorauyounisimasyoukaneto hahaha obaniitta 
maasousuruyorihokanisikatagaarimasumaito obagaitta 
tibikouworusunisite hutarihasorezore tizinwotayotte zidanno undouwosita 
yorosiinantokasimasyoukou kaidakusitekureta ninha sigoninmoattaga yokuzituninaruto syouzentositekouiu 
doumo sakainoyatuhadousitemokikimasenyokonoueha bengosinitanonde nozomino tunamo kirehatete ikkasanninhatagainitame ikiwotuita 
motoyori onnato kodomonokotodearu kokoroha yuukinimititemokaradano hirouha mikkameno asanihagesikuosoutekita 
hahano kataha murasakini harete kawo oukotogadekinai tibikouha suiminno husokuto kadono roudounotameni atamaga oobanisinogotoku omokunari doukiga takamari ikigurusikunattekita 
touhuwo kau ninha ookunattaga tukuru ninganakunari urinideru monoganakunatta 
zidanga hutyoude kakutairaha kangokuhemawasareta 
sannanninga kakutairanosasiire monowositakaha eikyuuno gimontosite houmurareta 
sikasi tibikouno ikkaha sidaisidaini binkuni sematta 
yonakano nizini okite touhuwo tukureba asanihamoutukarete matiwomawarukotogadekinai 
matiwomawaroutosureba yonakani touhuwo tukurukotogadekinai 
konotamenio miyoha onnatehitotudewazukabakarino touhuwotukuri tibikouitininga urini derukotonikimeta 
seisakuno ryouga sukunainodeikura uretemomoukeru kingakuhakiwamete sukunakunatta 
tibikouhaitumo kaeri mitini hurutakaratanisiwo hiroute kaetta 
ikkasanninnookazuhatanisitookarabakarideatta 
obanoo senha mainitinoyouni gutiwokobosita 
omaenotamenikonnakotoninattayokorewo kikutabini tibikouhaitumo namidagundeitta 
obasanbokuhadonnanimokasegukarasonnakotowoiwanaidekudasaiyoaru nitikareha touhuokewokatuide reino uramitiwo kayottakareno mimini totuzeniyouno onkyouga kikoeta 
soreha isyano tedukano iedeatta 
yuuhihakatto ue komiwo somete dozouno kabega moyuruyouni akaku hansyasiteita 
ussouto sigetta kigino midorinoaidani akaruibotanno hanaga mezamurubakarinisakihokotteirunoga mieru 
sokoni ookina ikegaatte dobasiwokakewatasimigiwaniha siroisyoubumo mieru 
soreyorizutto okuni kairouukyokusite syouzino syokumatu sironisokorakara pianono otoga eigawohokorukanogotoku nagaretekuru 
aasono iehabokuno titino iedattanoda tibikouha anzentositeokewo robouniorosite udewokunda 
o tousanha seitounotamenikono iemadenakusitesimattanoda 
o tousanhazuibun ninno sewamosikono matinotameninarukotowositanodagaimadehadarehitorisorewoiu monoganai 
sono konobokuha touhuwo uttesoredemogo mesiwo taberukotogadekinai tibikouha kyuuninakitakunattakareha zibunga umaretatokinihakono teino nakawo zyotyuuya ubanidakarete komori utawo kikinagara nemuttakotodarouto souzousita 
tumaranainatokareha tanikisita 
ikura hataraitemogo mesiga taberarenainoda hatarakanai hougaii sindesimauhougaiibokunazoha ikiteru sikakuganainoda robounokaerunoyouni ninnihumaretehetabattesimaunoda kurai yuuutuhakareno kokorowo tozasita 
kareha zibunno kagebousigaikanimo awareni hosonagaku kakineni kussetusiteirunowo minagaratame ikiwohaita 
kagebousimadenandaka misuborasiiya pianono otoha kigino hawoyusutte suzukazeni nottekuru 
o tousannoaru monoha kouhukudanaaaasitebounboun pianowohiite tanosindeirukarehagakkarisiteokewokatuida 
tukareta asiwohikizutte nisan|kanarukidasutosokodehitorino onnano koniatta 
soreha kouitino imoutono humikodeatta 
kano onnaha zinzyouno gonendeatta 
sitabukurenourizane kaode meha ookisugiruhodopattiritosite kamiwo hutatuni satte ryoumiminotokorode musubi tamawokosaeteiru 
genrokusodeno seruni ebityanohakamawohaki issyoukenmeini gomuhoozukiwo kutide narasiteita 
konbanhato tibikouha koewokaketa 
konbanhato humikohanikkorisiteitta 
gasugu omoidasitayouni aokisan niisangaanatawo sagasitetawa niisanga 
aa nanika youzigaarundesukasoudesyou watasisiranaikeredomo humikohakouittematabuubuuhoozukiwonarasita 
kyuuyounano 
soudesyounandarou aebawakaruzyanaino 
sorehasoudesuna niisangaima ieniirudesyouittetyoudaine humikohakouittagasugu watasimo issyoniikuwaasokoni ookina inugairukaraoiharattetyoudaineaa sakayano inudesukahutariha narande arukidasita 
syougakkouniitatokiniha humikohamadamadaosanakatta 
getanohanaoga kirete nangisiterunowo mite tibikouhatenuguiwosaitehanaowosugeteyattakotogaaru 
sonotoki katanitukamatte kataasiwo tibikouno kataasino ueni nosetakotowokareha kiokusiteiru 
hutariha kouitino ieno uragutino maehekita 
mattetene humikoha asiwokeagete hasiridasi kattekutino kowoaketakato omouto ookina koede sakenda 
niisan aokisanwoturetekitawa niisan hayaku kouitino sugataga konoaidakaraarawareta 
yakamasiiyatudanaotenba !sonnakotowoittara aokisanwoturetekiteagenaiwaomaegaturetekonakutemo aokikunhakokoniiruzyanaika kouitihawarainagara tibikouno houwo mukikimityottohaittekuretamaebokuhadoroasidesukarasoukazya niwaheikou tibikouhaokewo katasuminioite kouitino usironisitagatta 
hutarihauno hanaga yukinogotokusakimititeiru nakaniwahedeta 
sokono niwatorisyaniimasimo oikomaretaniwatoridomohamadagotagotahisimekiatteita 
kimini soudangaarundaganeto kouitiha kinsuguna kaowositeiidasita 
bokuhabokuno tititomoyoku soudannouedekonokotowokimetandagadonnakotodesukatumarikiminimoiroiro hukouna zizyouga kasanatteruyoudagakimihamou sukosi gakumonwosuru kiganaikanesorehabokudatteto tibikouha hayakutiniitta

koharaha heiso|tinmokukagengakuryokuhasahododenaiga yakyuubuno hosyutosite zenkouni sinraisareteiru 
katahabaga hiroku kaoha sikakudedoronogotoku kuroiga ookina meha sentaakarademo masukuwotoositemierunode yuumeidearudarekagakarewo hyousite umanoyouna medatoittatokikarehasouzyanaioreno meha kokontouzaino kakiwo yomitukusitakarakonnani ookikunattanodatoitta

doroboumega tikusyoudorobougaitano

syokun
koharahosyuha koudanno sitaniodori dasite itidouno houhe ryoutewohirogete tatta 
koutyousenseiga syokunni kokubetuno ziwotamawarusoudaga syokunha senseitowakareru isigaaruka isigaarunara kokubetuno ziwo kikubesida isinonai monohadousitemo senseitowakaretakunaimonohao hanasiwo kiku hituyouganaito omougadoudasouda muronda koudouno kabegawarerubakarino kassaito hakusyuga okotta 
koharaonegaisitekure senseinionegaisitekuredarekagasukitooru koedekouitta 
koutyouhamassaoninattekono karadawo miteita 
zibunga tesionikakete kyouikusita seitogakahodomade zibunwo sinzitekurerukato omouto kokorono nakadenakazunihairarenakatta 
sensei!koharaha koutyouno houhe mukinaotteittasonomatu kurona kaoni moyurugotoki honoogahirameita hiroi katato hutoi kubiga namino gotokuhurueteiru 
sensei!karehahutatabiittaga namidaga nodonitumattenanimoienakunatta 
koutyousensei!kouiuyainayakareha kyuuni koewotatetesusuriagesono hutoi udewo meniatetesimatta 
koudouha mizuwo uttayounisizumattasigureni utaruru huyukusanogotokusokokokokaranaki koega okottatosoregayagatekoraekirenakunatte itidoninakidasita 
kanbunno senseiha ryoutede kaowokakusita asaisenseiha tobirawoakete sotohedeta hokano senseitatiha migini katamuki hidarini katamuite namidawokakusita 
koutyouhasizukani koudanni tatta 
hikuisikamo sokodikaranoaru koehakutibirukaramoreta 
syokun!husyoukuboikatumiga toukouni housyokusiteyorikokoni rokunenimada nitiasakinikakawarazu maekoutyounonokosareta bihuuto toutihouno kenzennaru kuukito syokuinsyosino atusiminotoniyotte saiwaini daikizunaku koutyouno ninmuwo dukusi etarukotowo manzokuni omotteimasu konkaitoukyokuno inotiniyori honkouwo sari syokuntowakarerukotoninattakotoha zituni ikantosurutokorodearimasuga zizyoumakotoniyamuwo emasen 
omouni rigousyuusanha zinseinotuneaete kanasimuni tarazarukotodearimasutada syokunnisite watasiwo omou kokoroarunarasono utukusiki yuuzyouwotuginikitarubeki koutyounisasagetekuretamae syokunno hitokotoitigyounisitemosi mitiwoayamaruyounakotogaareba maekoutyouno kuboiha munousyadearutowarawarerudarou syokunno kenzennaru goukikakannaru seiginiatuku yuuzyouni tomerukono kihuuwo usinawazarebasorehayagate kuboikatumino meiyodearu watasiha syokungaikani watasiwo itositekurerukawo sitteiru syokunmomata watasino kokorowo sitteirudarou kumoyamakemurimizusouhedaturedomo ippenno itanasakokoni souyurusebawakarerukotohanandemonai watasiwo omounarasizukanisizukani watasiwokono tikara sarasimetekuretamae watasimo syokunwo omoebakosokono tiwo sarunoda koehasizukanasizukana yuunamiga kisiwo utukanogotokudeattaga sidaini kouhunsite sibukigasatto iwaatamanihanekakarukato omoutosorewoosaerugotoku motonosizukasani kaerunodeatta itidouha daitorino tubasanidakikomareta hinadorinogotoku nariwosizumeta 
mosi syokunnisite watasiwo omouamarini keisotuna koudouwotoruto watasiga rokunenkankono urawamatinitukusita kokorozasiha zenzen|houmuraretesimaukotoninaru syokunha gakuseino hunwo siranakerebanaran gakuseiha kessite zokusekainokotoni yubiwo sometehanarantada watasiha syokunniiu zyon buraitoha tadasikiwo hundeosorurunakaretoitta watasihakono kakugenwo syokunni osieta watasiga sarunomosoredearu syokunmomatakono kakugenwowasuretehanaranu gonennamaha rainenda itinenseimo gonenno notiniha sotugyousurudarousonotokinihamata aeruharukani urawano tenwonagamete syokunno kenzenwo inorou syokunmomataimamadedoorinirippani benkyousitamae koharahaguttarito atamawotaretedamattamou nanninmoiumonoganai koutyougaikanimo kanasigeni itidouwo miorosite itireisita seitohakotogotoku kiritusiteozigiwosita 
sousitesonomamahutatabinakidasita 
kouretuno houkara tobirakutihekuzuredasitaitosimeyakana asidori sousikinogotoku kanasigeni itidouha koudouwodeta 
damekana akouitiha hitobitotohanaretehitorinakitaito omottakareha yumenogotoku matiwo aruitakareha zibunno haigokaraisogasisouniaruitekuru asiotowo kiita asiotoha sidaini tikaduitasousite kouitiwo toorisugosita 
aokikunkareha yobitometa 
aa yanagisandokoheyuku 
kouitiha tibikouga touhuokemokatuganainowohusigini omotta 
bokunoozisanwo mimasenkato sensanhaurourositeitta 
iya minaiaasoudesuka kesakara iewodetakiridesukaranamata sakaino iehedonarikominiittanodehanaikato omottene sensanhanakidasisouna kaowositeita 
sinpaidarounebokumo issyonisagasiteageyou gotibikouto kouitiha uramontoorikara simizuyayokotyouhedeta 
sokode tibikouha siri aino yaoyanikiita 
ieno ozisanwo mimasenkaaa mitayoto yaoyagaitta 
sakkine marutan bounoyounamonowo mottenekokowo kayottakara koewokakerutoneoreha daidorobouwo uti korosiniyukundatoittetakkedokoheittadesyousaa teisyabano houheittayouda yottemasitakatitobakasi sakekusakattayoudattaganaa tibikouhayakuyukanaitotondakotoninarukamosirenaiyoarigatou tibikouhamou munega itipaininattayouyaku kangokukaradetekitamonogamatasitemo sakaini tearanakotowositeha ozisanno sintaihakokonihoroburuyorihokahanaidonnanisitemo ozisanwosagasidasi ieheturete kaeranebanaranu 
hutariha asiwo hayameta 
teisyabaheyukuto ozisanno sugataga mienai tibikouha zyunsanikiita 
aakitayo nanpunbakari maedesukasaa sanzyuuhunbakari zenkanedottino houheyukimasitakasaato zyunsaha kubiwokasigete tokiwamatitooriwomassuguniittayouni omougahutariha oodoorihe mitiwo totta 
dousitekouiyanakotobakariarundarouneto kouitihaitta 
bokuga omounikono yono nakanihitori waruiyatugaaruto yono nakazentaiga warukunarundesuto tibikouhaitta 
dagakimi syakaiga tadasiimonodearunarahitoriyahutarigurai waruiyatugaattemosorewo gekitaisuru tikaragaarubekihazudasorehasoudagasikasi waruiyatuno houga tadasii ninyorimo tiegaarimasukaranetumari kunno gakkouno koutyousanyori sakaino houga tiegaarimasudousitemo waruiyatunihakanaimasensonnakotohanaito kouitiha kaowomakkanisite sakenda 
mosikono yoni seigiganakattarabokuraha tuitatidatte ikiteirarenainodabokuha waruiyatuto tatakawanakyanaranaikono yono akkanwokotogotoku gekitaisite seigino kuninisiyouto omoebakosobokuraha gakumonwosurunzyanaikasorehasoudagasikasi tuyoiyatunihakanaimasen seigiseigitoittatokorodebokuno oziha kangokuheyarareru sakaiha zyoyakudeibatterusorehadoutomonaranaizyaarimasenkahutariha keisatusyono maehekitaimasimo sitihatininno hitobitogahitorino otokowo biki tatete monnaihehairutokorodeatta 
tibikouha denkini kanzitayouniodoriagatte hitobitono notiwo outa 
tomatasugumodottekita 
ozisankato omottarasoudenakattakareha ansinsitamononogotoku mewo kagayakasitasousitekouitta 
kenkasite ninwokittandesuttesorehaiikotodehanaigabokuhaaaiu ninwo mirutonandakasono ninno houga tadasiiyouna kigasitenarimasen tokiniyorutobokumonebokugamosi sintaigakonnani tibidenakattaramou sukosi udeni tikaragaattara waruiyatuwo katatu hazikara kitteyaritaito omoukotogaarimasu sintaiga tiisakute binboude yowai hahaoyatohutaride ozisanno yakkaininatteirundehaiitaikotogaattemoienaiissobokuno atamaga gamusyarade ranboude sakainoyouni zento akutono sabetuganainarabokuhamou sukosi kouhukukamosiranaikeredomo gakkoude senseini osiwattakotowowasurenaisi mitinihazuretakotowositakunaitameni ninni humaretemokeraretemogamansuru kininarimasusonnakotodeha sondesu yono nakani ikiteiraremasensou omoinagarayahari waruikotohasitakunaisine tibikouha namidagunde tanikisita kouitihananimoiukotogadekinakunatta 
karehaimamade seigihakanarazu zyaakuni katumonoto sinziteita 
sorega kyoumottomo sonkeisuru kuboikoutyouga sakainotamenioiharawaretanowo mite seigini taisuru giwakuga seitenni muragaru hakuunnogotokuwakidasitatokorodeatta

yanagikun!soreha tedukadeatta 
konogoro tedukaha uragiri monotosite nanninnimokirawaretadekareha kouitinimotareruyori sakuganakatta

haruno nayamitoiundabokuha syousetuhakiraidato kouitihaitta 
aasoukato tedukahabetuni hazimosezusorezya sekaino kaikiteyatuwo kunni miseyou doutaiga hyakugozyuu|kanmoaruikadano hanani wawotoosita bannindano tyakusyokusyasinga hyakumaimoaruyoarewo motteyukoukareha keikainikouittekaratuginisagesumuyouna kutyoude tibikouniitta

mainitiyatteimasuto tibikouhaitta

zeimusyode zeimusyo

kouitimo hasiridasita 
syounendokusyasyokunni hitokotosuru 
nipponno seiziha rikkenseizidearu rikkenseizitoiunoha kenpouniyotte seizino unyouha zinminno tewomotte okonaunodearu 
zinminhasonotameni zibunno sinzuru ninwo daigisini senkyosuru kennioiteha kenkaigiinsinioiteha sikaigiintyousonnioiteha tyousonkaigiin
korerano daigiinga kokuseikenseisiseityouseiwo ketugisurunodesono syugiwo tomonisuru monoha atumatte itidantonarusorewo seitoutoiu 
seitouha kokkano riekiwo zousinsurutameno kikandearusikaruni kabutono seitouto otuno seitoutohasono syugiwo kotonisurutameni nakaga warui nakaga warukutomo kokkanotamenara soutoumo tomuwo ezarutokorodearuganakaniha kokkano riekiyorimo seitouno riekibakariwo syutosuru monogaaru

korega nipponno kyouno seikaidearu 
sakaitakesitaha zitouno tasuuwotanominisite zyoyakuno tiiniarunowo saiwaini huseikouziwo okosite zitouno riekinisiyoutositakoreni taisuru rikkentouha tyoukainioite dankotositesono huseiwo semetateta

takesitahaima hutinno sakaini tatteiru 
ganhamada gakuseino midearu 
seizinokotohawakaranaigakareha zettaini titiwo sinziteita 
kareha matihe derutoatirakotirade huseikouzinouwasawo kikunodeattadagakarehaharanoutideseserawaratteita 
bakanayaturadaaituranibokuno oyazino ataiutigawakarumonkakareha nanninyorimo titiga sukideatta titiha yuubenkade hakusikide hourituni akarukute wanryokugaatte matino hitobitoniosorerareteiru titihaitumo kutiwokiwamete toudaino timeino seizikadaizinseitousyuryounadowo batousuru monbudaizinnogotokimo titiha zibunno sinyuunogotokuniiinasusorewo mite ganhamasumasu titihaeraito omotta 
sono nitikareha rihatutokodehutarino kyakuga hanasiteirunowokiita 
sasugano takesihutomo kyoukosoha ouzyousitarasiize tyoutyounihidokusikararetasoudayotohitorigaitta 
tyoutyoudattedouyara kusaimonodatohitorigaiu 
iya tyoutyouhanakanakaii nindahutarino hanasiwo kikinagara ganhamatasitemoharanoutide reisyousita 
tyoutyounantesorehaoreno oyazinihurimawasareterudekunoboudattekotowo siranaindakarehakou omoute iehe kaetta titihasudeni kaetteitadamattenigarikitta kaowosite suwatteitanode ganhatugino situhehikkonda kigenno waruitokini tikadukutogenkotuga tondekuruosoregaarukaradearu titiha tankidakaragenkotuga hizyouni hayai 
oi ganto takesitaha yonda 
haikisamadokoheittekita tokoyaheyukimasitananisiniitta atamawo karinibaka tuatamawo kattattekisamano atamagayokunaruka tuo kaasangayuketoittakarao kaasanmobakada atamahaikurada nizyuusendesu nizyuusende atamawo kariyagatte gakkouwo taikousareyagatte ganhadamatta nizyuusenno atamato zibunno taikoutoikanaru kankeigaarukato kangaetemitagakarenihawakaranakatta 
kouiutokini ieniirutorokunakotoganaito omottanodekarehasotto sotohedeta 
matiwo itizyunsitehutatabi kaeruto titino situni raikyakugaatta 
soreha yakubano syomukatyouno tutiitoiu rouzindeattakono rouzinha hizyouni kouzinbututoiu hyoubanmo takaiga hizyouniyokubaridatoiu hyoubanmo takaitumari kouzinbutudeatteyokubarinanodearu 
hahahadokoheittaka sugataga mienai titito tutiirouzinha sakewo nominagara hanasihayohodo kakyouni ituttarasii 
sinpaisurunayonandemonaisasonna tiisana ryoumideha tenkaga torenaize titino koeha kaikatugouhoudeatta 
demosonone tyoukaigaannanisawagi dasutodousitemonemouiiyowakattayooreni kangaegaarukarananiwobakanaha tuha tuha tuwaraigaderuyoudeha titihayohodo yotteiruto ganha omotta 
sikasiiyoiyo asitagoro tabunasitagoro kenzigaaruiha kenziga sirabenikurukamosirennodenaniwoiuka kenzigakitatokorodenanda syoukogaaruka tutyoubohasono yaitesimae rouzinhaatto koewoagetakiridamattesimatta 
ha tuha tuha tuto takesitahawaratta 
ga ganno asiotowo kiitesugudonatta 
dareda tubokudesu ganka nanihentokoyaheyukundaikura atamawokattemo rikouninaranzo ganhadamatte zibunno situnihairi tukueni mukatte honwo yomihazimetakareha honwo yomuto nemukunarunogakusedearuiku zikantukuenimotarete nemuttakawakaranaigagaragarato kowoakeru otoni mewosamasuto kyakuhasudeni sari hahamo tokonituitarasii 
nandaroukou omottatokikareha titiga sotohederu sugatawo mita 
dokoheyukundarou gazentositekareno atamani ukandanoha tibikouno ozikakutairaga tititakesitawoukagatte hukusyuusentositeirukotodearu kyoumo yakubawomatigatte zeimusyohe tinnyuusitatokorowo tibikougakitetureteittasoudahebinogotoku syuunenhukaiyatudakaraitudonnatokorokara tobidasite boukouwo kuwaerukamosirenai 
titiwo hogosinakyanaran ganha tatiagattakareha hosomino katanawosikonda kuronurino sutekki(titiga mukasiaiyousitamono )wo kowakinikakaete titinoatowotuketa 
hatukaamarino gatuganeboketayouni matino katagawawousunezumi syokuni akarukusiteita 
titino asimotoha ganga yosousitahodomidaretehainakattakareha matino kurai houno gawawo isogi aside aruita 
dokoheyukundarou ganhakou omoinagara titito nizyuuhobakarino kankakuwo tottesatorarenuyouni nokisitani souteitta 
titihasoretomo sirazunimassuguni hondoorihe dete hidarihe magatta 
yakubaheyukundakono sinyani yakubaheyukunohanannotamedarou ganno atamani itidano gikumogatadayouta 
tokarehasaraniodorokubekimonowo mita titiha yakubano iri kutikara irazunisibaraku madono sitanitatazundeitagayagate karugaruto madowakuniyozinobotta tewo garasumadonikaketakato omouto garasugakasukani hansyano hikato tomoni ugoita 
titino sugatahamou mienai 
dousitakotodarou ganhaakkeni toraretagasugukou omoikaesita 
nanikawasuremonowositanodaroudagakonotokikarehapatto issenno hihikariga madono garasuni ututtayouna kigasitasousitesoregasugu kieta 
naze dentouwotukenaindarouhutatabi hihikarigapattohirameita 
yugandayouna hansyaga garasuwokirakirasasetasoreharousokuno hikaridemonakereba gasuno hikaridemonai homatuno kemuriga kuromito siramito kongousite gyuunyuusyokuni tenzyouni tatinobotta 
ganhawarewowasurete madoniyozinobori honumanogotokuroukahe orita 
madokara haegasattohukikonda honootaru hihikato kokuennoaidani titiha hizyouna zinsokusawomotte tyoubohakoni aburawo sosoideiru sekiyuno kusaiha tissokusurubakarinihagesiku hanawotukusousitesusamazii ikioiwomotte kemuriwo itipainiminagirasu honoono sitaha miru miru yukaitawoname teeburuwoname kabewo tutaute tenzyouwo hawantositutuaru 
ganhaikinarisokoniaru tukuekakewototte tokono ueno kaenwotatakidasita 
daredato titiha sinobi koenidonatta 
bokudesuo tousanomaekananiwosuru kesimasyouabunai hayaku nigero kesimasyouto ganhanaomo hiwotatakinagaraitta 
abunai hayaku hayaku nigeropatipatitoketatamasii otogasite kokuenhaikututonaku naranda teeburuno sitawokugutte hunsuinogotoku mukouno anakara hukidasita 
madotoiu madono garasuha hirunogotoku hansyasita 
moudameda hayaku hayaku sitawo hae tatterutomuseruzo sitawo hatte hatte nigero kesimasyouto ganha sandoitta 
naniwoiukaguzuguzusiteruto sinuzo sindemokamaimasen kesimasyouo tousanbaka tukoi titihamuzuto ganno tewotukanda ganhasono tewonigirisimenagaraitta 
o tousananataha syoukosyoruiwo yakutamenikono yakubawo yakundesukananiwo 
titiha tewo hanasiteyoroyorotosizatta 
kesitekudasaio tousan ganha honoono nakahe tobikondakareha migini hasiri hidarini hasiriarayuru teeburuwo hini tookukorogasisorekara kabeyatanaya hakono sitawokakezurimawatte hino tewosaegirisaegiritatakinomesihumisidaki asyuraouga honoono kurumaninotte hino konawo hurasi kemurino kumowowakasiyukugagotokuabaremawatta 
dagasoreha mudadeatta 
aburato mokuzaino moyuru akusyuutomatu kurona kemuritoha ganno gotaiwo tutunda 
kesitekudasaito ganha kurusisouninaomo sakebituduketa 
gan!dokoda gan!titihawaga miwowasurete kemurino nakani ganwosagasita 
kesite kesiteo tousangobugobugobuto yunotagiruyouna otogasokokokoni kikoeta

kotaeganai 
gan!gan!yappari kotaeganai 
takesitaha gyoutensitakarehahutatabi katyuuni tobikondamou hino teha tokoitimennihirogatta migiwo mitemo hidariwo mitemo hino namigaodotteiru 
tenzyouniha hiryuuno sitaga kagayakidasita 
gan!takesitano munehaharisakerubakaridearukarehamou kyouakuna sanbyakudaigendemonakereba huseina seitouyademonaikarenoarayuru tihawaga kowo sukuoutosuru issinni moetatta 
kareha kemurini makarete tissokusiteiru ganno karadani asiwohuretakareha kyoukinogotokusorewo katanikaketasousitekitto madono houwo miyatta 
gakareha ranrantaru honoono kagamini irarete megakuranda gosikino nizigeigakatto nouwo sasitakato omoutosono hikarino nakani kakuzentohitorino otokono kaogaarawareta 
yaa kakutaira!karehakou sakende taoresouninattatotanni kakutairano udeha hayakumokareno doutaiwokakaeta 
oisikkarisiroto kakutairahaitta 
kisamahaorewo korosinikitanoka tasukenikitanda kakutairaha takesihutoto ganwo sayuunikakaetasousite zenryokuwokomete madono sotoheodorideta 
toutyokuno hitobitoya kinzyono hitobitoniyotte hiha kesaretaga situnaino zyuukihahotondo motiwonasanakatta 
zyuuyouna syoruihakotogotoku syousitusita 
hitobitoha madono sotoni taoreteiru takesitahusiwo byouinni okutta 
kakutairaha hitobitototomoni syoukanitutometasawaginoutini yorugahonobonoto aketa 
matiha kanaenowakugagotoku ryuugenhigoga okotta 
huseikouzino mondaiga okoritutuari daigigokugakokoni hirakarentosuru yasakini yakubani houkawositamonogaarutoiukotoha nannintoiedomo utagawazuniirarenai 
kabutohakouiu 
koreha dousikaisunawati yakubahano monoga syoukowo inmetusaserutameni houkasitanodearu otuhakouiu 
yakubahantaihasunawati rikkentounoyaturaga yakubawo utagawaserutameni koini houkasitanoda iromeganewomottemirutoizuremo dourinoyouni omoeru 
daga tasuuno ninhakouitta 
takesitahusiga itimeiwo nagedasite syoukanitutometa tokorowomottemiruto yakubahaga houkasitanodehanakaroukouitte hitobitoha takesitaga urawamatinotamenimezamasii hatarakiwositakotowo kutiwokiwamete syousansitasoreto douzini ganno kourouni taisuru syousanmo happoukara okotta 
hansihansyounomama byouinhe hakobaretamadeha isikisiteitagasono notinokotoha ganhanannimo siranakatta 
karega byouinno issituni megasametatoki zensinmo kaomo houtaisareteirunoni kigatuita 
megasamete 
hahano koega makuramotoni kikoeta douziniyasasii hahano megahakkirito mieta hahano kaohaaozameteita 
o tousanha 
to gangakiita 
sokoniyasundeirassyaimasu ganha mukinaoroutositaga itakutetamaranainodeyatto kubidakewo muketatyoudo naranda tonarino sindaini titiha houtaisita katatewo muneniatete nemutteiruhigemobinmo yaketidiretetokorodokoro kurozundeiruhooha houtainoaidakaramorete mieru 
o tousanhadonnadesuka taisitakotomonainodesu tedakega sukosihidoiyoudesuyosorehayokatta ganhakouittehutatabitukudukuto titino negaowo miyatta 
koregabokunoo tousannanokanaahutotubuyakuyounikouitta 
naniwoitteruno 
to hahaha bisyousita 
iyanandemoarimasen ganhadamattakareno atamanihahusigina giwakuga syouzita 
koregahatasitebokuno titidarouka 
waga mino tumiwo inpeisurutameni yakubawo yakoutosita kyouakuna sakuyano koui!soregabokuno titidarouka 
kareha yousyoukarawaga titiwo sonkeisi suuhaisiteita gakusikigaari tanryokugaari toukyouno timeino samuraito sitasiku maziwatte urawano matinisubarasii seiryokunoaru titiseigiwo sakebi zindouwo sakebi seizino kakuseiwo sakendeiru titi!zissaikarehawaga titiwoyuituno kyouzitositeitagaimayasorerano sonkeiya sinkouya kyouziha sotuzentositesubete muneno nakakara kie useta 
o tousanha warui nindakareha oogoewodasitenakitakunatta 
karenihananimonomonakunatta 
warui ninda !imamade titini osieraretakotosikararetakotosorerahaminnausonoyouni omoeta 
yaketetidiretahigegamunyamunyato ugoite kutigapokkariaite ranguino hagaarawaretakato omouto takesitaha mewopattirito hiraita 
titito kono sisenga atta 
ou megasametanokadouda itamuka titiha okinaotteitta 
nandemoarimasento ganha hiyayakaniitta titiha sindaiwo oriyoutosite kubinitutta houtaiwo kinisinagara ganno sindaihe yorisoutasousite sinpaisouna mewo ganno kaoni tikaduketa 
genkiwodaseyoiikadokomo itamihasinaika kurusikattara kurusiitoieyo ganhadamatte kaowosomuketa kurusisaha kubiwonokogiridehikareruyori kurusiisikasisoreha yakedono itamidehanai titiwosagesumu kokorono sinkizudearu 
kono yono nakani kamideari hotokedeari seigino eiyuudearuto sinziteitamonoga itiyanoutini akumanamizyuntonatta zetubouno kurusimidearu 
takesitahusino mimainitote raikyakuga sattousita matino hitobitohairoirona buppinwo okutta takesitaha hidarino udeto hidarino asiwo yaitanode gaisyutuhadekinakattakareha sindaino ueni suwatte raikyakuni sessita 
karehakou hitobitoniitta 
segarega inotigakedeyattekuretamondakarayatto kesitomemasitayosorekarakarehasegaretohutaride yakubano maewo touruto hino hikariga mietanode madowotatakikowasite nakahehaittagasono tokiha zyuuyousyoruiga yaketesimattaatodeattanogananiyori zannendatoitta

mita 
aa mitadonna huuteino monodasoreha kakutairaniyoku nitayatudatta ganha atamano noutenkara koorino bouwo uti komaretayouna kigasite omowazu sakenda

soudasorenitigainai 
aituhakiminiuramigaarukarakimini houkahanninno utagaiwokakesaseyouto omotte houkasitanitigainai reino kouzimondaiga okotteru saityuudakarakimiga tyoubowo yakutameni hiwotuketanodaroutohatyottodaredemo kangaerukotodakaranaiyaaituhazituniumaku kangaetamonodasoudakotoniyoruto rikkentounoyaturaga kakutairawo sendousitanokamosirenzeiyoiyoomosiroito tyoutyouhaisuwo noridasitekorewo kikaini konteikara rikkentouwo kaimetusurundanesoudazituni koukikaidawazawaiga tenzite hukutonaruzeoi hayaku taiinsitekuretigaimasuto ganhahutatabi sakenda

oreha kyoukara umarekawarundazodousitedaorega imamadeyoito omotteitakotohasubete waruikotonandasoregawakattayosorehadouiukotodadouiukototteomaesubetedayosubetedananimokamooreha waruikotowosite waruito omowanakattanoda oyazihaoreninandemo gakkoude itibantuyoi ningenninaretoiudaroudakaraoreha kenkawosita katudouwo miruto ninwo kittari tobakuwositarisurunoga kyoukakudatoiu nindadakaraorehasorewomanete mitandadagasoreha matigatterune waruikotowosite ninyorierakunaroutoiunoha dorobousite kanemotininaroutosurunoto onazimonodanesou omowanaikasoudatomodakarasa sakaihakouittatoki kizugaitamunode mayuwohisometa

urawano matiha taiheidearu

sensanhasono nitikara maiyosenseinomotohe kayouta senseihamata tirito rekisino kankeiwomottomo seimituni osietekuretasoreha hutuuno tyuugakkoudehakiwameteyurugasenisiteirukotodeatta tyuugakkoudeha tirino senseito rekisino senseitobetuna nindearunoga ooisonotameni missetuna hutatuno kankeiga bunrisaretesimauga mokumokusenseiha rekisino sinkoutotomoni tiriwo tenkaisaseta zinmuirai|yamatoha hassyouno tininatteirusokode senseiha yamatono tiriwo osieru douzini yamatoni katuyakusita zinbutuno denkiya ituwanadowo osieru 
gakuseino atamanihasono nintosono titosono zidaiga hukakukizamareru

niwani dete mizuwoabitekoi senseiha sensanno syouzikiga kiniitta

okunihamada ninno koegasuru 
dousitandarou sensanha tedukanaru isyaga kanemotiniha houkannogotokutiyahoyasuruga binbouninnihakiwamete reitandatoiu ninnouwasawo omoidasitasoreto douzinikono sinyani raisinwo koutozuibun sukunakaranuo reiwodasanebanarumaigasoremodekizunimuyamito monwotatakunohaikanimo atukamasiikotodato kangaetarisita 
yattonokotode syoseino koegasita 
donata 
touhuyano aokidesuga hahaga kyuubyoudesukaradoukatyottooidewo negaitaindesuhaaatomyouni kinonuketa henziga kikoeta 
touhuyano aoki
hai senseiha kazekideoyasumidesukaradoudesukaukagattemimasyoudouzoo negaisimasu kyuubyoudesukara sensanha kurai monzendesizukani mimiwosobadateta okude goisiwokuzusu otogatyaratyarato kikoeru 
nanda gowo utterunonioyasumidanantekou sensanha omotta 
tohutatabi tiisana madoga hiraita 
tadaima ukagaimasuarigatougozaimasuto sensanha omowazu ookina koedeitta 
douzoyorosikuarigatougozaimasu sensanha issokusakini iehe kaetta hahahamada syoutaiganai 
hietandakara asiwoatatamerugaiikou ozigaitta 
obahatadaurourosite butudanni tomosibiwotomositarisiteiru sensanhasugu hiwookosikaketa 
sokohe kurumano otogasita 
doumogokurousamadedouzokugurino kowohaittekitanoha tedukaisidenakute daisinno moritoiu otokodearu 
kono moritoiunohazuibun hurukukara tedukano yakkyokuniiruga daimitosite kanzyawo ousinsita kotohakiwametemaredearu sensanhaitumo moriga siroi yakkyokuhukuwo kite ouraide kyattibooruwoyatterunowo miteirunodehanahadaobotukanaku omotta 
senseiga kazekinande morihakouittezunzun okuheagarikondakarehasono gaitouto bousiwo kurumaottoniwatasitasorekara meganewotyotto hanano ueheseriagete byouninwo miyatta 
donnani waruindesukaaan 
karehao miyono udewototte myakuwosirabeta 
sorekara hatubyouno moyouwo kikinagara tyousinkiwo muneniatetari memabutawohikkurikaesitemitarisitasono taidohaikanimootitukiharatteiru 
koregaoriori genkande tedukato udeosiwositarisyatihoko tatiwositari kinzyono kodomowokarakattarisuru nintoha omoenai 
monkutide kurumaottogasikirinisekibaraiwositeirusoreha samukutetamaranaikaraii kagennisite kaettekuretoiukanogotoku mieta 
haankoreha nouhinketudesunaaantaisitakotohaarimasen atamakanasinetudesukana asiwoatatamete atamawohiyasite anminsaserutoiidesuaan kusuriha sankusurito mizukusuriaansugudeyorosiikarehakouitte senseikara karite kita kabanwo tori agete situwo deta 
oi koukiti!koukititoha kurumaottono meidearukarehaitumo asato banni sirihasyoriwosite koukititohutaride monzenni mizuwomaiteirunodearu 
syoseito kurumaottoha onazikukore houkouninnakamaiwaba doukaikyuudearu 
soregaima gouzento yobi sutenisaretanode koukititarumono kyoutyuuisasakaodayakadenaikarehadamatte kotaenakatta 
oi koukiti!naniwositoruka tuaan hayakuyukimasyouyo morisanto koukitiha gouharamagireniitta 
kora tugaitouto bousiwookureaan moriha sotohe deta kurumano hasiru otoga kikoeta samusaha samusi huheiha huheinariosoraku koukitikurumamokutugaeretobakari hasittakotodearou 
kurumaniokurezito sensanmo hasittakarega isyano genkanni tuitatoki okudehayahari igono otoga kikoeteita 
hahano byouzyouhasore izyouni susumanakatta 
gasaritote tokowoderukotohadekinakatta 
asitaninattara okirarerudaroukou hahahaittadaga yokuzitumo okirarenakatta 
byouzyakuna kanozyoga samusawookasite mainitimaiyonaisyokuwo hataraitasono tukaregatumoritumotte nounioyondanodearu 
sensanha touhuwokatuide matimawarino kaerisinani tedukano ieheyotte kusuriwomoraunodeatta saisyokusuriha hutukahunzutudeattaga hahanoo miyohasorewokobanda 
zikininaorukara itinitibunzutudeii hutukahunmorattemo mudaninarukarakorehaikanimo douriaru kotobadeattadouiuwakeka isyaha hutukahunzutuno kusuriwokurerusoremo hitotuhakanarazu ino kusuridearu kanemotino ieha kusuridainimo komaranugamazusiki iedeha itinitibunno yakkaha itinitibunno komedaini soutousuru 
o miyoha mainitikusuriwo nomutabinimottainaitoitta 
aru nitisensanha kaette hahanikouitta 
o kaasan tedukano ieno tenzyouha kousininatte hitotu hitotuni ewo hattearimasu kinunikaitakireina e!arewo mitakaeto hahaha byouiniotoroeta mewo muketesabisikuitta 
areha ousetusitudattandesuo tousanga sinakazega sukidattakarasou 
ano tonarino situnomou hitotu tonarino situha tyasitukazedeomaegasokode umaretanodesu hagino tenzyoudesu tokono maniha hahano koeha hatatoyanda kanozyoha mewouttorisasete mukasisono ottoga yoniarisitokino zenseina seikatuwo kaisousitanodeatta 
anotokiniha zyotyuuga goninsyoseiga sanninmatugewo tutaute tamano tuyugahororitokoboreru 
o kaasan !tumaranaikotowoiunohayositekudasaibokuhaimaniare izyouno iewo tateteagemasusousousoudane hahahasabisikuwaratta sensanhatamaranaku kurusikunattaimamade muneno sokoniosaetuketeoita yuuutugamuramurato kumonogotokuwaita 
kareha kusuriwomoraini isyano ieheyuku sinakazeno tenzyouno sitani tiisaku suwatteiruto reino yuuutugahisihisitosemattekuru 
aakokogaoreno umaretatokoronandaorega umaretatokini tedukano oyazigapekopeko atamawosagete mimainikitandasoregaimasoituni senryousareteabekobenioreno houga atamawosagete kusuriwomorainikiteruaru nitikarehakonnakotowo kangaenagara monwohairoutosurutosokode daisinmorikunga tedukato kyattibooruwositeita 
sorakondoha doroppudazo tedukaha tokuininatte tamawonigirikaete moosyonwotuketa 
yosikita morikunhaheppiri kosininatte kataasiwo ukasitekamaetamosi asiniatarisouna tamagakitara kataasiwoagete nigasoutoiu harananodearu 
saakoiyosi tutamaha daitiwotataite yokono heiwo utisaraniodoriagatte sensanno touhuokewo utikorokorotodobuno houhekorogatta 
oi touhuya!hayaku tamawotoreyo tedukagasakenda 
ha tusensanhaokewokatuidamama tamawookkaketaokeno mizuhadabudabuto namiwoodorasite hutamo houtyoumo daitini otita 
yaayaa yuukanyuukanto morikunha kassaisita sensanha tamaga isinodobu haziwo tutatte dorono nakahe otikomoutosuruyatuwoyattoosaeyoutositatenbin bouga dobeinigatantotukiatattato omoutokarehahanekaesarete touhuokemorotomo sirimotiwotuita 
touhuha sakanano gotokuhanete tizyouni titta 
bakadaneokewo oite hasirebaiindabaka tutedukahakouitte zibundedobudorono nakakara tamawotumamiageikinari sensannookeno nakade tamawo aratta 
soreha komarimasuto sensanha uttaeruyouniitta 
touhukawo harattara monkuganaidarou tedukahawaratte okuhehikkonda 
mate tuto sensanha yobitomeyoutositagazitto sitakutibiruwokanda 
ima tedukato kenkawosureba hahano kusuriwomoraukotogadekinakunarukareno mekara atui namidagawakideta 
ningenno kityouna syokuryouhin!sonookeno nakanidobudoronimamireta tamawotukkonde araunanteamarino ranboudearu

karehamourappawohuku rikimonakunatta

sensanomae konyamo yasumuno 
aadousitedayukitakunaikarayukimasenkareno koehatukkendondeatta hahaha kanasisouna medekarewo miyattanarinanimoiwanakatta sensanha yaguno nakani kubiwotukkondekara kokorono nakade hahaniayamatta

oi aoki!yuugatano matiha hitodoorigahinpandearuamarini ookina koenanode ouraino ninha tatidomatta 
oi aoki!sensangahurikaerutosoreha mokumokusenseideatta senseiha kataniturizaowo kanai katateni sumidawarawokakaeteirutawarano sokokaraimonosippogakoboresouniburaburasiteiru

sensei!bokugakatuideo takumade motteyukimasuto sensangaitta

haimou nitiga kurekakete ieno nakaha usugurakatta sensanhawaraziwonuide herihazini suwatta

senseihazitto sensanno kaowo mitumeta 
douda sensei!kimino titisoha nantyouno tyuusindakimino tino nakani sosenno tiga ikiteruhazudakimino seisinnoutini sosenno tamasiiga nokotteruhazuda kunha erabaretaru kokuminda taisetuna sintaida nipponninakutehanaranai sintaidasouha omowanka sensei!nanimoiukotohanai sosenno meiwohazukasimenaiyouni hunpatusuruka senseisoretomo syougaitouhuyadekutihateruka sensei!watasihananimoiunasaaimowo kututtekara henziwosiro senseihaimononabewoorosita niwahasudeni kurete oti hagasarasarato naru sitirinno higa kazeni hukaretepatto moeagaruto siragasirozenno mokumokusenseino kaotoharisakeruyounisuzusii mewomihiraita syounenno akai kaotoga anno nakani ukidasite mieru

konotoki gyouretuga seitoo toorininaru

binboudemokamaimasen 
o kaasan kenieoyabouhahonnohadaka midemotte ousyuuya iseya syotokorokatagatade gunwo okosite maketeha nige nigetehamata giheiwo atume tuitatidatte yasumuhimamonaku tenkoyounotameni hatarakimasitayosorenikuraberuto nitini sandozutugo mesiwo tabeteirubokunazohamottainaito omoimasu

yaa mukoukara yaoyano hankougakitanaaremo tyuusinnisiteyarunda

kono sanninhaminnadekiruyatudesu

anbaha zissaisenseiomoideatta 
kareha kiseityuuniha maiasakanarazu senseiwotazunete mizuwokumi mesiwotaki yoruno souziwosita 
senseiha sotohe deruto anbano zimanbakariiu

kaarairuwomanetehaikan 
eiyuuha hanazyanai midearu 
mosi hanadearunarasoreha hantaru keihakuno totoiwanakyanaran 
meiyobussituhossorerawomotte mokutekitosurumonoha makotono eiyuutohaienaizoiika 
eiyuuha zinruino tyuusintendearusouda tyuusintenda kurumano zikuda kokkawo sasaeru daikokubasirada girisyano sinwani atorasuyamaha tenga otirunowo sasaeteiru yamatositearu

senseihaarigatainakarehaitumokouitta 
kareto tibikouhasuguni sinyuuninatta 
oriorihutariha kougaihedete nagai nagai tutumino uewo sanposita 
samui samui kazegahyuuhyuu nomenwohukukareasihazawazawa natte kumoga hikukutareru anbaha heikidearu 
kareha takai tutumini tatte muneitipainihatte takarakani utau 
aa tamahaini hanaukete midorisakeni gatuno kageyadosi tianno yumenihukeritaru eigano timatahikuku mite kouokanisosori tatu goryouno kenziikitakasi 
baritonno koedearuga ryouha yutakani tikaragamititeiru 
soreha tookuno morini hankyousi tikakuno nomenwowataribekibekitaru rakukumowo yabutte tento titono koudaimuhenna kangekiwo itipainihuruwasu tibikouhadamattesorewo kiiteiruto tainaino tiga yakuto tyouruyouna kigasuru 
ziyuugouhouna seisyunno kihasono tukareta nikutaiya otoroeta seisinni kinhebiginhebino sekiyoutaru hikariwoataeru 
mottoyattekuretokarehaiu 
umuyosi tuanbaha sitirinnoyouna kaowogutto kituritusaseruto douzini hanaanawopatto ookikusurutosuguinosisinoyouniarai kokyuuwopuutohuku 
huyouno yukino seiwotori hounono hanano hanawoubai kiyosiki kokoronomasuraoga turugito hudetowotori motite hitotabi tataba nanigotoka zinseino igyounarazaran 
utatteikuutinikareno kaohamasumasu kuroku akaramisono meha kagayakiwaga kouwo aisuru netuzyouto eienno risouto genzairikigakuno yuukitosubeteno takamaina hutouna huntoutekina kihakugaarasinogotoku tossyutusitekuru 
tibikouha namidawotareta 
kimihana binbouwo kinisityaikanzoto anbahaitta 
binbouhodo yukainakotohanaindakareha tibikounokatawarani suwatteiituduketa 
oreha binboudakara syomotuga kaenakatta 
oreha zassisura yondakotohanakatta 
suruto senseihaoreni honwo kasitekureta 
senseino honha nizyuunenmo sanzyuunenmo maeno honda senseigaoreni kasitekureta honha sumisuno daisuuto suuintonno bankokusito siosamutoorikansoredakedaanna honha toukyouno huruhonyanidatteariyasinai 
daga sinkanno honga kaenaikara hurui hondemosorewo yomuyorihokanisiyouganakattasokodeorehasorewo yonda tomodatiga asobinikiteoreno tukueno uewo ziroziromirutokiorehahazukasikute honwokakusitamonoda tamaturigotokaninsatunante hongaarundakarana zissaihazukasikattayo 
orehakonna zidaiokureno honwo yondemo yakuni tatumaito omottadaga senseiga kasitekureta hondakara yomanaiwakeniyukanaisore igainiha honganaindakaranasokodeoreha yonda 
saisyohamuzukasikumoaritumaranaito omottagadandan'omosirokunattekita tuitatituitatito zibunga kotteikuyouna kigasita 
oreha nyuugakusikenwo ukerutokihonno toukabakari senseiga zyunbihukusyuuwositekureta 
konna kyuusikinanodemoiinoka sirantooreha omotta 
daizyoubudaiketo senseigaittaorehaittasousiteumaku nyuugakusita 
naa tibikouanbahananiwo omottaka meni itipai namidawotataeta

senseihanikkori waratte muneno sitawo sasasita

ippou|mokumokuzyukudeha gakugyounohimahimani mourensyuuwotuduketa

sensei!siitonokkuha siitono houhe uttekudasaito sensanga tangansita

sensei!massuguna tamawokudasaito sensangaiu 
baka tutekihaitumomassuguni tourukayosoregaowaruto senseiha sensanni toukyuusasete zibunde goropponwo utu 
daga senseino zoutta battohakobukobudarakenanode utta tamahaminna fauruninari tippuninaru

iti|huntokino tigaimonaku zen'ingautisorouta

senseiha daiitibanno go|oozu(tousyu)nohesonotokorowo ositemita 
oikimiha kahukuni tikaraganaizo munenotokorowohekomasite kahukuwohukuramasuyouniseihai senseihatugino kuramounohesowo osita 
oi ookinahesodanaabokuhaima tikarawo iretetukidasiterunodesuikanhesonotokorowotukidasunozyanaihesono sitahe tabetamonowominnasageteyarundaiika munegasekasekasite makemai makemaitoaserebaaseruhodo kahukugahekonde katasakini tikaragahairi atamaganoboserunda mikataga make syokuninattaraminnahesoni kiwootitukeroiikawasureruna mokumokuzyukuha itimeiheso gakkoudazosou omoe senseihahitorihitorinihesowo ositemita

sokode senseimowaratta

mosi kuboikoutyouga harunara kumadakoutyouha huyudearu zensyaha harukaze|taitoukousyaha kanpuu|rinretu!donnani samui nitidemo kumadakoutyouha gaitouwo kinai koutyousituni hibatimookanaikatute daihubukino nisseitohakotogotokuhurueteita nitikoutyouha kouteinidete yukidarumawo korogasimawattasono kamitonaku metonaku kutitonaku yukidarakeninattaga sukosimohirumanakatta

kino dokudakawaisouda kouitiha muneitipaininatta 
zya katudounokotohasoredeyosinisiyou daininikimiha insyokutenhe deirisurusoudaneaasoregaikenainokadaredatte nondari kututtarisurudarou tedukakunbokudatte ninga yousyokuwo kueba kuitakunarusoba yahehairukotomoarudagane gakuseihadokomademo zyunketudenakerebanaranainoda insyokutenha taiteiotonanikegasareteiru huketuna onnaga deirisuru gakuseihasouiu sukosidemo huketuna basyoheittehaikenainoda sintaigakegarerukaradaiikarippana tamahakirino hakoni iretesimatteokudarou gakuseihakegarenonai tamadasorewokimihadobudorono nakani tobikonderunodakimiha ieniireba yousyokudemonandemo kueru mibunzyanaikanaze tabetakereba iede tabenainoda gakkoudeyakamasikuiunomo keisikidehanaisonnakusatta syumiwo yorokobuyouninaranaiyounisurutamedakiminokotobakariwoiunozyanaiyobokudatteoriori otonanomanewositaito omoukotogaarudagasorehaiyasiikotodato omoikaesudakedaiyadabokuhabokuno sendebokuno sukinatokoroheyukunoni gakkougananimo kansyousurunihaataranaizyanaika tedukakunkimihadousitemobokuno tyuukokuwokiitekurenainokaiyadabokuni waruikotoganaindasoredehakimito kouitiha hunzentosite mewomihatta
